1b1(mdo sde): //rgya ga bskad du/Ar+ya pany+tsa pUr mit+tA ni rdo shA nA ma ma hA yAn stu tra/
1b2(mdo sde): bod skad du/'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po
1b3(mdo sde): mdo/bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
1b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das
2a1(mdo sde): /mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chol mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong stong
2a2(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs
2a3(mdo sde): pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/
2a4(mdo sde): cang shes pa/glang po chen po/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid
2a5(mdo sde): par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems can thams
2b1(mdo sde): cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phul cher gzhon nur gyur pa/skye ba
2b2(mdo sde): gcig gis thogs pa/sems can gyi bsam+ba pa ji lta bo bzhin du srid pa las grol ba/srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa/thams cad kyang bla na
2b3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /
2b4(mdo sde): dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas/bla mar byas/
2b5(mdo sde): ri mo byas/mchod pa byas nas/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba bla na med pa/lho dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/
2b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid los brtsams nas 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston to//de nas bcom ldan
3a1(mdo sde): 'dus dang wAn+d+ra pa shU r+yA ti bul bka' stsal du/shA rad+ya tISh+Ti 'phrul byung chu ba sems dpa' sems
3a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na mngon par 'du byed pa med par sbyin pa byin par bya'o//de skad ces bka'
3a3(mdo sde): stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA radr-i ti'i thAs bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ga sol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
3a4(mdo sde): ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa legs/bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad gyi gtso bor gyur pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ni
3a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi skyon par gyur pa lags te/de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das las gang thos ni dge slong rnams 'dzin parje 'gyur ba di
3a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis dge slong rnams la bshad du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung thar
3b1(mdo sde): gyur te/lan gnyis kyi bar du gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa tI'i bu ngas khyod la bcol gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3b2(mdo sde): chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lngas brtsams te/khyod spobs par gyis shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa tI'i bus bcom ldan 'das lus go/
3b3(mdo sde): skabs gnang ba thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus thog ma nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms
3b4(mdo sde): shing rjes su ston te/bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas thog mi nyid du rnam pa thams
3b5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par bgyi zhing sbyin pa byon par bgyi'o//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
3b6(mdo sde): dmigaso par bgyis nas sbyin pa byin no/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags so//byang chub
3b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' lta bar lhung bas sbyin pa byin po ni mi bsngo'o//nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngos pa ni de lta ma lags so//de ci'i slad du
4a1(mdo sde): nan de'aM zlas du lagrus pa tshul bar s+ho spyod ga//denas chod ldan pa sa ma 'brugang pos rlo dang na
4a2(mdo sde): pashU ra dwa ti'i bu la 'diska/ ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir na de byang chub sems deng 'asnyems dpa' chen po'i 'jigs pa yin par shes par bya/
4a3(mdo sde): smras pa/nyan thos rnams dang 'bras bu mnyam par 'gyur du 'ong bsnyen de'i phyir de'i 'jig sa bu yin par shes par bya'o//de na sna tshe dang ldan pa byams ma
4a4(mdo sde): bregang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA re dwa tI'i bu la 'di skyed ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pA shA ra dwa tI'i bya byang chub sems dpo'i sbyin pa byin pa gang yin po dang /
4a5(mdo sde): nyan thos dgra bcom pa mngon sum+b+ha du bya bar 'dod pa sbyin pa byin pa gang yin pa 'di la bye dag ni ci yod/tha drad du dbye ba ni gang yon/smras pa/tshe dang
4a6(mdo sde): ldan pa gang pa thadud du dbye ba ni 'odi nyid sbyin te/gcig ni gang nyan thos kyi sar yongs su sdu bar byed la/cig shes ni rnam pa thams nad mkhyen pa nyid du/
4a7(mdo sde): yongs su sngo bar byed pa yin na//de ci'i phyir zhin/tshe dang ldan pa dper na skyes bral li zhig de dgi rgyal por gyur kyang cim rung sum du rgyal po'i sa l-i
4b1(mdo sde): dmigs nas sbyin pa byin la/skyes bu cig shos ni bdag rgyal po de'i yul na gnas kyang ni mu rung snyam du mngag gzhug par khas lon par 'dod de sbyin pa byin zhing de ltar
4b2(mdo sde): yongs su sngon/skyes bu des skyes bu snga ma des dmigs pa'i rgyal po'i sa gang yin pa de nyid non par nus sam/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dri bzhin du byang chub sems
4b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs nas sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su stso la/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni sbyin pa gling byin pa de nyan thos
4b4(mdo sde): kyis la dgra bcom pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do//de ltar 'phags pa nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' nye gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod na/skyes pa des sbyin pa de nyid
4b5(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bor byed pa'i mthu dang nus pa yod dam/yang tshe dang ldan pa gang po mos pa gang dang ldan pas byin po de rnam pa thams cad
4b6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'i mos pa de ni med kyi/sbyin pa de nyan thos su yongs su bsngo ba 'dren byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa
4b7(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tha dad du dbye ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na skyes bu la la zhig sbyin pa 'dis bdag tshong dpon nam/khyim bdag gamatshangs par
5a1(mdo sde): gyur cig ces sbyin pa byin pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sbyin par byalta'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams mA'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sh+tsa
5a2(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/shU rAdwa ti'i bus shin tu legs par smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dperan
5a3(mdo sde): skyes bu la la zhig kaR+ShA pA Na 'bum khyer te/khyim bdag phyug po gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du song nas 'di skad du/kaR+ShA pa Na 'bum 'di dag khyod la 'bul te/bdug
5a4(mdo sde): kyang khyod kyi thad na 'dug cing bya ba dang /sbyor ba rnams la g.yog bgyid do zhes zer ba de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sbyin pa byin zhing /
5a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring du khos len to//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ltar sbyin pa byin par mi byed de/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
5a6(mdo sde): spyod pa dang nyan thos kyi sbyin pa byin pa'i khyad par du dbye ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med gcig gros gser 'bum khyer
5a7(mdo sde): to/tshong dpon nam/ded dpon gang yang rung ba'i drung du song nas 'di skad du/ ser 'bum 'di dag kyang khyed la 'bul/bdag kyang khyod kyi g.yog bgyid cing sngor
5b1(mdo sde): ldang ba dang /phyis nyal ba dang /khyod kyi dgyes pa bzhin spyod par bgyid do zhes zer ba de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag sbyin pa'ang sbyin zhing de bzhin
5b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i nyon thos nyid du khas lon to//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smos so//tshe
5b3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa sbyin pa de nyid yongs su btang du 'dra na/gcig ni nyan thos kyis yongs su 'dzin par gyur la/glacig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 'dzin par gyur
5b4(mdo sde): pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/tshe dang ldan pas legs par smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thams cad du thabs la mkhas par blta bar bya'o//gzhan
5b5(mdo sde): yang tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin par 'dod cing /bla
5b6(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na thog ma kho nar 'di skad du sbyin pa 'di las byung ba'i bsod
5b7(mdo sde): nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang
6a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni ster rmi sdug pa stod du byu //phyir mo ldog pa gang dag gnas pa d+mo dganats+tsha du rnam pa thams
6a2(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces brjod par bya ste/de ltar bdag nyid kyang de'i khongs su gtogs par byed cing byang chub sems dpe'i de dag kyang
6a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin par byed do//ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin cing rjes su srung ba de lta de ltar rnam pa thams
6a4(mdo sde): cud mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba de lta de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro//
6a5(mdo sde): tshe dang ljon pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byin pa ni/sbyin pa de 'di ltar bdag gis kha zlasgo kyi sbyin pa 'di las sems can+da
6a6(mdo sde): gang dag mig lam na snang ba dang /glang dag myi snang ba thams cad las sems can gang dag za ba dang /cung zad za bar gyur pa'i sbyin pa de las gang bdag gis dge
6a7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/theg pa las gser du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
6b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dgra gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig/phyir mi ldog pa gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
6b2(mdo sde): nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsdu bar byed pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa
6b3(mdo sde): rnams yongs su 'dzin cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dong yung nye bar 'gyur to/gang gi tshe sbyin pa chung ngu'ang dpag tu med par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
6b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po'i thebs la mkhas pa yin par rig por bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang
6b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa byon pa na/bdag gi sbyin pa 'di bla na med pa yang dog par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mo gtogs par gzhan du rnam par smin pa
6b6(mdo sde): mo gyur cig ces de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o//gol te yongs su sngo bar byed na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o//ci ste phyis yun ring mo zhig lon
6b7(mdo sde): nas yongs su sngo bar byed cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed na'ang de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang bya
7a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa ni nyung ngu zin kyang mang bar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir/
7a2(mdo sde): ro//sbyin pa mang po'ang nyung ngu'i 'gyur ba yod par rig par bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dri ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi bsngos pa'i phyir ro//
7a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa de'ang gal te phyis yun ring mo zhig lon nas yongs su sngo byar byed na'ang sbyin pa'i spyi bor te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra thob par 'gyur ro//tshe drang
7a4(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor ba thog ma med pa nos 'khor ba nas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par ma brjod par sbyin
7a5(mdo sde): pa byin pa gang yon pa de'ang byang chub sems dpas thabs mkhas pa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin par yongs su sngo zhing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par
7a6(mdo sde): byedan byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin par rig par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams me'i bu glang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
7a7(mdo sde): ces smos so//tshe dang ldan po ci 'di khyod nyid kyi spobs pa yin nam 'on to bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs yin smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa bdag gi spobs pa
7b1(mdo sde): gang yin pa 'di ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs yin no//tshe dang ldan pa glang po 'di la 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu myed/grangs med tshad med pa dag/
7b2(mdo sde): na sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du so so'i skye bo rnams sam/nyan thos
7b3(mdo sde): rnams sam/rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin la/sbyin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpos bsams te/bsamo nas kyang 'di skad du sbyin pa 'di la rjes su yi rang
7b4(mdo sde): ngo zhes zer zhing /de ltar yongs su gtong ba rnams kyi de la byang chub sems do pa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yod la/rjes su yi rang nas
7b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dris 'jig rten gyi khams mtho' yas mu med pa dag na/theg pa la gsar du
7b6(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig/phyir mi ldog pa'i gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
7b7(mdo sde): po nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ca na/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du rnam pa thams cad
8a1(mdo sde): pa pa'i bsna mdun/byung chu sa ma pa'i sa dang bad lda de'i sems la / shid+hA /
8a2(mdo sde): DU bye ba ma /zla s+yA pyu glu y+YA pa/ / rnamadi ste byang sa smras
8a3(mdo sde): dz+has su yi ring ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des thams cud zil gyis non pa'i phyi ro//rgyu dang ldan pa gang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ny-id kyis 'dir thabs
8a4(mdo sde): lemadzes pa nyid ba na dang //dang ldan pa rling pog na ya ni sa mas can de dge mas cang bsgral po ga sa khyim snyid du gnas nga sa su rgyus
8a5(mdo sde): lasogs pa'i dge slong gling gi'i'adzin la sbyin pa ya sbyin nang bskyed rnams na mide labyang chub sems dang rjes su so rang /kyi mkhyen pa
8a6(mdo sde): legs par byin no//legs par sbyin par byed //ste steng du gyis te sbyin pa bye //nes sa te sbyin par byed do//smad pa med par sbyin par byed do//sbyin
8b1(mdo sde): pa d+ma lanas su yi dang nan/byang chub sems dang 'du sa su yi dang ba dang ldan pa'i sems la snyam sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i bsod na nas mngon par 'dra byed pa das
8b2(mdo sde): ma'i gau d+hAng 'dum smi da/ ba rgyu da/bye ba na dang/skyed de/ dang /babyung ba dang /dpo /
8b3(mdo sde): yang nye bar mi 'gro/de ci'i phyir zhen/'di ltar byang chub sems dpo'i ni rjes su yi rong ba'i sems kyis zil gyis gnon par byed par rig par bya'o//rje drung dz+nyAn pa
8b4(mdo sde): gang po dper na zla ba'i dkyilde 'khor 'char ban spyir mo'i gzugs gang rje snyed yid pa de dag thams cad kyi 'od med par byed do//tshe drong ldan pa glang po dper na nyi ma'i dkyi
8b5(mdo sde): 'byor rgyu mang+yas gling 'di ga rnapas gas sbyin du ma skyer rnaMs gling bye myur bye thams cung rdzol kyis sminan tu di myed pa byud do//rnyedang ldan pa gang po
8b6(mdo sde): bas/ nga chen par rgyu la/smre gling dun na zug N+DIg bzhini ma da kyi spyir bye rnams
8b7(mdo sde): blurin po che bai n+ya ts+yai gcig pa'i kha dog dang 'a kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur /'di mi sdang zhing mi smra par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin rje dems lnga
9a1(mdo sde): dag thams cad bskul pa dpag tu med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas pa'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni byang chub sems
9a2(mdo sde): dpa' de'i rjes su yi dang ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe drang ldan po gang po dper na/rta rin po
9a3(mdo sde): tshedrigi rlung du zhugs na/rte phal de dag thams cad gsal bu ma yin zhing sme ba mra yin la/rje rgod pa'i bag kyang ston par mi byed de/de dgra thams cad rti rin
9a4(mdo sde): chengs zil gyis nAMn par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du bskul pra gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas pa'i sems can de dog thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i
9a5(mdo sde): bstod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de/byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar me 'grob nas rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi
9a6(mdo sde): 'gro ste/de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas rjes su yi rang ba'i sems kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems
9a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag ni theg pa la
9b1(mdo sde): gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyi m+b+hi ldog par gyur cig/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gung dag gnas pa de dag ni myur/
9b2(mdo sde): dra rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur nag/chos yongs su bsdu bar byag//ji wA ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i che bde yongs sug
9b3(mdo sde): bde lta de ltar snang bar 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro//rdo lta ji ltar dge ba'i rno ba de dag bdag gir mi byed cing /dge ba'i rje ba 'dis
9b4(mdo sde): sems cani thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyod pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtswa bla rnams kyis 'bogs par 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis
9b5(mdo sde): 'bogs pa de lta de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rna ba de dag lus bdag gi bar sems mi bskyed pa de lta de ltar dge ba
9b6(mdo sde): rnab dpag tu med pa 'dzin to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa glang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
9b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i chen po'i rjes su yi ring po'i sems thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngos nas theg po la gsar du gas pa'i byang chub se ma so dpa'i rnams la phyin
10a1(mdo sde): 'dogs par byed do//rjes su 'dzin cing phyir mi ldog pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mngon par shes pa skor bar yongs su sna'o//des/
10a2(mdo sde): de dag la'ang phan btugs nas bdag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 'dzin par byed pa 'di ni/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la
10a3(mdo sde): mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rnam pa thams nang ma khyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phy-ir te/bdag de las gnan pa'i byang
10a4(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang don che bar byed do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//
10a5(mdo sde): rje dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang bskal pa gAng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas pa'i sems can de thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa
10a6(mdo sde): byin pa ni bsod nams dag kyang byed pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ba
10a7(mdo sde): snyoms lan cig tsam 'brel na'ang /bsod snyoms 'bul ba gang yin pa 'di la dge ba'i rtse ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/
10b1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' drang sems can de dag gi len pa po ni mtshungs te/len pa po mi mtshungs/
10b2(mdo sde): pa ma yin mod kyi/bsngo ba dang bral ba'i phyir sems can de dag gi sbyin pa de byang chub sems drapa'i sbyin pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro le rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do///
10b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ston pa byin pa ni 'di ltar bro dag gis sbyin pa 'di ltar byin zhing /'di ltar yongs su btang ba
10b4(mdo sde): las bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa dang /dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa'i dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can
10b5(mdo sde): rnams sems can dmyal ba nas 'dron par gyur cig/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas 'don par gyur cig/gshin rje'i 'jig
10b6(mdo sde): rten gyi sems can rnams gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas 'dron par gyu tsog dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
10b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldeg pa nyid du gyur cig/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myun du rnam pa thams
11a1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig nasu sems bskyed par bya ste/ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba dgu bskyed pa delta/
11a2(mdo sde): de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par byed de/dge ba'i rtsu ba dpag tu med pa'ong rnam paru 'phel bar byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang
11a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/'di 'ang byang chub sems dpa'i thab so la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o//ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtse ba rnams la bdag gi bar 'du shes mi byed pa de
11a4(mdo sde): lta de ltar bsod nams dpag tu med pa mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su 'dzin to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang
11a5(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no//dge ba'i rtsa ba gzugs med pa gang yin pa'ang yongs
11a6(mdo sde): su gtong na gzugs yod pa'i dngos po lta ci smos te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yod pa dang /gzugs med pa'i dngos po thams cad
11a7(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba yin te/thams cad yongs su gtong bas na de thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro//'di skad du nang gi 'am/phyi rol gyi 'am/gzugs yod pa 'am/
11b1(mdo sde): gzugs med pa'ang rung ste/gang bdag gis yongs sum btang ba'am/ma byin pa'am/mchod sbyin ma byas pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong //dngos po yang /
11b2(mdo sde): dge par rjes su mi mthong ngo //zhes kyang seng ga'i sgra sgeg cing de ltar dga' nga skyid do//cha dang ldan da gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po bla na med pa yang dag
11b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi gzigs te/'di skad du nang gi 'am/phyi rol gyi 'am/gzugs
11b4(mdo sde): yod pa 'am/gzugs med pa'ang rung ste/gang bdag gisde yongs su ma btang po'am/mo byin pa 'am/mchod sbyin ma byas pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
11b5(mdo sde): ste/gang gis phyir bdag gis dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i phyir bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
11b6(mdo sde): gang bdag gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs margyas pa'am/yongs su ma shes pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //ji ltar chos de yang dag par rjes su myi mthong
11b7(mdo sde): ba de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob ste/gang bdag gis mngon//
12a1(mdo sde): b+hur rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'am/yongs su ma shes pa de ni'ang med do//ji ltar gang bdag gis yongs su ma btang ba 'am/ma byin pa de cing
12a2(mdo sde): med pa de ltar bdag gis chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'am/yongs su mi shes pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes seng ge'i sde sgrog go/
12a3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yongs su btang bas na/nang dang phye'i chos rnams la zhis ga
12a4(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs par stangs ma rgyas pa'am/yongs su ma shes pa'i chos ci 'di yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/tshe dang ldan pa glang po byung chub sems dpa' sems
12a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming thob cing rnam pa thams
12a6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yong mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems dang mi
12a7(mdo sde): 'brel po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mi rnyed na/gnod sbyin nam sha zas blags rnyed pa lta ci smos te 'di ni gnas med do//tshe dang /
12b1(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos sems shing 'gro ba'i phyogs der mi 'am/mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags mi skyed do//de
12b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/yid la byed pa de dag ni de ltar stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa rnams ni de ltar bsnam gyis mi khyab cing de ltar rgyu
12b3(mdo sde): che'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ni de ltar sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'ang yin la nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yin no//
12b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam grangs 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad
12b5(mdo sde): zil gyis gnon to//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang phan 'dogs par gyur pa dang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//sems can
12b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir chos kyang ston to//sems can dpag tu med pa'ang phung po gsum du yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam
12b7(mdo sde): brengs 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byis pa so so'i skye bo
13a1(mdo sde): thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog ces bya/gtso bo dang /phul dang /rab dang /rab mchog dang /bla
13a2(mdo sde): na med pa dang /grong na med pa zhes bya'o//yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sems can rnams kyi phan 'dogs par gyur pa dang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/gang dag de
13a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la spos dang /me tog dang //phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan rnams
13a4(mdo sde): kyis bkur sti byed/bla mar byed/ri mor byed/mchod pa byed de/de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro//gang dag 'dod
13a5(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba'i bsam pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la me tog gcig tsam 'bul ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos
13a6(mdo sde): can du lung bstan to//tshe dang ldan pa glang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug na'ang sems can rnams kyi phan 'dogs par gyur pa dang nye bar 'tsho
13a7(mdo sde): ba yin la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang sems can rnams kyi phan 'dogs
13b1(mdo sde): padang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa ma
13b2(mdo sde): gtogs par sems can gyi ris ni byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i sems can de gang yang mi dmigs te/yod ces bya ba ni gnas med do//tshe dang ldan
13b3(mdo sde): pa gang po dper na gser ni bsregs kyang rung /ma bsregs kyang rung ste/sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba yin/bzhu'ang rung /ma bzhu'ang rung /brdungs su byas kyang rung /
13b4(mdo sde): ma byas kyang rung ste/sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyir spyod de'ang sems
13b5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das na 'od sems can
13b6(mdo sde): rnas kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis ni gling bzhi po dag tu sems can rnams kyi bye ba byed cing gling bzhi po dag gi nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/
13b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis yong na snang zhing gsal la nyin mtshan dang /zla ba phyed dang /dus tshogs dang /lo rnams shes par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin
14a1(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug na'ang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
14a2(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs par sangs rgyas pa dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa'o sems
14a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po ni de ltar chos rgya chen po dang ldan pas ni nams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na ded dpon gser
14a4(mdo sde): 'bum dag gis nye tshong byed na/sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa dag bde bar 'gyur te des nor gyi phung po bsdus pa la de dag yongs su spyod do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de
14a5(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug gam sdod kyang rung ste/sems can du ma bde bar 'gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
14a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de nyid kyi mthus nyan thos rnams bde bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/tshe dang ldan pa glang po de ltar na byang chub
14a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa'i tshe 'am/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni'ang rung ste rnams kyang nye bar
14b1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba ma yin no//gang gi tshe bdag kyang bde la/sems can gzhan rnams kyang bde bar byed pa 'di ni/skyes bu dam pa skyes bu dam pa'i mtshan nyid do//tshe dang
14b2(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po dper na/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ni/'jug pa'i tshe'ang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bad par byed la/shi na'ang sngon gyi gzi byin drag po
14b3(mdo sde): ris yul de'i phyogs su rkun po dang /chom po rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug na'ang sems
14b4(mdo sde): can rnams bde bar 'gyur la/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'das na'ang sems can dpag tu med pa dag bde bar 'gyur zhing /gang dag de'i
14b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims dran par byed pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba dran par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang bde bar
14b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/sems n+dan de dag la mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas dogs par mi bya'o//dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
14b7(mdo sde): stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/sems can de dag la 'jigs pa gang gis kyang dogs par mi bya ste/gang dag de bzhin
15a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa la tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las dran
15a2(mdo sde): par byed na/de dag la 'jigs pa gang gis kyang dogs par mi bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
15a3(mdo sde): 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos rgya chen po dang ljon pa ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
15a4(mdo sde): rnams kyang chos rgya chen po dang ldan par blta'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rgya che ba gang lpags/bcom ldan 'das
15a5(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa 'di nyid rgya che ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste
15a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sangs rgyas nyid 'di ni rgya che ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las sbyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o///
15a7(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ljon pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
15b1(mdo sde): 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/gal te bdag la slong ba 'ga' zhig ngongs na phyis sbyin no zhe 'am/bdag la med do snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o//bdag ni sbyin
15b2(mdo sde): mi phod do snyam du sems bskyod par mi bya'o//gzhan sbyin pa byed pa dag la'ang rjes su yi rang bar bya/yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/yang dag par dga' bar bya/
15b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan po'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thums cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar
15b4(mdo sde): bya'o//byang chub sems dpos ji ltar byas na sems can 'di dag sbyin pa gtong zhing /bsod nams dag kyang byed par 'gyur snyam pa'i rjes su yi rong ba'i dge ba'i sems thams
15b5(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa dros ni/de dag gi sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems zil gyis gnon te/soms can de dag gi bskyod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /dge
15b6(mdo sde): ba'i mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de'i sbyin pa'i sems snga ma de ni rjes su yi rang ba'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
15b7(mdo sde): stong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba'i cha dang /bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang /grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe dang rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod cing /byang chub sems dpas
16a1(mdo sde): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems gcig bskyed pas zil gyis gnon te/'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i
16a2(mdo sde): phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/thabs la mkhas par bya ste/de gang dang
16a3(mdo sde): gong sbyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpo' sems dpa' chen pos thabs la mkhas par bya'o//
16a4(mdo sde): gagral tri byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mi mkhas pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas te/sbyin pa byin la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bsngo bar mi
16a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan po gang po gzhan yang skabs 'ga' dag tu snod dzam+b+ha gling gi tshad tsam
16a6(mdo sde): thogs pa'i sems can dag 'ongs te/'di'i nang du byon cig ce na/der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par smin par bya'i/med de snyam du sems bskyed
16a7(mdo sde): par mi bya'o//snod 'di dag ni ha cang ches so snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o//snod 'di dag ji ltar yang dag par bya snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o//ji ltar sems
16b1(mdo sde): bskyed par bya zhe na/sbyin no snod 'di dag dgang bar spro bar bya'o//ji ltar snod 'di dag dgang bar bya ba de lta de ltar 'bud do//de lta de ltar btsalnga lo snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//
16b2(mdo sde): gol te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo lta de ltar 'bad cing 'tshal lo//brtson 'grus rtsom ste yongs su gtong na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin
16b3(mdo sde): no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems
16b4(mdo sde): dradapa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can la snying brtse bas sbyin pa byin par bya'o//byams pa dang snying rje la gnas par bya ste/sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin par bya'o//
16b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin pa na/'di ltar gang 'di las bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams dang /dge ba mngon par 'du byed
16b6(mdo sde): po nges 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na theg pa la gsor du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig
16b7(mdo sde): spyiphyir mi ldog pa gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya'o//ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems
17a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su gtong ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
17a2(mdo sde): 'bogs par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na gser ni ji lta ji ltar bsregs pa dang /bzhu ba dang /bskol ba dang /tshos par byas pa de lta de ltar shin tu gsal
17a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang ji lta ji ltar bsod nums mngon par 'du byed pa dang /dge ba mngon par
17a4(mdo sde): 'du byed pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'brogs so//ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'bogs pa de lta de
17a5(mdo sde): ltar sems can rnams kyis bsnyen pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing /kha dog dang /'od dang /gzi brjid kyis kyang shin tu gzi brjid che bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po
17a6(mdo sde): dper na/bud med me long gi byi dor byed pa ni ji lta ji ltar me long gi byi dor byed pa de lta de ltar shin tu 'od gsal bar 'gyur la/ji lta ji ltar shin tu 'od gsel bar
17a7(mdo sde): gyur pa de lta de ltar bzhin gsol bar rab tu snang ngo //tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang ji lta ji ltar sbyin pa las
17b1(mdo sde): byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo zhing /de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la'ang yongs su gtong ste/
17b2(mdo sde): gling dag theg pa lnga gsar du zhugs pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig/phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
17b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par gyur cig ces ji lta ji ltar yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tu che bar 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba
17b4(mdo sde): de lta de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o//ji ltar
17b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa chung ngu byin na bsod nams mang po skyed par 'gyur zhe na/gal te sbyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
17b6(mdo sde): bsngo na/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa chung ngu byin la bsod nams mang po bskyed do//ji ltar sbyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar mi byed
17b7(mdo sde): na/de ltar sbyin pa mang po byin la/bsod namos nyung ngu skyed par 'gyur ro//gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas te/bde bar sbyin pa'i yo
18a1(mdo sde): byung myang po yongs su gtong la/sbyin pa de'ang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed na/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
18a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po sbyin pa mang po byin zhing /bskyod nams mang po skyed do//de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'chen pos sbyin pa byon na/rnam pa thams cad
18a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
18a4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de ni byang chub dang nye ba yin te/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
18a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par byed pa ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan
18a6(mdo sde): po gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa gang po
18a7(mdo sde): gang gi phyir des 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas ser sna bsten te/de sbyin pa de yongs su gtong na/sor sna rgyang ring bar byed cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar
18b1(mdo sde): byed do//ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar byed pa de lta de ltar nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa lus ldog par byed do//ji lta ji ltar nyan thos kyis
18b2(mdo sde): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ldog pa de lto de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/che ru pa 'bab pa'i cha bla gab med par
18b3(mdo sde): bum pa bzhug pa de rim gyis thigs pa bab pas gang bar gyur na drang por thigs pa brab pa gang yin pa dang /tha mar thigs pa bab pa gang yin pa nyi tshes bum pa de gang bar gyur pa
18b4(mdo sde): ma yin gyis/de'i bar gyi chu'i thigs pa rgyun ma chad par rim gyis bab pa'i chu'i thigs pa rnams kyis bum pa de gang ba yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems
18b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang po sems bskyed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'ang ma yin/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pas kyang ma yin gyi/dang po sems bskyed
18b6(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i sems bskyed pa phyi ma'i de'i bar gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi khyad par bskyed pa/phan por
18b7(mdo sde): gyur pa bsags pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bla na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rim gyis 'bras bu bskyed pa yin te/tshe dang ldan po gang po de ltar na
19a1(mdo sde): 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma 'dres pa'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
19a2(mdo sde): byams ma'i bu gang pos/tsho dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems ma 'dres pa yin//
19a3(mdo sde): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa glang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa byung na/de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par gyur par
19a4(mdo sde): mthong zhing /gal te 'di dag las bdag gi lus grub pas na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'di ni bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don yon te/skyed par 'gyur ro zhes
19a5(mdo sde): shes pa gang yin pa de ni sems ma 'dres pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa glang po gzhan yang dang dug byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga phan 'dogs pa dang /gnod
19a6(mdo sde): pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgyu yin par mthong ste/de ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
19a7(mdo sde): pos sems ma 'dres par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/bsad par chad pa'i mi bsad pa'i sar khrid pa na bdag ni bsad do snyam pa'i yid la byed pa 'be'/
19b1(mdo sde): zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/dpe de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'da' zhig yid la byed pa 'di ni/tshe dang ldan pa gang po
19b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ma 'dres pa yin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/rin po che khyer ba'i mi 'jigs su 'am/'brog khong
19b3(mdo sde): khong yang bar zhugs nus/de 'jigs sa dang 'brog khong khong yang bar 'gro ba ni/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yid la byed pa 'byung ste/bdag nam 'brog khong khong ya nge ba 'di
19b4(mdo sde): las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing 'jigs sa 'di las 'da' bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa 'bra' zhig yid la byed do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
19b5(mdo sde): chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'i yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi skabs dbye bar mi bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ma 'dres pa
19b6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa glang po dper na/mi g.yo can gyi rang bzhin can tshong 'dus kyi nang du zhugs te rku zhing tshangs ma gcod pa na 'di ltar bdag rku zhing chings ma gcod pa sus kyang
19b7(mdo sde): ma mthong grang snyam du sems shing /de yid la byed pa de 'ba' zhig kun tu 'byung ste/de'i yid la byed pa gzhan mi 'byung ngo //tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems
20a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems na po rnyan nga ga pa rdzogs dun pa sa pa sgru 'o su skye pa skrun+d+ha dag gis nga
20a2(mdo sde): ba mi /da rgyun pa gAng /na myeng chub sems pa sam du can pa sems pa ma par ga pa / nga ldan pa ste slo /skyes
20a3(mdo sde): gasted rnog shig rjod pa de'i lcag tugs klu rlogasad rgyal du'i mi/de la di du mkhyod kyis gso dulas sbyin gyi rnam padag /pang rgyud kyis
20a4(mdo sde): gaN+DIg gis zin pa'i las de khyod kyi zla ba gcig gis zin par gyis she//kAl te na pa gcig gis rin por ma byos na/de'i phyir khyod kyi mgrog tsa shes sbyin/do du
20a5(mdo sde): m-id+hin gis de bsdug byu / ba nga/rten gu sri b+h+ri ba rgyun na mI ltubyung //gnyen du na/no 'od rnams lta zin sna 'gyur ni ga tshu
20a6(mdo sde): dridren pa pa rgyu dang kha nas yid 'i rnye bu mi 'byung du kun du'i yid la byid ba'i da labyung pa 'du zhig dang /rgyun gyi rnam pa 'da'i nig dul byed de/
20a7(mdo sde): sems dang sams las byung mas de la gnas sa/ /de ston pas pa shi 'o//de nas mongs ldargyan de dan ni mi mos lan
20b1(mdo sde): so nas rgyun byed pa de dag rtul po la la mo//de nas rgyal po dag zhig mag sbya ngas nas/'di na dang bang khyod kyis zlab bcu gnyis kyi lhas byas pa de ni khyod byu dag dzin pa
20b2(mdo sde): dbang gos skyes so//tshe dang ldan pagung po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i man pa sa dang ba semasu bskyeng pa nas/phyi ma'i sems bskyed pa de'i bing du sems
20b3(mdo sde): ma'adres par gyi//ji ltar skyes bre gser mug de 'ang la byed pa gzhan da mya 'dres par rgyun de dag byed de/deci'i phyir zhe na/srog pang sa pa'i glus che ba'i phyir yin pa
20b4(mdo sde): bzhind/ni dung ldan pa gang byu chu ba sems dpa' sam sna pa'i ni ni sa rnam pa rnams ni sbyin pa nyid 'ang 'byed pa ma 'dres par bya ste/yid la rgyu pa gzhan dgas
20b5(mdo sde): skangs bye bar mi bye'i//gal to rnam pa rnams cad ste khyen pa nyid ltar len pa'i stobs chen/de nyid sems ma 'dris po la gunas te/byang chub sems dpa'i gzhan gang brnam
20b6(mdo sde): grangs myod pas blan med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i rgyu chu me ngan par rdzogs par 'chang byung 'gyur ba de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dnga' chan pa ngas bskal ba
20b7(mdo sde): yang ma dzugs par 'gyur ro//dede'i phyir zhen/gdog phyir des yid labyed pa gzhan dag gi sgribasam phye ba'i phyir te/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe hUM
21a1(mdo sde): sems ma smras pa lags nga bsngal pa nga mi rlos par smos pa dngas par spyod // na gang da byung chub snyoms dpa'
21a2(mdo sde): sems dang 'a chen pos sems me 'dres par bya'o//de ltar nu bdag kyang don de la sbyor zhing /sems can dge kyang don la ste /'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes blan
21a3(mdo sde): med pa'i sprin la sbyar ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu na pa la sri la du gyi gsum pa'o/ na rjes smras pa dang /chu dang sbyin pa
21a4(mdo sde): byams mA'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti dul 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gal te yid la byed pa de dag par mad 'dres pa zhig na/de'i nga ba nyid ni gang yin
21a5(mdo sde): gling dang ni ldan/de skad ces smrase pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces skyes so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe nyen thos kyis dang ldan zhing /rang sangs rgyas
21a6(mdo sde): kyis dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa byung ba 'o che/byang chub sems dpa' sems mA 'dres pa yin par rig par bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i tshul
21a7(mdo sde): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dag yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub la ni bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro//dal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poni ma
21b1(mdo sde): gas nga ldan pa / dang ldan pa 'am/ na na pa nga/'byud pades byang chub sems dpa' sems sa ga d+ha na rdzu
21b2(mdo sde): ni/rnas pa ga pa shi ni byung chub semasna de'i sgyid mngon par 'grub po ste/smon 'dags par gyur pa/rgyu gyur pa rtogs su thong pa'
21b3(mdo sde): sa rkyen pa nyid // ni la ldan/rdzus m+bu smra na
21b4(mdo sde): sti d+ma bya ban du/nyin mengs pa zlonasas nam /byung rjes snod sems rgyun pa blan chung ba na
21b5(mdo sde): byang chub mngon por rdzogs par ched rgyuste/rgyudang ldan pa gang po skye bsnyen/rnams cod mkhyen pa nyid la bar chang byed pa m+WA ba di la byed pa gang dge min
21b6(mdo sde): sa byed chu ba sems ga rnaMs da dzin pa skyesems rjes pa sa byu na / bang na/ spyo na pa
22a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'dres par gnas pa yin no//yid la byed pa de dag ci'i phyir 'dod par bya zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems
22a2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'khor byas yongs su mi skyo ba'i go cha bgos pa'i phyir te/de dag 'byung na skye ba'i gnas rnams yongs su 'dzin la/skye ba'i gnos rnams
22a3(mdo sde): yongs su bzung bas yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
22a4(mdo sde): pra dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin te/yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo//de ltar na yid la byed pa gang dag
22a5(mdo sde): gis srid pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba de dag ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mi gyur gyi bar du 'dod par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa
22a6(mdo sde): gang po ri ltar nyon mongs pa rnams la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su skyo bo'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o//byang chub sems dpas ci'i phyir 'dide par
22a7(mdo sde): bya zhe na/'di dag ni bdag la phan 'dogs par gyur pa dag ste/gal te 'di dag gzugs can zhig yin du zin no/bdag gis bsti stong chen pos ri mo bya ba zhog ste/de
22b1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de dag lnga de'i phan yon rnams nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro//gal te thabs la mkhas pa gzugs can zhig yin du zin na ni/de ba dang de bzhin
22b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa bzhin du bdag gis bsti stang chen pos ri mo bya ba zhig ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar bdag gis thabs la mkhas pa 'di ni srid par kun tu sbyor ba mi gcod la/
22b3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsgrubs pa yin pa'i phyir ro//ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang
22b4(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar srid par kun tu sbyor ba rnams srab par 'gyur/nyam ngams par 'gyur/zhan par 'gyur
22b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/shing rta kha lo chen po bkal ba ni/ji lta ji ltar shing rta 'gro ba de lto de ltar de'i srog shing yongs su zad par 'gyur te/srog shing de'ang khal de
22b6(mdo sde): nyid kyis shin tu non pa dang /khral khyer bas yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing zhen par 'gyur rjod kyi/srog shing de grong khyer gyi nang du zhugs te/bya ba byas na sa chag par 'gyur
22b7(mdo sde): ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i srid pa 'thogs par byed pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gir dag yin pa 'od dag ni gang dag gis
23a1(mdo sde): srid pa yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dag ste/ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i gnas rnams mngon par 'grub par byed pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyinA
23a2(mdo sde): pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar srid par kun tu sbyor ba rnams srab par 'gyur ro//ji
23a3(mdo sde): lha ji ltar srid par kun tu sbyor ba rnams srab par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur te/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
23a4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe/kun tu sbyor ba bya ba byas pa de dag phyis de dag gis bya ba med de/ji ltar srog shing de grong
23a5(mdo sde): khyer du zhugs nas bya ba byas te/chag nas phyis nges bya ba med po de bzhin du/kun tu sbyor ba bye ba byas pa de dkro gis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23a6(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob por gyur pa la/kun tu sbyor ba de dag gis phyis bya ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni bya ba byas pa yin
23a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro//sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gshe zhing brgyad bkag la/gshe zhing brgyad bkag nas/byang chub senas dpa'
23b1(mdo sde): de nyid 'di bdag la dgos so zhes slong ste/de dag la sbyin par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lnga phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no//dmigs
23b2(mdo sde): pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed par byed de/dmigs pa de dag thams cad kyang tha masna cang mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin par shes so//
23b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar 'dir yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang spangs rgyas kyi sa ma gtog pa de las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa gang ngag yin pa de dag thams cad ni/byang chub sems
23b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin par rig par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//
23b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos rnams kyang de la phan 'dogs par gyur cing /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la phan 'dogs par gyur par rig par bya ste/nyan thos rnams pha rol
23b6(mdo sde): tu phyin pa drug gis 'doms shing rjes su ston la/des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sbyar bar bya dgos pas/de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po'i skyen gnas
23b7(mdo sde): yon pa'i phyir/de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de'i sbyin gnas yin pa'i phyir/phan 'dogs par gyur
24a1(mdo sde): pa gang po de de bzhin te/gang dab la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis dom sa shring rjes su stong pa de dag kyang de'i sbyin pa sra yin pa'i phyir/nyan thos rnams kyung byed chub
24a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang sbyin gnas yin pa'i phyir/de dgro kyang de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs pa'o//
24a3(mdo sde): gyur pa yin no//gzhan yang gang dag dmigs byar bya ste/sbyin pa'i sbyin pad+mo 'du rnam pa thams na mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngon/de dag thams cad kyang de la phan
24a4(mdo sde): 'dogs par gyur pa yin te/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'on kyang nyan thos dang ldan pashA rnyi de byed pa gang yin pa de dadu ni des 'byed par mo bya'o//de'i sa la'ang 'dod par mi
24a5(mdo sde): bya'o//ci'i phyir zhe na/de las byang chub sems dbye' ldog par bya 'i yin pa'i bying ngo //rang sang sa rgyas dang na rdo'i da la byed po gang yin pa de dag kyang ngas bskyed
24a6(mdo sde): par mi bya'o//de'i sala'ang 'o ma byu/ /de sa byang chub sems da pa bye ba yin pa'i phyi tshe dang ldan pa gang po'on
24b1(mdo sde): dzad/rangasangs rgyas rnams ni pan sa pa byung bsnyen no// dang sngon pa glang po lta na/byang chub snams dpa 'a sums dang 'chen po thabs la mkhas pa
24b2(mdo sde): ni ta sa song mi khyen pa nyid la phan par mi 'gyud pa'i chos gang nang mi migs/dge bats+tsham Sh+Ti sems dang /sa pa gang yin pa nga byung chub sems dpa'al pan
24b3(mdo sde): dgas par gyur pa yin te/gal te de medo na de las ldog pa'i phyir ro//'di lta bur dgra bcom pa'i sems bskyed pa m+bi b+ha'i/shes pa gcig pa zhes bya bar ni ma yin te/des
24b4(mdo sde): de sbyangs nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang yin pa der sems bskyed par bya'o//de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /rang sangs rgyas kyis shes pa'ang /byang
24b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no//gal te dgra bcom pa gang yin pa dang /rang sangs rgyas gang yin pa
24b6(mdo sde): sems dang /shes pa zhes bya ba med du zin na/bon 'dogs par snang mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir na na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dra 'a chen po
24b7(mdo sde): sems ni zag pa dang bcas pa ma/zag pa myed pa'i sems dang thun mongs ma yin pa ste/de las gzhan pa'i sems rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems mi gtogs
25a1(mdo sde): byad+ya chub sems dpa'i sems nyid de lta de dag gaman na nas bya ba nas/gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i byu dang /mi mnyam pa dang /mnyam pa
25a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do//tshe dang ldan pa glang po de lta bus na/sa 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs
25a3(mdo sde): par gyur pa yin te/de ltar na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par ma gyur pa'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs so///
25a4(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/dngos po gang yongs su gtong ba'i dngos
25a5(mdo sde): po de la mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bya'o//de ltar mtshon ma med par yongs su gtong zhing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdod/phran 'dogs par gyur pa yin no//mtshan
25a6(mdo sde): ma ma spangs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te/'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnying pa nyid ni rtad pa che ba yin no//bye ba drag gis
25a7(mdo sde): gser bya ba 'am/rin po che bye ba 'du ba gang yin pa de ni rnyed pa che ba ma yin gyi/gang mtshan ma med par dngos po yongs su btang /blon mod pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
25b1(mdo sde): na ngon par rdzogs par 'chung rgya ba 'di nyid rnyed brkyang par du 'phags pa yin na//grang mtshan ma yongs su ma spangs par gling chen po bzhir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par
25b2(mdo sde): b+har du zin kyang /de ni rnyed pa chen po ma yin la/mtshan ma ma spangs par 'dod pa'i khams su badrag po'i bya ba byeng du 'jug pa 'di 'ang rnyed pa chen por 'gyur ba ma yin no//gal te
25b3(mdo sde): mtshan pa yongs su spangs nas/rkyen du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang
25b4(mdo sde): byang chub thob par gyur na/'di ni rnyed pa shin tu che ba yin par rig par bya'o//gang mtshan ma yongs su spangs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa 'di 'ang rnyed
25b5(mdo sde): po che ba yin te/'di ni rnyed pa snga mi de bas rnyed pa shin tu che ba ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnyed pa 'di ni mnyam pa'i zla med de/'di lta ste/dri bzhin gshegs
25b6(mdo sde): brnyed pa yin no//gang gis dang /zas dang /mal tshe dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad mtshan mar yongs su bzung ba'i dngos po ni bskyed par mi bya'o//de ci'i
25b7(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/de ni mtshan ma'i grangs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro//gang yang gos dang /kha zas dang /mel cha dang /stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad de'ang yongs
26a1(mdo sde): su chung la/thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngos na/thams cad mkhyed pa nyid thob bo lta bas nA 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
26a2(mdo sde): rnams kyi rnying pa mchog yin par rlig par bya//byang chub sems dpa' la 'din dang /khyod kyis thams ca dmakhyen pa nyid ni thob pa 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhen/
26a3(mdo sde): kyis gang la mtshun mang bzung ba'i dngos po de ni rnyeng por dka' ba ste/nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro//de ltar na khyod kyis tham
26a4(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thob par 'gyur ro//gang dag gis thob pa dang /gang dag thob pa dang /thob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thob ro//
26a5(mdo sde): thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar bya'o//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces smras so//
26a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa bzang ba 'di byang chub sems ngong gang gi yin sgra sa~M pra/'di ni byang chub sems dang 'thangs la mkhas pa'i bgrang ba yin no//de ci'i phying ldan/sems can 'di
26a7(mdo sde): dgagis thams cad pa khyon pa nyid ni rdzob ra de ltung shes bu dzinan ni/sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/gang gi phyir 'di ltang de dag
26b1(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lamams shing sems mi sbed pa'i phyir te/gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems mi spyad pa dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa stong bab byang smo byung /
26b2(mdo sde): ro//gang dag 'di ltur rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos shing sems paskyed pa dag ni/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/sems de bskyed nas/dngos po dang /
26b3(mdo sde): dang gang yongs su gtong bya de dang de dngos po med par mthong ngo //dngos po gang dang gang shes pa la 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/'di ni ji ltar bdag gris mtshon mar bzung ba ltar ma yin
26b4(mdo sde): nosam nas de gtong ba'i blo shes ni byer 'gyur zhing /sbyin pa'i blo nga ldan par 'gyur te/'dzin pa'i sems pa skyed //'di lta dngos po 'di ni sgyu ma lta bur snyoms can rnams
26b5(mdo sde): kyis de ltar mi shes pas/dngos po de dag la shas tsher mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/yongs su mi gtong ba'i blor 'gyur ro//yongs su myi gtong bas ser sna yongs su 'dzin to//
26b6(mdo sde): ser sna ngas kyang ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur la/dngos po de dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro//de ltar dngos po de'ang yongs su mi gtong zhing yongs su ma spyad le/dngos po de las
26b7(mdo sde): brten nas ser sna bskyed de/ngan song rnams su'ang skye bar 'gyur ro//gang gi cha byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas 'di ltar shes te/da
27a1(mdo sde): ni su ma lta buH/yongs su gtod byung su ma lta ba spyod pasan/rtswa ba lta bu dang yid pang ni byudag gi 'ang ba yin mangs su gtong ba'angam
27a2(mdo sde): //de ci'i phyir zhen/ dbu ma sna bu yin pa phyir/dang sa khyod rje cher yongs su spyo sam du sangs so//da podun su btong bas sangs rgyas
27a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams pa 'dod paskyeng pa/bcom lda 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni legs pa dge sung ba/prI tsi me log par gsung ba khron ste/
27a4(mdo sde): dulta dngos pa yongasas sa/yong pa'i mtshan nyi ldan pa pa yang dag 'di rdzogs pa byung chub pang bang rdzogs pa 'i zla ba gyur pa na pa tshoraH
27a5(mdo sde): dril byang chubs ma snad pa'i sems pa shA rgyan pas d-i/ seM sa rgyas tsam ldan 'as snyid byeng na byung chub sems dpa' sa pa de dge la mngon par nan pa
27a6(mdo sde): du sa byu byu sgrub s+ho/byung nu bskyabs dpa mas rjes kyangs pa dad dang /na de dge mdun nyid mang ba tsun
27a7(mdo sde): ba'adi ni /ba mjed pa'i snyam du ga par bya'o//dang ba zed bye nga byung chub sems dpe'i se sa po'i chen po ni meng pa med dge par gas pa'i byang
28a1(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas kyang chos ci'ang thob pa med do//gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems
28a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po 'god pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/chos kyi 'du ba'i sgo 'ong de kho na dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/chos 'ga'
28a3(mdo sde): zhig yongs su btang bar gyur na ni/byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos kyang yod pa zhig thob par 'gyur
28a4(mdo sde): na/gang po gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gtong ba byed na/dngos po yod pa ci'ang yongs su btang ba myed pas de'i phyir byang chub sems
28a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/yod pa'i chos ci'ang thob pa med do//gang po dper na/sgyu
28a6(mdo sde): ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mas sgyu ma mkhan gyi lag tu la dri zhig btsongs la/de la sgyu ma mkhan gyis kaR+ShA pa Na dag gcig mngon par sprul te byin na/gang po de ltar
28a7(mdo sde): na/rin ji lta ba de bzhin du ladu'ang dri dang 'dra'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa ji lta bu yongs su bting ba de bzhin du bla na med pa
28b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang de kho na dang 'dra'o//gang po de lta bas na 'du ba ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'god pa'ang de kho na dang 'dra ste/de ltar
28b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa'i rin ci 'dra ba de bzhin du rnyed pa'ang de kho na dang 'dra ba yin no//glang po dper na/skyes bu sgyu ma mkhyen gyis shing ljon pa zhig mngon par sprul la//shing
28b3(mdo sde): ljon pa de'i drung du'ang srog chags 'bum sprul te/srog chags de dag kyang shing ljon pa de'i 'bras bu rnams zo na/gang po de ni 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du za ba po rnams kyang de kho na dang
28b4(mdo sde): 'dre'o//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su gtong ba ji lta ba bzhin du/chos kyis 'du ba'i sgo'ang de kho na dang 'dra'o//gang po de ltar na/byang chub sems
28b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gtong ba na rin dang /rnyed pa dang /rnyed pa dang rin du mnyam par 'gyur ro//gang po 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhon gyi slob ma
28b6(mdo sde): mkhas pa zhig gis/lam gyi bzhi mdo chen por skye bo phal po che'i mdun du bud med gcig mngon par sprul la/bud med de'ang sbrum mar mngon par sprul te/buM byung ba bstan nas bud
28b7(mdo sde): med de'i bu bcas la/khye'u zhig tu bcas nas khye'u de'ang shi bar bstan na/gang po 'di ji snyam du sems/ci khye'u shi ba de'i tshe na bud med de la bdag gi bu shi'o snyam pa'i sems
29a1(mdo sde): skye 'am/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mA la dus s+ho//tsom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po de snyan/ma ji lta ba de bzhin bu'ang de
29a2(mdo sde): khon dang 'dra ste/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o//gang po de ltar na
29a3(mdo sde): 'dir yang chos de dag gi 'du ba'o sgo gnyis pa med do//gang po 'di ji snyam du semos/ci khyod kyis nga chos 'ga' zhig la 'dod pa che bar mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
29a4(mdo sde): 'das nga ni mA lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos de dag stong par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i slad du lags so//bcom
29a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang po de bzhin du 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos gang la'ang 'dod pa che ba med pa de bzhin du/nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe chos gang
29a6(mdo sde): le la zhig yongs su ma btang ba de med do//de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni chags pa 'am/khong khro ba 'ga' yang mi skye'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar sangs
29a7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro//gang pos gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos por
29b1(mdo sde): dang dang gang yongs su gtong ba de dang de nyid stong ba'am/ya mA pAR+Ya ma/gso blam/gsog tu mthong ba ni ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag
29b2(mdo sde): gris 'tshal ba ltar na/gal te byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dbyig dang gser gyis bkang sti slong ba rnam pa la stsal kyang /byang chub sems dpas
29b3(mdo sde): ji ltar yongs su gtong ba'i thabs mo 'tshal na/de ltar na de'i sbyin pa nyi tsher 'gyur gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma lags so//byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po yongs su
29b4(mdo sde): gtong ba na/'di ltar yang bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o snyam du'ang sems bskyed par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka'
29b5(mdo sde): sprul pa/bstan pa 'di'i don bshad pa'i phyir spobs par gyis shig/ngasro bshad pa'i dus la bab po na'ang bshad par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan
29b6(mdo sde): baM byAms ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa glang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
29b7(mdo sde): rdzos par 'ching rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad stong par yid la byed cing sbyin pa byin par bya'o//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par byas nas/bdag pa thams cad yongs su btang
30a1(mdo sde): bar bya'o//zin pa dang ma zin pa'i dngos po rnams yongs su ma btang ba 'am/mu byin pa 'am/mchod sbyin ma byas pa ci 'ang med par bya'o//tshe dang ldan
30a2(mdo sde): pa glang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis sbyin pa byin par bya'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las sgyu ma lta bur dusten
30a3(mdo sde): dadu'i le'u ste lnga pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu legs sau legs so//shA rAdwa ti
30a4(mdo sde): de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyi la dmigs pa byas la sbyin pa byin par bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod shar phyogs kyi 'jig
30a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag sbyin pa byin par byed pa mthong bar 'dod dam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
30a6(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ji ltar sbyin pa byin par bgyid pa mthong bar 'tshal lo//de nas sangs rgyas mthus/che
30a7(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /de las gzhan pa'i nyan thos chen po rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'di nas thad ka'i phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams sgyum
30b1(mdo sde): kyan/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba tAn thos rnams la chos ston te/de nas byang chub sems dpa' thogs
30b2(mdo sde): dri med pa zhes bya ba/khyim na 'dug cing khyim na 'dug bzhin du dbyig dang /gser gyi phung po ri tsam sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su gtong te/'di las byed pa'i sems can de dag
30b3(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin par gyur cig ces sgrogs so//gos kyi phung pa rI tsa sgo dag byin par byed do//bzu' ba dang /ban+de'i bu'i phur po ri tsam dag sbyin pa byin por byed de/sems rten gang
30b4(mdo sde): dog gis phabi las kher ba de dag la sbyin pa byin par gyur cig ces sgrogs so//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pra shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/byang chub sems
30b5(mdo sde): dpa' thogs pa med pas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'bum phrag meng po bkram ste/shing rta re re lA'ang bud med kha dog stong gis brgya ni bdag bskyon nas/tshong dus kyi steng du sbyin
30b6(mdo sde): par byed de/tshig 'di skad du gang shing rta 'di dag dang /bud med 'di dag 'dod pa des khyer cig cis kyang zer ro//bud med de drag re re 'ang bud med brgya brgya'i 'khor dang lji na te/
30b7(mdo sde): shing rta dbyig dang bcas pa bud med kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de bud med de dag la sbyin par byed cing yongs su btang ngo //shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' thogs
31a1(mdo sde): med pa sbyin pa byin pa mthong ngam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lugs so//bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das
31a2(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sbyin pa byin par bya'o//de nas nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sbyin
31a3(mdo sde): pa byin pa de mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka'o stsal pa/shrI ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sbyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin nam/gas
31a4(mdo sde): pra/a la lA bcom ldan 'das rgya che ba legs so//bcom ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa 'di ltar byin zhing yongs su btang ba 'dril de las gan+dan pa'i
31a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa rnams ni brgya'i cher yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//de nas spangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan po shA ra dwa ti'i bus sbyin pa de byin nas/'di skad
31a6(mdo sde): dudo dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31a7(mdo sde): chen po gang dag yin pa de dag myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed pa'ang mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
31b1(mdo sde): pa shA ra ti'i dus 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das 'di la theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grang dag la bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
31b2(mdo sde): shA ringadwa ti'i bu 'odi la byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa/sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas pa ni dgra bcom pa'i sems las 'da'o//sems gnyis par skyed pa na
31b3(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi sems las 'da'o//phyir mi ldog pa'i sems la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ma nges shing lung ma bstan pa'i sems las 'da'o//byang chub sems
31b4(mdo sde): dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa ni/thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug la/thams cad mkhyen pa mthob pa ride las ldang ba 'di ni
31b5(mdo sde): mi sri de/gau skabs mA yin zhing gnas med de/ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug
31b6(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /bdud dang bcas/tshangs pa dang bcas/lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
31b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs so zhes rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa/bla na med pa
32a1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i skal pa can du gyur pa'i phyir ro//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
32a2(mdo sde): bla dang /nyan thos de dag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa gang dag byang chub kyi snying po lnga 'dug
32a3(mdo sde): tsi /bla na med pa yang dag byar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pad+ma 'tshang rgya ba du dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grungs med pa gang dag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyi
32a4(mdo sde): mngon par 'byung ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dang 'grangs med pa gang dag khyim na gnas shing sbyin pa gtang ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'agrangs med pa
32a5(mdo sde): gang dag slong ba rnams slong ba na/mgo yongs su gtong ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dge slong ba rnams slong ba na/lus 'bigs su bcug ste/
32a6(mdo sde): khrag byin pa dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang /khyim gyi dngos po dang /zhing gi dngos po dang /rta dang
32a7(mdo sde): ba lang dang bran dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tshe ba rnams yongs su gtong ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag lha rnams
32b1(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin byed pa dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dang 'grangs med pa gang dag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su ste bdag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang
32b2(mdo sde): dngag dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/mi'i mngal du skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag btsa' ba dang chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo //byang
32b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams kyi tshad du sdug bsngal rnams yang drang yang myong ba dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag sems can
32b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi cheng du dpad+ma tshad brgyar yang 'gro zhing /nyis brgya 'am/sum brgya 'am/bzhi brgya 'am/lnga brgya 'am/dpag tshod stong ngam/de las lhag par yang 'gro ba dang /sems
32b5(mdo sde): cin rnams kyi ched du ji ltar byas na/sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam drag lnga gnas par 'gyur bar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /yang na gsum la skyengs su
32b6(mdo sde): 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya ba dang /yang na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am/yang ni bslab pa'i gre zhi gnyis sam/gsum ma ma/
32b7(mdo sde): bzhi'am/lnga 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am/yid na sems can 'ga' yang byang chub la gnas par 'gyur bar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi dmas grangs
33a1(mdo sde): med pa dag tu 'phro bar yang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gi nang du rab tu byung nas/pha rol
33a2(mdo sde): tu phyin pa rnams mi thos mi mthong ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi thos shing mi mthong bas bskal pa 'bum dag tu 'khyam zhing 'khor te/yun///
33a3(mdo sde): rang pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ston pa'ang
33a4(mdo sde): mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams tshol na'ang mi rnyed pa dag kyang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag pha rol tu
33a5(mdo sde): phyin pa rnams tshol zhing de dag gis rnyed pa'ang mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
33a6(mdo sde): bdag kyang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs myed pa chos ston pa dge kyang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'
33a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi ched du/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por byang chub tu sems snong du 'jug par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang
33b1(mdo sde): dag sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /gang dag byang chub tu sems skyed du 'jug par mdzad padag kyang mthong ngo //sangs nus bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa ga
33b2(mdo sde): dag sems cani ga ng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams grang se med padag
33b3(mdo sde): gshegs nas/sems can rnams kyi cheng du chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo //de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu
33b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gong+ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag na/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag kyang
33b5(mdo sde): mdzang ngo /shidaphyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cadan/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag btsugs pa dag kyang mdzang /lci b+h+yogs dang /nub dang /
33b6(mdo sde): dang /phyogs mtshams dang /'og dang /steng du'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/de ltar khor khor yug tu phyo rgyas bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /sangs
33b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dang mthong ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i dus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs
34a1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan te/ji lta zhe na/shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpab tu ma mchis pa dag na/byang chub sems
34a2(mdo sde): dpa' grangs ma mchis pa drag dang /spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis pa dag mthong ba dang /de bzhin du lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og dang /steng
34a3(mdo sde): dang /phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khamos grangs ma mchis pa dag tu/byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag
34a4(mdo sde): tu ma mchis pa dag mthong ba ni ngo mtshar lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar
34a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan te/gang dag gis rgya chen po'i gnas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu snga mas
