34a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa ni ngo mtshar legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar
34a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems rgya chen po bskyed par bya'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mi 'gyur bar 'tshal bas ni/dper na 'khor los sgyur
34b1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po ltar bgyi'o//lhar 'gyur bar 'tshal bas ni/dper na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ltar bgyi'o//tshe rnying ba yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal bas ni/dper na 'du shes
34b2(mdo sde): med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams ltar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba 'tshal ba dang /stong gsum gyi
34b3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang /sangs rgyas 'tshal bas ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed par bgyi'o//de
34b4(mdo sde): skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/'jig rten gyi sbyin
34b5(mdo sde): gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan
34b6(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa 'di las gud na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa ches bzung ba 'am//
34b7(mdo sde): ches rgya che ba 'ga' lta mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
35a1(mdo sde): la yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni spong ba'i sems kyis rang
35a2(mdo sde): gri rgyud dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs par zad kyi/sems de sems n+dan dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du bskyed pa ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems
35a3(mdo sde): ni sems can dpag tu med pa'i ched du bskyed pa yin gyi/nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ni ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu rong sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang rang gi tshod dang ldan pa'i
35a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams zlog par zad kyi/byang chub kyi sems ni sems can dpag tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams zlog pa yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu'ang byang chub kyi sems ni bsten
35a5(mdo sde): cing bstan te bsgoms la mang du byas na/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo//thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob na/de nyan thos
35a6(mdo sde): rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu phye'o//gang dag 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/'di lta ste/rang byang chub la sems shing sgom na/de dag la sangs rgyas
35a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das khyed ni rong sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/bskal pa 'di snyed cig no lha rnams dang /mi rnams kyi nang du mtshams sbyar te 'khod nas/rang sangs rgyas thob
35b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston gyi/shA rA dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpanga' la/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
35b2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung mi ston to//nyan thos rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la lung mi ston to//grol te nyan thos lung ston na dang //de bzhin gshegs pa
35b3(mdo sde): las zlos nas lung ston to//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis sems can thams cang dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod kyang /des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba ma yin gyi
35b4(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyi 'doms shing rjes su ston na/'di ltar des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba yin no//de ci'i'o/
35b5(mdo sde): phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos las ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub byung ba ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub
35b6(mdo sde): byung ba'i phyir ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug
35b7(mdo sde): pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nA byang chub sems dpa'i rig par bgyi/
36a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyu b+h+ya /
36a2(mdo sde): chub sa rgyas da nas bya med tshig/sal pa com seM mam ma sa kyis mas myu sh-i sa pang ba shi pa rlo
36a3(mdo sde): ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lung bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par gzung bar 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di rje
36a4(mdo sde): snyam du sems/byang chub sems dpa'i sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa zhe sdang dang banas pa gti mug dang bcas pa smin neste/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'do chags
36a5(mdo sde): dang bcos pa/zhe sdang dang bcas pa gti myug dang bcas pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu'adi rje snyam du sems dag bcom pa'i sems 'dod
36a6(mdo sde): chags dang bral ba zhe sdang drang bral ba/gti mug dang bral ba yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lha la gas te/dge btsam po'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba
36a7(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang bral ba/gti mug dang bral ba lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gal te dgra bcom bzag pa zad pas
36b1(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la byams pa dang /snying rje khyab par byas kyang /de'i tshe sems can de dag bde bas tshim par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar
36b2(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ma mchis na/sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la byams pas ji ltar khyab par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ji srid du mnyam par
36b3(mdo sde): bzhug pa de srid kyi bar der byams pa des kha cig na bde bar 'gyur/kha cig ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen
36b4(mdo sde): pa nyid thob pa de'i tshe sems kyi skad cig la/byams pa la gnas shing byams pa mngon par sgrub pa ma lags mod kyi/bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa nan gyis dper bgyis te bshad
36b5(mdo sde): par bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das gal te dzam+bu gling 'di bdag dang 'dra ba/rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa sha stag gis gang bar gyur la/de dag kyang byams pa la snyoms
36b6(mdo sde): par zhugs sam/gule te snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal na'ang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'os mo lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis
36b7(mdo sde): kyang zag pa med pa'i sems las byang chub sems dpa' sems mchog ces bya ba nas/gong na med pa'i zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gal te sems can thams
37a1(mdo sde): cad drugra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa shAshri stag tu gyur la/dgra bcom pa re res kyang bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med 'khrugs med snyed mngon par sprul
37a2(mdo sde): na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'khrugs med de dag mang ba yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang legs so//bde bar gshegs pa mang lags
37a3(mdo sde): so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/dgra bcom pa de dag dang /dpung de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byang
37a4(mdo sde): chub kyi sems de bzlog par nus sam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mi lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/
37a5(mdo sde): sems de gnyis kyi nang na gang mthu che/sems can thams cad theg pa zad par gyur pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa mthu che'am/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
37a6(mdo sde): dpa'i sems mthu che/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems ches mthu che lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i
37a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ches mthu che ba yin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa med pa'i sems kyis bdud kyi sde khrugs med dpag tu med pa rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon
37b1(mdo sde): par sprul na'ang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyis/'dod chags dang bcas pa/zhe sdang dang bcas pa/gti mug drang bcas pa'i sems yongs su gtugs par mi nus
37b2(mdo sde): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/sems 'di dag gi nang na sems mchog ces bya ba nA se/gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan
37b3(mdo sde): 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas/gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar zag pa
37b4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gtugs par bgyir rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan khyod nyid la yongs su dri bar byas/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig/
37b5(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gal te mching bu'i nor bu dag gI nang du/nor bu rin po chu bai DUr+ya bzhag na/ci mching bu'i nor bung dag gis nair bu rin po che bai DUr+ya la gsal ba
37b6(mdo sde): dang /rin thang gis thub bim/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni mA legs so//mching bu'i nor bu dag gi phung po chen pos nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya gcig kyang zil gyis mnon
37b7(mdo sde): bar rngo mi thog lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de ci'i phyir/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu de dag ni yongs su dag pa'ang ma lags/
38a1(mdo sde): dag ba ba'ang ma 'grus/rlonaHdu yang chung la/gad par yang nus pa lags to/ma ldan 'das ma ching bu n+do bu ni gnas rgyu rkyen nas byung
38a2(mdo sde): ma gas// na g+h+nan+d+ha paN+Ti nas mas pa zhes te/snas nanarnams kyi las kyi sbyin dus ma na hrIn+da
38a3(mdo sde): rlung ba grus/ 'i na cung dus ni ma gyis ston pa mo / m-i snre thaMd de sbyinag
38a4(mdo sde): rlung chub se mas dpa snam snad pa chen po'i sems ni nyan tus thams cad kyis nas zis skye rlon par 'ag ste/de byizhin du sheg sa ng+yas don gying nga 'ad+mo yang dge bar
38a5(mdo sde): sa nas/byi mi zlog pa'i byang chud sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po'i sems mchog nyid du dgage parnaMs/gong ni meng pa rji kyi byung du bzhig pazhinan//na
38a6(mdo sde): du/rnam pa pam ston AnI rgyu sems da sas gang byams pa rdzun pa de'ang ra pa byed mi nusaso/ dag parnam
38a7(mdo sde): gab da sa ma na pa shes pa gled ldan pa dag na gyi mas 'di kyai des kunan du sa rgyas pa sa
38b1(mdo sde): ldog kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sems nang par mnas /shArA ti'i budag bcom pa pa nga/mngon phyur shes pa drug dang ldan pa da dag gis /rgyu tu na
38b2(mdo sde): sa ma rnam par nas ma kyi/phyi mi d+h+r-ig pa'i lta chub se mas dpa 'a sems dang tshun pa'i sems ni rnaM kyis mu ni pa n+de/ par byed sbyi nus so
38b3(mdo sde): tI'i bung dgra bcom pa zag pa pa/mngon par shes pa blo/dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang /'di rten gyi khams klung+ka'i klung gi phyim snyed sreg shi mI'i phreng po chen po de du
38b4(mdo sde): dbugs kyis bres dpa/nus myod kyi/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni ril gyi sa mnan pa'om/zed par byed mi nus so//shwa dwa tI'i bu
38b5(mdo sde): rnam rgyas 'dis na/mi sdig pa'i byo chub sems dpa'i mams dpa'i chen pa'i sems mchog r+b+hesaH/bdang /dul dang /da du/rgyu me da nga/blan mi
38b6(mdo sde): na na zhes bya ba'i ba du yo dang//dun ces pa/'asgyu dang / shA 'i dus bcom ldan phrul 'diskyed nas gsaso//sa m+b+hi
38b7(mdo sde): tsam du phyi mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rgya che shing zed par bgyid pa'im/brlig par mi nus pa mtshar lags so//bco mi ldan
39a1(mdo sde): u sgyu na na/ du sargyas sa na rnams ni gnyis su migasu s+ho/rlu nan/
39a2(mdo sde): sheg sung rnams ni banyis su med pa gsung zhing /de bzhin 'on ste gzhan du ma yin//shwA ra ti'i byigal te 'dzi dz+nyAn gyi khams mtha' yas mu mi pa'i gda'i
39a3(mdo sde): myed pa da kyi sems can gzhan zung ba dgyung pa mas sring bung /tshul 'dis skyed pa dang /myu khams de skyed pa dang /rlu gi khabs
39a4(mdo sde): mas na na zla ba rdzu yang mas ma suldan dag mang ba 'dzid pa/ mi ldan la med dgasus/
39a5(mdo sde): mormol kyi bu chen po lta bur rdzu 'phrul dung ldan pa gyur /b+hU prA s+ya ni de dag gis 'di byung sems can+da daM snying bdi snyed kyi bdud sdig rgyun mngon par spru te/sdig can re rI
39a6(mdo sde): la'ang sems can de dge sbyid pa de snyed/glang po che'i tshogs yod pa'am/tshogs dang/shi 'i chags dang /dpung bri rlung gi tshigs meng par gyur te/bgrang ba'i
39b1(mdo sde): sa //ngag ma pa/m+b+ha na / sgyu da na mas ga smo ma sa /da
39b2(mdo sde): m+bu ba nasas ma/ Sh+T+ri /sem ldan 'ang ma rdzogs s+ho/ma ldan da sa 'astsa pa/suM y+YA n+te sa kyi pa dus kyi
39b3(mdo sde): gas kyi m-i ga na gnas pa'i spyod gsum m+b+hi chen phyi'i jig rten gyi kham sa pa sreg par mngon pa dru la de byedan/ sa mo sems
39b4(mdo sde): dU d+hu phrul chen po pa stan pa yin nam/gsol pa/com ldan 'das de dag ni rdzu 'dul tshwa ba lagasas//rdo 'phrul chen dang ldan ni de/'jigs pa rjen po'i tshum
39b5(mdo sde): tishing gnas pa lags s+ho//tsam ldan 'dis kyis paka su swA/shrI 'i zugs ti dag 'jig rten gyi khams mas su me bye gdu rlu gan ma rnyed kyi me
39b6(mdo sde): pa pa/de myigs pa drug pazhin nas ston /b+him stug pa'i byeng nupa sems dnga' sems dadu tshun pa dag gi sems rnyeng pa bya /
39b7(mdo sde): mnan pa'am/bain+de nus pa'i skal pa med do//shA rang ti'i bu ding snyam dros mes/sems can dpag tu med pa de dag /bdud rtsigacin do ga gi rngu 'phrul gang yin pa
40a1(mdo sde): dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa 'di gnyis la/gang ches mthu dang ldan pa yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rdzu
40a2(mdo sde): 'phrul dang ldan pa 'di dag gi nang na/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang /semAs 'di ni ches mthu dang ldan pa lags so//bcom
40a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa tiSh+Ti bu 'di ji snyam du sems/'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang /stobs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de mchog byed pa'am/mchog tu 'byung bar
40a4(mdo sde): 'os pa yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/rna sna me grangs 'dis na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma gtogs/
40a5(mdo sde): par byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni
40a6(mdo sde): zad par bgyi rI rngo mi thog pa'i slad du lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'o stsal to//shr-I ra dI tI'i bu de de bzhin no//de de
40a7(mdo sde): bzhin te/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byar mi nus so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o///
40b1(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu glang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs gang gis na/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
40b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par byer mi nus/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gang dang gang byin pa na
40b3(mdo sde): de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs nas sbyin par byed de/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par bya ba 'am/zil gyis monan par mi nus so//tshe
40b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang po dper na/skyes bu tshong po zhig zong 'bum phrag mang po spyod cing /de tshong byed la/tshong pa des tshong dpon nam/ded dpon gang yang rung ba las lo 'bum phrag mang po zhig
40b5(mdo sde): nas skyen po blangs pa las/de'i tshong ma rung bar gyur nas/des rgyal po la bskor te rgyal po'i gan du song ngo //de rgyal po'i dpung des na rgyal pos yongs su bzung ba'i mi de la tshong
40b6(mdo sde): dpon do dang /ded dpon des tshugs par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar do dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs 'di lta ste/rgyal po'i phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la brten pa'i
40b7(mdo sde): phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/dang po sems bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni
41a1(mdo sde): dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs la brten to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la brten pas na/de
41a2(mdo sde): nyan thos thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so//tshe dang ldan pa glang po dper ni/skyes bu rgyal po la brten pa ni longs spyod zad par gyur kyang /'on kyang tshugs par ma nus
41a3(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs la brten pa'ang /'di ltar nyan thos thams cad dang /bdud thams cad kyis mi
41a4(mdo sde): tshuchugs so//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i nyan thos thams cad kyis tshugs par 'gyur/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te nyan
41a5(mdo sde): thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyis sgrogs shing 'chad pa na/de'i sems snyed cing bdag kyang de ltar gyur cig ces sems bskyed na/nyan thos rnams kyis tshugs pa
41a6(mdo sde): yin no//gang de'i gtam gyi ro myong bar byed pa dang /de la yang dag par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yod la byed pa bskyed pa des na tshugs par 'gyur
41a7(mdo sde): ro/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/de dag la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya/smras pa/'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
41b1(mdo sde): chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la grogs byed pa yin te/'di dag spyad par byed pa ma yin la/'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/de bas na 'di dag ni byang chub
41b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya bar 'dod cing /yang
41b3(mdo sde): dag pa la nges par 'jug par 'dod pa'i 'dod tshogs dang /zhe sdang dang gti mug kun tu 'byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid ring por byed pa yin te/de dag de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la
41b4(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen
41b5(mdo sde): po nyid la'ajo nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams gegs byed pa yin te/yid la byed pa de dag bskyed na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems/
41b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pra shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin te/
41b7(mdo sde): gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa skyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yid la byed pa de dag gis byang chub
42a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi chud pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/rgyun du zhugs pa nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod na sbyin gnas su mi
42a2(mdo sde): 'gyur te/gal te gang gis de'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i shes pa thob na/des de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin gyi/nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rab tu phye ba
42a3(mdo sde): ma yin te/de ltar na shes pa yongs su shes pa dang /spong ba la 'dris pas de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos
42a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems kun tu spyod cing skye bas/byang chub sems dpa' zhes rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams pa'i
42a5(mdo sde): sems dang sems las byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag skye bas/'di lta ste/de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin te/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la
42a6(mdo sde): gnas na tshugs par mi nus so//tshe dang ldan pa dper na/'phong gi slob dpon ni gnas na 'dug kyang rung /'gro'ang rung /dgra rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin te/gzhan
42a7(mdo sde): gyi mnga' yang gcod cing bdag kyang srung ngo //tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'ang tshugs par dka'o//nyan thos kyi
42b1(mdo sde): spyod pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thos na'ang 'di ltar bdag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/'di lta ste dper
42b2(mdo sde): ni/de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa da ltar nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa de bzhin du/bdag kyang nyon thos rnams la chos ston
42b3(mdo sde): par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo brir byed do//tshe dang ldan pa de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa la tshugs par mi nus te/nyan thos kyi
42b4(mdo sde): grata mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi glo tam thos na'ang /chos kyi gtam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ngo zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dran par byed de/nyan thos rnams la chags pa mi
42b5(mdo sde): spyod do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa ni thub par dka' ba yin no//tshe dang ljon pa dper na/rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor
42b6(mdo sde): spyod pa dmigs pa thob cing /ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar dmigs pa de la rab tu goms
42b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'ang thub par dka'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral
43a1(mdo sde): ba'i phyin ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te byang chub sems dpa' thub pa dad ka/'a bar rig par byan/thob pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang
43a2(mdo sde): drug yin pa rnams dang /phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang /byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug pa gang dag yin pa thams cad dom/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
43a3(mdo sde): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thub par dka' ba yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' de dag dam bcas pa las bskyod mi nus tI/de ltar ni byang chub sems
43a4(mdo sde): dpa' dom bcas pa la gnas pa dang /byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa de dag ni thams cad kyang thub par dka' ba yin no//tshe dang ldan po shA radwa ti'i bu dper no/byang chub
43a5(mdo sde): snyoms dpa' de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa dang /de bzhin gshegasu bra lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po nas mngon par rtogs par sangs rgyas te/zhugs
43a6(mdo sde): shing gzhes pa grang yin pa de gnyisaka'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du theg pa la gser du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
43a7(mdo sde): pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tha ma'i sems thob po gang yin pa de dag thams cad
43b1(mdo sde): 'a s+ho/thams rgyu mkhyen pa nyid med la byed ba rnams kyis mnyan no//rgyusmra ba/ni dung rdzun pa byung po 'di dag ji ltar khyad par med/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ti/
43b2(mdo sde): byung rje kyi snyoms pan byed par med de/'on kyang mthogs dul gyis ni khyang pa yod //myi sted gnyis kani ma ma/byed zhen/ rgyub tu mngon par skye gle
43b3(mdo sde): yin pa rnaMmasaso//nga po na pa sh+tsa r+ya hU~MshrI bu byang chub sems dpa'i sem so la gnas pa ni mi sgrog //dgra bcoMm+b+ha pa gang dgra bcom pa nyid las sdug pa/zag pa med pa'i
43b4(mdo sde): las de rdzogan/de dge bcom pa nyid dri rig por bya'am/smras pa/rgodadu ldan pa gang na ma yin no//de ni lkug pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o//smras pa/
43b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shrI ranga? shrI'i bri de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sems las phyir ldog pa gang yin padren byang chub tu khos 'tshe bar zad de/de ni byang chub sems
43b6(mdo sde): da de'i ma yin gyi/de ni byang chu ba sems dpa' smin 'byin pa yin te/de ni byang chub semos dpe' zhes bya bar rig par dbye ba ma sbyin no//smras sde/tshe dang ldadog
43b7(mdo sde): bu de bzhin no//de ponan te/tshe dang ldan pa shing po dper na/mi nin po mtshan dang ldan par gyur /mau dang po mchong ba ma yin pa la /dris de'i bom chen med par byung
44a1(mdo sde): la/pho mtshan gyi bya ba byed mi nus na/de ni ma ning zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa'i sems
44a2(mdo sde): rmugs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o///
44a3(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lo 'di skad ces smos so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i bla na med pa yang dag
44a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgya bar 'dod pa yid la byed pa ji lta bu bskyed par bya/smras pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bskyed
44a5(mdo sde): par bya'o//de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpe'i chos rnams la gnas po yin no//de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpe' ni sbyin pa de thams cad/
44a6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//gal te de ltar yongs su
44a7(mdo sde): sngo bar mi byed na/de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa byin pa na rnam par rtog ste/
44b1(mdo sde): bdag gi chung zad ni yongs su btang la/chung zad ni yongs su ma btang ngo zhes rnam par rtog par byed cing 'di ni bdag gis sbyin par bya/'di ni sbyin par ma bya'o//'di la ni sbyin/'dri
44b2(mdo sde): la ni mi sbyin no zhes rnam par rtog par byed de/ngan pa ni sbyin par bya/bzang po ni sbyin par mi bya/tshul khrims can lo ni sbyin par bya/tshul khrims 'argyal ba la ni sbyin par mi
44b3(mdo sde): bya'o zhes rnam par rtog par byed na/rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar chad byed pa yin no//de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni yun ring mo zhig
44b4(mdo sde): gos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//bdag yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur grangs zhes rnam par rtog par mi bya'o//thams cad la
44b5(mdo sde): mnyam par gtong zhing sems mnyam pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
44b6(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga gnas par bya'o//sbyin pa zil gyis mnan te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
44b7(mdo sde): pa ni gal te/byang chub sems dpa' snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/sems can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/zan zos pa'i 'og tu sems can de dag la gser gyi dong tse dang /sa
45a1(mdo sde): bcos bu zung dang /gser thags can gyings byin la/de bzhin du nyi ma dgung dang /phyur de dang /de bzhin du mtshan nonam gyi na stod dang /de bzhin
45a2(mdo sde): dunam gyi dgung dang /de bzhin du na ma gri na smad kyi thun la/snyoms can gang+gA'i klung gi b+han+d+ha snod la zan byon la/de bzhin du sbyin pa 'dra byin te/bsgral pa grA
45a3(mdo sde): gau bye ma snyeng duganasu shrIng /de bzhin du yongs su gting yang ji ltar thams cing mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su slo bar bya ba mi shes ni/de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/sbyi
45a4(mdo sde): pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no//ji ste yongs su bsngo ba shes na/byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no//de ni byang chub sems dpa'i
45a5(mdo sde): dadan mang du yongasus gtong ba ma yin no//de'i'i phyir na na/khyod mye nga chos tshang med pa'i chos thob padro 'did cing //byang chub sems de'i tshes myong thob par 'dod na
45a6(mdo sde): rlung ngangabardzun pa'i yongs su gtong bas thams cad mkhyon pa nyid thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro//ga te sbyin pa de ci ngos par gyur na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi yin
45a7(mdo sde): /gang gi phyi sbyin pa de cidanges pa ma yin pa do byir/sbyin pa'i rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro//tshod ldan pag padi lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
45b1(mdo sde): ngos rna dngas pa ma smid pa'i sprin pa byir par bya'o//de nas skyes yongs su btad byur byu zhes de//du yongs su ba ga/ngan pa snyam don
45b2(mdo sde): da ni/s+yA sten+d+ha myod cing /mas cad mabyon pa nyid yongs sgo 'dzin to//deyang 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa dpa ga tu med pa byin par b+h+yoH/gang gi ci blan med pas
45b3(mdo sde): dge par rdzogs de'i byung rgyu byer don par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du sbyin par bya'o//bla nA mud pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
45b4(mdo sde): mong kyi kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la yin gdags par srid du byung chub byu pa'i bangar du ni sa pad da dgas
45b5(mdo sde): rlon meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ni/'ad zing mi pa'i chos kyi ston pas/sems can rnams la phan ga dgas par byung myong
45b6(mdo sde): bskyed do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper ni/mi nig rgyal po la brten to//de rgyal po la brten cing 'khod la/bsnyen bkur byas pas/rgyal po des de le gan byed ni /
45b7(mdo sde): kyi skye pas pa ni 'dogs te/des basbyin cing sor te/bad pa byas pas rgyam po mnyes shing gyes par byur napo/rin pa cho skyod dus spyor bye bani dadu
46a1(mdo sde): dang ldan du gang po byung chub sems dpa 'thun myed pa snang dag par dogs pa rgyu chub tu mngon pa rtogs pa ga rgyad na byung 'dod pas kyang /byang chub tu spyang
46a2(mdo sde): b+han/sems can dang ga med dpa la zong zung gi sbyin pas byin 'dogs shing /blun med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa de sangs rgyas nos kyang /
46a3(mdo sde): med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/sems can rnam la 'doms shing rdzas su ston te/sems can dpag tu med bdag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed do//
46a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/rgyal po'i bu zhig yod la/mi mang po gang dag gis rgyal po'i bu de la bsten cing bskor te/bsnyen bkur byed na/rgyal po'i bung bsten pa'i ming
46a5(mdo sde): dru thams cad la kha zas g.yos pus phan 'dogs par byed de/ji tsam na rgyal po'i phreng rgyal sred gnas pa'i dros la bab ste/rgyal srid kyi dbang bsgyur zhing /rgyal snying
46a6(mdo sde): dbang gyur ba thob pa'iH/de'i mi zhabs ldi snyi dri m+b+hi ba gang yin pa de dgal/'di dag ni bdag gzhon nu'is lu gnas pa na/bdag gis skyengs shing bdag
46a7(mdo sde): byas pa yin/bdag kyang 'di dag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin gyis/bdag gis mi 'di dag longs spyod la ci rigs par dgod do snyam ste/des bdag gis mdza
46b1(mdo sde): rnams kha cig ni grong khyer dag tus por bcugs/kha cig ni las kyi sna dag tu/kha cig ni tshong 'dus dag \u0f7f/kha cig no 'or gyi skyong dag tu bsgos/khacig lani grong dam pa longs spyod du/
46b2(mdo sde): byin no//tshe dang ldan po gang po/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na ming pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa
46b3(mdo sde): /byung chu spyod pa sems can dngag tu ma bangadags pan 'dogs so/zung zing gi sbyin pags dang /zas da /mamachu dang /rkyen dang /nad gsos da ska
46b4(mdo sde): zong dag gis phan 'dogs te/ji ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des/'khor de dag kha zas gnos pa dang /bza' ba dang /bcu'i paci 'byor pa dag gi sde phan 'dogs pa de bzhin du/
46b5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas kyang /sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pas phon 'dogs shing /grang gi tshe bla na med pa yang
46b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur ba thob pa na/blo ji lta ba dang /shes rab ji lta ba bzhin du zang zing med pa'i chos
46b7(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pas 'doms shing rjes su ston to//zang zing med pa'i chos kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa na/kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
47a1(mdo sde): bu la/kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/kha cig ni bzod pa'i sa la 'god/kha cig ni mthong
47a2(mdo sde): paba'i sra la/kha cig ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji ltar rgyal po'i bu de gang gi tshe/rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur
47a3(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/rten pa'i mi de dag ci rigs par longs spyod la 'grod pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
47a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can+da rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'god par byed de/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi spyad
47a5(mdo sde): pa spyod pa na/sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /sems can rnams
47a6(mdo sde): momyos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god par byed do//de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin
47a7(mdo sde): zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur la yongs su mya ngan las
47b1(mdo sde): 'das nas kyang /sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/mi zhig rgyal po la brten te/bsnyen bkur byed na/de'i tshe rgyal po des
47b2(mdo sde): zas dang gos kyi bgo skal byin nas/gang gi tshe mi des rgyal po de la shas cher brten pa de'i tshe/rgyal po de mnyes shing dgyes par gyur te/de thugs rangs par gyur nas/gos
47b3(mdo sde): dang rgyan brgya stong du ma ston to//longs spyod kyis rgyas par byed do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
47b4(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed cing /de bla na med pa yang
47b5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/'khor ba las
47b6(mdo sde): grol bar byed do//de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa byams mu'i bu gang pos/tshe dang ldan pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
47b7(mdo sde): bus ji ltar bshad pa de de bzhin te/tshe dang ldan pa dper na/mi gang dag gser gyi 'byung khung de'i nye skor na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/gser gyi 'byung khung
48a1(mdo sde): des nams kyang nye bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/gang gi tshe gsar du brkos shing phyung nas ring por mu lon pa de'i tshe'ang /sems can rnams
48a2(mdo sde): kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe shin tu dri ma med par byas shing shin tu sbyangs nas snying por byas te phyung ba de'i tshe'ang /sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho
48a3(mdo sde): ba yin no//gang gi tshe 'byung khung de nas bton nas bzhus te/de nas sum cha'amo/bzhi tsha gser du gyur pa de'i tshe'ang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//
48a4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang /nams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba ma yin par mi 'gyur te/
48a5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na'ang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'dod pa na'ang /sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/byang chub sems dpa' bla
48a6(mdo sde): no med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na'ang /sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'ang
48a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bo yin te/rgyu 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do//rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
48b1(mdo sde): mchog ces bya/gtso bo dang /phul dang /rab dang /rab mchog dang /gya nom pa dang /bla na med pa dang /gong na med pa zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cha
48b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa dang /theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang lhag
48b3(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa dang /bdag pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus ji skad bshad pa bzhin du gzung zhig/
48b4(mdo sde): chongs shig/kun chub par gyis shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dang /tshe dang ldan pa byams me'i bu gang bri dang /
48b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zer bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
48b6(mdo sde): pa la mngon par bstod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u dgu pa ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs so////bam po gsum pa//'di
48b7(mdo sde): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga
49a1(mdo sde): bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par byung gA sems
49a2(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par grol ba/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rjes
49a3(mdo sde): su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba/yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnom por grol ba sems thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son
49a4(mdo sde): bai shu stag dang /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/gzhan yang
49a5(mdo sde): gzi brjid che ba'i lho dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto'i 'phye chen po dang /mi dang myi
49a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /mdun gyis bltas nas/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas 'khor
49a7(mdo sde): bzhi po dgal chos ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
49b1(mdo sde): thun mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brnams te/khyod stos par byung
49b2(mdo sde): sheg/de nas che dang ldanA pa shA ra ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das las skabs phye ba thob nas/sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'tshon po rnams
49b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes skye ston to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos ched dado ldan shA rang ti'i bul 'di skad ces smras so//rdzing
49b4(mdo sde): ldan pa shA rarA dwa ti'i bu ji lhor byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal par reg par gyi/byang chub sems
49b5(mdo sde): dpe' rnams kyi spyod yul ni gong yin/spyod yul ma yin pa ni gang yin/de skad naso smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams mo'i blo gang po la 'dra
49b6(mdo sde): ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di lcag la tu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yi pa byed pa rnams kyi gnas na/'di ni byang chub
49b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'o//de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpe'i ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul ma yin
50a1(mdo sde): pa la spyod pa'o//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma
50a2(mdo sde): 'dzin na/byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spong ngo //byang chub sems dpa'i dam btsos pa spong na/tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan
50a3(mdo sde): pa gang po gzhon yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa byin pa na/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngo na/spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod de/
50a4(mdo sde): spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod na/de tsam gyis na tshul khrims 'chi lnga par rig par bya'o//gelA te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs
50a5(mdo sde): spyod pa tsam gyis ni/de tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya ba ma yin gyi/gang sbyin pa byin zhing nyon thos kyi sa dang /rlong sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/de tsam
50a6(mdo sde): gyogyis na tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na rgyal po'i bu rgyal pos gdams pa'i tshig bzhin du byed pa zhig yod la/rgyal rigs
50a7(mdo sde): rnams kyi rgyal po'i bus bsgrub par bya ba bzo'i gnas/'di ltar glang po che'i gnya' bar bzhon pa 'am/rta bzhon pa'am/shing rta bzhon pa 'am/ral gri'i thabs sam/
50b1(mdo sde): 'phyong ngam/mnga' bo che 'phang ba'i thabs sam/brgyug pa 'am/'gom pa 'am/mchong ba 'am/stobs 'byed pa 'am/dgra zad pas ma/de la tshogs pa'i bzo de dag
50b2(mdo sde): la slob na/rgyal po la dben pa yin te/rgyal po'ang smra dbab par mi sems so//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas te/'dod pa'i yon tan/
50b3(mdo sde): lnga rnams kyis rtse zhing dga' la/dga' mgur spyod du zin kyang /byang chub sems dpa' do ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lnga phan 'dogs pa nyid du gyur pa yin no//gale tre yang sbyin pa
50b4(mdo sde): byin pa na/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su bsngo nan+ya/de tsam gyis na spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin te/bdagra nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing du mi rung
50b5(mdo sde): byobor byed do//ji lta ji ltar bdag nyid zhing du mi rung bar byed pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to//ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
50b6(mdo sde): yongs su mi 'dzin pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed de/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin no//de'i spyod yul ma yin po gang
50b7(mdo sde): yin pa de nyid ni/de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gal te khyim gyi gnas nas byung bar gyur te/dbang tshul khrims
51a1(mdo sde): gang dang gang yang dag par bzung nas gnas pa de'ang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi bston/byang chub sems drupa de ni byang chub sems/
51a2(mdo sde): dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin no//gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o//gal te byung
51a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khyim ni gnas shing /gsum lo skyabs su song bar gyur la/de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngon de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan rnams la
51a4(mdo sde): longs spyod du zin kyang /de tsam gyis na du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa/tshul khrims dang ldan pA zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' gling byang chub
51a5(mdo sde): sems da pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa de ni//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no//gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de ni thams
51a6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams 'byung du zin kyang
51a7(mdo sde): de dag thams cad de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byed pa'i sems cig gis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya na
51b1(mdo sde): mching bu'i nor bu 'bum dug dang lhan cig tu bsros te bzhag na/nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rin thang med pa dang /kha dog bzang po dang 'od kyis mching bu'i nor bu de dgra thams cad
51b2(mdo sde): zil gyis gnon to//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
51b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems gcig bskyed pas zil gyis non par rig par bya ste/ji ltar mching bu'i nor bu de drag nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya gcig gis zil gyis non cing lam mer
51b4(mdo sde): ma gyur pa bzhin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gral te byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma rnams 'dod cing sbyin pa byin na/spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o//gang de'i
51b5(mdo sde): spyod yul ma yin pa thams cad ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chubo sems dpas mtshon ma rnams 'dod pas sbyin pa byin par mi bya'i//
51b6(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa byin par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang la thams cad mkhyen po nyid yod pa de la ni mtshan rnams yod do//de li ni mi 'jigs pa rnams
51b7(mdo sde): yod do//de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad rnams yod pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yod do//de ltar na de'i sbyin pa ni mchog tu bzung ba ma yin no//
52a1(mdo sde): gang gi tshe mchog tu ma bzung ba de'i tshe/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to//smras pa//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i na rgyang chub
52a2(mdo sde): snyems dpa' grang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin po byin par byed na/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin nAm+ba/gang dang gang la mchog tu
52a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de nyid de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mjug tu 'dzin pa yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni yul na gnas pa 'am/phyogs
52a4(mdo sde): na gnas pa ma yin no//thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzugs sam/tshur bri 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed rnams sam/rnam par shes pa'ang ma yin no//
52a5(mdo sde): 'du byas kyang ma yin/'du ma byas pa'ang ma yin/tshad yod pa'ang ma yin te/de ni mchog tu bzung bar mi nus so//chos gang yang dmigs su med de/gang
52a6(mdo sde): dmigs su med pa de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/med pa'ang ma yin te/gang yod pa'ang ma yin/med pa'ang ma yin pa ni mchog tu bzung bar mi nus so//tshe dang ldan
52a7(mdo sde): pa gang po de lta bas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa byin nam/tshul khrims srung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngon/tshul khrims de/
52b1(mdo sde): brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin no//gral te'ang tshul khrims de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/tshul khrims na chog tu 'dzin pa yin
52b2(mdo sde): te/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams pa yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar nyams pa phyir
52b3(mdo sde): bslang bar nus sam/smras pa/gal te yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ma byas la gal te bden pa rnams mi mthong ni phyir yang bslang bar nus so//yang smras pa/'di la
52b4(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sumi du mi bya'o//
52b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ci'i phyir/smras pa/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni thams
52b6(mdo sde): cing mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i skul ba med pa'i phyir ro//gal te de chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe byung na ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par rang byang chub mngon sum du
52b7(mdo sde): byed par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po rgyu 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par ma gyur gyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byar ma gnang ngo //
53a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa glang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/tshul khrims de sems can thams cad la
53a2(mdo sde): pan gdags pa'i phyir mngon par mi sgrub na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gral te
53a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshad yod pa rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa byin nam/tshul khrims srung na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no//
53a4(mdo sde): do ci'i phyir zhe na/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chud yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims gang yin
53a5(mdo sde): smras pa/sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims srung ba de thams cad/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed na/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
53a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims so//gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye mi snyed du/tshul khrims bsgom pa'i phyir spyod la/thams
53a7(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi sngon/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa mi yin no//gal te nyan thos nyid dam/rang sangs rgyas nyid du'ang
53b1(mdo sde): yongs su mi sngon/de ltar na'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin te/des tshul khrims 'chal par yang mi rtsi'o//gal te nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang
53b2(mdo sde): srungs rgyas kyi ser yongs su bsngo na/de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i
53b3(mdo sde): phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang yin/smras pa/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /thams cad mkhyen pa
53b4(mdo sde): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo//gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
53b5(mdo sde): snod du khyim na gnas te/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la brten cing longasu spyod la//nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang sems mi skyed na/de tsam gyis
53b6(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes mi brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar 'dis 'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ma dkrugs
53b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/mi la la zhig nyes pa med par btson rar bcug ste/de btson ra der lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po//lo 'bum phrag mang
54a1(mdo sde): por btsun rar bcug la/de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang 'khrugs par ma gyur/des rkun po'i sems kyang ma bskyed du zin kyang /de btson rar bcug
54a2(mdo sde): na/de tsam gyis ni de rkun po zhes brjod pa ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'ang khyim na gnas shing /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams
54a3(mdo sde): la yongs su longs spyod pa des/tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya bar mi brjod do//gal te bskal pa grang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du tshangs par spyad pa spyod la/de'ang
54a4(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo zhing /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang 'khrugs na de tsam gyis nI de tshul khrims
54a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//gang gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan thos kyi tshul khrims la gnas ni de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi brjod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
54a6(mdo sde): ltar de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u dang po'o//de nas
54a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bskal pa mtha' yas par mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar byas la/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
54b1(mdo sde): bskyed de/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad
54b2(mdo sde): ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes tshad nges par byed par gyur na/'di la nyes pa ci yod//
54b3(mdo sde): smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor bas skrag cing rings te/de rings pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'ang tshad yod pa nyid du gyur te/de ni nyan
54b4(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/tshad yod pas ni sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar mi nus so//tshe dang ldan pa grang
54b5(mdo sde): po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med grangs med pas na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ma gtogs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba med do//gal te
54b6(mdo sde): bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang da dung sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur te/mtha' yas pa'i phyir na/de'i tshe thams
54b7(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob por 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lto bas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod/
55a1(mdo sde): pas ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring bar mtshams sbyor zhing /'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par yongs su sgom par 'gyur ro//
55a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang po dper na/snod sar pa sman gyi khu ba'i chus bkang ste bzhag na/ji lta ji ltar bzhag pa de lta de ltar shin tu bsgos pa dang /shin tu sra bAr 'gyur ro//tshe
55a3(mdo sde): drang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing /'khor ba de lta dro ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
55a4(mdo sde): phyin pa legs par bsgoms shIng tshes brtan par 'gyur ba dang /ljing bzod par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/bum pa sar po'i nang du mar ram til mar
55a5(mdo sde): bzhag na/de ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring du bzhag pa de lta de ltar bum pa de snum dang ldan par 'gyur te/bum pa de snum gyis khyab par ma gyur pa chung zad kyang med
55a6(mdo sde): do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun rang por mtshams sbyor zhing /'khor ba de lta de ltar
55a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang /'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang /'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa
55b1(mdo sde): ba pade//gyur pa rnam tu sbyin pa zas //dI m+b+ha ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa de/ sbyar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo//dziT+Tad+hISh+Tha pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de lta de lta
55b2(mdo sde): thams ni mkhyen pa nyid da bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang rten pa bang po ste byung chub sems dada' sa mos dang 'a dzin po sem sa gung dang bung spyod pa de thams cad
55b3(mdo sde): khyen pa nyid nga sbyin pasnyi nga /sems gzhan dag skye de'i ga skabs mi 'a do//gang gi tshe sems gzhan skye ba'i goskabs mi rnye pa de dz+ha/bye chub sems papa'i
55b4(mdo sde): yongs da'i chen po 'dabu brlo phyin pa rnams kyis sems kyi drung yongs su brnams pa zhes rgya/dadu rdzun pa gang gi/dper na ma sa pa ni dang phyin
55b5(mdo sde): nas bzung yang /de dang de snang gyi dring sngon pa nyid du 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po'i sems gang dang gang ste bu de dag thams ca chung
55b6(mdo sde): cing ma sbyin pa nyid dang ldan pa nyid sa par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i mims dngape 'a chen po de la ni bdu sdig can gyis rmugs brgyal kyang gags rnyed de/de ni dmigs pa
55b7(mdo sde): gang las blugs 'che le po'i dmogs pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgom par byed pa'i phyir te/de bzhin du bdud kyiris rnams kyis kyang grags mi rnyed do//tshedang ldan na
56a1(mdo sde): dade ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji b+ha ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang /'phags
56a2(mdo sde): byanyan thos rnams dang drang pa thob par 'gyur ro//dzim+b+ha ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang /'dugs pa nyan thos rnams dang phyung ba thob pa de lta de ltar bai rol tu phyin pa rnams
56a3(mdo sde): thos par 'gyur ro//rdo lta ji ltar ba rol tu phyin pa rnams thos pa de de ltar/de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed rnying skom mo//ji lta ji ltar nan tan byed cing sgom pa de lta de
56a4(mdo sde): lhur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa bang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni/
56a5(mdo sde): thog ma kho nar semaso dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung ba/tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur la/de nas de'i 'og tu pha rol tshul khrims yang dge par 'dzin
56a6(mdo sde): du 'jug go/de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdun/rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo tshul
56a7(mdo sde): khrims yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa de/byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub
56b1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'doms la/gtams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/
56b2(mdo sde): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang de la 'doms pa de/byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'dri lto ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
56b3(mdo sde): du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper ni/mi lal gser gyi mi khyer te 'gro na/khyer ba gang yin pa de nyid gser gyi mis kha dog dang /dbyibs dang
56b4(mdo sde): 'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
56b5(mdo sde): 'doms na/nyan thos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas zil gyisanon par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
56b6(mdo sde): du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/mi zhig gis shel gyi mi pang bar thogs te 'gro na/khyer ba gang yin pa de nyid shel gyi mis/kha dog dang /
56b7(mdo sde): dbyibs dang /'od kyis zil gyis non kar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gang dag yin pa de dag gi
57a1(mdo sde): byem snyed ldan thos ni yod pa gyu pa/dang byang chub sems nga du/tshul khrims gyulal tu phyir bral 'dams shing rjes su stoms/
57a2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sungs su bstobs rnaMl gyis non par 'gyur ro//dzem+b+ha ji ltar de dag 'doms pa di
57a3(mdo sde): lcing nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par gyur ro//gal te bskal po kr-id+hI klung gi bye ma snying du 'dug ste/nyan thos de dag byang chub sems dpa' la 'dams shing rjes su
57a4(mdo sde): s+thAn+dan/de nam du byang chub sems dpa'i ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin sa hU~M bags la/'di ste ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bsdu/nyan thos rnams
57a5(mdo sde): ni zil gyis non pa 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang blo dper na/gsor ni d+hIHji ltar bzhu zhing sgrol ba de lta de ltar ches 'od gsalnga zhing /chos khe dog bzang por 'gyur ro//
57a6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa phung po de bzhin du jim+b+ha ji ltar nyen thos kyi thege panga'i gang drug gas/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'joms shing rjes su ston pa de lta
57a7(mdo sde): sbyar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//dzaM rdo ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de sbyi de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta s+ho/
57b1(mdo sde): ngas kyi na phyin pa rnam na pa ny-i nga sa su sgrubs/na rnaMs kyi pa de'i 'a ga rnaMm rjes non par 'byung ma// rdzun pa ga spyod dus
57b2(mdo sde): nang byu ma 'an da du / dgas pa dang /shin tu ngas su dgu par gyur ro//da du rgyun gyis kyi sbyin pa
57b3(mdo sde): slong bag / byang chub sems dang tshul khrims pa rab tu phyin pa la 'dams shing rjes su ston pa de de ltar byu chug sem smi dI n+d+he m+b+ha mas
57b4(mdo sde): pa shin tu yongs su dgi khyong na/ shin tu yo sa su ga phyir 'gyur ba de lta ltar byang chub sems dngos 'ad sa/rdul khrims kyi phyir ba tu na
57b5(mdo sde): sa rlung misbyin pa nyid yongs slo 'i byur nyin gyis rnams zil gyis non pa gyur /nga nub dang ba dper na/mamangon du/ri mamaldan gyi smra
57b6(mdo sde): shin tu lo bris pas kha dag sa lnga'i tshun gyis ji b+h+yo d+ha da ga dang /dbyings kyi gzugs 'di zhing chen hrIHs+t+wa~M/rdzogs par byed cing chen byed pade ny-i myur yid du'adzin
57b7(mdo sde): sa par byed pab cu /seng gis pa rgyas rnams bris pa nying bdag da/dbyings kyis zil gyis sbyin par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ljon pa gang ba de bzhin du ga
58a1(mdo sde): thos dpag tu med pas/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul
58a2(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//de lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos rnams zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byed de/'di lta ste/
58a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to//byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phra
58a4(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du rnam par 'phel lo//de dag ni tshulde khrims de tsA me nyi tshe dang ldan pa yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/mi zhig gis shing
58a5(mdo sde): bskyed la/shing bskyed nas dus dus su byi dor byed cing chus bran ni ji lta ji ltar byi dor byed cing chu sa bren pa de lta de ltar chu zheng dang 'phang du skye bar 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa ga
58a6(mdo sde): po//de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ji lta ji ltar nyan thos
58a7(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel lo//ji lta
58b1(mdo sde): ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen
58b2(mdo sde): pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byas nas/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/bdi lta ste/tshul khrims kyi pha
58b3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas gang dag dri la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de dag kyang zil gyis gdon to//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/
58b4(mdo sde): mi la la me chung ngu'i nang du rtswa dang /shing dang /lci ba rnams 'jug na/de ji lta ji ltar 'jug pa de lta de ltar de'i rgyu las me de mched par 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar me de mched pa
58b5(mdo sde): de lta de ltar me'i phung po de shin tu che bar 'gyur te/des dpag tshad mang po/dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang /dpag tshad stong phrag mang po rnams bsreg cing snang bar byed do//
58b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ji lta ji ltar nyan
58b7(mdo sde): thos dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su
59a1(mdo sde): bsngo ba'i phyir/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
59a2(mdo sde): phyin pa la snang ba dpag tu med pa de lta de ltar/byang chub sems dpa' lo tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'doms pa'i nyan thos gzhan gang yin pa dag gis zil gyis
59a3(mdo sde): non par mi 'gyur te/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/mi zhig gis gser gyi 'byung khung nas gser blangs te/
59a4(mdo sde): des gser de blangs nas bdag nyid kyang btsongs la/gleser de'ang btsongs na/des gser dri btsongs pa'i rin ni ches che ba yin gyi/gang gis gseng blangs pa'i me do'i ni
59a5(mdo sde): ma yin no//tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes
59a6(mdo sde): su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu med cing chos rin thang med par 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' de la nyan thos de
59a7(mdo sde): ngag gis tshul khrims kyis kyang zil gyis non par mi 'gyur la/byang chub sems dpa' ni nyan thos de dag tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/'a
59b1(mdo sde): ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i
59b2(mdo sde): gang zag 'doms shing rjes su ston pa gang yin pa de nyid/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis gnon pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
59b3(mdo sde): po rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/'di lta ste/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro//de nas tshe dang
59b4(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bshad pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang nas tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
59b5(mdo sde): nichos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes smras so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u gnyis pa'o///tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus
59b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu glang po la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
59b7(mdo sde): spyong na/gal te byed pa po'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/de byang chub sems dpa'i chos la gnas par rig par bya ba ma yin te/byang chub sems
60a1(mdo sde): dra pa'i chos spong zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas spyod do//de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni/de'i
60a2(mdo sde): 'chal pa'i tshul khrims shes bya'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gleng byed pa po'i chos 'ga' yang /yang dag par rjes
60a3(mdo sde): su mi mthong zhing /de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang drug par blangs nas 'dug no/chos gang la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phan 'dogs pa 'am/gnod/
60a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/chos gang la'ang phan 'dogs pa 'am/gnod par byed pa ma yin no//gal te chos
60a5(mdo sde): 'ga' zhig la phan 'dogs pa'am/gnod pa byed par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa yin par rig par bya'o//
60a6(mdo sde): gal te byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos 'ga' la phan pa 'am/gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dgra bar rjes su mthong na/byang chub
60a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no//byed pa po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/byang chub sems pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
60b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ste/tshul khrims de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub
60b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sbyin pa gang dang gang yongs su btang nas/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//
60b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa gong po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsta na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
60b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyis spyos som/brgyad bkag kyang rung ste/bzod par byed cing /bzod pa
60b5(mdo sde): de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
60b6(mdo sde): sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan rnams kyi ched du rtsol bar byed la/brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul
60b7(mdo sde): khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gang dang gang skyed pa de bzhin du/bsam gtan 'di dag bskyed nas/rdzu 'phrul
61a1(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrub par bya'o//rdzu 'phrul des kyang sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug cing shes par bya'o//de nas snod du gyur par bya snyan ste/
61a2(mdo sde): sems kyi khyad par de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mi khyen pa nyid du yongs su bsnga na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//tshe dang
61a3(mdo sde): bragang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rib gong dang gang la spyod cing /phung po la mkhas pa'am/khams la mkhas pa 'am/skye mched la mkhas pa 'am/rten
61a4(mdo sde): cing 'brel par 'byung po la mkhas pa 'am/gnas dang gnas ma yin po la mkhas pa 'am/mnyam pa nyid du 'du shes nas 'du shes thams cod spang ba'i phyir chos bstan
61a5(mdo sde): par bya'i snyam ste/sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang yongs su bsngo na/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o//
61a6(mdo sde): bla na med pa'i tshul khrims dang ljon par rig par bya'o//gal te byang chub sems dpa'apha rol tu phyin pa drug thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub se mos
61a7(mdo sde): dpa' brel ni nyan thos gang gis kyang tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnang nus pa ga yang med do//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems cen thams cad dge ba
61b1(mdo sde): chu'i las ki lnga dang ldan par gyur na/de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya/
61b2(mdo sde): char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe drang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur
61b3(mdo sde): na/de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni/theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/
61b4(mdo sde): rgya'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas por gyur/snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms
61b5(mdo sde): lo gnas par gyur na/de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de'ang theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar
61b6(mdo sde): mi 'grob nas/rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/
61b7(mdo sde): de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/rgyu'i
62a1(mdo sde): bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang
62a2(mdo sde): ldan par gyur na de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar
62a3(mdo sde): mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad smon pa med pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur
62a4(mdo sde): na/de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi ba rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas
62a5(mdo sde): rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad brkyang par gyur na/de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po
62a6(mdo sde): zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mo 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams
62a7(mdo sde): sgyu'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//gal te tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ting bus bdog gi dri ba dris pa lan gdab pa'i skabs phye na/tshe dang
62b1(mdo sde): ldan pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dris shig dang /thos pa'i don brda sprad par bya'o//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu
62b2(mdo sde): gzugs brgyad pa yin par 'dod dam/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa glang po de ni ma yin no//smras pa/tshor po dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
62b3(mdo sde): pababargyad pa yin par 'dod dam/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dri ni ma yin no//smras pa dri las gzhan pa'i chos rnams la brgyad par 'dod dam/smras pa/tshe dang
62b4(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu'o na brgyad pa dri gang yin par 'dod/badrag gis tshe dang ljon pa shA rangadwa ti'i bsdu bshad pa'i dron de ji
62b5(mdo sde): lte bur shes par bya/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa glang po chos 'di rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis mi shes pa de la shes pa grang gis mnyam pa nyid de
62b6(mdo sde): mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa de ni bya ba byas pa'i phyir thob pa yin te/de la brgyad pa ni yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gal te gnas 'di rnyed na ni mnyam pa nyid shes
62b7(mdo sde): pa 'di la brtag cing brgal ba med do//smras pa/'di skad du brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba
63a1(mdo sde): nas rgyu'i bang byung byu mi 'groSh+kaM sa rnye na/du rdzun sh+tsa dwa tI'i di s+thA ma da ma nga/sbyis sgyu ma d+hi/ mthu du
63a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po brgyad du'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de bye chu bo sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yong nye bar mi 'gro ba nAs r+b+ba'aM byar
63a3(mdo sde): du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba dri ni ji ltar las dang po pa la bya shed pa de ltar bstan to//ci nas sems can rnams 'jug par 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to//ci nas skye bo mang
63a4(mdo sde): sa go bar 'gyur ba de ltar bstan /// nas smreg pa chen po dang /sa sa ts+tshas kyi mag pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dri ltar ban///brgyad pa'i tshul yinasu gang yin po de ni
63a5(mdo sde): la m-i zhugs pa'i byang chub sems de'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgya char yang byu myi gro nis/chu'i bang na bar ste 'gyug/
63a6(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po gzhin yang rgyun du zhugs pa rnangs d+hA dang /lan cig phyi 'ang ba rnams cad dang /sbyi mi 'ong ba thams cad dang /dgra be rnam pa rnams cid dang /rnye/
63a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro
63b1(mdo sde): khros rgyu'i brang du'adra nye bar mi 'gro'o//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang nyan thos gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par sems pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs
63b2(mdo sde): nga'i tshul khrim sna zil gyis mnan par 'dod par zad de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang rtsod par sems su zang ngo //tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na gang rgyal po'i bu dang rtsod
63b3(mdo sde): paR+Sha sims pa de ni/rgyal po dang rjod par sems pad rlu //tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par sems pa gang yin pa
63b4(mdo sde): de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis munan par sems par zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thub par
63b5(mdo sde): dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro//tshe dang ldan pa glang po dpe rla na mi la la zhig rkang lag med par gyur la 'di skad du/bdag 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du mchod par bya'o///
63b6(mdo sde): zhes zer na de skad zer ba de la mi de ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal byed de smra bar rig par bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa dang po de bzhin du nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas gang 'di skad
63b7(mdo sde): du/bdag byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par bya'o zhes zer na tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ltar de ni smra bar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub
64a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rgya mtsho drug can pa dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir ro//ji ltar mi de rkang lag rnams med bzhin du rgya mtsho la mchod/
64a2(mdo sde): par 'dod pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams med bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
64a3(mdo sde): khrims zil gyis non par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa
64a4(mdo sde): yin pa'i phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin/smras pa/tshe dang
64a5(mdo sde): ldan pa gang po sems can tshul khrims 'chal ba dpag tu med pa dag 'chol ba'i tshul khrims las yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod pa'i
64a6(mdo sde): phyir ro//smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas/smras pa/'di lta ste/'chal pa'i tshul
64a7(mdo sde): khrims zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa dang /dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang /sems can du 'du shes pa dang /srog tu 'du shes pa dang /gang zag
64b1(mdo sde): tu 'du shes pa dang /yod par 'du shes pa dang /med par 'du shes pa'i tshigs bla dgas te/nyon mongs pa de dag dang gzhan rnams yod na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
64b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba rab tu phye'o//de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dpag tu med pa rnams tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod cing theg pa 'di la zhugs te//
64b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims dpog tu med pa dang ldan pa de ni nyan thos rnams samya/rung sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis mnan par sla ba ma yin no//byang chub sems dpas ni 'di lta ste/tshul
64b4(mdo sde): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ming tsam gyis kyang nyan thos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis gnon to//smras pa/
64b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims kyis theg pa med pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la zag
64b6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni bdag nyid lnga phan pa'i phyir bskyed pa yin la/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du yongs su bsngos pa yin
64b7(mdo sde): te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khri mos kyi so zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpe'i tshul
65a1(mdo sde): khrims tshud nges pa zhig sgrub tu zin na ni/zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyang zil gyis non par mi 'gyur la/dri'i tshul khrims kyang pha rol tu phyin par
65a2(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba zhig na/gang gi phyir sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du yongs su bsngo ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpe'i tshul khrims des zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims
65a3(mdo sde): zil gyis non par 'gyur ro//tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'cha ba ni srog chags kyi rigs srin bu me khyer thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis gnon to//tshe
65a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /
65a5(mdo sde): gce re bu pa la sogs pa nas 'phags pa nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi bor rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi 'od kyang zil gyis gnon to//tshe dang ldan pa glang po dper ni zla
65a6(mdo sde): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis gnon to//tshe drang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad
65a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems
65b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi khyad par yang skyed na/rang gi spyod yul la spyod pas de'i tshe
