153b4(mdo sde): 'alung bstan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i stong tham pa thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/thams
153b5(mdo sde): cad kyang ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i sa thob pa/mkhas pa/drang po/ded pa dang ldan pa/rtog pa mang ba/dang ba gtso bor byed pa bzhin 'dzum pa/khro gnyer med pa/gso
153b6(mdo sde): med pa/bsgrub pa dang ldan pa/chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa/chos bstan pas yongs su mi skyo ba/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par skyes pa/yongs
153b7(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa/ldem po dag la phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/yul thams cad phyin ci ma log pa'i so dang ldan pa/dus shes pa/tshod shes pa/skabs shes pa
154a1(mdo sde): ran pa shes pa/rgod pa med pa/khengs pa med pa/spyod lam tha mal pa phun sum tshogs pa/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa/'byung ba /
154a2(mdo sde): dang 'jig pa yongs su spangs pa/smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/'khor ba la yun ring du spyod pa la zhugs pa/mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/spros/
154a3(mdo sde): pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mtshan ma legs par bzung ba/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa/'du shes thams cad dang bral ba/nyan thos kyi theg pa rnam par
154a4(mdo sde): bzhag pa la mkhas pa/chos bstan pa yang drag par dbye ba 'jug par byed pa/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston pa/nye bar zhi ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa/byang chub sems/
154a5(mdo sde): dpa' yang dag par slong ba/spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhe 'gros pa med par chos ston pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /'jam
154a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /spobs pa brtsegs dang /lag na rin chen ldan dang /spos 'od dang /mtha' yas snang ba'i blo gros dang /ngan song spong dang /don grub sems
154a7(mdo sde): pa dang /yon tani rgyal po snang dang /mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros dang /mi mnyam pa thams cad ston pa dang /de'i rang bzhin du mi gnas pa dang /
154b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang /brtson 'grus dang /rtsal bstan por sems pa dang /rin chen 'byung gnas dang /bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /'khrul/
154b2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i mthu rtsal dang /khyad par blo gros dang /kun nas mdzes dang /sgrib med ston dang /rnam par rtse dang /gser mchog 'od dpal dang /chos thams cad la rtag tu
154b3(mdo sde): lta ba'i blo ldan dang /spos dri myur+tha sbyin me tog kun tu rgyas dang /gtso bo brtsegs dang /mya ngan med pa'i dpal dang /lhun po'i lto dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /
154b4(mdo sde): spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /blo mtha' yas sgrub pa dang /dam pa'i chos thams cad mi brjed par gnas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
154b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po seng ge ltar sgra mngon par sgrogs pa dang /de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po gzhan drag dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas bcom
154b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thebs dang chos gos gsol te/lhung bzod bsnams nas dge slong nyis stong gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod
154b7(mdo sde): snyoms la gshegs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams grong khyer du gshegs pa ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i
155a1(mdo sde): /chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag rgyu/spong ba rnams ni mngon bur gyur byon pa rnams ni zlos par gyur/sman pa rnams ni/
155a2(mdo sde): dran pa rnyed par gyur to//lha'i mi tog gi char yang bab bo//snang ba chen po'adra byung ngo //srang yang dri ma med par gyur to//lha'i sil snyan yad du 'ong ba dag kyang ma
155a3(mdo sde): brdungs par grag go/mnar med pa'i sems can du mya lbu ba la thug pa nas 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi sems can thams cad kyang gcig tu nges par bde zla dang ldan par
155a4(mdo sde): gyur to//de'i tshe yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nA litsA bI seng ge'i bu rin chen byin zhes bya ba skyes nas lo gsum lon pa mA ma'i pang pa na 'dug pa khang bzad kyis brgyan
155a5(mdo sde): po'i khang bzang kyi steng ni 'dug ste/khye'u rin chen byin gyis rmad du byung ba'i mtshan mo dag mthong ngo //de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis rang gi ma ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ma ma
155a6(mdo sde): gang gi mthu stobs kyis//shin tu ya mtshan byung ba snang //nyi ma bye ba rnams kyi 'od//zil gnon snang 'di su zhig yin//stong gsum sa gzhi khyab gyung nas/ngan 'gro
155a7(mdo sde): skams par byed pa yis//rdzu 'phrul snang ba gang yin 'di//ma ma bdag la myur du smros//dus mi ni me tog char ba yis//sangs rgyas zhing mtshams med par mdzes/
155b1(mdo sde): phyogs rnams bya'i tshogs rnams kyis//skad snyan pas ni khyab par gyur//srang yang me tog rnams kyis khebs//me tog gdugs kyang rnam par bres//skyes pa bud med dgal
155b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis//kun nas rab tu mdzes par 'dug/long ba rnams kyis mig kyang thob//skye bo 'o na rnams sgra yang thos//byangad ngan byad gzugs phun sum tshogs//mdog
155b3(mdo sde): ngan kha dog phun sum tshogs//g.yengs pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed//lce med tshig ni rnam par dag/sems can byams pa'i sems med pa//byams pa'i sems dang ldan
155b4(mdo sde): par gyur//ma mra sems can khyad par can//rdzu 'phrul grub pa mthu ldan pa//'jig rten dag na rgyu ba 'di//su yin bdag la kun myur smras//de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyi ma
155b5(mdo sde): mas khye'u rin chen byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/rnam par dag pa spyod mchog ldan//rgyal po dri med blo mi dmyan//bsam yis mi lus yongs su dag/dbang ldan yon
155b6(mdo sde): tan+t+ra rin chen 'phags//'jig rten mgon po 'khrus sa mig/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa lag 'di//blo ldan bsod snyoms don du gshegs//'jig rten chos la rten pa med//
155b7(mdo sde): 'di la sdug dang mi sdug sogs//'jig rten pa yi rtog mi mnga'//pad+ma chu las skyes pa ltar//mnga' bdag mi gos spyod par mdzod//blo gros ldan pa the tshom gcod//
156a1(mdo sde): phan mdzad thugs rjer ldan pa de//'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir//rnam par 'dren pa 'dir gshegs so//bstod kyang dgyes par mi 'gyur
156a2(mdo sde): la//smad kyang 'khrug par mi 'gyur te//khong khro rjes su chags pa spangs//chags med rgyu ba rlung dang 'dra//'di ni ches rgyal dam pa ste//ye shes zab mo phun sum
156a3(mdo sde): tshogs//don dam don la mkhas pa po//'gro ba'i slob dpon gshegs pa yin//de ni dbu mo ston pa ste//yod med 'dzin las rnam par grol//chos lam ldan zhing
156a4(mdo sde): zhi ba ste//bsten pa thams cad yongs su spangs//ye shes phung po bdag med bdag/bsod nams tshogs rnams bsags pa yi//bde gshegs 'jig rten 'dren
156a5(mdo sde): pa po//mtha' yas gzugs can deng gshegs so//dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas//'jam zhing mdog bsdum lcang lo can//gnag cing 'dzings pa med rnams
156a6(mdo sde): kyis/de yi dbu ni rnam par mdzes//gtsug tor g.yas su 'khyil ba ste//dbu skra 'khyil cing legs par gan sde//ri rab rtse mo 'dra bar ni//de yi dbyibs ni mdzes
156a7(mdo sde): pa yin//de yi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes//'jam zhing g.yos su 'khyil ba ste//'od ni shel dag zla ba yi//bod zer dra ba mang bas lhag/de yi zhal nas
156b1(mdo sde): spyan mdzes pa//me tog ut+pal sngon po 'dra//ba yi rdzi ma yongs su dag/mi dmar ma 'dzings zhi bar gzigs//dpal ldan seng ge'i 'gram pa 'dra//de ni rtag tu zhal yang //
156b2(mdo sde): 'dzum//sgros ni bim pa bzhin du dmar//zhal mdzes lus can kun 'dren pa//mthu stobs chen po phun sum tshogs//bsod nams brgya yi stobs mnga' ba//tshems
156b3(mdo sde): kyi phreng ba sra ba'i 'od//snyoms shing thags bzang yongs su dag/de yi tshems ni shin tu dkar//ljags ni shin tu ring zhing srag//bdag nyid kyi ni zhal gyi ros//de yis
156b4(mdo sde): kun tu khyab par gnas//dpal ldan dbu ni gdugs dang 'dra//de bzhin de ni shangs kyang mtho//mdag ni btso mo'i gser dang 'dra//de yi zhal gyi dpral ba mdzes//de yi
156b5(mdo sde): zhal gyi smin tshugs ni//kha dog mthon mthing shin tu sdug/zhi ba'i spyan ni mdzes pa ste//snyan gyi drung du thug par gnas//snyan shal ring lnga rab tu 'phyang //zhal mdzes
156b6(mdo sde): ston gyi zla bas lhag/zhal ras pad+ma rnam dag 'dra//zhal mdangs dkar la drang zhing gsal//brtan po chings pa'i sgra skad ldan//de gsung ka la ping+ga 'dra//de yi gsung bzang
156b7(mdo sde): yid du 'ong //'jam zhing sems cin tshim par byed//rma bya ngang pa mi 'am ci//ne tso ri skegs khu byug dang //'brug sgra khrung khrung kun la//shang shang te'u dang gling bu dang //
157a1(mdo sde): dzA rnga'i sgra drang gzhan dag kyang //sgra skad snyan pa ci yang rung //de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yi//gsung gi bcu drug char mi phod//bskrun mdzad
157a2(mdo sde): de bzhin mnyen pa ste//de ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang //yid 'ong drag 'a byed gsal ba ste//skyon dang bral zhing 'jigs pa med//re ba rnams la char rgyun ltar//sems
157a3(mdo sde): rgyun tshim par byed la zhi//mnyams ma 'khrul rab tu zhi//de bzhin dag cing brda phyung sla//skal dang ldan zhing snyan par ldan//don dang yon tan thams cad sogs//
157a4(mdo sde): glasung gi rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs//ngo yi gsung ni drag skyed pa//sems can mos pa tha dad pa//de bzhin nges tshig the dang rnams//dri yi gsung la nges par dang ///
157a5(mdo sde): yid kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur//des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams//gnas pa'i sems can gsung gis khyab//mgon po de yi gsung tshig ni//sems can rnams
157a6(mdo sde): la don yod 'jug/thub pa skyes mchog de yi ni//mgur yang dung 'dra dpung mgo zlum//de yi thal gong rgyas pa ste//de ni bdun po mtho ba mnga'//de yi phyag kyang rab tu
157a7(mdo sde): ring //pags pa gser mdog 'dra ba ste//gser gyi sdong po bzhin du mtho//n+ya gro d+he ltar chu zhing gab//thugs ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan//'khor lo'i mtshon can pad+ma'i
157b1(mdo sde): phyag/shing bal 'dab ltar reg na 'jam//de yi phyag gi sor mo ring //spu rnams re rer skye zhing yar phyogs sdug la 'jam//brang gi phel ka che la rab rgyas lce bzug/phyal dbyibs
157b2(mdo sde): gzhu 'dra blang chen bzhin du sbubs su nub//rje ngararu e na yA 'dra mdangs dkar 'dam bu'i sbubs//long bu mi mngon de yi rting pa legs par grub//de bzhin drang srong sor mo ring
157b3(mdo sde): zhing sen mo dmar//bde bar gshegs kyi zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon te//'khor lo lcags kyu bkra shis ldan dang dung gris spras//mgon po de yi zhabs gnyis mnyam zhing legs
157b4(mdo sde): gnas dang //shing bal bzhin du reg na 'jam zhing bzang ba dang //me tog ut+palA dmar po legs par skyes pa yi//kha dog 'dra bas sa gzhi dag la gshegs par mdzad//
157b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra sgrogs bde sbyin pa//'gro ba rnams kyi glatso bo de ni 'drir gshegs te//yong gis 'jigs pa med par seng ge'i sgra skad kyis//gnyis su med
157b6(mdo sde): cing spros pa med pa'i chos kyang ston//de nas khyo'u rin chen byin gyis bdag gi ma ma lnga 'di skad ces smras so//ma ma bdag skar khung 'dir zhog cig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o//
157b7(mdo sde): de nas ma ma des khye'u rin chen byin skar khung du bzhag go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rin chen byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas srang de kho nar gshegs
158a1(mdo sde): so/khye'u rin chen byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/gang dag de bzhin gshegs
158a2(mdo sde): pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa 'di lta bu mthong nas byang chub kyi sems skyed par mi byed pa de dag ni rnyed pa nyes par rnyed pa'o snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin
158a3(mdo sde): chen byin gyi sgo drung du gshegs so//de nas khye'u rin tshon byin 'dri snyam du soms te/sems can khyad par can 'di lta bu ni bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum du'ang rnyed par dkas/
158a4(mdo sde): khang bzang 'di las bdag gis mchod par bya'o snyam mo//de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis ril gyis gser las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab mo 'bum dang ldan pa rtsen pa lag mthil
158a5(mdo sde): du khyer ro//de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis khang bzang de las bdag nyid kyis mchongs so//de sangs rgyas kyi mthus nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug go/de nas khye'u rin chen
158a6(mdo sde): byin gyis ril gyis gser las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma 'bum dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo//de khye'u ri ni chen byin gyi lag na sti btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i
158a7(mdo sde): drong thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' bor snang la pad+ma'i gdugs su byas te rin po che'i dra ba'ang bres so//de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin tshon byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
158b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pad+ma 'di phul ba//bdag ni ci yang mi 'tshul te//don rnams thams cad bcad skad du//bdag ni byang chub mchog 'tshal lo//ji ltar byang chub ma skyes lA//
158b2(mdo sde): thob pa ma mchis bshig ma mchis//blang du ma mchis thob ma mchis//de ltar bdag gis me tog dbul//byis pa rnams kyis dron gang brtags//brtags pa de ni don
158b3(mdo sde): ma mchis//rtog pa thams cad gcud skad du//gang zag mchog la bdag mchod bgyid//de phyir me tog phul ba 'di//bdag la rnam smin 'bras ma gyur//dngos po thams cad
158b4(mdo sde): gcad slad du//pad+ma 'di ni bdag gis phul//bdag gi sangs rgyas zhing du ni//rgyal mchog theg pas 'gro ma gtogs//nyan thos kyi ni ming yang rung //rang rgyal ming yang
158b5(mdo sde): 'byung me gyur//de nis tshe dang ldan pa mod+gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/khyod ni ston pa 'di 'dra la//dad pas mchod pa byed mod kyi//blo
158b6(mdo sde): gros phyin ci log gyur nas//sngangs rgyas su ni ji ltar 'gyur//de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal gyi bu chen po la tshigs su bcud de smras pa/'di dag thams cad
158b7(mdo sde): ma skyes te//'dus byas dag ni gsob dang gsog/de 'dra ba yi chos rnams la//dngos por 'gyur ba ga la yod//khyod ni chos gos ngur smrig bgos//dgra bcom nyid du 'dzin
159a1(mdo sde): par byed//rnam shes 'di dang spyod yul yang //stong pa kho na ma yin nam//dmigs pa la ni gnas bcas pas//sangs rgyas bye ba mu mnyes byas///
159a2(mdo sde): bye ba de yang zhi bar mthong //su yang ma mnyes byas pa med//maud+gal bu la dra dung yang //dmigs pa 'jug pa yod dam ci//khyod kyi sems ni gang zhig gis//yon
159a3(mdo sde): yang yongs su sbyong bar byed//de nas tshe dang ldan pa maut+pal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so//khye'u ci de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag
159a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas sngam/chos kyang ma bstan tam/khye'u rin cheni byin gyis smras pa/maut+pal gyi bu mkhas pas ni byang chub spros
159a5(mdo sde): par mi bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rlom sems su mi bya'o//chos mi skye'o snyam du brtag par mi bya'o//chos thams cad 'dus byas so snyam du brtag par mi bya'o//
159a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so snyam du brtag par mi bya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te chos thams cad skye ba dang /mi skye ba dang /dngos po dang /dngos po med pa zhes bya ba dang
159a7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang /gtong ba zhes bya ba dang phrad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /'gro ba dang /'ong ba dang /gnas pa dang /'pho ba dang /'dod chags kyi chos dang /zhe sdang
159b1(mdo sde): gachos dang /gti mug gi chos dang /chos dang /chos ma yin pa zhes brtag par mi bya'o//ma rig pa la sogs pa nas so so'i skyo ba'i chos rnams dang /nyan thos kyi chos rnams
159b2(mdo sde): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams dang /rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang /gzugs ldan dang /
159b3(mdo sde): gzugs can ma yin pa dang /'du shes dang /'du shes med pa dang /mtshan nyid dang /mtshan nyid med pa dang /spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /mnyam pa nyid dang /myi mnyam
159b4(mdo sde): pa nyid dang /lus dang /sems dang /chos thams cad tshul bzhin dang /tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du skye bar 'gyur ro//zhes brtag par mi bya'o//mot+pal gyi bu
159b5(mdo sde): 'dri ji snyam du sems/de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya 'am/smras pa/de ni ma yin no//smras pa/ci
159b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang /byang chub de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang /so so'i skye bo de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par 'dod dam/mod+gal gyi
159b7(mdo sde): bus smras pa/de ni ma yin no//khye'us smras pa/mod+gal gyi bu khyod spros pa med pa la spros par byed dam/mad+gal gyi bus smras pa/kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi sgo nas
160a1(mdo sde): ston to//khye'us smras pa/maud+gal gyi bu 'jig rten ni brdzun pa slu ba sgyu ma'i rnam pa/byis pa 'drid par byed pa'o//mod+gal gyi bus smras pa/gal
160a2(mdo sde): te 'jig rten 'di brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can yin pa dang bstan pa 'dri'ang brdzun pa/slu ba'i chos cin yin na khyod ci'i phyir ston par byed/smras pa/maud+gal gyi bu chos thams
160a3(mdo sde): cad ni bstan du med pa ste/de dag ni bstan par bya ba ma yin/thob par bya ba ma yin/mngon sum du bya ba mo yin/spang bar bya ba ma yin/yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin///
160a4(mdo sde): bsgom par bya ba ma yin no//maut+pal gyi bus smras pa/'o na khyod kyis gong gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/khye'us smras pa/maud+gal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs
160a5(mdo sde): pa'am/sbyin pa po 'am/sbyin par dmigs sam/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu cang mi smra bar gyur to//khye'u rin che ni byin gyis smras pa/modol gyi bu bdag gis
160a6(mdo sde): de las bAs ma nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yongs su sbyangs te/nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems bskyed par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni rnyed pa nyes par rnyed pa'o zhes
160a7(mdo sde): deskad kyi tshig smras so//mot+pad+gal gyi bus smras pa/khyod ni na tshod shin tu gzhon//shes rab kyi ni rgya mtsho bzhin//khyod kyis ji srid tsam zhig nas//chos 'di dag la
160b1(mdo sde): bslabs par gyur/khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/bslab pa thams cad rnam 'jig pa//bslab pa gang yin de bslab min//kang la bslab pa med pa dri//mkhas pa
160b2(mdo sde): rnams kyi bslab pa yin//don gang khyod kyis bdag dris pa//sems can 'du shes gnas pa ste//'dir ni chos rnams thams cad la//gang la yang skye ba mi rnyed do//byis
160b3(mdo sde): pa rnams ni byang chub dang //'khor ba nyid du rtog par byed//'dir ni da dung btsun pa khyod//byis pa'i chos la 'brang ngam ci//ring po'am yang na thung dro zhes//mkhas pa
160b4(mdo sde): dag ni rtog mi byed//chos kun rnying po med par ni//de bzhin de dag khong du chud//byis pra'um byis pa'i chos rnams sam//sangs rgyas chos sam rgyal ba'ang rung //blo ldan tha
160b5(mdo sde): da mi 'byed kyis//stong pa nyid la de ltar ltos//drang srong chen pos byang chub thob//de ni mi rigs brtags pa yin//chos 'di la ni skye med na//mya ngan 'das pa ji ltar thob//
160b6(mdo sde): chos rnams mtha' yas rab tu gsungs//sems can grol ba'ang dngos po med//mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba la//tha dad dbyer med gzung bar gyis//'di la rnam pa thams
160b7(mdo sde): cad du//bsnan dang dbri ba ci yang med//tha dad med pa'i chos rnams la//mkhas pa rnams ni rmongs mi 'gyur//byis pa rnams kyis thob cing rnyed//byis pas mya ngan 'das
161a1(mdo sde): pa thob/'khor ba la ni de kun chags//rloms sems bdud kyi 'ching ba yin//gang gis blo la ngas thob snyam//des ni ci yang thod pa med//
161a2(mdo sde): de yi yang srid 'gro ba yi//ma rig pa la'ang 'jug par 'gyur//byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni//mthong ba med cing spangs pa'ang med//sangs rgyas rnams kyi
161a3(mdo sde): byang chub 'di//tha skad yin te don du min//byang chub da ni mya ngan 'das//tha dang dag gis brjod mi nus//gang dag de ltar yang dag mthong //de dag chos nyid rnam
161a4(mdo sde): par shes//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin gyis yun ji srid cig nas chos 'di la spyad
161a5(mdo sde): lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gi tshe de de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba lung bstan
161a6(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/'di mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to//gang gi tshe ngas bla na med pa yang dag
161a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa de'i tshe 'di bzod pa thob nas bskal pa sum 'brim lon no//shA ri'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das lce
161b1(mdo sde): rin chen byin blan med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sbyangs ma rgyas pa'i rgyu ni gang lags//rkyen ni gang lugs/bcom ldan 'das kyis ga/
161b2(mdo sde): stsal pa/khyod kyis khye'u rin chen byin 'di nyid lo dris shig dang 'di nyid khyod la ston par 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA rI'i bus khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces
161b3(mdo sde): smras so//ci'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par sangs ma rgyus/rin chen byin gyis smras pa/bla na med pa yang dag par
161b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi dmigs pas na de'i phyir bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgyu'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/'on ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par
161b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas po las na dmigs pa la spyad dmo/rin chen byin gyis smras pa/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dzin na ni/de'i dmigs
161b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba zhig na/chos gsung ba ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar yang mi mdzad la spong bar yang mi mdzad do//shA ri'i bus smras pa/khyod chos bzhi sgrub pa de
161b7(mdo sde): yongs su smin pa mnyam pas bzod pa gang la gnas/khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/bdag gis ni chos gcig kyang yongs su grub par yang dag par mi mthong na bzhi lta ci
162a1(mdo sde): sa/ la yang dag bla sgrub pa glang dad spyod du/sa rnam par ri bya nas rgyang dzin dmigs pa'o//rgyu rgu rgyas byu di ni dmigs
162a2(mdo sde): pa'o//de bzhin ga shegs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa'o//groli b+he zhes bya ba 'di ni smras pa'o//shA 'i byis smras pa/rinas kyi blo khyod 'dra lta bu'i tshes
162a3(mdo sde): rnams la spyod la dz+nyAs te skye bas snangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du gyur phyir skye zhing rnyin rjer 'byung bu 'di ni ngor gyur to//de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin cheni byin+da gyis
162a4(mdo sde): rigs su brjod pa 'di dgro smras so//spyo nga de bzhin sgyu me gnyis ni smos pa ste//kun tu rtags pa'i sa dang bdud kyi spyod yul yin//chos la sogs pa'i chos
162a5(mdo sde): 'dzin nam sems 'dad po yi//sgra dang ga min 'gro bya rnams ni 'dir ba gagabs bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas pa bai sa sbyi mdu//de/ klung dag byasam parab
162a6(mdo sde): b+hu /byed pa//de dgas dus r+b+ba ye+e n+nim+b+ha ng+yas gas bar byed//sa mya 'dil 'drin pa rnams kyis brgyas pa yi / ni skye ba med byung /
162a7(mdo sde): byung nas rong byung rlom//sems kyi dmigs par rnam lakhru lo nis//bstan pa la ni mun 'byin rnams//badz+rad rtsi bdag gis brib ba zhes//thob pa'i nga rgyal
162b1(mdo sde): tsan+d+ra dag sgra//skyob pa shAk+Shasang ge yi//bstan pa la ni spros med pa//sems kyis rnam pa thams cad du//sems kying bo nyid mi rtogs//de bzhin nam 'dren sa su
162b2(mdo sde): pani//lte ba doni rang bzhin med//spyan dag rgyal bas gsungs pa yi//lta ba la ni lta ba med//de phyir shes rab ldan pa ni//bdag nyid grol snyam 'dzin pa med
162b3(mdo sde): mtshan mar 'dzin pasgom pa rnams//bdag tu dmigs pas rmongs par 'gyur//mkhas pa ma yin kha cig ni//yang dag ma yin stong pa spong //dngos po rmi lam sku
162b4(mdo sde): ma 'dra//rang gi blos ni brgyug sa nas kyang //mi mkhas de dag dngos po rnams//gzhig phyi mya ngan 'das pasgra//lus la yang ni rten bcas nas//tshul khrims 'du shes
162b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig/sems kyi dmigs pa dag la yang //bsam+b+ha gtan 'du shes rnam pad+mo 'jog/de bzhin shes rab dmigs nas kyang //sa bon 'du shes rnam par rjengs/
162b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis//de dag chos kyi rkun por brjod//'di 'dra ba yi chos rnams la//chos dbyings 'od gsal nyon mongs med//'o na rab tu byung ba'i
162b7(mdo sde): don//khyod kyis bdag la ji skad brjod//chos rnams thams cad tha dad med//'di dag brag cha 'dra ba yin//mo byas pa de dag nam du yang //'phags pa'i spyod yul
163a1(mdo sde): rtog mi byed//gzhan min mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid//gzhan dag tu ni yong mi 'gyur//chos rnams 'gyur ba med pa la//rab byung brtags
163a2(mdo sde): pas ci zhig bya/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so//khye'u byang chub ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/rin
163a3(mdo sde): chen byin gyis smras pa/'jam dpal byang chub ni chog gi bla dgas med pa'o//'jam dpal gyis smras pa/khyod ci las bsamA te de skad smra/rin chen byin gyis
163a4(mdo sde): smras pa/'jam dpal chos nyid ni bsam du med pa yin na/de bdag gis 'di skad bsam skye basbyin par bya/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/'di la las dang po pa'i

163a6(mdo sde): zhig zhe sdang ma gzhal cig/gti mug ma bsal cig/rang gi lus las gyen du ma bskyang cig mi dag pa spyod cig/lta ba tshar ma bcad cig/kun tu sbyor ba rnams ma

163b1(mdo sde): mi dge ba la rtogs shig/dge ba spongs shig/sangs rgyas yid la ma byed cig//chos ma sems shig/dge 'dun la ni mchod pa ma byed cig/bslab pa dag yang dag
163b2(mdo sde): par ma len cig/srid pa nye bar zhi ba dron du ma gnyer cig/chu bo las ma rgol cig ces gdams ngagra 'di lta bu 'dis las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gdoms par
163b3(mdo sde): bya/rjes su bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa 'di ni gnas pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro//byis pa de dag ni skye ba'i chos su lung ston par byed do//
163b4(mdo sde): 'gag pa'i chos su lung ston par byed do//chos kyi dbyings 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin te/chos 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin de ltar rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni byang
163b5(mdo sde): chub po zhes de ltar gdums na/gal te mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i skal ba cani yin/
163b6(mdo sde): no snyam du shes par bya ste/gdams ngag 'dis yang dang yang du yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o//de'i tshe dmigs pa can gyi dge slong brgyad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bsten/
163b7(mdo sde): par spangs shing 'khor de nas song ste/kha nas khrag dron mo byung nas shi'o//shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du skyes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal
164a1(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas gnod pa chen po ji tsam

169b5(mdo sde): cad rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyangs dang /chos kyi rdo chen sgra dbyangs dang /kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang /mi rtog rnam por mi rtog dbyangs dang /sa stengs sgra
169b6(mdo sde): dbyangs dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyings kyi yan lag thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbyangs dang /kun+da nas snying po dang /kun tu dri ma med
169b7(mdo sde): pa'i snying po dang /yon tan snying po dang /rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang /rin chen snying po dang /zla ba'i snying po dang /nyi ma'i snying po dang /snang byed snying po dang
170a1(mdo sde): pad+ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang /rdo rje'i snying po dang /blo gros bzang po dang /blo gros chen po dang /khyad par blo gros dang /rnam grabs blo gros dang /
170a2(mdo sde): rgyal chen blo gros dang /bla ma'i blo gros dang /'phel ba'i blo gros dang /mtha' yas blo gros dang /yangs pa'i blo gros dang /sangs rgyas blo gros dang /
170a3(mdo sde): gros mi zad pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /brten pa'i blo gros dang /rdo rje blo gros dang /sangs rgyas mngon sum blo gros
170a4(mdo sde): dang /ri rab mar me dang /mar me chen po dang /chos kyi sgron ma'i mer mo dang /phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i mar me dang /kun sam mun pa thams cad sol
170a5(mdo sde): ba'i myur me dang /'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i mar me dang /gcig tu snang ba'i mar me dang /zla bo'i mar me dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
170a6(mdo sde): chen po nyi ma'i mer me dang /'jam dpali gzhon nur gyur pa dang /lag ni rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang /lag na phyog rgya rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang /rin
170a7(mdo sde): chen 'od sar gzhon nur gyur pa dang /nam mkha'i mdzod gzhon nur gyur pa dang /sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba gzhan nur gyur pa dang /dra ba
170b1(mdo sde): can gyi 'od gnon nur gyur pa dang /rnam par sel ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang /bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang /dpal gyi snying po gzhon
170b2(mdo sde): nur gyur pa dang /seng ge gzhon nur gyur pa dang /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang /zla ba'i 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang /mtshig gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
170b3(mdo sde): rkyen bkod pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang /lag nI pad+ma dang /lag na rdo rje dang /nyi 'od dang /nor bu dang /glog dang /nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs
170b4(mdo sde): po thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od dang /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa'
170b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i blo gros dang /rdul meng rnam par gnon dang /rnam dag rnam par gnon dang /phung po rnam par gnon dang /

173b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyang rgyus kun nas bslang bar lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go//thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu 'byung ba lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shas/

173b4(mdo sde): stog go//thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rten pa sha stag go/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa'i mdog yongs su 'grub pa

173b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag tu sgra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang /'byung ba dang /skye ba dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' ba spyod par sbyor ba dang /byang chub kyi snying por

175b3(mdo sde): gyi khams re ren sgong las skyes pa dang /mngal nas skyes pa dang /drod go sher las skyes pa dang /brdzus te skyes pa dang /gzugs can dang /gzugs can ma

176b2(mdo sde): stag dang yang thabs cig go/'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la
176b3(mdo sde): blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyen pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga pha ba der lhags so//brgya byin bye ba phrag brgya

176b7(mdo sde): mang po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
177a1(mdo sde): /ldan 'das gal ba der lhags so//srin pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag bco brgyad dang /'byung po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag sum nu rtsabad+hA dang /l+h+wam
177a2(mdo sde): yin gyi rgyal po 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang /rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa lnga dang /drang srong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu thamos cad kyang mngon
177a3(mdo sde): par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag dang /rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung dang /rnam par 'thor rlung chen po g.yo ga 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag
177a4(mdo sde): dang /tshangs pa bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshangs pa chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /'od chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang /'od gsal byed
177a5(mdo sde): phrag brgya dang /dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang /dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang /sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang /'bras bu tshe bye
177a6(mdo sde): bye phrag brgya dang /bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang /gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang /shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang /mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya do//
177a7(mdo sde): mi gdung po bye ba phrag brgya dang /'og mon gyi lce bye ba phrag brgya dag la tshangs po chen po ri ro'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dge bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'o//
177b1(mdo sde): d+hor dang /phyag bya bya'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bskyon bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gal bu der lhags so//
177b2(mdo sde): bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blto ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i
177b3(mdo sde): phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bco ma ldan 'das gal ba der lkugs so//blo'i dbang pa blo ba phrog bad+mo dang /gnod sbyin
177b4(mdo sde): dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /dri za'i dbang po bye ba phyag brgya dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang/mi
177b5(mdo sde): 'am ci'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /

177b7(mdo sde): yin pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dog kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta bo'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir
178a1(mdo sde): dang /chos mAny+dzan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//dge bsnyen dang dge bskyon ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag
178a2(mdo sde): kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
178a3(mdo sde): 'das ga la dir lhags so//d+ha dang /shing gol ba dang /sman dang /nags tshul gyi lha gang dag yin pa dag dang /ljon po dang /lhun po chen po dang /btang bzung dang /
178a4(mdo sde): btang bzung chen po dang /gangs ri dang /'khor yug dang 'khor yug chen po lnga sogs pa'i rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gnas dang bcas te/bcom ldan
178a5(mdo sde): 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga lta ba
178a6(mdo sde): der lhags so//rgya mtsho dang /rgya mtsho chen po dang /chu klung dang /chu bran dang /mche bran dang /mtsho drung /chu mig dang /'brib chu rnams kyi lha gang dag yin+da
178a7(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad kyang gnas dang bcas te/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir deng /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
178b1(mdo sde): phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga lnga ba der lhags so//grong dang khyong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khrur dang /rgyal po'i pho blang ma
178b2(mdo sde): dang /'od rnams kyi lha gang dog yin pa de dag kyang rang gi gnas dang lhan cig tu/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir drung
178b3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lho ma yin dang /num mkha'i rdzi
178b4(mdo sde): dang /mI 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kyi lha ga dag yin pa de dag kyang rang rang gri gnas su zhugs te/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag
178b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir drang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/bcom ldan 'das
178b6(mdo sde): kyis mthus sems can 'ga' lo'ang gnod pa med cing sgrib pu med do//zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang /rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya re re'ang g.yog
178b7(mdo sde): 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan
179a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga ba la der lhags so//klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa'ang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang
179a2(mdo sde): phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//dud 'gro'i skye
179a3(mdo sde): gnas su song ba'i sems can thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /mchod pa'i phyir dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir
179a4(mdo sde): dang /chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so//dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa//
179a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la gzhol ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod pa sha stag go/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dang /gzugs dang /gzi brjid dang /
179a6(mdo sde): 'od kyis 'khor thams cad kyang zil gyiso mnan te/lam me lhan ni/lhang nge'o//'di lta ste/dper na nya mas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'brum phrag grangs med
179a7(mdo sde): pa phyung ste srin bu me khyer thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lam mo/lhan no/lhang nge'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig
179b1(mdo sde): na skyong bu thams cad zil gyi sna man+t+ran te lam me/lhun no//lgang nge'o//'di lta ste dper du zla ba yar gying chas bcoM lnga la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyin gyis dra bu las grol ba/
179b2(mdo sde): skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lam maM/lhan ne/lhung dro'o//de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang /tshungs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba
179b3(mdo sde): thams cad spa bkod ste zil gyis mnan nas lam me/lhan ne/lhang nge ste/ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar dpal gyis rab tu 'bor te/sku mi g.yo/mi 'gyur/mi 'gul
179b4(mdo sde): bar lam me/lhan no/lhang de'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di
179b5(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni skyo mi g.yo mi 'gyur/mi 'gul bar bzhugs so//de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub
179b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal dri bzhin ga shegs
179b7(mdo sde): pa 'di la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni rab tu 'byung bar mngon du phyogs shing khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar shes so//kha cig gis ni rab tu byung zhing
180a1(mdo sde): dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par shes so//'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying por gshegs par shes so//kha cig gis/
180a2(mdo sde): ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par shes so//'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bdud 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pas bskor ba bcom par shes so//
180a3(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsI dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /brgya byin dang /
180a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis ded dpon chen po rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes spro bar byed par shes so//kha cig gis ni mngon
180a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas brgya byin rnams gsol ba 'debs par shes so//kha cig gis ni tshangs pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs par shes so//'khor
180a6(mdo sde): 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par shes so//kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
180a7(mdo sde): la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so//'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la tshul khrims kyi gtam ston par shes so//
180b1(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni bzod pa'i gtam/kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam/kha cig gis ni bsam gutan+da gyi gtam/khwa cig gis ni shes rab k+ShiM gau tAm/
180b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so//kha cig gis ni thabs la mkhas pa'i gtam/kha cig gisA ni rdzu 'phrul gyi ga tA ma/kha cig gis ni smon
180b3(mdo sde): lam gyi gtam/kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi gtam bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so//kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam/kha cig/
180b4(mdo sde): gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam/kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam/bcom ldan 'dras bdag cag la ston par shes so//kha cig gis ni sems
180b5(mdo sde): can dmyal bar skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so//khwa cig gis ni dud 'gror skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
180b6(mdo sde): la ston par shes so//kha cig gis ni yi dgas su skye ba'i chos rnams kha cig gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye bo'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la
180b7(mdo sde): ston par shes so//kha cig gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha'i nang du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cig la ston par shes so//kha cig gis ni sum
181a1(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum g+hi gnas su skye ba dang /kha cig gisan+ni 'thab bral gyi gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lnga ston par shes
181a2(mdo sde): so//kha cig gis nI dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang /kha cig gis ni 'phrul dga'i gnas su skye bo dang /kha cig gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su skye ba
181a3(mdo sde): dang /kha cig gisani bdud kyi gnas su skye ba dang /kha cig gis ni tshangs po'i gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so//
181a4(mdo sde): bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs 'khor dang /'od chung dang /tshad mdo 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dag
181a5(mdo sde): rgyas dang /sbyin med dang /bsod nams skyes dang /'bras bu che dang /miche ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang dang /shin tu mthong dang /'og min
181a6(mdo sde): dang /nam mkhye'u mtha' yas skye mched dang /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /ci'ang med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
181a7(mdo sde): mched du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pa ro shes so//'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni mir skye ba'i chos rnams
181b1(mdo sde): tsug gos ni 'khor lo sa sbyar ba'i rnal por 'gyur ba'i nas rnams/kha cig gos ni gling gnyi sna dang /gsum dang /brko pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
181b2(mdo sde): nyis dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang /snying gsum gyi ste chen po'i 'jig rte kyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed drug gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i
181b3(mdo sde): chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag lnga ston par shes so//'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dom do tsam
181b4(mdo sde): du 'phags par shes so//kha cig gis ni rgyang grags tsam du 'phags kha cig gis ni rgyang grags gnyis tsam du 'phags/kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
181b5(mdo sde): spyi dpag tshad tsam du 'phags par shes so//kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag chud gnyis tsam du 'phags par shes so//kha cig gis ni de
181b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag cad bcu tsam du shes so//'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kho cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong nga shrIs so//kha
181b7(mdo sde): cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu par shes so//kha cig gis ni
182a1(mdo sde): dpag tshad 'bum dang /kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /
182a2(mdo sde): lnga bcu par shes so//kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong par shes so//'khor 'dri nyid kyi nang nas kha cig
182a3(mdo sde): gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrang ba las 'das par shes so//'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs
182a4(mdo sde): pra gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo //kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chen po an+d+ra rnyil gyi kha dog tu/kha cig
182a5(mdo sde): gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nir bu rin po che skar 'od kyi kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog tu/
182a6(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha drog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che lha
182a7(mdo sde): thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni
182b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che shel gyi kha dog tu shes so//kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od
182b2(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu/kha cig gisani nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan
182b3(mdo sde): gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu//kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par drag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu shes so//'jam dpal
182b4(mdo sde): 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i kha dog tu shes so//'jam dpal khwa dog dang /spyod lam dang /dbyibs
182b5(mdo sde): gang dang gang kho nas sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur la/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dang /spyod lam dang /dbyibs de dang de kho nar sems can
182b6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mthong ngo //'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ston par
182b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyis shes so//'jam dpal spyod pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jud cing 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod
183a1(mdo sde): pade dang de la de bzhin glu shegs pa bzhugs par sems can rnams kyis shos so//'a lung rdzun daphyogs kyi 'jog rten gyi du
183a2(mdo sde): dpag tu med/grangs med/brasam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/tshad med/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa drug lha dang /klu dang /gdong /
183a3(mdo sde): sbyin da/dri ba dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi'am N+Di dang /s+thi 'phye chen po dang /badz+ra byin dang /tshangs pa dring /'jig rten skyong badring /ming
183a4(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lto dang /de bzhin du nub dang /dri bzhin du byung dang /dri bzhin du shar
183a5(mdo sde): dang /de bzhin du ljo nu ba dang /de bzhin du nub byung dang /de bzhin du bya shAr dang /de bzhin du snying dong /de bzhin du 'i ga go phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi mas
183a6(mdo sde): rlubag tu med/grongs med/bsam gyis mi lcug/mau tshungs pa med/phrin ma du med/rgyud med/brjod du rnyed pa'i yang brjid du med po dag rgyu dang /klu pag na/
183a7(mdo sde): sbyin do//dri zo dang /skye ma yin dang /nam mkha' ldi dang /mi 'amaching nga /lho'i phye chen po dang /bai byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /
183b1(mdo sde): mi dang /mi ma yin pa dag gis dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lAm/pu rnam shing gi tshal lam/til gyi zhing bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag 'jam
183b2(mdo sde): dpal gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin na/sems can de dang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan snga na 'drom gang tsam na 'khod par shes so//
183b3(mdo sde): 'jom dpal kha dog dang /spyod lam dang /gnas gang dang gang gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de khro nar de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs
183b4(mdo sde): por sems can de dag gis mthong ngo //'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gisku sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid kyi chos ston par
183b5(mdo sde): thos so//'jam dpal spyod pa gang gris sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs
183b6(mdo sde): zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo //'jam dpa lnga 'dri lta ste dper nu zla ba yar gyi ngo'i
183b7(mdo sde): 'khor nam phyed kyi dus na dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyis so so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par shes kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can de dag gi
184a1(mdo sde): bdag ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes par 'gyur dur bdag sems can de dag ga mdun na 'dug par bya'o//snyam du mi rtog/rnam par mi
184a2(mdo sde): rtog mod kyi/'on kyang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de lta bu'i bya ba 'dri 'byung ngo //
184a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/
184a4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/tshad med/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dbus na bzhugs na de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mdun
184a5(mdo sde): na bzhugs par mthong mod kyi/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs pa shes par 'gyur ba rang
184a6(mdo sde): sems can de dag gis mdun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba de bzhin du de bzhin
184a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs parare shes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//'jam dpal dper na sems can rnams kyi las
184b1(mdo sde): tham dang /byung dang /rab kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang /'bring dang /rab rnams 'byung yang 'du byed rnams ni mi rtog
184b2(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang 'du byed de dag lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog por tha ma dang /'bring dang /rab rnams kyi bya ba dag la 'jog go/'jam dpal
184b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgro bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa tha ma dang /'bring dang /rab
184b4(mdo sde): kyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thi ma dang /'bring dang /rab tu sems can rnams kyis mthong yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gyishegs pa ni mi rtog/rnam par mi
184b5(mdo sde): rtog ste/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mdzad pa de lta bus de lhun gyis grub par 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dper na nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya rags ma ni ra
184b6(mdo sde): tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/'jam dpal gral te nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ras ser po'i steng du bzhag na nI nor bu rin po che bai tsar+ya kha drob
184b7(mdo sde): ser por 'gyur/gal te ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya kha dog dmar por 'gyur/gal te ras sngon po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin
185a1(mdo sde): po che bai DUr+ya kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/de ltar ras kha dog ci drang ci 'dra ba'i steng du bzhag pa de dang de nyid kyi kha dog kho nar 'gyur yang 'jam dpal
185a2(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin
185a3(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur to/'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs
185a4(mdo sde): pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin nA ni de dag gis ni de bzhin ga shigs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo //gal te sems can rnams
185a5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong ngo //gal
185a6(mdo sde): twe sems can rnams mr-i tig gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mu tIg gi kha dog tu mthong ngo //gal te
185a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil
185b1(mdo sde): gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo //'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i khwa dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin nA ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs/
185b2(mdo sde): pApa'i sku nor bu rin po che mthon kwa chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo //gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba
185b3(mdo sde): yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong ngo //gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che dbang
185b4(mdo sde): gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo //gal te sems
185b5(mdo sde): can rnams nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de
185b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nAs 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo //gral te sems can rnams
185b7(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge
186a1(mdo sde): ral btsun gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo //gral te sems can rnams nor bu rin po me seng gi'i rgyul mtshan gyi rtse mo'i khadog lta du/gdul bar dbyu ba yin
186a2(mdo sde): na ni/de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che steng ge'i rgyu'i mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong ngo //'jam dpal ga lA~M ti sems can rnams na
186a3(mdo sde): bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che glog gri sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong
186a4(mdo sde): ngongo//gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'drang gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin ni nA de bzhin du de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor
186a5(mdo sde): bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu mthong ngo //de bzhin du sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba'i kha
186a6(mdo sde): dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba'ang yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong
186a7(mdo sde): ngo //de bzhin du sbyar te sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yo dgas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi bdog gis
186b1(mdo sde): gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i
186b2(mdo sde): bar gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo //gzugs med par skyes pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang /lus dang /kha dog dang /spyod lam gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul
186b3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang /lus dang /kha dog dang /spyod lam de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //de bzhin du sgo nga las skyes pa dang /mngal
186b4(mdo sde): nas skyes pa dang /drod ga sher las skyes pa dang /brdzus te skyes pa dang /gzugs can dang /gzugs can ma yin pa dang /'du shes can dang /'du shes can
186b5(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang /lus dang /kha dog dang spyod lam gang dang gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i
186b6(mdo sde): gzugs dang /lus dang /kha dog dang /spyod lam de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag gis gser gyis kha
186b7(mdo sde): dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar
187a1(mdo sde): gyur la/nor bu rin po che an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis nor bu rin po che an+d+ra rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong
187a2(mdo sde): bar gyur la nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon kra chen po'i kha dog tu mthong
187a3(mdo sde): bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar nA ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad/
187a4(mdo sde): bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che
187a5(mdo sde): drubang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur lnga/nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par drug pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar
187a6(mdo sde): nim gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par drag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nAs 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur
187a7(mdo sde): la//nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa
187b1(mdo sde): can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mI'i khwa dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor burnon po che song /
187b2(mdo sde): 'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che brgya byin thog sa pa'i kha dog tu mthong byur ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu
187b3(mdo sde): rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang bla'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gi san nor bu rin
187b4(mdo sde): po ni rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nI bu rin
187b5(mdo sde): pa che lce khrims cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che'i zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni mi gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu
187b6(mdo sde): rin pa che ny+tsi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mra'i khwa dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin
187b7(mdo sde): po che glog gi sprin ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig ces mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog go/
188a1(mdo sde): de bzhin du sbyar te/'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la'ang brjod par bya ste/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma
188a2(mdo sde): rtog/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo ///bam po gnyis pa/
188a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpel dper na nor bu rin po che dbyung gi rgyal po gang 'byung ba der lcags dang lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams mi 'byung mod kyi/'jam dpal 'on
188a4(mdo sde): kyang nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni mI rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'di snyam du bdag gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams 'byung
188a5(mdo sde): blar ma gyur cig snyam du mi sems mod kyi 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bye bo de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi
188a6(mdo sde): zhing gang du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba der mu stegs can spyod pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang gtsor bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad mi 'byong /der
188a7(mdo sde): lta bar gyur pa thams cad mi 'byung /der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung /der mtshams med pa lnga po dag mi 'byung der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi la ma rnams
188b1(mdo sde): mi 'byung /der rgyal po'i bka' lcang dang /chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'azung /der nyi zla'i 'od dag mi 'byung /der brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba
188b2(mdo sde): dag dang lha thams cad kyi 'od dag mi 'byung /der nor du rin po che'i 'od rnams dang /me'i 'od rnams dang /glog gi 'od rnams mi 'byung /drer yud tsam dang /yud
188b3(mdo sde): tsam phyed dang /zla ba dang /zla ba phyed dang /lor bgrang ba rnam pa mi 'byung ste/'jam dpal gzhan du na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
188b4(mdo sde): pa'i byon gyi brlabs ni ma gtogs so//'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing
188b5(mdo sde): rnam por mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dper na nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad nor bu rin po che mthon
188b6(mdo sde): ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yang nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bye ba de lta bu
188b7(mdo sde): 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag de bzhin gshegs pas dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi khe
189a1(mdo sde): dag tu 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi N+Dog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang 'jam dngul ldan gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par du
189a2(mdo sde): bsnyen gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dper nA nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUr+ya byi dor legs par byas pa mgo'i rgyan nam/mgul
189a3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyun nam/lag pa'i rgyun nam/rkeng pa'i rkyen yang rung ste/gang dang gang gis logs na rgyun du 'dug pa de dong drir rgyun du shin tu la ma me/lhan ni/lhang po//
189a4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya de nyid kyi mthus rgyan de dag kyang shin tu lam me/lhan ne/lhang nger/'dug kyang nor bu rin po che chen po bai DUr+ya mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog
189a5(mdo sde): /'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bye ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
189a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang spyod lam gyi gnas gang dang gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
189a7(mdo sde): 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'am/spyod pa pa dang /kun tu rgyu dang /gcer bu pa'i spyod pa'am/dud 'gro nga /yi dgas dang /gshin tu
189b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten dang /sha za dang /grul bum dang /srin po'i spyod pa 'am/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za'i spyod pa 'am/spyod pa gang dang gang la gnas pa'i
189b2(mdo sde): spyod pa de dang de nyid shin tu lam me/lhun ni/lhang nge'o//de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin tu lom me lhan ne/lhang der rnam par mdzes kyang
189b3(mdo sde): 'dzom dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal
189b4(mdo sde): dper na sa la gnas/sa la brten nas sa bon thams cad dang /rtswa dang /shing gal pa dang /sman drang /nags tshul rnams skye zhing 'phel la shin tu rgyas pa nyid
189b5(mdo sde): du 'gyur yang 'jam dpalas ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de
189b6(mdo sde): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas/de bzhin gri shegs pa la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/shin
189b7(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par rtog par do'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung
190a1(mdo sde): do//'jam dpal dper na sprin chen pos dzam+bu'i gling thams cad khebs par byas nas rbA dang /shing gel pa dang /sman dang /nags tshol
190a2(mdo sde): rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su char ba chen po rab tu bab ste/ro gcig pa'i chu'i rgyun des rtswa dang /shing gil ba dang /sman dang /nugs tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams
190a3(mdo sde): skye bar byed cing gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chu de ro tha dad pa dang /khe dog tha dad par yang granas la/'jam dpal sprin ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on
190a4(mdo sde): kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par ni rtog par bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
190a5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab par mdzad de/sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs
190a6(mdo sde): bsags pa/smon lam dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /mos po tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon par phab ste/'jam
190a7(mdo sde): dpal chos kyi char de'ang ro gcig pa yin mod kyi/'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/smon lam dang lkug pa'i bsam pa dang /mos
190b1(mdo sde): brothudad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /smon ldum dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /mos pa thadad pa la zhugs pa rnams la rnam pa tha dad pa nyid
190b2(mdo sde): kyi chos tha dad pa kho na'i tsher pas nus pa ji lta ba dang /mthu ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/
190b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//sems can 'di drag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
190b4(mdo sde): ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//sems can 'di drag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed
190b5(mdo sde): par bya'o//sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal chen bzhi po'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//sems can 'di dag la ni sum cu rtsa gsum
190b6(mdo sde): gyi gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//de bzhin du sbyar te 'thab bral rnams dang /dga' ldan rnams dang /'phrul dga' rnams dang /
190b7(mdo sde): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /de bzhin du tshangs po rnams dang /chings chen rnams dang /tshangs pa'i mdun ni 'don rnams dang /'od chung rnams dang /tshad
191a1(mdo sde): byu/mang 'ad rnams dang /'odags pa rnams da //dag rgyu rnams dang /nadu med dag rnams dang /dag sa rnams dang /skyon spyo /
191a2(mdo sde): da /bsod nams panas rnams dang /'bras bu rgya ba rnams dang/ ba rnams dang /mi gdu rnams dang chen pa skyed nga/shA hU~M
191a3(mdo sde): da /gnas gtsang ma'i ris rnams dang /'og min rnams kyi dge ba'i rgyu bya dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o//bdud rtsi ris kyi lharnams kyi ga pa
191a4(mdo sde): da rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du'ang mi dpal de bzhin ga shegs pa ni ma dz+ha/rnam par mi rtogag/sems can 'di dag kun num par sgyu 'i
191a5(mdo sde): gas ga mi ra ra ga//sems can dag pa ni mi tsus par ba skyed pa/mas na

191b2(mdo sde): rtog go/'jam dpal dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shur ma thag tu 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas dzam+bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nag
191b3(mdo sde): thams cad med parwa 'gyur yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo ///
191b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas
191b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi lta bar 'gyur ba'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur te/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs
191b6(mdo sde): kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so//'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs po ni ngas sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa bsal
191b7(mdo sde): lo snyam mam/bsal bar bya'o snyam du mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs
192a1(mdo sde): pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du rnam par mi rtog cing mnyam ste btang snyoms pa'o//'jam dpal
192a2(mdo sde): dper na sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /lus tha dad pa sna tshogs ston kyang 'jam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med pa ma skyes pa/
192a3(mdo sde): ma 'ag gis paM/yi ge med pa/sgra med po/yul med pa/dngos po med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshan nyid med pa/gnyis su med pa/kun tu spyod pa med
192a4(mdo sde): pa/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing gnyen po med pa yin yang 'jam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu mo mkhan gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog por bya ba
192a5(mdo sde): sna tshogs ston to//'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis 'khor gyi
192a6(mdo sde): nang na gzugs kyi sku dang /kha dog dang /spyod pa dang /spyod lam dang /bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi/'jam dpal de bzhin
192a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa de ni brjod du med pa/ma skyes pa//ma 'gags pa/yi ge med pa/sgra med pa/yul med pa/dngos po med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab
192b1(mdo sde): pa/mtshan nyid med pa/gnyis su med pa/kun tu spyod pa med pa/chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs shing gnyen po med pa/khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa
192b2(mdo sde): ste/'on kyang 'jam dpal dri bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis mdzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to//'jam dpal
192b3(mdo sde): dper na nyi ma ni gcig kho na yin na rI'i rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang por mthong ste/kha cig gis ni de 'char

192b5(mdo sde): kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/kha cig gis ni nyi ma mel tse thun cig tsam du shar bar shes/kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed yol tsam du shes/kha cig gis ni nyi ma skur
192b6(mdo sde): tsam du shes/kha cig gis ni tho rengs tsu mu du shes te/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor cig yin mod kyi/'on kyang gli dri bzhi drag tu sems can rnams kyi gzhan drang
192b7(mdo sde): gzhan du mthong yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten

193a2(mdo sde): can gyi dbang gis 'khor gcig kho na'i nang nas kyang sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes/kha cig gis ni
