200a4(mdo sde): tsam dang /yud tsam phyed dang /zla ba phyed dong /zla ba dang /lo bgrang ba'i grangs gzhag pa'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis bya ba de lta
200a5(mdo sde): bu dag 'byung yang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba 'am/'phel ba 'am/mi snang bar 'gyur ba med de/'on kyang 'jam dpal sems can rnams
200a6(mdo sde): kyekyi sngon gyi druge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /nyi ma'i dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //rnam
200a7(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i sems can rnams
200b1(mdo sde): kyang rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa yang drug par gzhom pa'i phyir dang /sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams yongs sbyin par bya ba'i phyir dang /de dunan
200b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gzung po'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngom pa'i chos 'grib pa dang nub par kun tu ston te/'jam dpal sems can gyi dbang gis de
200b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i ches nub pa dang /'grib pa dang /'phel bar 'gyur mod kyi/'on kyang 'dzem dpal sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub
200b4(mdo sde): cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dper na nam mkha' la gnas/nam mkha' la brten nas sems can
200b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bya ba sna tshogs dge 'byung yang nam mkha' ni me smras pa/ma 'gags pa/'dus ma byas pa/yi ge med pa/sgyu med pa/brjod du myed pa/brjod
200b6(mdo sde): par bya ba ma yin+dan mi/gnyis su med pa/gnyen po med pa ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam por mi rtog par de'i bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo //rnamad pa sa
200b7(mdo sde): de btsun du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
201a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad 'byung yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi skye mi 'gags
201a2(mdo sde): te/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa/yi ge med pa/sgra med pa/brjod du med pa/brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/gnyis su med
201a3(mdo sde): pa/gnyen po med pa ste/'on kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /spyod pa dang /smon lam gyi stobs dang /byin gyis brlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam
201a4(mdo sde): par mi rtog par sems can rnams la de'i chos kyi mdzad pa sna tshogaso dag kyang 'byung ngo //'jam dpal theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs
201a5(mdo sde): rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bya ba cig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sems can
201a6(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med pa dgo ni bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur bar byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs mod pa dag na nyan thos dang rang sangs
201a7(mdo sde): rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar byed//sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni tshangs pa thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni gzhan
201b1(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skyo ba thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/sems
201b2(mdo sde): can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'thab bal gyi lha'i gnas
201b3(mdo sde): su skye ba thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni sum cu rtsa gsumo lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
201b4(mdo sde): ni rgyal chen bzhi po'i lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lce'i rgyal po thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs
201b5(mdo sde): med pa dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni stobs kyi 'khor los sbyor ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/sems
201b6(mdo sde): can dpag tu med grangs med pa drug ni klu'i dbang po thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa drag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thob par byed/sems can
201b7(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dri za'i dbang po thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po thob par byed/sems can
202a1(mdo sde): dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni mi 'am ci'i dbang po thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po
202a2(mdo sde): thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni mi'i rgyal po thob par byed/sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni myir skye ba thob bar byed//
202a3(mdo sde): sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni rigs chen por skye ba thob par byed na thal mo sbyor ba lta ci smos/bdug pa phul ba lta ci smos/de bzhin du mor
202a4(mdo sde): me phul ba lta ci smos/spros phul ba lta ci smos/me tog phul ba lta ci smos/mchod pa rnam pa mang po gzhan phul bu lta ci smos/tshigs su bcad pa cig
202a5(mdo sde): tsam yang nyan pa dang /klog pa dang /'dzin pa lta ci smos/dam pa'i chos rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/de bas chos grangs med pa'i
202a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa 'am/bskal pa brgya 'am/bskal pa dpag
202a7(mdo sde): tu med grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob pa ni sla'i/byang chub sems
202b1(mdo sde): dpa' sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas/chos dang /dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa ni de lta ma yin no//'jam dpal de lus sangs rgyas mi mnyes par byed pa
202b2(mdo sde): dang /chos dang /dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa ni tha na bdag gi chung ma la mi tshangs par spyod pa las byung ba'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang //
202b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par zhe sdang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' la khyad du gsod pa dang /chos spong ba
202b4(mdo sde): drang /chos 'dor ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' la gus par mi byed pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa dang /sems can yongs su
202b5(mdo sde): smin par byed pa 'dor ba dang /bla ma dang /sbyin pa'i gnas dang /slob dpon dang /pha ma dang /dge sbyong dang /bram ze yong dag par song ba dang /yang dag
202b6(mdo sde): par zhugs pa la gus par mi byed pa dang /chos smra ba/chos khyad par can rtogs pa/chos rgya chen po ston pa/theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa/
202b7(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bya ba shes pa/gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa rnams la mi 'dud cing brjid byed pa dang /khengs pa yin chos dang chos
203a1(mdo sde): smra ba lA mi gus pa skyed pa dang /sri zhu dang rim gro mi byed pa dang /chos rgya mtsho chen po bsgrags pa byung na la la zhig dad par gyur na mi
203a2(mdo sde): rlung ngo snyam nas chos smra ba'i gang zag la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa ri mo byed pa dang /bdog shes pa la mi 'jug pa dang /chos la nges phyir sems pa
203a3(mdo sde): mi skyed pa dang /mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed de bsngags par 'os po'i gang zag rnams kyi bsngags pa bcabs shing mi snyan pa brjod pa dang /pha rol gyi yon tan
203a4(mdo sde): dang bsngags pa la mi dga' ba yin gang zag la zhe sdang bas chos lnga zhe sdang bar byed cing chos spong ba dang /gzhan dag kyang rtsod du 'jug pa dang /stan mthon po
203a5(mdo sde): 'dod cing tha bas tshol ba dang /gzhan las rim gror bya ba bdag gis byed cing mngon par dga' ba dang /gnas brtan rgan zhing yun ring du tshangs par spyad pa
203a6(mdo sde): rnams la rim gro mi byed cing bsu bar mi byed la bzhin khro gnyer tsan+da yIn/rtag tu sems rtsub cing klan ka tshol ba dang /glags lta ba dang /nga rgyal bskyed
203a7(mdo sde): nas mkhas pa'i gno du mi 'gro mi sten ston par mi byed/bkur sti mi byed cing dge ba ni gang /mi dge ba ni gang /bya ba ni gang /mi bya ba ni gang /
203b1(mdo sde): bam yin pa ni gang /ci zhig byas na yun ring po'i don dang /phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyur zhes mye 'dre pa dang /nges par 'byung bar mi lta zhing rjod pa mang bru sod/
203b2(mdo sde): te/'jam dpal de ltar na sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun mi mnyes par byed pa yin no//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i
203b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang skur bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/rgya mtsho ngom pa'i snying po dri ma med par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur
203b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu
203b5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnams tshe 'di la rnam par smin par 'gyur te//
203b6(mdo sde): klad pa cha bas sam/rims che bas sam/rtsib logs na bas sam/rgyal srid 'khrugs pas sam/glu klo 'khrug pas sam/mu ge'i 'khrug pas sam/lus
203b7(mdo sde): la gnod pa dang /yid la gnod pa gang yang rung bas brgyad bkag pas kyang tshe gcig la byang bar 'gyur te/tha na rmi lam tsam gyis kyang byang bar 'gyur ro//
204a1(mdo sde): dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa
204a2(mdo sde): dgra lasna dge ba'i rtsub bskyed pa/sbyin pa las byung ba dang /mchod pa las byung ba dang /de dag gi thad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnam sa~M sna ng+ge
204a3(mdo sde): gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes
204a4(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gter bcu rnyed par 'gyur to/bcu gang zhe na/srungs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bgrang bar sbyor
204a5(mdo sde): pa'i gter dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'i gte dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i grat+te ro dang //
204a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu ston pa'i gter dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brjod du med pa'i tshul la
204a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa rtogs par byed pa'i gter dang /sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /cho 'phrul thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'i gter dang /sangs
204b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'i gter dang /sgyu mar gyur
204b2(mdo sde): po'i bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gtor dang /sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
204b3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dang ba chen po 'thob pa'i gter ro//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems
204b4(mdo sde): dpa' ni dab bcu thob par 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshe'i tshad bsgral pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir tshe la dang
204b5(mdo sde): ba dang /ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la nges par sems pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir sems la dbang ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams
204b6(mdo sde): cad bkod pa dang /rgyan du mas brgyan pa'i byin gyis brlabs kun tu ston pa'i phyir yo byad la dbang ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun tu
204b7(mdo sde): ston pa'i phyir skye ba la dbang ba dang /dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin po byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir las la dbang ba dang /'jig rten gyi
205a1(mdo sde): khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gang bar byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir mos pa la dbang ba dang /dus gang dang gang gi tshe byang chub
205a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i dus de dang der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa'i
205a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir smon lam la dbang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang
205a4(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul la dbang po dang /mtha' dang dpung med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir chos la dbang ba dang /
205a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnams dang /rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa'i phyir ye
205a6(mdo sde): shes la dbang ba'o//'jam dpal dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skya'i khyon tsam gcig la phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'
205a7(mdo sde): mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'jug par byed kyang sems can gang la'ang gnod pa dang /sgrib po med de/sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin no//
205b1(mdo sde): bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med pa rnams yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing yud tsam gcig ni bskal pa dpag tu med
205b2(mdo sde): grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob ste/bskul pa re re la'ang mes 'jig pa dang /chus 'jig pa dang /rlung gis 'jig pa byin gyis rlob kyang
205b3(mdo sde): sems can gang la'ang yo byad ces kyang phongs par mi 'gyur zhing lus la gnod pa'am/sems la mi bde ba'ang mi 'byung la/sems can gang ji ltar yongs su
205b4(mdo sde): smin par 'gyur ba des bya ba de lta bu'ang shes so//'dzem dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs bcu'i
205b5(mdo sde): phyogs re re'ang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' klas pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su/'jig rten gyi khamasau re ra na rdul phra rab kyi rdul r-I raM la sangs rgyas
205b6(mdo sde): kyi yul gyi mtha' klas pa'i lus rnams kyis lus re res kyang dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa dang /skye ba dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang /dka' ba spyod par sbyor bya dang /
205b7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /bdud 'dul ba ston pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub po dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bsnol ba dang yongs/
206a1(mdo sde): /su mya dran las 'das pa rnon po'ang ston to//'jam dpa la dge pa du shos gtanaHsa yongs su zin+na 'i byang chub sems dang shAn 'do na/
206a2(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'jug par byed cing
206a3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod po gang dgra yin pa de dag zhing gcig tu ston par byed/zhing gcig gi rgyan gyi yon tan
206a4(mdo sde): bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing thams cad du ston par byed/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang na'ang/
206a5(mdo sde): snang la gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o//'jam dpal dge ba'i bau shos gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dor na phyogs bcu'i 'jig
206a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su ston te/sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams cad kyi
206a7(mdo sde): kyi lus su ston kyang lus 'dres par yang mi byed de/sems can gang la'ang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing bya ba de lta bu de'ang ston te/lhun gyis grub cing rnam par/
206b1(mdo sde): mi rtog par sems can rnams kyang yongs su sbyin par byed do//'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cang sangs rgyas gcig tu byin
206b2(mdo sde): gyis rlob cing /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang songs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis rlong la dri bzhin
206b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur te/lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu thams cad kyang ston to//lus gcig gis mnyam par
206b4(mdo sde): 'jog la/lus dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis ldang zhing lus dpag tu med grangs med pa dog gis mnyam par bzhag lAM lus gcig gis ldang ngo //
206b5(mdo sde): bram po gsum pa ste tha ma//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings la spyod yul ba'ang yin la
206b6(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la spyod yul bar yang snang ngo //sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon par dga' ba'ang yin la bdud kyi spyod yul pa ro yang rnam par snang ngo //mya
206b7(mdo sde): dngan las 'das pa spyod yul ba'ang yin la 'khor ba'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo //thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba'ong yin la byang chub sems dpa'o//
207a1(mdo sde): spyod yul bar snang snang ngo //na ba'i spyod yul ba yang yon la mtho ba dang /rab tu min pa dang /nye bar man ba'i spyong yul ba snang
207a2(mdo sde): skye sems can rnams kyang 'dul lo//blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa dang /spros pa med pa dang /ma spros pa dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /dngos po med pa
207a3(mdo sde): dang /shes par bya ba med pa dang /bar snang dang mtshungs pa spyod yul ba'ang yin la spros pa dang /mtshan ma dang /dmigs pa spyod yul ba'i sems
207a4(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi nong na'ang snang ngo //stobs bkod pa spyod yul ba'ang yin la gzugs bzang po'i spyod yul byar yang snang ngo //chos thams cad skye ba
207a5(mdo sde): med pa dang /'gag pa med pas gnyen po spyod yul pa'ang yin la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod yul bir yang snang ngo do//ye shes dang /
207a6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /rig pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i spyod yul po 'di yin li phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rlab
207a7(mdo sde): 'byams thams cad kyi sgra dang /klu dang /gnad sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha mo yin dang /ni ma mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lho 'phye chen podang /
207b1(mdo sde): byon dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten spyod pa dang /srin pa dang /'byung b+h+yo dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /thul bum dang /sgul po dang /lus smra /
207b2(mdo sde): po /sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa dang /skrod las skyes pa dang /mngal nas skyes pa da
207b3(mdo sde): drod ga sher las skyes pa dang /rjes te skyes pa dang /gzugs can dang /gzugs can ma yin pa dang /'du shes can dang /'du shes can mayin pa dang /
207b4(mdo sde): dri shes meng 'du shes med min nas gzugs med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams yongs su sbyin par byed par yang snang ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang /
207b5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa thams cad kyi spyod yul thob pa'ang yin la nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig
207b6(mdo sde): dang spyod lam yang kun tu ston to//'jam dpal dge ba'i bla shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sgra snrums
207b7(mdo sde): chen gcig gi sgrar 'jug par byed la/sems can gcig gi sgra sems can thams cad kyi sbyor 'jug par byed cing /sgra rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur
208a1(mdo sde): sems can gang gi sgra la'ang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lhun
208a2(mdo sde): gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du rang gi lus sa'i khams dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams
208a3(mdo sde): drang /rlung gi khams su byin gyis rlob po//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi lus la zhing
208a4(mdo sde): gi lus kun tu ston kyang sems can gyi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed/zhing gi lus la sems can gyi lus kun tu ston kyang zhing gi lus dang 'dres par
208a5(mdo sde): yang mi byed do//sangs rgyas kyi sku la nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su kun tu ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dman par yang mi byed do//nyan thos
208a6(mdo sde): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston kyang nyan thom dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang mi byed do//spyod pa'i lus la
208a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs por byang chub pa'i sku kun tu ston kyang spyod pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do//mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku la spyod pa'i
208b1(mdo sde): lus kun tu ston kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyams par yang mi byed do//mya ngan las 'das pa 'khor ba'i rgyun du ston kyang mya ngan las 'das pa
208b2(mdo sde): la mngon par zhen pa'ang mi skyed do//'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par kun tu ston kyang gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
208b3(mdo sde): yang mi byed do//mnyam por yang bzhag la bya ba thams cad kyang ston te/'di lta ste/'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /'greng ba dang /nyal bar byed do//spyod lam
208b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyang kun tu ston la ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'khrug par mi byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis zhabs kyi drung na chos nyan par yod snang la/phyogs
208b5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag na gzugs dang /lus dang /kho dog
208b6(mdo sde): yongs su 'grub pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang chos nyan la ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed cing /chos kyang len la 'dzin te 'don cing kun chub
208b7(mdo sde): bar yang byed la sangs rgyas de dag las chos nyan pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du gzugs
209a1(mdo sde): dang /lus dang /kha dog yongs su 'grub pa tha dad pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed la lus tha dad par yang mi byed cing
209a2(mdo sde): gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du bya ba thams cad kun tu ston kyang ting nge 'dzin tha dad par
209a3(mdo sde): yang mi byed do//sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang mngon par sgrub la
209a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed de/'jam dpal rnam grangs des na rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub
209a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthas klas pa'i bskal par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa mngon par sgrub kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
209a6(mdo sde): bsgrub pa rnams kyi mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa de thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen
209a7(mdo sde): las nges par byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo brjod du med pa mngon par bsgrub pa mtha' yas dpag tu med grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/
209b1(mdo sde): mtshungs pa med/grazhal nga med/tshad med pa dag dang /gzungs thob pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i bshes gzhon las nges par byung ngo //
209b2(mdo sde): stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/mtshungs pa med/gzhal du med/tshang
209b3(mdo sde): med/brjod du med pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no//'jam dpal mdor bsdu na de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa mtha' yas
209b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par byung ba yin no//'jom dpal dge bo'i bshes gnyen
209b5(mdo sde): gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug pa sems can+da la kun tu ston pa'i yul dang /'jig rten gyi khams
209b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs du ma mngon par sgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad shes par byed pa'i yul dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa mngon par bsgrub
209b7(mdo sde): pa'i yul dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur
210a1(mdo sde): mngon par bsgrub pa'o yul dang /nam mkhago khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par bsgrub pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams namam ga
210a2(mdo sde): su mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang /'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par mngon par bsgrub pa dang /mya ngan las 'dis pa 'khor bar mngon par bsgyud pa'i yul dang /
210a3(mdo sde): sems can gyis brjod pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa'i yu m+b+ha dang /gad dang lus mtha' yas pa kun tu bstan pa lus gcig tu byin gyis
210a4(mdo sde): byurlab cing lus kyi rim pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul drang /lus gcig gis chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i yul dang /sems can gcig
210a5(mdo sde): gis sems bskyed pa rnams la sems kyi skad cig sems kyi spyad cig re re la'ang sgo mtha' yasA pas bsgrub pa'i byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i yul dang /'jam
210a6(mdo sde): dpal de la sogs pa yul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khya pa de dgu byang chub sems dpa' la yang drug par
210a7(mdo sde): 'grub pa//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams
210b1(mdo sde): rgyanas spyod gag/'dzig na khams so//garten no khams thams cad du nam shi 'jug//'dug rten gyi khams pas babyu gang du/
210b2(mdo sde): gcig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra gcig gis yongs su khyab par masna shing 'jug ga/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i dra ba nyid du kun tu
210b3(mdo sde): sa shing 'jug gi/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyun du mas shing 'jug /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpe
210b4(mdo sde): ngas su khyab par mas shing la rgyun/'jig rten gyi bsus thams cad smi nas kyi khyun gags 'jug par masu shing 'jug go//ngag rten gyi 'dus
210b5(mdo sde): rgyad lus gcig tu 'jug pa dang ldan par mas shing 'jug go/'jig rten gyi khams thams cod de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi byang chub kyi shing dang byang chub kyi
210b6(mdo sde): pas yongs su khyab pa rnams shing 'jugas+ho//'jog rten gyi khams rnams cang sgra sad gcig gi sdug par byed cing sems can+do ni khams sna tshogs sgrol 'a
210b7(mdo sde): pas tshim par pyong bar mos shing 'jugs//sems can thams cad rtsong ba nyid dang lus su mas shing 'jug go//sems can gyi khams thams cad sems pa
211a1(mdo sde): gi lus la 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go/sems can gyi khams thams cad byung chub ses dpo'i khong du song por mos shod 'jug
211a2(mdo sde): go/sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i khong du zhugs par mos shing 'jug go/sems rkyen gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi
211a3(mdo sde): lus la brten par mos shing 'jug go/sems can gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos shing 'jug go/sems can gyi khams thams
211a4(mdo sde): cad brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba gang 'dod pa dang mos pa'i gzugs dang /lus dang /kha dog dang /rtags la mngon du phyogs pa ston
211a5(mdo sde): par mos shing 'jug go/sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /lus dang /khwa dog drung /rtogs dang /tshul
211a6(mdo sde): du ston par mos shing 'jug go//sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i byin gyis brlabs kun tu ston
211a7(mdo sde): por mos shing 'jug go/sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang /mtshan dang /dpe byad bzang po dang /gzugs dang /
211b1(mdo sde): lus dang /kha dog sna tshogs dang /spyod lam dang /spyod pa kun tu ston pa gzhan shes par byed par mos shing 'jug go//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen
211b2(mdo sde): yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa'i khamosde nas kyang mi g.yo la gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang /rnam par thar pa dang /ting
211b3(mdo sde): nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gis dbang gis kyang mi skye'o//nyan thos kyi lam mngon du shes pa la zhugs pa'ang yin la snying rje chen
211b4(mdo sde): po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do//rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon du shes shing mthong ba la mkhas pa'ang yin la snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do//g.yog
211b5(mdo sde): 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor ba'ang yin la lha dang mi'i g.yog 'khor mang po rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan no//lha'i bu mo 'bum dag glu dbyangs rjes su sgrogs shing
211b6(mdo sde): san 'bum dag sil khrol 'byin pa dang yang ldan la byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsamag tan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
211b7(mdo sde): kyang mi 'dor ro//'gro ba'i dga' ba dang /rtse ba dang /gzhan dag dang /'jo sgeg thams cad dang /sems can brkam chag pa'i 'du 'dzi thams cad kyi nang na
212a1(mdo sde): gnas pa'ang yin la sems kyi skad cig gcig la'ang byang chub kyi sems kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang mi 'dor ro//'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yin te/
212a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres la pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam la slob par yang snang zhing las dang nyon mongs par bying ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang
212a3(mdo sde): byed do//lam la gnas shing lam laM ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa mthong ba la zhugs pa'ang yin la/lam dran par lhung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
212a4(mdo sde): phyir lam ngan pa na'ang snang zhing lam de la snying por 'du shes pa'ang ma yin la des dag par 'dod pa'ang ma yin no//lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi las kyi
212a5(mdo sde): mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang yin te/rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrung zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la'ang gzhol la sems
212a6(mdo sde): can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo phal pa'i spyod yul ba la'ang kun tu snang ngo //bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
212a7(mdo sde): tshogs bsags shing byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba la'ong gzhol la ngan 'gror skyes pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba dang
212b1(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /mi khom pa dang /dbul po'i khyim du skye ba'i 'gro ba'ang kun tu skyon la 'gro ba dor yang dag par gzhol ba'ang
212b2(mdo sde): ma yin no//ye shes dang spobs pa thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'ang yin no//de bzhin
212b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang lus gzugs gcig tu gyur pa dang /sems can
212b4(mdo sde): thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi tshul dang dgongs pa snang ba rtogs pa dang /theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /sangs
212b5(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi stod yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang /'gro ba thams cad kyis bsngags par 'os pa dang /sems can+da gyi khams thams cad kyis gdong du lta ba
212b6(mdo sde): dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang /zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /sangs rgyas
212b7(mdo sde): kyis sku dang /kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa'ang yin la chos yongs su tshol ba'i rgyun yang mi gcod do//lha dang /mi dang /
213a1(mdo sde): l+h+wam yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob dpon dam pa'ang yin la/tsog cig por 'dug ste thal mo smya nas mkhan po dang /slob dpon//
213a2(mdo sde): las chos len par yang kun tu ston cing gus par bya ba thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par yang snang ste/byang chub sems dpa'i ldum lo gnas nas thabs gang dang ga
213a3(mdo sde): gis sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'am 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang de nyid sems can rnams la ston to//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu bsdus pa
213a4(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rtse mor phyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba dang /chos kyi dbang phyug gi bdag
213a5(mdo sde): po dam po'i mchog thob pa dang /chos kyi cod pan thogs pa med cing dri ma med pas bcings pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med par de bzhin/
213a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku kun tu ston pa dang /thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i byin gyis brlab dang ldan pa dang /lus gzugs 'jig rten gyi khams thams
213a7(mdo sde): cad du zhugs pa dang ldan pa dang /chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog thob po dang ldan pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad thob pa dang /
213b1(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i zhing thams cad du skye ba ston pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yul gcing
213b2(mdo sde): tu gyur pa'ang yin la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rkyen yang mi gcod/byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'du bya ba'i stobs las kyang yongs su mi nyams/byang
213b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyis brlabs las kyang thag ring du mi 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor/byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi mtho
213b4(mdo sde): las kyang mi 'da'/byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang phyir mi ldog/byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhum par yang mi byed do//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes
213b5(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la blang ba med pa dang /dor po med pa dang /'deg pa med pa dang /'dzag pa med pa dang /
213b6(mdo sde): ma dang /smig tu dang /rmi lam dang //mig yor dang /gzugs brnyan dang /chu zla dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
213b7(mdo sde): par 'du bya ba med pa dang /brjod du med pa dang /smrar med pa dang /bsnyad du med pa dang /de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /rnam par 'jig
214a1(mdo sde): med pa dang /mnyam pa nyid dang /dbyer med pa dang /gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba de nI de'i dmigs pa yin te/chos thams cad ni/
214a2(mdo sde): gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro//chos thams cad ces bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa ste/'du shes pa 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems
214a3(mdo sde): med pa la sems su dmigs pa ni 'du shes phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir te/sems phyin ci log tu gyur na sems myos par 'gyur ro//sems myos na sems
214a4(mdo sde): bslad par 'gyur ro//sems bslad pa las sems skrag par 'gyur ro//sems skrag pa las byang chub kyi sems nyams par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal
214a5(mdo sde): de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems la sems kyi rjes su blta bar bya'o//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub
214a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'o ni dbang bcu thob par 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshe la dbang ba dang /sems la dbang ba dang /yo byad la dbang ba dang
214a7(mdo sde): las la dbang ba dang /skye ba la dbang ba dang //mos pa la dbang ba dang /smon lam la dbang ba dang /rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /chos la dbang ba
214b1(mdo sde): dang /ye shes la dbang ba'o//rnam par sprul pa bcu'ang thob ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can rnam par sprul pa dang /zhing rnam par sprul pa dang /chos
214b2(mdo sde): rnam par sprul pa dang /lus rnam par sprul pa dang /smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang /spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang /ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang /mngon
214b3(mdo sde): par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang /rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang /stobs rnam par sprul pa'o//'dzam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang
214b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi mos pa la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /phyogs thams cad kyi dri
214b5(mdo sde): ba rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams steng g.yogs med cing gzhi phyal pa'i rgyud thams cad la 'jug pa dang /chos thams cad gcig
214b6(mdo sde): pa dang tha dad po nyid rab 'byams rnam par bzhag pa la mkhas pA la 'jug pa dang /las thams cad bsgyur bar gzhug pa la 'jug pa dang /'du shes phyin ci
214b7(mdo sde): log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes can tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /chos thams cad bsgyur ba la 'jug ngol
215a1(mdo sde): mtha' nges par 'byung ba gcig la 'jug pa dang /chos kyi dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spel par byin gyis rlob pa
215a2(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang /'gro ba thams cad dus gsum la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung rgyun mi chad pa la bzhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par
215a3(mdo sde): sgrub po//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs
215a4(mdo sde): med pa drag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sbyin pa las byung ba dang /mchod pa las byung ba dang /de dag gi thod nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro
215a5(mdo sde): gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/'jam dpal de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no//'jam dpal dge ba'i
215a6(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/
215a7(mdo sde): de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa mu med pa dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re re na'ang rdul phra rob kyi rdul re re la dus gsum la 'jug cing
215b1(mdo sde): bskal pa'i phyi ma'i mthu'i mur thug par bskal par byin gyis 'arlabs te/dus gsum la 'jug pa'i chos ston to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal de bzhin
215b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rtag pa/brtan pa ther zug pa yin pa'i phyir ro//'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen
215b3(mdo sde): gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro//'jam dpal 'du shes phyin ci log gis sems phyin ci log tu gyur
215b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no zhes mngon par zhen nas chos spong bar byed do//mi dge ba'i
215b5(mdo sde): las sna tshogs kyang byed do//'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni skye ba 'am/'gag pa med de/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni ma skyes pa//
215b6(mdo sde): ma 'gegs pa/yi ge med pa/sgra med pa/gnyis su med pa gnyen po med pa sgra las yang dag par 'das pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na//gnyen po med pa'i phyir
215b7(mdo sde): ro//'jam dpal 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so//'jam dpal 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no//zhes bya ba 'di gnyis ni mtha' ste/'jam dpal
216a1(mdo sde): mtha' gung yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin te/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos ni mtha' med pa'i ngo bo nyid do//'jam dpal mtha'
216a2(mdo sde): med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag go/'jam dpal mi skye mi 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' dang mtha' med pa yongs su spangs pa ste/yi ge med pa dang /
216a3(mdo sde): sgra med pa/sgra las yong dag par 'das pa/gdags par bya ba ma yin pa/gnyis su med pa/gnyen po med pa'o//'jam dpal gang glanyen po med
216a4(mdo sde): pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag go/gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste//
216a5(mdo sde): shin tu ma skyes pa/ma byung ba/mo 'grags pa'o//de la ni tshigs med mod kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /spyod pa dang /smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i
216a6(mdo sde): byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //'jam dpal dper nu nor bu rin po che chu 'dang bar byed pa chu'i nang du bcug
216a7(mdo sde): mi thag tu 'dam rdzab dang rnyog pa thams cad 'dang bar byed kyang 'jam dpal nor bu rin po che chu 'dang bar byed pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis
216b1(mdo sde): grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ma thug tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams
216b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs po'i 'dam rdzab dang rnyog pa thams cad dang bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/rnam par ma rtog s+ho/don
216b3(mdo sde): kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dper na rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo shin tu myur zhing stobs kyi shugs kyis
216b4(mdo sde): 'phangs pa ni rdza mkhan gyi dbang gis snod spyad sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed kyang 'jam dpal rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang
216b5(mdo sde): lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i byi ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs su dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
216b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /spyod pa dang /smon lam gyi stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi shugs kyis sems car gyi dbang gis sems can rnams la dge ba'irtsa
216b7(mdo sde): ba sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de/
217a1(mdo sde): 'byung ste/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//'jam dpal sems can gang dog de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol
217a2(mdo sde): ba dang /gang dag bshos mi gsol ba dang /gang dag gis mthong ba dang /gang dag gis ma mthong ba dang /gang dag stong pa dang /gang dag mi stong pa dang /gang
217a3(mdo sde): dag gshe ba dang /gang dag mi gshe ba dang /gang dag zhu ba byed pa dang /gang dag zhu ba mi byed pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
217a4(mdo sde): brlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo //'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad kyang dge bo'i bshes
217a5(mdo sde): gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi sku dang kha dog
217a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa grub pa'i gzungs thob ste/gzungs de thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skus khyab
217a7(mdo sde): par byed do//'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku ston to//lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par chos kyi 'khor la
217b1(mdo sde): bskor ba grangs med pa dang /chos tha dad pa nyid grangs med pa ston te gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o//'jam dpal de ltar na dge ba'i bAshos gnyen rnams ni yon tan//
217b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no//'jim dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen
217b3(mdo sde): rnams la bsten par bya'o//bsnyen par bya'o//bsnyen bkur bya'o//'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni brog gi bya skyabs rab tu 'bar ba bzhin
217b4(mdo sde): du yongs su spang bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang 'du shes phyin ci log tu
217b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//sems phyin ci log tu gyur na kun tu 'khrul par 'gyur ro//sems kun tu 'khrul par gyur na rnam par rmongs par 'gyur ro//sems rnam par rmongs na
217b6(mdo sde): skrag par 'gyur ro//sems skrag par gyur na byang chub kyi sems 'dor bar 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi sems bar na lha yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro//lha yongs
217b7(mdo sde): su gtong na lha rnams kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro//klu rnams dang /gnod sbyin rnams dang /dri za rnams dang /mi 'am ci rnams dang /lho
218a1(mdo sde): 'phye chen po rnams dang /mi rnams dang /mam yin pa rnams nas sangs rgyas bar dag kyang dol ba sngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro//
218a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o//bsnyen par bya'o//bsnyen bkur bya'o//'jam dpal
218a3(mdo sde): dper na skyabs zhes bya ba'i sman ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/drang ba'i sems dang ldan pas mthong yang rung ste/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song
218a4(mdo sde): bu de dag gi nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang skyabs zhes bya ba'i sman ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub
218a5(mdo sde): cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpa'i de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/dang po'i sems drang ldan pa
218a6(mdo sde): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur mir bris pa 'am/gzugs su byas pa mthong na tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'ang rlung ste/de dag gi nyon mongs
218a7(mdo sde): pa'i nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtag/rnam par mi rtog ste/mi 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam
218b1(mdo sde): bar mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags te//nam mkha'i spyod yul lo gnas das/
218b2(mdo sde): 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang la por
218b3(mdo sde): thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par byed cing mun pa sel bar byed/'drem rdzab dang /rnyog pa thams cad skams par byed/pad+ma rnams kyang kha 'bye bar byed/rtsa dang /
218b4(mdo sde): shing gel pa dang /smon dang /nags tshal thams cad kyang skyed par byed/sman thams cad kyang yongs su smin par byed/las kyi gnas thams cad ni gnas pa
218b5(mdo sde): byed la/chu klung dang /mche'u dang /mtsho byin thams cad lo 'dra dus gcig tu ltung ba thob par 'gyur yang ginas la sgo kyang mi g.yo zhing 'jam dpal nyi ma'i dkyil
218b6(mdo sde): 'khor ni mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ldud kyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de rtag tu 'byung ngo //
218b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas kyang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las mngon par 'phags te/chos kyi
219a1(mdo sde): dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa btang bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
219a2(mdo sde): rab 'byams thams cad du snang ba sbyin paro mdzad cing sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang /rab rib dang /ling tog rnams rnam par sel bar
219a3(mdo sde): mdzad/nyon mongs pa'i 'drim d+hU bo dang /rnyog pa thams cad skem par mdzad/yun ring po nus gnyid kyis ldog pa'i sems can gyi khams ni sad par mdzad
219a4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ni skye bar mdzad/sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad ni yongs su smin par mdzad//
219a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad ni rab tu 'jog par mdzad de/dus gcig tu de'i mdzad pa thams cad 'byung yang gnas nas kyang mi g.yo zhing 'jam dpal de bzhin
219a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/'on kyang ma 'dris pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung
219a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshems pa'i lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i gnas kyang dge bar
219b1(mdo sde): bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo //'jam dpal dge pa'o bshos gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rnaMs rab tu rnam par byed/
219b2(mdo sde): tsIng dpyod pa la mkhas par 'gyur te/de chos rnams la 'di ltar da pyod do//mig ni gzugs kyi dmigs pa'i rgyu mo yin/gzugs kyang mig dmigs pa'i rgyu
219b3(mdo sde): yin la dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/rnam par shes pa de'ang mig lngas kyang mi byung /gzugs las kyang mu byung zhing rnam par
219b4(mdo sde): shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o//rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus kyang de bzhin no//yid kyang chos kyi rkyen ma yin zhing chos kyang yid
219b5(mdo sde): kyi rkyen ma yin la dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/rnam par shes pa de ni yid las kyang ma byung /chos rnams las kyang ma byung
219b6(mdo sde): zhing yid kyi rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o//de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'ang byang chub kyi rkyen mi yin/byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
219b7(mdo sde): rkyen ma yin mod kyi/dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang byang chub kyi rkyen la dmigs pa las sems skye ba rnams kyis skye ste/de dag kyang skyes nas zhig cing zhu la mi gnas pa'o//
220a1(mdo sde): de las sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /sems gang gis byang chub tu longs su bsngos pa de gnyis ni phan tshun
220a2(mdo sde): mi sbyor ro//dper na me ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du mi 'gro ste/'on kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyis 'bar ro//'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpe'i
220a3(mdo sde): shes rab kyi me 'bar ba'ang gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ste/'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar te/
220a4(mdo sde): shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//'jam dpal de ltar na dge ba'i
220a5(mdo sde): bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa yin no//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
220a6(mdo sde): khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams la rtag par nyin gcig
220a7(mdo sde): bzhin du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /lha'i na bza' dag phul la/de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gis bye ma snyed du phul zhing de bzhin gshegs pa de
220b1(mdo sde): dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re reng
220b2(mdo sde): yang mchod rten dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser lus byas pa nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bsgo
220b3(mdo sde): ba/nor bu dang /mu tig dang /rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /pa dan bsgreng ba/dril bu g.ye ra ka'i dra ba'i bla bre
220b4(mdo sde): bres pa/tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byug pa/nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas khebs par byas pa/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
220b5(mdo sde): rdul snyed de dge byas te/mchod rten de dag la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i ni bza' drug dang /gdugs kyi sprin dgra dang /rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang //
220b6(mdo sde): ba dan gyi sprin dag dang /me tog gi sprin dag dang /spos kyi sprin dag dang /nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyalnga po'i sprin dag dang /yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin
220b7(mdo sde): dag gis gtor/mngon par gtor la nyin gcig bzhin/de ltar mchod cing bskal pa ga/ng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod la/sems can gzhan dpag tu med
221a1(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag kyang mchod pa de nyid la 'god pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan grang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
221a2(mdo sde): yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tha na mos par byed na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches
221a3(mdo sde): grangs med par bskyed do//'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med
221a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do//sa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrog dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gnon to//bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
221a5(mdo sde): phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag phyir snyil bar byed do//sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rab tu
221a6(mdo sde): shes so//nga rgyal gyi ri dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rnam par 'jig par byed do//phrag dog dang ser sna'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med grangs med pa dag
221a7(mdo sde): stsol bar byed do//srid pa'i chu klung dpag tu med grangs med pa dag skems par byed do//skye ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med grangs med pa dag las rgal bar byed
221b1(mdo sde): /bdud kyi nags pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gnod do//ny+tsin rnamasna dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten spong ba rnams kyi gzi brjid
221b2(mdo sde): la gyis minan te 'dug go/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /yi dgas dang
221b3(mdo sde): gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ro//
221b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes byi bo'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//chos thams cad la
221b5(mdo sde): dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang
221b6(mdo sde): 'thob bo//dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i
221b7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
222a1(mdo sde): kyang 'thob bo//yul la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//cher bsgyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rnam pa
222a2(mdo sde): sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin klung 'thob bo//song ge bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//nyi mA'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
222a3(mdo sde): kyang 'thob bo//mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rab tu g.yo ba'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rdo rje'i dkyil
222a4(mdo sde): 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rdo rje lte ba zhes
222a5(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//sa 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//lhun po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po//lhun po rgyal mtshan
222a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//
222a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//spyod pa thams cad kyi yul las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
222b1(mdo sde): 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//sbyor ba zab cing gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//sna tshogs snang ba'i spobs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//ltar mi
222b2(mdo sde): mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/
222b3(mdo sde): kyang 'thob bo//mngon par shes pa thams cad las nges par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob po//bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya
222b4(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//gzugs thams cad kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i ting ngo /
222b5(mdo sde): 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//lus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//shes
222b6(mdo sde): rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//mngon sum du byang chub snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//so so yang dag par rig pa rin po che bstan
222b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//chos thams cad 'dul bar rnam par
223a1(mdo sde): nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//
223a2(mdo sde): dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo//zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste/de dag la
223a3(mdo sde): sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag 'thob bo//sangs rgyas kyi sku dang kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i
223a4(mdo sde): gzungs kyang 'thob bo//ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//mi zad pa'i za
223a5(mdo sde): ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//
223a6(mdo sde): pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//so so yang dag par rig pa rnam
223a7(mdo sde): par nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo//sangs rgyas
223b1(mdo sde): kyi sku dang kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob ste/de dag la sogs pa gzungs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag
223b2(mdo sde): kyang 'thob bo//chos thams cad la spyod pa'i khyad par nyid kyang 'thob bo//chos thams cad la gzhan la rag mA las pa'i shes pa'ang 'thob bo//chos thams
223b3(mdo sde): cad la som nyi gcod pa nyid kyang 'thob bo//sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa stong phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob bo//sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bye
223b4(mdo sde): brag la mkhas pa'ang 'thob bo//'jam dpal dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lam me/lhan ne lhang nge'o//'jamo dpal de
223b5(mdo sde): bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lam me/lhan na
223b6(mdo sde): lhung nge'o//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so//
223b7(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang 'thob pa'i chos kyi bye brag gzhan dag kyang yod
224a1(mdo sde): dam/de skad ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//
224a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos ni/yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob pa'i chos lnga po 'di dag ste/lnga
224a3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/chos thams cad gnyen po med pa dang /ma skyes pa dang /ma 'gags pa dang /brjod du med par mos pa dang /rtag tu rgyan mi chad par skad cig/
224a4(mdo sde): skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang spyod lam lo 'jug pa'i gnas dzam+bu'i gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul las kyang lhag pa dag la lhun gyis grub cing rnam
224a5(mdo sde): par mi rtog par 'jug par mos pa dang /seng ge bran bzang gyi bu'i rtogs pa brjod pas sems can yongs su smin par byas pa de bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
224a6(mdo sde): pas/bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mdzad par mos pa dang /mar maM mdzad kyis lung bstan pa nas bzung ste mngon
224a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par byang chub po'i ba ri der/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'
224b1(mdo sde): klas pa'i bskal pa nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan pa yin par mos pa dang /shAkya thub pas bstan pas sems can yongs su smin par byas pa
224b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa de sangs rgyas kyi yul gyis mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mdzad pa yin par mos pa
224b3(mdo sde): ste/'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pasnga yan tan gyi khyad par 'di drag drang gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang thob pa yin no//
224b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa//
224b5(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /lha'i gos dag byin te/de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung
224b6(mdo sde): gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyi ma gcig zas byin na de ni de bas bsod
224b7(mdo sde): nams ches grangs med par bskyed do//'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang gtsug lag khang dzam+bi'i
225a1(mdo sde): rngu ba gasrer las byas pa/nor bu rin po che klog gi sgron mas spras pa/nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su
225a2(mdo sde): bskor ba/nor bu dang /mu tig dang /rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan bsgreng ba/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra
225a3(mdo sde): ba'i bla bre bres pa/tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos khebs par byas pa/rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i rin po che rnam
225a4(mdo sde): par dag pa bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang pos dkrigs pa/nor bu rin po che'i seng ge ral pa zhes bya ba'i spang leb bres pa/
225a5(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo las byas pa'i sgo gang dang /rta babs dang /skar khung gis brgyan pa/dar gyi lnga ldi mang pos bres pa/phyogs bcu'i
225a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dgra byas te/rang sangs rgyas kyi glanas stong phrag grangs med pa drag dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag la nyin gcig

225b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas she 'am/'jig rten gyi mgron po zhe 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa zhe 'am/thams cad mkhyen

225b3(mdo sde): mthong ba lta ci smos te/'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med por skyed do//gang gis mar me phul ba 'am/bdug pa 'am/spos sam/me togra dag
225b4(mdo sde): gam/rol mo'i sgra 'am/mchod pa sna tshogs gzhan dag byed pa lta ci smos te/'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do//gang gis de bzhin

226a3(mdo sde): byis pa/nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/nor bu dang /mu tig dang /

226a6(mdo sde): rten de dag la nyin gcig bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i goso drug dang /gdugs kyi smin drag dang /rgyal mtshan gyi sprin ngag dang /ba dan

227a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams grangs myed pa skyed do//'jam dpal de lhu bas na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam

231a6(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang /klu'i rgyal po dang /rgyal po mkhar gyi bdag po dang /rgyal phran dang /stobs kyi 'khor ltos sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /dge slong dang /dge
231a7(mdo sde): slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me tog dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa
231b1(mdo sde): dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /sil snyan dang /dar gyi chun po rnams thogs te/grong khyer chen po ba ra NA si zhes bya ba gang na/
231b2(mdo sde): ba dang /a mra srung ba mo'i tshal gang na ba drer dong nas bdag gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
231b3(mdo sde): rnams la mngon par mchod de/me tog gi char dang /dri'i char chen po mngon pararo phab bo//de naswa de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dzam+bu'i gling dang /a mra
231b4(mdo sde): srung ba mo'i tshul de dpag tshad khrag khrig brgya stong du ma srid du rgya che bar byin gyis brlabs te/sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam la lha'i yid du 'ong ba kha dog
231b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/dri dang ldan pa/lha'i me tog gi shring dang /'bras bu'i shing drang /spos kyi shing dang /rin po che'i shing dang /dpag bsam gyi shing dang /gos
231b6(mdo sde): kyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/lha'i seng ge'i khri dang ldan pa/rin po che dang /dar dang /me tog gi chun po rab tu sbyangs pa/lha'i dril bu'i sgras brgyan
231b7(mdo sde): par gyur te/'di lta ste/dper na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin du yid 'phrog par byed pa/tshim par byed pa/mgu bar byed pa/mngon par dga'
232a1(mdo sde): bar byed pa/byang chub sems dpa' dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma

232a3(mdo sde): po dang /blon po dang /bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du de dag gis grang bar byin gyis brlabs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
232a4(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 'das go la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /

232a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa ni mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid dang rdzu

232b3(mdo sde): de bzhin te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni mang ngo //sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu dang /ji ltar

238b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud can dang /thams cad skyobs dang /log par
239a1(mdo sde): dad sel dang /gser thub dang /'od srung dang /rnam par gzigs dang /mi 'khrugs pa dang /'od dpag tu med pa de dag 'khor gyi
239a2(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor na bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas nyan thos dang /byang chub sems dpar bcas pas bskor zhing
239a3(mdo sde): 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu la chos ston par snang ba dang /shar dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang gis phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs
239a4(mdo sde): ba du ma seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas chos 'chad cing bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do//de nas
239a5(mdo sde): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang lha'i bu de dag dad par gyur te/mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i
239a6(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi stobs skyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang /spos dang /dri dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /nu bza' dang /rgyan
239a7(mdo sde): rnams kyis mngon par mchod de/lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dge smras so//e ma ye shes ye shes ni//ting nge 'dzin pa
239b1(mdo sde): shes rab sgom//ji ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnams//'das nas bskal pa du ma na//sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir//dpa' bo chen po 'di ni bzhugs//byang chub
239b2(mdo sde): sems dpas yongs bskor zhing //seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gda'//sangs rgyas mthong ba legs pa ste//chos mnyan pa yang legs pa yin//dge ba'i bshes
239b3(mdo sde): gnyen blta ba dang //mnyan pa'ang de bzhin legs pa yin//gang dag 'drir ni bslab 'dzin pa'i//lus kyi sdom pa legs pa yin//nan tan gyis ni sgrubs pa dag/
239b4(mdo sde): de kun byang chub thob par 'gyur//thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa rnams//'dir ni sems can thar bar mdzad//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang //de bzhi ni sgyu ma
239b5(mdo sde): byed pa 'dra//'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba yang //de bzhin gshegs pa ston par mdzad//mchod rten dang ni ri mo dang //sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang //mchod dang /
239b6(mdo sde): bkur sti bye ba'i phyir//gang dag mtshan ni dran byed pa//byang chub phyir ni gnas pa rnams//thams cad thar pa thob par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs la phyag
239b7(mdo sde): 'tshal nas//dam pa'i chos ni mnyan pa dang //mchod cing 'dzin pa'ang de bzhin te//sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
240a1(mdo sde): /byin gyis brlabs dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di yang drag par bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri ba ni stong gis mi skyo
240a2(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod po thob par gyur to//srog chags nyi khris chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/lha'i bu lnga stong gis len pa med par zag pa la so
240a3(mdo sde): sems rnam par grol lo//phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to//dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma bdun brgyas
240a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob par gyur to//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal ba'i sgras khyod kyis sems
240a5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi don du dris pa'i lan bshad pa 'di ni khyod kyis legs par bshad de legs mod kyi/kho bo the tshom cung zad cig skyes kyis/gang thos
240a6(mdo sde): nas sems can rnams kyis yid la byas te/de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las grol bur 'gyur ba dang /bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
240a7(mdo sde): blan med pa yang rig rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar kho bas dris pa de bstan cing lung ston cig/'jam dpal byas smras pa/rgyas po
240b1(mdo sde): chen po khyod kyis sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis spobs pa skyes pa ni legs so//khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa dris
240b2(mdo sde): shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o//smras pa/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan thos pa tsam dang /mchod pa dang /bkur sti byas po nyid kyis sdig pa byed pa'i
240b3(mdo sde): sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag gang lags//
240b4(mdo sde): de dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni gang na bzhugs/de dag la mchod pa ni ji ltar bgyi/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can rnams
240b5(mdo sde): ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /gang dran song du skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su
240b6(mdo sde): grol bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams dang /'jig rten gyi khams su mchod cing bsti stang bya ba bshad kyis nyon cig/
240b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/'tsho
241a1(mdo sde): lag zhes shing chos kyang ston pa yod do//'jig rten gyi khams gtsug phud can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
241a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud can zhes bya ba yod do//'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
241a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dri ma med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do//'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ra
241a4(mdo sde): tuzhi bar bkod pa zhes bya ba yod do//'jig rten gyi khams bde ba n+dan na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu

241a7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang /'jig rten
241b1(mdo sde): mas rtogs pa dang nags su ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba rnams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang /'jog rten gyi khams ngan 'gro dang bral ban
241b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dran song thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med po na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par dag pa zhes
241b3(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten gyi khams dbang po ni de bzhin gshegs po dbang po'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/de'i mtshan bzung ba nyid kyis lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro//'jig rte
241b4(mdo sde): gyi khams zla ba na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba
241b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams khyad par thob pa na de bzhin gshegs po ngan 'gro thams cad bri bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yod de/de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas ngan
241b6(mdo sde): thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro//'jig rten gyi khams legs par snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad sdug par mthong ba zhes bya ba

246a1(mdo sde): kyis mi brel bar rjod cing mchod pa byas/gang gis chos kyis rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad pa tsam yang nyan pa dang /'char/

246a4(mdo sde): yas bye ba dag/sems can rnams kyi phyir ni dgongs mdzad cing //ngan 'gro las ni sems can thar bar mdzar//stir med las la gnas shing sbyin byed
246a5(mdo sde): dag/las byas nas ni ngan 'gror song ba rnams//de dag thar bar bya phyir chos 'dod pas//de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag mchod par bgyi//ri mor
246a6(mdo sde): mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs byos//gser dang dngul dang de ltar lugs rnams dang //'jim pa'i sku gzugs dag ni byed bcug nas//mchod pa sna tshogs
246a7(mdo sde): kyis ni mchid par gyis//me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang //mar me sil snyan dri dang spos kyis mchod//shes rab che bas bsngo ba dag kyang gyis/mdo sde/
246b1(mdo sde): bshad cing 'dir yang bzhugs par gyis//de bzhin gshegs dang mdo sde'i gzi brjid kyis//sdig pa'i las las sems can de thar gyis//bla med byang chub
246b2(mdo sde): reg par gyur par du//dge ba'i gnas su skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur//sngon gyi las rnams rjes su dran 'gyur zhing //dran nas mkhas pa sdig pa byed mi 'gyur//

246b4(mdo sde): 'byung //de yi rgyal srid kun la gnod mi 'byung //khyim dang grong dang grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur//gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni rtag 'dzin pa//sangs rgyas rnams kyi
246b5(mdo sde): mdzod ni rtag 'dzin 'gyur//gang zhig mchod cing brjod dang 'drir 'jug dang //las gzhan med par nyan du 'jug pa ni//des ni sangs rgyas yang dag mchod
246b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur//des ni myur du byang chub mchog rtogs 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhad mo can gyis 'di skad
246b7(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di la the tshom skyes te/bcom ldan 'das ci lus 'dis rgyal srid kyi longs spyod bsgrubs nas slar yang sdug
247a1(mdo sde): bsngal bsgrub par 'gyur ram/'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe skyo bor mi 'gyur rAm/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan
247a2(mdo sde): dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba rnams myong bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar ske/ji ltar 'gum/ji ltar 'tshe/ji ltar bde ba sgrub par 'gyur//
247a3(mdo sde): ji ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad ma can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
247a4(mdo sde): ltad mo can 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu'ong 'di la gang yang skye ba med/'chi ba med/'tsho ba med de/rigs kyi bu 'di la
247a5(mdo sde): rga ba dang 'chi ba med kyi/'tsho ba'i khams ni rtag tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas so//yang las kyi rkyen dang las kyi gzhis skye ba sna tshogs su 'ongs
247a6(mdo sde): shing 'phos nas bde ba dang /sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/bde ba la bde bar 'du shes/sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du 'du shes/bde ba'ang ma
247a7(mdo sde): yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa la bde ba'ang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i 'du shes skyed mod kyi lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
247b1(mdo sde): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du gyur gyi bar du skyo ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na skyes bu la la
247b2(mdo sde): zhig gos sar pa gyon te/des de gyon nas las thams cad byed cing bde ba dod sdug bsngal yod myong bar 'gyur ro//yang dus gzhan zhig na gos dri snyings shing
247b3(mdo sde): mugs te dri ma can ma thar pa chad par gyur pa dang /des de dor ba'i chos can du shes nas bor ro//bo ra nas yang gos sar pa gsar ma gzhan zhig btsal te
247b4(mdo sde): gyen no//des gyen nas kyang las byed cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur nas don dam pa'i gos sra zhing brtan la mi shigs shing mi chod pa gyon par
247b5(mdo sde): ma gyur bar du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'di lta bus bskal pA du ma 'das kyang gos de bgos so she 'am/bor ro zhes mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog gis de ni
247b6(mdo sde): lus kyi dbang du 'gro'o//rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'tsho ba'i khams des lus 'jig pa dang /'gyel ba'i mthar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe lus de bor nas
247b7(mdo sde): yang gsar pa gzhon nu gzhan btsal te/de de'i las byed cing de bgos nas bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro//ji ltar rang gi bsod nams las skyes
248a1(mdo sde): pa'i gos de 'jam pa dang /sra ba dang /rtsub pa'i bgo ba de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams kyis bgo ba lta bu'i lus blangs te/ji ltar rlung
248a2(mdo sde): gi las kyi rkyen gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa bzhin du lha dang /rgyal po dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i
248a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/lus de'ang 'chi ba'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gro zhing 'tsho ba'i khams kyi yongs su btang yang mi rtog/rnam par mi
248a4(mdo sde): rtog go/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du lus gos lta bur blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dper na sbrul ni las kyi rkyen gyis dus kyi mthar shun pa de
248a5(mdo sde): bor nas rang gi lus kyi gzugs kyis 'gro zhing 'ong ste/bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang shun pa de mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog go//de bzhin du
248a6(mdo sde): 'tsho ba'i khams ni sbrul lta bur blta'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na shing lo mA dang 'dab mar ldan par gyur pa las/yang dus kyi rkyen gyis 'jig
248a7(mdo sde): pa dang ltung bar mthar 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur nas phyis yang dus kyi rkyen gyis myu gu dang /yal ga dang /'dab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras
248b1(mdo sde): bu rnams len te/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang 'gag par blta'o//rigs kyi bu yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na sems can drug rnyed
248b2(mdo sde): pa dang /chags pa dang /khro ba dang /phrag dog dang /ngo rgyal mang ba dag 'byung ste/srung dang gzhal ba lo g.yo byed par dga' ba 'dod chags kyi rjes su
248b3(mdo sde): spyod pa dag 'byung ste/de dag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'drod pa'i gzhis sdig pa mang du byed par 'gyur te/sdig pa mang du byas nas sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing mi rtag pa la rtag
248b4(mdo sde): po'i 'du shes can dang /mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba'i 'du shes can gyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/byis pa'i blo can
248b5(mdo sde): de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi tshol gyi/gang de lta bu'i sems can de dag la chos ston pa de dag dgod cing kyal ka byed pa mang bar 'gyur gyi/dad par mi byed//
248b6(mdo sde): yid ches par mi byed de/de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni sdig pa spyod de/de dag gis 'tsho ba'i khams des las kyi rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du myong bar 'gyur ba'i
248b7(mdo sde): bgo ba'i lus blangs nas sdug bsngal la dga' ba'i 'du shes bskyed do//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/'di ni las kyi
249a1(mdo sde): rten yin par bsdu ste/'di la su'ang 'dzi ba med /'tsho ba med/bde ba dang /sdug bsngal yang myong par mi 'gyurate/las kyi rgyud kyi na/
249a2(mdo sde): gyis skye ba dang 'gag par 'gyur ro//sems can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dka'i ba spyang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mdzad
249a3(mdo sde): nas bdog thams cad yongs su btang ba yongs smra bta nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur te/sems can thams
249a4(mdo sde): cid mye mya ngan las 'da' bal bkod do//de nas de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlab kyis sa chen g.yos par gyur to//ji ltar lkugs
249a5(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang bcom ldan+da 'das la legs so zhes gsol to//rgyal po gsal rgyal dang /gzhan yang mthu chen pa mthu che brdzu 'phrul cher
249a6(mdo sde): bo mdu bas lha'i ni bza' lnga brgyas de bzhin ge shegs pa la mngon par mchod nas lus 'drar bzhon du bcom ldan 'das la ldan gsum bskor 'i byas te/
249a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad nyes pa la nyes so zhes so sor bshegs te bslab pa la yi dam bca' bar bya ste/ji ltar/
249b1(mdo sde): lhanas pa'i 'khor de dag gis du skad du smras so//de bzhin gshegs pa smra ba thams cad las slar ldog pa/sems can thams rgyud sdug bsngal la sa skos drad
249b2(mdo sde): grol ba thams cad la phyug bgyi'o//phyog 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das smon chad bdage drug skye ba'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal myong bar ba mi 'gyid do//
249b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag smyo ba dang /rga bo dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsnol ba dang /yid mi bde pe
249b4(mdo sde): le drug pa rnams las grol bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag nan tan spyong por phyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas kon
249b5(mdo sde): mchog gsum la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par byos shig/'du byed thams cad mi rtag cing sgyu ma lta bur shes par byas shig/dam pa'i chos yongs su gzu
249b6(mdo sde): ba la spro bar byos shig/mchod pa dang /rjed pa dang /bkur sti myong por byos shig/sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bar shes par byos shig
249b7(mdo sde): chos smrab pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byas shig/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla mar 'du shes bskyed par byos shig/chos kyi rnam gra
250a1(mdo sde): //'di yid la bya ba dang /bsgom pa dang /rgyas par byos shig/rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal thams cad dang /skye ba thams cad dang /rga ba dang /
250a2(mdo sde): na ba dang /'chi ba dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/'khor ba'i zhags pa las yongs su
250a3(mdo sde): grol bar 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la bsgrub par byos shig/bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byos shig/rigs kyi
