250a4(mdo sde): bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa cig yud tsam bzung bas kyang sems can rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol zhing bde 'gror 'gro ste ngan 'gror
250a5(mdo sde): mi 'gro bar 'gyur na/gang dag dgod pa dang /ku re dang /dga' ba dang /rtsed mo rnams yid kyis yongs su spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchog tu
250a6(mdo sde): mos pas rim gro byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs te/'phags pa'i nye bar gnas pa yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas nas gso sbyin yang dag par blangs
250a7(mdo sde): te spyod pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi skye zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /lha dang mi'i bde ba myong nas sdug bsngal mthar byas te/rim gyis bla na med pa
250b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/bud med kyi lus nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par
250b2(mdo sde): gyur pa la la zhig nyin gcig gam nyi ma phyed dam/yud tsam yang rung ste/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yang dag par len cing bslab pa 'dzin par byed na de dag thams
250b3(mdo sde): cad bud med kyi dngos po dang /sdug bsngal dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa thams cad rnam par bzlog te/sdug bsngal thar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par
250b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi yi dam
250b5(mdo sde): 'cha' ba dang bslab pa 'dzin pa yang dag par len par byed pa ni yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dang ldan pa yin na/byis pa dag gis ni de mi shes so//de nas
250b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe na bar snang las sgra chen po byung bar gyur pa dang /'khor de dag thams cad kyis e mA'o e ma'o zhes dam pa'i sgo byung nas me tog dang /dri'i char chen po rab tu
250b7(mdo sde): phab bo//sems can 'bum tshang ba rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur te/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
251a1(mdo sde): bkad do//gzhan yang sems can bye ba rnams sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun la skabs su 'gro ba yid la byed cing sems dang dza/
251a2(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to//de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang /lha rgyal
251a3(mdo sde): byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin gshegs
251a4(mdo sde): pos bdag cag dbugs phyung ste/bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams thos te/bcom ldan 'das
251a5(mdo sde): la chos smra ba dang /'chang ba dang /'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /mchod pa dang /sgrogs pa de drug gi yul lam/grong khyer ram/gtsug lag khang
251a6(mdo sde): rnams bdag cag gi lus dang srog dang yang bsngos te/bsrung bar bgyi/yongs su skyab par bgyi/don thams cad grub par bgyi/nor dang 'bru
251a7(mdo sde): rnams legs par bsgrub par bgyi/thams cad du mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi/nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/dran pa dang /stobs
251b1(mdo sde): dang /spro ba sprul bar bgyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//ci nas kyang de bzhin
251b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'od myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis byos shig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa
251b3(mdo sde): dang /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dgra thams cad dang nyan thos chen po
251b4(mdo sde): rnams dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das
251b5(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs
251b6(mdo sde): so//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya bud d+ha d+harma a tsin t+ya ni rde sha/bod skad du/'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos
251b7(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa//bam po dang rtog/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa la phyag 'tshal lo//de nas de na byang chub sems
252a1(mdo sde): dpa' mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur to//kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa rgyas
252a2(mdo sde): zhing bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam las byung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgyum/kha cig ni sangs
252a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khya'i snyam/kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 'byung
252a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/kha cig ni sngangs rgyas
252a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs
252a6(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam
252a7(mdo sde): kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
252b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsnam gyis mi khyab snyam mo//dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gre sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen pas byang chub
252b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' ut+pa la'i snying po la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyi brlabasngo nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi shugs su gyur/de bzhin gra shogs pa'i snang bas
252b3(mdo sde): snang bar gyur/sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis kun tu khyab par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la gnas par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'jug cing 'bab
252b4(mdo sde): pipa dang ldan par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi che ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyis yul la zhugs par gyur/chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa med pa bcu rdul yab la gnas par
252b5(mdo sde): gyur/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung gcig nas gcig tu 'bra' zhig shes par gyur/sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul brjod du med pa la spyod cing bsgrub par gyur
252b6(mdo sde): to//de nas ut+pa lA'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa rtogs shing shes nas/yid la chags pa med pa'i dbyings su bsgrubs te/byang
252b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pas chos thams cad kyi sgrib pa spangs po dang /kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan par zhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su
253a1(mdo sde): rtogs shing sangs rgyus mthong ba dang /snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po bgos nas sems can thams cad la lta zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang //byang
253a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yi dam gyi dkyil 'khor brtsams pa dang /skad cig me'i mthar song ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub
253a3(mdo sde): pa dang /mi zad pa mthong ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du bya ba dang /gzungs thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang /so sor yang dag par rig pa
253a4(mdo sde): rtogs nas ut+pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi mthus pad+ma'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs
253a5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa dpag tu med do//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sprul pa chen po la gnas so//kye rgyal ba'i
253a6(mdo sde): sros sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i mtshan thams cad kyi mdzad pa brnyes so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi bsam pa dang
253a7(mdo sde): ldan zhing chos kyi 'khor li skor ro//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so sor yang dag por rig pa bzhi brjod du med par ston to//sangs rgyas bcom
253b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos bsam du med pa la granas so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra
253b2(mdo sde): dbyings dpag tu med par 'gro'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing chung //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
253b3(mdo sde): rnams mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi khyu mchog sangs rgyas so//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chodas kyi dbyings kyi mtha' sgribs pa
253b4(mdo sde): med pa la 'jug pa mdor bsdus pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu
253b5(mdo sde): ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag cing ma brnyogs pas thams cad du 'gro ba spangs
253b6(mdo sde): pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i spyan mtha' dang dbus med pas spyan mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par
253b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chags pa med pa'i snyan mtha' dang dbus med pas 'gro ba thams kyi sgra sgribs pa med par gsan pa dang /
254a1(mdo sde): sang ste rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis shangs kyi skye mched mtha' tsha na bas med pas sangs rgyas thams tsan+d+ra kyi mnga' mchog brnyes pa dang /sangs
254a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis ljags che zhing srab pa mtha' dang dbus med khas tshasna thams nyid kyi dbyings su sgra dbyangs kyis 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
254a3(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pas las kyi lhag ma me lus 'dod sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa ston
254a4(mdo sde): cing dmigs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad sa kyi yid kyi sas mtha' dang dbus med pas chos kyi dbyings kyi sku dbyer med cing dus gsum la ma chags pas
254a5(mdo sde): rjes su 'gro ba rnam par dag pa dang /sang+yas rgyas bcom ldan ngas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar po la gnas po mtha' dang dbus med pas sangs rgyas kyi
254a6(mdo sde): rnam par sprul pa dang cho 'phrul mi za de pA ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'daso rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa mtha' dang dbus med
254a7(mdo sde): pas brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brarlabs shing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dmigs pa dang /sangs rgyas
254b1(mdo sde): /bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang /smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang /ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa dang /chos kyi
254b2(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs shing ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
254b3(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas
254b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/skad cig le 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
254b5(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar ston pa dang /skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe ston pa dang /skad cig la
254b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par byung bar ston pa dang /skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams cad du byang chub kyi zhing drung na bzhugs shing mngon par bya ba
254b7(mdo sde): chub par ston pa dang /skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar ston pa dang /skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
255a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis sems can rnams ji ltar smin zhing 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas mgu bar mdzad pa ston pa dang /skad cig la 'dzag
255a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i dmigs pa ston pa dang /skad cig la
255a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan zhing /khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod ston pa dang /
255a4(mdo sde): skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thams cad rnam par dag pa ston pa dang /skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang
255a5(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /dbang po dang /brtson 'grus dang /dad pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa'i rim pa dang /dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs mngon
255a6(mdo sde): par mkhyen pa ston pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu'o//
255a7(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus las mi 'da' ba bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas mngon par
255b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da' ba dang /dus de rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yang dag par dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par smin pa
255b2(mdo sde): las mi 'da' ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
255b3(mdo sde): 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin cho 'phrul ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can rnams ji ltar dang ba
255b4(mdo sde): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i byin gyi brlabs ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
255b5(mdo sde): 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal du 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas ji ltar rab tu dang ba'i sems
255b6(mdo sde): can rnams rab tu 'dzin pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas nyon mongs shing gdul dka' ba'i sems can la mi btsams pas 'dul ba dang /sangs
255b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmigs pa ston pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
256a1(mdo sde): 'das rnams dus de nas dus las mi 'da' ba'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyad pa/
256a2(mdo sde): bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/skyil mo krung gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par khyab pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba
256a3(mdo sde): cig yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /'od zer gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang ba dang /sku gcig gis sku thams cad du ston pa dang /
256a4(mdo sde): phyogs gcig gis gnas dmigs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku dang ye shes gcig gis chos thams cad bsgribs pa med
256a5(mdo sde): par chud pa dang /dus mkhyen nas sems cig bskyed pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyis ma lus par khyab pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi che ba tshad med pa'i rjes su song
256a6(mdo sde): zhing gom pa gcig la de kho na nyid ston pa dang /dus gsum thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pas khyab pa dang /sangs rgyas 'gro ba thams cad dang
256a7(mdo sde): mi 'dre zhing 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gcig ste/gnyis su med par spyod pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
256b1(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o//kye rgyalnga ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin bla rlabs mngon par sgrub pa//
256b2(mdo sde): rakhyen pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'jug cing smon lam mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /lus med pa'i lus mngon par sgrub pa
256b3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa dang /chos thams cad gnyis su med pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /sems can bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa la sems
256b4(mdo sde): can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul
256b5(mdo sde): thams cad ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /yul thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed cing las kyi rnam
256b6(mdo sde): par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i dbyings su mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin//
256b7(mdo sde): rnam par byang ba'ang ma yin par mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /chos thams cad skye ba med pa la skye zhing 'god pa'i mtshan nyid rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs te byung ba
257a1(mdo sde): mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis 'arlabs mngon par sgrub pa mdzad
257a2(mdo sde): pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe no/dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su
257a3(mdo sde): 'gro ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su
257a4(mdo sde): gtogs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /gzungs dang /tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba rab tu dbye ba la ma byas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su
257a5(mdo sde): gtogs pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs
257a6(mdo sde): pa dang /snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /dus thams cad du sems can
257a7(mdo sde): thams cad la rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mnyam pas phan par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can
257b1(mdo sde): thams cad 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /chos thams cad kyi dbyings la mi chags par gnas pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
257b2(mdo sde): bu gtogs pa dang /skad cig la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs
257b3(mdo sde): pa dang /nyi ma gcig la dus gsum gyi bskal pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtog sa pA ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras
257b4(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad myed pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka'
257b5(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi bla bre bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/bdud kyis rgol ba bcom zhing gtor ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi zla
257b6(mdo sde): blo chen po dang /gzhan mur 'dug dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa shin tu bzod par dka' bo'i chos kyi blo bre chen po dang /sems can thams cad 'dul
257b7(mdo sde): zhing tshim par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi zla bre chen po dang /sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams
258a1(mdo sde): thams cad du gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla dro chen po dang /chos kyi dbyings rab tu
258a2(mdo sde): phigs shing mkhyen pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus
258a3(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par phye ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par bka' ba'i chos kyi
258a4(mdo sde): bla bre chen po dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad kyis so so yang dge par rig pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i gnas dang /so so
258a5(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang /sems can gti mug med cing dang ba'i sems can thos pas 'dul ba shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po dang /
258a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa spu'i bu grwa gcig bzhin du ba spu'i khams thams cad nas rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa de snyed gshegs pa gnas
258a7(mdo sde): pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas 'di bzhin du rims pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
258b1(mdo sde): sems can 'byin pa ste/'di ni spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bre chen po'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
258b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas gcig gi rab tu phra ba'i rdul la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa dang /
258b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rang bzhin gyis 'tshe rabs chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing sems can 'dul ba rgyun mi gcod la gtong ba med kyang gnod pa med cing 'jig rten gyi khams
258b4(mdo sde): thams cad du'ang gnod pa med de/rab tu phra ba'i rdul de rgyas par byas pa'ang med/'jig rten gyi khams chung ngur byas pa'ang med pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs shing
258b5(mdo sde): mkhyen nas gnas pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla bro chen po'o//mun pa med pa'i dbyings su de bzhin
258b6(mdo sde): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mun pa dang bcas pa snang bar gyur nas/sangs rgyas kyi chos rab rib med pa/rnam par rab rib med pa'i gnas lnga
258b7(mdo sde): sems can pha rol 'dzud pa dang /de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rjes su song ba ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
259a1(mdo sde): shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla blo chen po bcu'o//tso rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa'i chos
259a2(mdo sde): kyi bla bre chen po bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/bcug
259a3(mdo sde): zhen/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba shin tu bsgrubs te/thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
259a4(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi rigs sngon nas mtho bas 'das pa dang /mi 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs thams cad du kha na ma
259a5(mdo sde): ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa la mi gnas shing phyi
259a6(mdo sde): mami'i mtha' ma'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba myed cing rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos
259a7(mdo sde): thams cad la gnas pa bcom zhing dus gsum la mi gnas par spyod pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med
259b1(mdo sde): cing shin tu rnam par dag bya'o//sna tshogs kyi blang ba med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyan gcig pa'i ngo bo ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam du rgya
259b2(mdo sde): che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dgra pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams zad mi shes pas sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha'
259b3(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i bsod nams zung mAM shes pa dang ldan pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na mo tho ba med cing
259b4(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sems can 'dul ba'i don gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs deng khwa dog mtha' med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams
259b5(mdo sde): cad na chags pa med par bzhugs te/'di ni sa ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom
259b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'jig pa med pa bzhi brnyes te/bag tsha ba med par gnas nas khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra smag ste/stag chen po ltar rgol ba rnam par gnon cing /me mar
259b7(mdo sde): lta bu'i kun tu rtog pas chos ston te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sangs rgyas
260a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das mod kyi/'on kyang ming mang po rnam par rigs
260a2(mdo sde): pas sems can rnams kyi sbyin gnas spyod ste/ji ltar zhugs pa bzhin no//de srid du yun ring po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyang rung ste/sangs
260a3(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sbyin gnas bskrun pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma
260a4(mdo sde): tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las ring ba'i
260a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs kyang /'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran na sku ston par
260a6(mdo sde): mdzad de/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par drag pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas
260a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba ste/thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
260b1(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi smon lam shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
260b2(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ma chags pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
260b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis sems can thams cad phung po las byung bar mdzad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par
260b4(mdo sde): dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yog 'khor shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag
260b5(mdo sde): pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi sku
260b6(mdo sde): shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas
260b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa dang /rnam par gnon par mdzad pa dam pa'i mchog brnyes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/kye rgyal
261a1(mdo sde): ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o//kyo rgyal ba'i sras dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul
261a2(mdo sde): khams thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la dus
261a3(mdo sde): thams cad du sangs rgyas ston pa dang /dus thams cad du sems can shes kyi sems can la chos ston pa dang /dus thams cad du sangs rgyas la sems rab tu
261a4(mdo sde): dang ba'i sems can la tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /dus thams cad du chos mi 'gyur ba'i lam du 'das pa'i sems can la ye shes rtogs par mdzad pa
261a5(mdo sde): dang /dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang /dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin
261a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi chags par bzhud pa dang /dus thams cad du sems tson thams cad la thugs rje chen po rgyun mi gcod pa dang /dus thams cad du sangs rgyas
261a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs pa dang /dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas sna tshogs su sprul par
261b1(mdo sde): bzugs pa dang /dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'dri ni dus thams cad du//
261b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa ga/
261b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul mi zad pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
261b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pa brnyes pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /
261b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul gyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam
261b6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /sangs
261b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /kha dog gis ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad ma skyed pas
262a1(mdo sde): sngon gyi mtha' nas smon lam spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mthar 'gro ba thams cad 'as
262a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mo gcod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /spangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can+da ma mus de'i ris thams cad kyi sems kyi
262a3(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi gnon pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho ma
262a4(mdo sde): zad pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa bcu'o//
262a5(mdo sde): gyi rgyal ba'i sgras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
262a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin cing mngon par byung ba'i spyan dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad mi mkhyen pa mim
262a7(mdo sde): ba'i spyan dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad la thugs rje che ba'i spyan dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
262b1(mdo sde): rnams tshad med pa'i stobs bcu thams cad dang ldan pa'i spyan dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i spyan
262b2(mdo sde): dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar zhugs pa'i spyan dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
262b3(mdo sde): 'gro ba thams cad mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad pa'i spyan dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pas 'dul ba'i
262b4(mdo sde): sems can la 'dul ba'i spyan dang /gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med par spyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la dbyung ba'i spyan dang /
262b5(mdo sde): gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sems can btul te smin par mdzad nas/sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'i phyir sangs rgyas
262b6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'dra' bar ston pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas
262b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'odas sems can gyi khams la mtha'
263a1(mdo sde): yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas
263a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la
263a3(mdo sde): gdams pa rjes su bstan pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams rnam par spyod pa'i nan tan mtha' yas par
263a4(mdo sde): ston pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gdams pa mtha' yas pa bstan pa la 'god po'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas bcom
263a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rim pa'i khyad par bzhin smon lam gyis 'byung ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems
263a6(mdo sde): can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mtha' yas par sbyin pa'i sgo dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
263a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang dad pa bzhin ston pa'i sgo dang /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ni 'das pa dang /
263b1(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bskul par 'byus ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthus bsdus nas///
263b2(mdo sde): yongs su snang zhing /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i sgo ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
263b3(mdo sde): chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas
263b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku bstan pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung
263b5(mdo sde): gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
263b6(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi 'dzin pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom
263b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis sa dang /chu dang me dang /rlung gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin
264a1(mdo sde): gyis brlabs kyi yul gyi dbang gis brtsom pa'i yul thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs
264a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan gyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing rtsom pas
264a3(mdo sde): kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas kyang sems can
264a4(mdo sde): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad
264a5(mdo sde): pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras
264a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/smon lam rgyun mi gcod cing smon lam brtan pa dang
264a7(mdo sde): gnyis su med par bshad pa ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dang po'o//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
264b1(mdo sde): rab tu 'byon zhing ma zhum par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par 'gro zhing yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po
264b2(mdo sde): gnyis so//brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni 'dul bar 'os pa'i sems can gcig gzigs na'ang mi bzhugs par 'jig
264b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs te/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gsum mo//sems can gyi sems mi 'phrog pa la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa
264b4(mdo sde): dang /sems can sems rab tu dang ba la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bzhi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
264b5(mdo sde): yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang ma yin/ma byung ba'ang ma yin/gang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas nam
264b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub kyi sems mi 'jig ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyis
264b7(mdo sde): snying po lnga'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsdus nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi phyir mi spyod pa ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos
265a1(mdo sde): kyi snying po drug go/thog mar sems kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rjes su lus kyi las dang /ngag gi las dang /yid kyi las
265a2(mdo sde): la slob ste/thams cad mkhyen par bsngo zhing nyan thos pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod par ma yin pas blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
265a3(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bdun no//mtha' yas par 'od thams cad kun tu snang ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
265a4(mdo sde): thams cad snang ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba thams cad mtshungs pa thams cad mtshungs par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
265a5(mdo sde): du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po brgyad do//'jig rten gyi bdi de thams cad spong ba dang /'jig rten gyi dga' ba la mi 'dod
265a6(mdo sde): pa dang /'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i smon lam thams cad mtshungs par 'jig rten gyi badre ba thams cad dang ldan pas sdug bsngal thams cad
265a7(mdo sde): 'jig cing spros pa thams cad med pa ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dgu'o//sangs rgyas kyi yul la dad pas dka' ba dang dka' thub kyi sems bskyed
265b1(mdo sde): do//sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs bsrung ba lnga brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam par sdug bsngal thams cad rigs pas rig cing skyobs drung sa bcu'i bar
265b2(mdo sde): kyi mthar byung ba ste/'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu'o//
265b3(mdo sde): kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma
265b4(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad du gshegs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pa'ang
265b5(mdo sde): mi chags par spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na 'chag bzhengs bzhugs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang /
265b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams me lus pa thams cad na chos ston pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
265b7(mdo sde): gyi khams ma lus 'thams cad dang //dga' ldan gnas su gshegs pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus
266a1(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang /sngon gyi mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung bar yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
266a2(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gshegs pa'ang mi chags por spyod pa dang /sems can ma lus
266a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par gzigs shing sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la cho 'phrul gsum ston cing sems can 'dul ba'ang mi chags par
266a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas pocom ldan 'das kyi sku gcig gis tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa chen po spyod pa'ang mi
266a5(mdo sde): chags par spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sems can tshad med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams
266a6(mdo sde): cad la ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' yas bsdus pa'ang mi chags par spyod pa ste/kye rgyal
266a7(mdo sde): ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan
266b1(mdo sde): mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i mtshan drang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog
266b2(mdo sde): dam pa bla na med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yan lag drug cu mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing gsung gi yan lag brgya rtsa lnga yongs su bzung po brgya stong
266b3(mdo sde): du mas brgyan pa mtha' dang mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /don tshig 'bru rab tu dang ba dang /'jigs pa med pa
266b4(mdo sde): chen pos mi 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can thams cad la thos pa dang /snang ba dang /
266b5(mdo sde): shes par mdzad pa dang /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs dang /dbang bo sna tshogs kyi rim pa so sor slong zhing 'dul ba ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
266b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yid kyi las stobs bcus brgyan pa/sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge
266b7(mdo sde): 'dzin chen pos rgyas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan te chags pa med pa'i yul gyi spyod yul ba/chos kyi dbyings la rab tu
267a1(mdo sde): gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yan lag brnyes te chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi brgyan dang /sems kyi skad cig ma gcig
267a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi dus gsum ma lus pa dang /chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa ste/
267a3(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi brgyan dam pa mchog bla na med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa'i 'od bye ba khrag
267a4(mdo sde): khrig rab tu btang nas/'od zer brjod du med pa gcig nas gcig tu 'od zer gyi dra bar bskor cing zhing mdo bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad du snang
267a5(mdo sde): bar byas pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa'i rigs ston pa/'dzum pa ston pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dge sna tshogs du ma kha dog brgya stong bye ba
267a6(mdo sde): khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa byung bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams la snang bas
267a7(mdo sde): shes par byed cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gdon
267b1(mdo sde): mi zab phyir mi ldog pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bzhugs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas dga' ba med par 'byung ba ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
267b2(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi brgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhan du lung ston pa dang /'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa med par
267b3(mdo sde): mdzad pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab rib med pas 'jig rten thams cad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa ston pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o//
267b4(mdo sde): tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku bsgrib pa med cing rnam par dag pa/chos thams cad la ma chags pa mtha' med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
267b5(mdo sde): mtha' dang dpung med par chud pa/'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/'jig rten thams cad de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba/'jig rten thams cad 'jig rten
267b6(mdo sde): las 'das par spyod par 'jug pa'i tshig gi lam chad cing brjod du med par chud pa/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched dang bral ba ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom/
267b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od tshad med pa/'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dbyer
268a1(mdo sde): med pa'i 'od brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i brgyan kha dog sna tshogs du ma'i rkyen kun nas mi phrog pa'i 'od/'jig rten thams cad la mchags pa'i 'od tshad/
268a2(mdo sde): med pa bsgribs pa med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzad thams cad khang pa ltar gyur pa ste/'od ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi brgyan bla na
268a3(mdo sde): med pa mchog dam pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi kha dog mtha' yas pa/kha dog 'tsher ba/kha dog rang bzhin gyis 'tsher ba/kha dog tshad med pa//
268a4(mdo sde): sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par byed pa'i kha dog ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi zlog pa'i
268a5(mdo sde): kha dog dang /kha dog thams cad kyi mchog brnyes pas de las gzhan pa'i kha dog dang /khams gsum gyi kha dog thams cad khyab pa zil gyis mnan pa ste/'di
268a6(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge bo shin tu rnam par dag pas 'das
268a7(mdo sde): pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs dge ba rin po che 'byung ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma smad pa/kha na ma tho ba med pas chos
268b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi de kho na mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sgribs pa med cing rigs rnam par dag pa thams cad
268b2(mdo sde): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung zhing 'dus pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs dang /gdung rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na
268b3(mdo sde): med pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis brgyan pa shin tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i sku'i 'du byed nyam rangs pa/shin tu rnam
268b4(mdo sde): par phye ba blta bas mi ngoms pas/thugs rje chen po'i thugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin gnas dang /skyabs ming gi mchog bla na med pa so sor 'dzin pa rnams la
268b5(mdo sde): thugs brtse zhing phan par bzhed pa/sems can thams cad la ye shes chen po'i byin gyis rlob pa bsod nams chen po 'phags pa/'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams mtha'
268b6(mdo sde): yas pa'i zhing sems can thams cad la yon tan dang ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
268b7(mdo sde): byams pa chen po dang /thugs rje chen po dang /bsod nams kyis mtha'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
269a1(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o///'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
269a2(mdo sde): bstan pa//bam po gnyis pa//kye rgyal po'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po dbang gi chos bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
269a3(mdo sde): 'das chos thams cad kyi bdag po dbang gis chos thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang /mtha' med pa'i tshig dang 'bru la spobs pa chags pa med pas chos ma lus pa
269a4(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su ston pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dang po'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
269a5(mdo sde): kyi bdag pos ji ltar sems can gnas pa'i 'dul zhing yongs su smin pa de ltar smon lam dang chos ston te/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i chos gnyis so//sangs
269a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos kyang sems can gcig la'ang gnod pa med pa tshad med grangs
269a7(mdo sde): med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'deg pa dang /'jog pa dang /
269b1(mdo sde): po dang /'phen pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams gtsug nas gcig dang /phyogs gcig nas gcig tu 'jog kyang sems can gyi khams kun nus ga mug ca
269b2(mdo sde): tshom med de/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag de'i dbang gi rgya ste gsum mo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la 'jig rte
269b3(mdo sde): gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ye shes kyi byin gyis rlobs te/rgyan+da sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang /'jig rte
269b4(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad du lhab lhub dang rgyun ston pa dang /grangs med pa'i bskal par 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa med pa'i lus
269b5(mdo sde): nyon cing ltab lhub dang dz+nyAni thams cad kyi kha dog mi zad par ston pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu kun 'brus
269b6(mdo sde): byar byin gyis rlob pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bzhi'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ba
269b7(mdo sde): pos sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs nas sems can gcig gi phyir brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par skyil mo krung mi 'jig pa
270a1(mdo sde): gang zag la dgrangs kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra dang thugs la sa ba ma mnga' zhing 'dul ba'ongs su de las ma 'da' so/dza ltar gang dran/
270a2(mdo sde): re re la'ang de bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthar cha la dbang ba byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang sangs rgyas ba
270a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la kun tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga'/skyo ba mi mnga' ste/de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag
270a4(mdo sde): gi phyir rim pas rab tu sbyong ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos lnga'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
270a5(mdo sde): bdog pos sems kyi skad cig ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'brang zhing gshegs nus/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
270a6(mdo sde): khams 'gyur ba rgya mtsho med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gaucig tu thams cad byin gyis borlabs pa dang /phyogs
270a7(mdo sde): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs kyi dra ba bzlog cing tshad med par gshegs te/chos kyi dbyings ston pa dang /mi 'phrogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor
270b1(mdo sde): lo bskor ba te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gis chos drug go/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag pos sems
270b2(mdo sde): skad cig ma la sems can ni khams 'drem ba'i phyir sems kyi skad cig ma la blan med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par spangs
270b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyang 'di ltar mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas po'ang med/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/mngon du rdzogs
270b4(mdo sde): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'ang med/slob pa'i sa la gnas pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu phye ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgribs par
270b5(mdo sde): med par rtogs shing rigs pa'ang med de/sems can 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa chen po'i yul rgyun mi gcod cing dpag tu med pa'i ye shes brnyes
270b6(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bdun no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos glang spyan gyi skye mchid
270b7(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad bde khyed kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub//gaspyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/
271a1(mdo sde): gang shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/gang ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas
271a2(mdo sde): kyi mdzad pa de sku'i skye mched kyis kun tu sgru'o/gang sku'i skye mchod kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad po de thugs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/gong thugs kyi skye mchod
271a3(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de'i bar gyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sna tshogs su rtsom zhing 'jig rten dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam
271a4(mdo sde): par phye ba brnyes te/de bzhin du rtsom pa re res sgrub cing sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rtsom pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du rtsom pa ma lus pa thams cad kyang
271a5(mdo sde): de bzhin te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos brgyad do//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang pos
271a6(mdo sde): rang gi sku'i ba spu gcig gi bu gar sems can re re'i lus kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du me pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ltar che ba'i sems can gyi khams ma
271a7(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad bcug cing nang du 'dus par mdzad de/de la sems can re res kyang bskal pa grangs med par gnas kyang sems can de dag la gnod
271b1(mdo sde): pa'ang med/kun tu gnod pa med do//'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu gom pa gcig gis gshegs te 'jig
271b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de dag gis sangs rgyas byung zhing sangs rgyas byung ba dang /de dag gis brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das te/de'i dbang gis sems can
271b3(mdo sde): gyi snying pos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shes so//de la ba spu'i bu ga'i sems can brjod du med pa dag gcig nas gcig tu
271b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su gyur te/gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing /gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston/gcig
271b5(mdo sde): nas gcig tu 'das pa brjod du med pa dang /gcig nas gcig tu ma 'ongs pa brjod pa du med pa dang /gcig nas gcig tu da ltar byung ba brjod du med pa snang bar byed//
271b6(mdo sde): mtha' dang dpung med pa'i nam mkha'i khams skabs byed pa ston/sems can thams cad 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /thams cad skye ba'i skye mched dang /bsgribs
271b7(mdo sde): pa med pa dang /'dod chags la yongs su spyod par 'jug pa mkhyen te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi
272a1(mdo sde): chos dgu'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag pos chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad+mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan te pad+man
272a2(mdo sde): snying po'i seng ge'i gdan la de bzhin gshegs pa re re bzhugs pa dang /chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang /sku dpag tu med pa dang /byang chub tu mngon
272a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol pa ston te/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pa de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams
272a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par sems can gyi snying po re re sems kyi skad cig ma la byin gyis rlob bo//sems kyi skad cig ma gcig ji lta ba
272a5(mdo sde): bzhin du sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad kyang de bzhin no//ji ltar pad+ma'i le'u dang /rnam par dog cing mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar chos
272a6(mdo sde): kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /bsam gyis mi
272a7(mdo sde): khyab pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /'jig rten gyi khams su rtsom pa sna tshogs kyi rim pa dang /med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa dang /
272b1(mdo sde): sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid dang /mtshan nyid sna tshogs med pa dang /rigs med bcu rdul yab tshad med pa dang /grangs med pa'i dus 'gyur ba dang /mi chags pa
272b2(mdo sde): ston pa dang /tshad med pa'i blo rgyas pa'i dad pa dang /skad cig ma sna tshogs dang /gnas med pa dang /skad cig ma bsam gyis mi khyad pa dang /tshad med par
272b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dang /sems kyi skad cig ma dang /sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la thams cad ston te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mched du mdzad pa ni mi mnga'o//
272b4(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag
272b5(mdo sde): po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs pa bcu ste/
272b6(mdo sde): bcu gang zhe na/gang gis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mtshan re re nas yongs su dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
272b7(mdo sde): ste/'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
273a1(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang
273a2(mdo sde): rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang /spyod pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang
273a3(mdo sde): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tsheng rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas
273a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bdag po 'gro ba thams cad gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa
273a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas
273a6(mdo sde): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon
273a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad gti mug med par ston pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu/
273b1(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par
273b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas yongs su mya ngan la so 'da' ste/k+She rgyal
273b3(mdo sde): ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras
273b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs ma yin pa'i
273b5(mdo sde): chos thams cad mkhyen nas spros pa med pa dang dge ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston cing snang bar mdzad de/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
273b6(mdo sde): kyi thabs la mkhas pa dang po'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad bltar med pa dang /phan tshun shes par mi rung ba dang /ma bcing
273b7(mdo sde): ba dang /ma grol ba dang /gzung du med pa dang /reg par mi rung ba dang /ma byung ba'i chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes shing /sangs
274a1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid dang /de kho na dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa'i chos
274a2(mdo sde): thams cad dang /bdag med pa dang /gzung ba med pa'i chos rnams kyi de kho na'i mtha' la chags pa med pa'i dbang du gyur pa de la dbang gis chen po bslabs
274a3(mdo sde): te/bslab pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing chos thams cad la gzigs te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gnyis pa'o//
274a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad kyi mtha' dang bral zhing mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa/mtshan ma mngon par mkhyen pas mi chags
274a5(mdo sde): pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid med pa dang /ji ltar ngo bo nyid smra ba'i tshul gyis rjes su song ba/grangs med pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag
274a6(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs kyi zhing thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad par ston pa/mun pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po yang dag par rab tu 'chang ba mun pa'i 'gro
274a7(mdo sde): ba thams cad la sgron ma chen pos snang ba ston te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gsum pa'o//sngon gyi
274b1(mdo sde): mtha' dang /phyi ma'i mtha' dang /da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba dang /chos kyi dbyings la mi gnas pa/
274b2(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma byung ba dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byung ba snang bar mdzad pa/brjod du med par bstan pa/
274b3(mdo sde): ltar tshad med pa'i rigs kyi phyir dang /sangs rgyas kyi phyir lta ba/sangs rgyas kyi yul kun tu gzigs pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
274b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bzhi pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus kyi lus dang /ngag gi las dang /yid kyi las mngon par 'du mi byed pa/
274b5(mdo sde): blang ba myed pa dang /rgyu med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu song ba ma nges pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod dang /grangs kyi sbyor ba
274b6(mdo sde): las log par tshogs mtha' yas pa sgrub pa dang /sna tshogs kyi rim pa 'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i glangs su gtogs pa'i rjes su song
274b7(mdo sde): ba/bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lte ba tshad med mtha' yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad pa/chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad
275a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams 'dul zhing rnam par rig par byed pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa lnga'o//
275a2(mdo sde): chos thams cad ltar med pa dang /sna tshogs med par song ba/rim pa med par song ba/ma byung bar song ba/mtshan nyid med par song ba/sna tshogs
275a3(mdo sde): med par song ba/rgyan med par song ba/blang ba med par song ba/ngo bo nyid med par song zhing chos thams cad mkhyen te/chos kyi klong las nges par 'byin
275a4(mdo sde): pa rab tu mkhyen pa/'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 'gal bar mdzad pa/yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par lta ba/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa//
275a5(mdo sde): ye shes kyis ma lus par gzigs pa/chos thams cad dbang gis snang bar mdzad cing de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid lngas mi 'pho ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bco
275a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thubs la mkhas pa drug pa'o//dus cig tu mtshan mA gcig phan tshun rtogs shing mkhyen pa de chos glasha' mor 'jug
275a7(mdo sde): pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa rnam par dag pa/chos gsha' ma nyid dang /dus thams cad du mi gnas pa de la nyi ma gcig dang /
275b1(mdo sde): zla ba phyed dang /lo gcig dang /lo brgya dang /bskal pa sdud pa dang 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'ang ma yin/ldog pa'ang ma yin/tshad med pa'i dus dang /nyi ma
275b2(mdo sde): gcig dang /yud tsam gyi dus dang /snga dro dang /nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang /phye ma red dang /spyod dang /nam gyi dgung dang /tho rengs kyi dus dang /nyi ma dang /grangs
275b3(mdo sde): su gtogs pa'i dus dang /zhag bdun dang /zla ba phyed kyi dus dang /zla ba gcig dang /lo gcig dang /lo brgya'i dus dang /bskal pa gcig gi dus dang /
275b4(mdo sde): tshad med/grangs med/bsam gyis mi khyab/brjod du med pa'i dus dang /phyi ma'i dus kyi mtha'i bar du chos ston to/chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'ang med
275b5(mdo sde): ldog pa'ang med rgyun kyang mi gcod sbyor ba'ang med/mtshams su'ang mi 'gyur/mi 'dor/mi 'pho/mi g.yo/ring ba'ang ma yin/de mtha' la'ang gnas pa ma
275b6(mdo sde): yin te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis thabs la mkhas pa bdun pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings ma
275b7(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad dang /tshad med pa'i mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa/so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa dang /
276a1(mdo sde): so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa gnas pa med pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa
276a2(mdo sde): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa kun nas gzung ba med pa dang /de kho na nyid so so yang dag par rig pa dang /tshig dang /
276a3(mdo sde): tshul dang /rtog pa so so'i yang dag par rig pa dang /chos thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa dang /ji ltar bsam pa dang /dang ba dang /dbang po
276a4(mdo sde): dang /ji ltar btags pa'i chos rnams dang /chos kyi gzhung gi mtshams ston pa dang /de dang de dag tu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mdo sde bye
276a5(mdo sde): pa khrag khrig brgya stong gi thog ma dang /bar ma dang /tha ma'i mdo yang dag par rab tu ston te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas
276a6(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o//ming med pa dang /ming dang /rigs dang /'byung ba'ang chos thams cad kyi ming dang /'byed pa dang /khams 'bar ba dang /
276a7(mdo sde): mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /'das pa med pa'i ming dang /ma 'ongs pa med pa'i ming dang /da ltar byung ba med pa'i ming dang /sems can med
276b1(mdo sde): pa'i ming dang /zhing med pa'i ming dang /chos med pa'i ming dang /yon tan med pa'i ming drang /byang chub sem dpa' med pa'i ming da nga /sangs rgyas me dad pa
276b2(mdo sde): med dang /grangs dad pa'i gling dang /grangs med pa ma yin pa'i mi dang //rAm+me b+hu ba'i ming dang /mi 'gog pa'i ming dang //med pa'i rdzing dang //med pa ma yin no/
276b3(mdo sde): pa'i ming dang /gcig ma yin pa'i ming dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ming rang bzhin gyis brjod da myed pa'o///rlos thams cad ni phyogs ma yin//brda
276b4(mdo sde): ma yin/ngag gi lam g+hi sgra dang bral ba/swa byung ba rnams cad kyis ma bsgrub pa/rnyed pa dang tshigs su bskyed pa dang /rnam pa gcig ma yin pa
276b5(mdo sde): dang /rnam pa myang po ma yin pa dang /spyang thams cad banod du med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyi pa brnyen pa/kun tu mi rtog pa'i yul mngon na 'bra' mi byed pa
276b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/rtog pa dang /gan tu rtog pa dang /yongs su thon pa thams cang 'gags pa/smra ba thams cad la mi gnanas pa gan pa ste/'dri ni sangs
276b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa dgu'o//gzugs kyi chos thams cad ma skyes par mkhyen te/tsher ngob ma yin/smosapa
277a1(mdo sde): ma yin/grangs ma yin/'du shes kyi spyod pa ma yin/'du byed ma yin/ljon pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa ma yin te/rang bzhin
277a2(mdo sde): gyis zhi bar rab tu mkhyen/skye mched med par 'jug pa dang /chos thams cad kyi dbyings mi dmigs pa dang /chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang /chos
277a3(mdo sde): thams cad ldang ba med de/rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/chos thams cad dben pa/las ma yin pa spyod pa med pa las byung ba/ma skyes
277a4(mdo sde): pa/ma byung ba/grangasnga med par rtogs pa/yod pa ma yin pa med pa ma yin pa/ma skyes pa/ma 'gags pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/rnam
277a5(mdo sde): par byang ba ma yin/ming med pa/gsha' ma ma yin pa/mi gnas pa yongs su mi gnas pa yongs su smin pa ma yin pa/dul ba ma yin pa/
277a6(mdo sde): sems can med pa/sems can med pa ma yin pa/srog med pa/srog med pa ma yin pa/rkyen med pa/rkyen med pa ma yin pa/rkyen dang 'du ba med
277a7(mdo sde): pa ma yin par chos thams cad mkhyen te/chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/tshogs gsum pa rnam par gnas
277b1(mdo sde): sa smos pa dang /mdos pa dang log par nges pa dang /mangs pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'o stobs bcu dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yong nas dang /
277b2(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po skye/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la ma
277b3(mdo sde): bcu'o//ste rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas
277b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs yangs pa/tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/lha dang 'jog rten du bcas pa gang gis nga
277b5(mdo sde): gzung bar mi nus pa/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa bcu ste/
277b6(mdo sde): gang zhe na/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' dang /chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams
277b7(mdo sde): du dga' ldan du skye ba ston pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' med pa dang /kho dog tshad med pa dang /gzi brjid chad mang
278a1(mdo sde): dang /snang ba tshad med pa dang /dbyings tshad med pa dang /dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa tshad med pa dang /sgra sgrogs pa rnam par rig/
278a2(mdo sde): pa tshad med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la gnas pa dang /shes rab dang /ye shes kyi yul tshad med pa dang /mtha' dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rjes su
278a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang /bdud du bcas/tshangs par bcas/dge sbyong dang /bram zer bcas pa dang /skye dgu dang /lha dang /mir bcas pa dang /lha ma yin
278a4(mdo sde): gyi 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa/mi 'phrogs pa'i byams pa chen po'i spyod yul ba snying rje chen po la phyogs pa'i mthas phyogs pas sems can rjes su 'dzin
278a5(mdo sde): pa/gzhan mtho ris su skye ba'i sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/bsod nams kyi stobs kyi dbang po phun sum tshogs pa dbang po rnam par dag pa dang /sems can
278a6(mdo sde): shes yongs su dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/reg pa chen po yongs su
278a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/'gro ba thams cad las 'byung ba'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
278b1(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dang spyod pa rnam par dag pa rdzogs pa'o//dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho zhing yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshe dang //
278b2(mdo sde): bdag gi lus su skye ba dang /sgyu ma lta bur spyod pa dang /sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la thug pa dang /mi g.yor lta bu'i rnam par rig pa dang /yul nam mkha'
278b3(mdo sde): ltar tshad med par song ba/'dod lnga lta bur skye ba la ma chags pa/smig rgyu dang /mnyam par snang ba dang /nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la 'brang ba/gnas med
278b4(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/bla bre dang rgyan chen po'i mdzod bdag gi lus skye ba'i mtha' yang sangs rgyas kyi
278b5(mdo sde): mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /rin po che chen pos smras pa'i khang bla brtsegs pa rin po ches mchod pa'i gnas chen po la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang //
278b6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /yid la byed pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /rnam par sprul
278b7(mdo sde): pa chen po'i mdzod ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /ma/
279a1(mdo sde): las skyes pa de la gnas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /yul chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
279a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po
279a3(mdo sde): la rnam par spyod cing mnyam par 'jog pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag las bzhengs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad
279a4(mdo sde): pa dang /thog ma dang /bar ma dang /tha ma dang /spyod pa dang po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i mtha'i bar gyis kyang spangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad
279a5(mdo sde): pa dang /sa 'di nas gnyis kyi bar du thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas phyis 'jig rten gyi grangs la shes par ston pa dang /gzi brjid sna tshogs kyis kyang
279a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /byang
279a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /mngon par byung ba dang /rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang //
279b1(mdo sde): sakyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa tha/
279b2(mdo sde): cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /'jig rten dpag tu med pa dang /'jig rten
279b3(mdo sde): kun dang /phyogs thams cad du rgya mtsho'i rgyun dang /rigs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /zhing dang dus me lus pas 'jig
279b4(mdo sde): rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sems can gyi rigs pa
279b5(mdo sde): lus pas 'jog rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang /rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa
279b6(mdo sde): dang /sprul pa chen po dang /rigs dang /sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang /chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/'di ni sangs
279b7(mdo sde): rgyus bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gnyis pa'o//dge bar spyod pa las rnam par dag pa dang /skye ba thams cad dang /ye shes dang /
280a1(mdo sde): spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang /skye ba bstan pa'i rjes su song ba dang /sems can 'dul zhing rjes su chud par byed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
280a2(mdo sde): cad dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /sems can rnams la dgos pa'i slas ston pa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags dang bral te gnas
280a3(mdo sde): la gnas pa dang /gnas pa med pa dang /sgra dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar so sor rtog pa dang /srid pa thams cad dang /mi dang srid par 'byung ba la rtog
280a4(mdo sde): pa dang /dngos po thams cad ye shes su 'jug pa dang /tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /snying rje chen pos
280a5(mdo sde): slas ltar 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba dang /byams pa chen pos sems yul la so sor rtog pa dang /dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten la mngon par dga' ba shes
280a6(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /btang snyoms chen po so sems la dbang sgyur zhing 'jug par byed pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bdag la yongs su rdzogs
280a7(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du lus mngon par sgrub pa dang /thams cad du gnas pa med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed
280b1(mdo sde): pa dang /g.yog 'khor thams cad rnam par dgra par nan tan pyod pa dang /chos ston cing smra brjod pa dang /'jig rten gyi dbang po smad pa dang /'gro ba thams
280b2(mdo sde): cad kyi nyes pa rtogs pa ji ltar spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ston pa dang /ji ltar gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba dang /yongs su ma
280b3(mdo sde): smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /ji ltar yongs su smin pa 'dul ba dang /thabs la mkhas pa grangs med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /sangs
280b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa las mi ldog par ston pa dang /spyod pa'i sgo sna tshogs kyi chos snang bar byed pa dang /gnas med pa'i rnam pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rnam
280b5(mdo sde): par dag pa byed pa dang /snying rje chen po skyes pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par 'bebs par byed pa dang /sbrang bu 'gro ba ltar byams pa la 'jug cing cho 'phrul gsum
280b6(mdo sde): yongs su 'bebs par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba rnam par rig cing slas kyi dbus na 'dug pa ston pa dang /de las mtha'i mtha' dang /dpung
280b7(mdo sde): med pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ston pa dang /ye shes chen po la gnas pas gnon cing sgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa mngon
281a1(mdo sde): par sgrub pa dang /las kyi mtha'i chos gsum la thabs mkhas pa ste/lus kyi las shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /ngag gis mi 'phro ba'i ma
281a2(mdo sde): shes shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /yid kyi las zab mo chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/'di
281a3(mdo sde): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gsum pa'o//mngon par byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba chen pos slas tshad med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan
281a4(mdo sde): payid du 'ong ba spangs te/'byung ba'i spyod pa ston cing 'jig rten gnas pa'i sems can 'dzud pa dang /'jig rten mngon par chags par 'gyur bar byed pa
281a5(mdo sde): dang /'jig rten gyi grangs mi rtog go zhes shes par byed pa dang /'jig rten sna tshogs la mngon par chags pa zlog par byed pa dang /'jig rten gyi dga'
281a6(mdo sde): ba'i sred pa gcod pa dang /nyon mongs pa spangs pa 'jig rten spyod du 'jug pa dang /don thams cad rjes su dran par byed pa dang /'byung ba'i don gyi phyir
281a7(mdo sde): 'brang bar byed pa dang /khyim pa'i mtshan ma yongs su gtong bar ston pa dang /nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la sbyor zhing gnas par byed pa dang /sngon gyi smon
281b1(mdo sde): lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa dang /ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor so sor rnyed par byed
281b2(mdo sde): cing sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i rab rib la lta ba dang /bdag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar khrid pa dang /dge
281b3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'du zhing sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye dgu thams cad la bsngags pa dang /bdag ye shes kyi don mthong ba'i ston pa
281b4(mdo sde): dang /sems can rnams la rnam par dag pa'i sgro brjod pa dang /sems can rnams lo kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgo sgrub tu 'dzud pa dang /'jig rten thams cad la 'byung
281b5(mdo sde): ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang /mngon par 'byung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan kun sgreng bar byed pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
281b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa bzhi pa'o//mdzad pa dang ye shes du ma dang rab tu ldan pas byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar
281b7(mdo sde): phyin nas byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad thugs su chud de/bdud kyi stobs rab tu bcom zhing zil gyis mi non pa'i sku'i byin gyi brlabs
282a1(mdo sde): kyi mdzod dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du khyab par byed pa dang /byin gyi brlabs mi zad pa'i mthas mtha' rnam par spangs
282a2(mdo sde): pa dang /tshad med pa'i spyod pa rab tu brnyes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don gyi rjes su gshegs pa dang /thams
282a3(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du smras pa'i gdan yongs su gsal ba dang /
282a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rig par byed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog rab tu brnyes
282a5(mdo sde): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang yang dag pa'i khyad par gyi smon lam la rnam par lta ba dang /byang chub
282a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' thams cad la dgongs pa dang /zab mo'i byang chub sems dpa' la chos zab mo'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang /tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul
282a7(mdo sde): rtsom pa dang /brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas kyi phyir 'brang zhing sna tshogs kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi/
282b1(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang /'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi yul du byas pa dang /sems can la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rig
282b2(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dbyer med pas 'byung ba'i sa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas shing yon tan thams
282b3(mdo sde): cad kyi khyad par ma lus pa'i mtha' rab tu rnyed do 'dug pa dang /'jig rten thams cad du 'gro ba dang /sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar 'gro ba dang /
282b4(mdo sde): zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang /chos thams cad du 'gro ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba dang /yongs su smin pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang /
282b5(mdo sde): dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang /'dul ba thams cad du 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol par 'gro ba dang /'gro ba ma lus pa thams
282b6(mdo sde): cad kyi dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par chud par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
282b7(mdo sde): pa lnga pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/'jig rten thams cad mngon par
283a1(mdo sde): shes par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /ma lus pa thams cad du ma lus par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mi 'jigs pa'i seng ge'i/
283a2(mdo sde): chen po'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod dang /mun pa med pa'i chos kyi mdzod kyi sgra snang ba'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /
283a3(mdo sde): ngas lhur chags pa med pa'i ye shes chad med pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /chos thams cad nga ba nyid med pa'i dub nyid bsgribs pa med pa
283a4(mdo sde): mi sor rtog pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang /sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i tshul gyis 'khor lo
283a5(mdo sde): dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos steng bar byed pa'i dus gsum du 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyig
283a6(mdo sde): tu sdug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang mi 'gal bu'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang /de la sogs pa grangs med pa rnams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi chos
283a7(mdo sde): lo skor to/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod par 'gro ba'i chos kyi 'khor ma skor ro//'di sngar chos kyi 'khor lo sar byas kyang sangs rgyas
