283b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa drug pa'o//grong
283b2(mdo sde): dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/
283b3(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /lha'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang /dri za'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /lha ma
283b4(mdo sde): yin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang /nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i pho brang dang /mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /'bar
283b5(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /sha za'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/gang 'di klong
283b6(mdo sde): byer gyi sgor gshegs nas sa g.yo zhing 'od zer gyi snang bas long ba rnams ni so sor mig thob/'on pa rnams ni so sor skra thos/smyon pa rnams ni so sor
283b7(mdo sde): dran pa rnyed/gcer bu rnams kyang so sor gos rnyed/sdug bsngal ba rnams ni so sor bde ba thob/sil snyan dang brdung ba rnams ma brdungs par yid du 'ong
284a1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra skud 'byin pa dang /brdung ba ma brdungs pa dang /'phyang 'phrul rnams 'phyang ba dang /brdungs pa'i sgra dang /bram ze sna tshogs
284a2(mdo sde): mang po rnams kyi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba dang /lta bas mi ngoms shing mi mthun pa med pa gzugs kyi sku ston pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems
284a3(mdo sde): can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /mtshan dang dpe byad bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
284a4(mdo sde): kun tu gzigs pa dang /rnam par gzigs pa dang /brkyang ba dang /bskum pas kyang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /mngon par shes
284a5(mdo sde): pa dang /byon pa dang /bzhengs pa dang /'chag pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /gzims pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la
284a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /chos 'chad pa dang /cang mi gsung bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
284a7(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang /rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can
284b1(mdo sde): rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa dang /'jig rten gyi spyod pa grangs med pa thams cad dang /'jig
284b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kyi yul dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la gnas pa dang sangs rgyas dang /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /yang dag
284b3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa'i phyir 'brang ba dang /sangs rgyas rnams 'byung zhing skye ba dang /smra ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
284b4(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /smra ba shin tu dkon pa dang /dkar po'i chos thams cad dang /bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang /sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang /de bzhin
284b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa kha dog mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa dang /sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du rtog pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa sems
284b6(mdo sde): can gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rtog pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa zhing thams cad la gzigs shing 'jug pa dang /'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
284b7(mdo sde): cad nye bar spyod pas kyang 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /de dag dad pa dang /phyag 'tshal ba dang /thal mo sbyar
285a1(mdo sde): ba'i las dang /rjes su ston pa dang /tshig tu 'byin pa dang /yang dang yang du yid la byed pa dang /mngon par lta ba dang /mngon du dran pa
285a2(mdo sde): dang /sems dang bas sangs rgyas la sdug par sems pa'i sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
285a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa'i
285a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i ro dang /sangs rgyas 'byung bas 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag par
285a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /kha dog mtha' yas pa la lta ba dang /ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
285a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /dad pa sna tshogs dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha
285a7(mdo sde): dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs tshad med pa la lta ba'i sems can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra thos pa'i sems
285b1(mdo sde): can rnams la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/de la sogs pa'i mtha' med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa'i rnam pa bye ba khrag
285b2(mdo sde): khrig brgya stong du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam
285b3(mdo sde): pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba las mi 'da' ste/'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la 'jig rten thams cad 'dzud de/yul las phyir mi ldog
285b4(mdo sde): cing thugs rje chen po gtong ba dang /sngon gyi smon lam la mi skyo ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad la rtog pa dang /sems
285b5(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la gnas shing dge ba rgyas pa tshad med pa brnyes te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
285b6(mdo sde): bdun pa'o//dgon pa na bzhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang /dben pa na bzhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom
285b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang /dben pa na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la bzhugs pa dang /ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas shing bzhugs
286a1(mdo sde): pa na gcig pur dgyes pa na bzhugs pa dang /sku bltar mi snang bar bzhugs pa dang /yo shos zab mo la gnas shing bzhugs pa
286a2(mdo sde): dang /dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs la bzhugs pa dang /sku'i spyod pa bltar med pa la bzhugs pa rgyun mi gcod pas kyang sangs rgyas
286a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang dang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul zhing gzhan gyis mi thub
286a4(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes dang /smon lom gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas lha yongs su 'chol zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas klu yongs su 'tshal
286a5(mdo sde): bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas nam mkha' lding yongs su tshol ba dang /sangs rgyas mi 'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang /
286a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang /sangs rgyas 'bar ba yongs su tshol ba dang /sangs rgyas myi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba
286a7(mdo sde): dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /sangs rgyas yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
286b1(mdo sde): la 'jug pa dang /chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas gcig gi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /sangs rgyas
286b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad po la 'jug pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang /smon lam gcig tu bsdus pa
286b3(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi spyod pa rnam par phye ba dang /spyod pa'i rim pa'i mthu dang /'jig rten gyi yul dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthu dang /
286b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /'jig rten gyi yul gyi mthu dang /yul mo yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzod pa mdzad pa dang /mtshan
286b5(mdo sde): mo dang /nyin par dang /zla ba phyed dang /lo gcig dang /bgrang bar gnas na bzhugs pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par gnas
286b6(mdo sde): na bzhugs pa'i bar gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
286b7(mdo sde): kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brgyad pa'o//khang pa lta bur gyur pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par sbyangs par gyur pa dang /sangs rgyas sems can thams
287a1(mdo sde): cad kyi bsam pa rnams dad par gyur pa dang /mos par gyur pa la sems 'jug cing sgrub par gyur pa dang /dbang po rnams 'dul bar gyur/
287a2(mdo sde): pa dang /sems can dang skye dgu thams cad la dang bar gyur pa dang /'gro ba thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskur
287a3(mdo sde): bar gyur pa dang /rtog pa la gnas shing ye shes snang bar gyur pa dang /gzhan dring la mi 'jog pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /sangs rgyas
287a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams mya ngan las 'das pa ston cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang /'jig rten mi rtog par ston pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi
287a5(mdo sde): snang bar mdzad pa rgyan mi gcod pa dang /byas pa'i dgos pa'i mtha' bsdus pa dang /ngo bo ma tshang ba med pas chos la 'jug pa snang bar byas pa dang /rtsa ba
287a6(mdo sde): bcad pa la srid pa'i mig snang bar byed pa dang /sems can rnams la skyo ba ston pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang mthun par byed pa dang //
287a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams la tshe'i mtha' ston pa dang /sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi mngon par mi dga' ba nye bar ston pa dang /sems can rnams ma
287b1(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par byed pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bltar mi snang ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing rnam par chud par
287b2(mdo sde): mdzad pa dang /'jig rten spro ba snang bar mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas sems rtsom pa dang ldan pa dang ldan par 'jog pa dang /su de bzhin gshegs pa rjes
287b3(mdo sde): su dAn zhing lta ba rnam par dag pa'i yongs su rtog pa'i sems can rnams la sems can rnams slong bar mdzad pa dang /dbang po skyo ba
287b4(mdo sde): klog cing yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang /skyo ba rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la byin
287b5(mdo sde): gyis rlob pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi brtsam par dgongs pa'i rkyen brnyes pa dang /lus kyis pa thams cad la de bzhin
287b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i skus sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang /'jig rten gyi sems can 'khrugs pa dang myos pa rnams sdom pa la 'jog par mdzad de/'di ni sangs
287b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dgu pa'o//kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das nas 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams
288a1(mdo sde): thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang /ngu ba dang /mya ngan smos pa dang /mchi ma byung bar 'gyur te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
288a2(mdo sde): rgyas zhes bya ba dang /thugs rje chen po zhes bya ba dang /ded dpon chen po zhes pa dang /thugs brtse ba zhes pa dang /lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang /
288a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa dang /skyabs su gyur pa/dpung gnyen du gyur pa/bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'das par gyur ces
288a4(mdo sde): pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar dga' ba zhes pa dang /rnam pa 'di lta bur smre sngags 'don/mya ngan slos shing sangs rgyas mthong ba
288a5(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa ste/de dang de dag tu sems can gyi bsam pa dang /yid la byed
288a6(mdo sde): par yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye gdung
288a7(mdo sde): dang ring bsrel byon gyis rlob ste/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
288b1(mdo sde): chen po dang /mi'i gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dul ba dang /ji ltar dang ba bzhin du sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/rang gi sku bor nas tshad mod grangs med pa
288b2(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob cing /gang 'di'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang ba'i dbang dang /sems
288b3(mdo sde): can rnams kyi dad pas mchod pa'i dbang dang /sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang dang /sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i dbang
288b4(mdo sde): dang /sems can rnams yongs su sbyangs pa'i dbang dang /sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang dang /sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs
288b5(mdo sde): pa'i dbang dang /sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par rtsom pa'i dbang dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi rgyan sna tshogs yul dang
288b6(mdo sde): ljongs sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams kyi dge pa'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i dbang dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bgos shing 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod rten du byas
288b7(mdo sde): shing yul dang phyogs der lha'i gnas sam/klu'i gnas sam/gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsi dang /lho/
289a1(mdo sde): 'phye chen po'i gnas dang /mi'i gnas dang /'bar ba'i gnas su sku gdung dang ring bsrol mchod par 'gyur/sku gdung dang /ring bsrel
289a2(mdo sde): dang /dbu sgra dang /sen mo'i mchod rten dang /sangs rgyas bzhugs par mchod rten brtsigs pa/'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas rjes su dran par
289a3(mdo sde): 'gyur/chos kyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur/dge 'dun la dad paso sor rnyed par 'gyur yul dang phyogs de dang der gnas shing rgyun mi chad par mchod par bsam
289a4(mdo sde): pas gnas nas/sbyin pa byin zhing bsod nams byed par 'gyur te/de dang de dag mtho ris kyi yongs su dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/rigs chen po so so
289a5(mdo sde): rnyed par 'gyur/longs spyod chen po dang /g.yog 'khor rnam par dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa so sor myong bar
289a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ngan par mi lhung ba'o nan tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/de dag sangs rgyas byung ba na gti mug med pas sgrub par 'gyur/dkar po'i chos
289a7(mdo sde): la gnas pas sor rdzogs par 'gyur/khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ji ltar thag pi la dad pa dang /sprin
289b1(mdo sde): lam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la shod byas pa gzo ba so sor rnyed par 'gyur te/phyir 'brang ba dang /gnas dang /man rna
289b2(mdo sde): dang /skyabs dang /dpung gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas kyang
289b3(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin gnas spyod ste/bsod nams yongs su mi gnas pa'i skyon gnas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du skye ba 'di lta bu'i rnam
289b4(mdo sde): pa mang por sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
289b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam
289b6(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlab ma gtogs par gzhan 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyi lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad
289b7(mdo sde): gzung bar mi nus/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas kyang 'jug par nus pa ma yin
290a1(mdo sde): no///'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa//bam po gsum pa//kye rgyal ba'i skyes sangs
290a2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo chos kyi dbang po'i chos mi gnyis par 'gro ba bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
290a3(mdo sde): 'das thams cad lung ston te/mi gnyis par 'gro ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi
290a4(mdo sde): sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs med bcu rdul yab brjod du med par gshegs pa mi gnyis pa dang /chos kyi don ma lus pa thams cad las rdzogs par
290a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas pa'i sku mi gnyis pa dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa
290a6(mdo sde): dang /'byung ba'i skad cig ma'i mtha'i ye shes mi gnyis shing thog ma'i mtha' dang /tha ma'i mtha' dang /dra ltar byung ba gnyis su med pa dang /dus gsum
290a7(mdo sde): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /sangs rgyas gcig gi zhing gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang /sangs rgyas gcig gi
290b1(mdo sde): gsung dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis su med pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams nAd kyi 'dul ba dang /rab tu phyogs pa dang /rnam par
290b2(mdo sde): rig pa gnyis su med pa dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi chos nyid dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gnyis su med pa dang /'dres pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang //
290b3(mdo sde): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis su med de/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas
290b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang po'i chos kyis mi gnyis par gshegs pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
290b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad la nan tan gyis gnas pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la gnas
290b6(mdo sde): shing ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas pa la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
290b7(mdo sde): ji ltar smon lam gyis 'byung ba la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can yongs su mi gtong zhing 'dul ba la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom
291a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ngo bo med pa la rab tu gnos pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don med pa ma yin pa dang /de bzhin
291a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams skal ba mnyam pa ma yin par gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu sems mnyam pa la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas
291a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma nyams pa'i dbang po la gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems chags pa med par spyod pa la gnas pa
291a4(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing mi 'jigs pa yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la gnas pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i
291a5(mdo sde): sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan la gnas pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas
291a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
291a7(mdo sde): cad kyi 'dres pa'i grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /da ltar byung ba
291b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /ngag thams cad kyi lam thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi 'jug pa
291b2(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo'i ye shes thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
291b3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsab chung ngu dang /'bring dang /chen po dang /sna tshogs rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /bsam pa tshad med pa
291b4(mdo sde): rgyun mi gcod pa'i mtshams kyi skad cig ma'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /chos thams cad rkyen dang 'dus pa tshogs
291b5(mdo sde): par khong du chud pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mthong bu thams cad mngon par mkhyen
291b6(mdo sde): pa dang /chos kyi dbyings dbye ba mig 'phrul mkhan gyis rnam par phye ba lhur thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ongs
291b7(mdo sde): rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po dang /stobs dang /
292a1(mdo sde): stobs chud med pa dang /skyabs kyi bdag nyid rdzo ba dang /brjod par dka' ba'i stobs dang /yongs su mnyams pa'i stobs dang /snying pa'i
292a2(mdo sde): stobs dang /mi phyed pa'i stobs dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang /sems can thams cad kyi mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang /
292a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal gyi chos bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dang /'tshe ba'i
292a4(mdo sde): dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis mi chod cing drug gis mi 'jigs pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'tshig pa'i me'i bskal pas mi 'tshig
292a5(mdo sde): pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'dzin pa'i chu'i phung po'i chus mi 'chi ba dang /bdud thams cad dang /bdud kyi sde thams cad dang /
292a6(mdo sde): lha thams cad kyi stobs dang /klu thams cad dang /gnod sbyin thams cad dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye
292a7(mdo sde): chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa'i stobs dang /sha za dang /'bar ba thams cad kyi stobs dang /sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmag gi stobaso/
292b1(mdo sde): kyis ma tshugs pa dang /ri rab ldan po'i ri dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i rgyur 'bebs pa dang /gzhan yang 'khor yug chen pa'i ri dang mnyam pa dang /gzhan yang snang
292b2(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i chur babs te/des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba
292b3(mdo sde): su'ang mi 'grel/bug tsha bar yang mi 'gyur bzhud pa dang /bzhengs pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /mnal ba'i spyod lam sdud pa'ang mi mnga' ste/yul grong dru bzhin
292b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ji tsam du bzhed pa kun tu de tsam du ma bab bo//sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la 'od gces par ma gyur/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
292b5(mdo sde): brlabs kyi sems can la'ang gtses par ma gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi 'khrugs pa lta ci smos te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu
292b6(mdo sde): chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos dang po'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhingad na chos thams cad kyi dbyings mchig ma lus pa thams
292b7(mdo sde): cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /re rab lhun po'i ri dang bcas/kho re khor yug dang /khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas/rgya mtsho'i ring
293a1(mdo sde): nags stug por bcas pa dang /snyoms can gnas pa'i gnas sna tshogs dang /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dag thams cad de dazhin
293a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu bcug ste tha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mtha' bzung na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs pa rA sems
293a3(mdo sde): can gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so//'jig rten gyi khams du ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gar bcug nas tha ma'i mtha'i
293a4(mdo sde): bskal par bzung ste/bzhengs pa dang /bzhud pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /mnal ba dang /bskal par gshegs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs lnga skad
293a5(mdo sde): cig kyang sdug bsngal du mi 'gyur/skyo ba mi mnga' ste/stobs dang mthu yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/spyod lamaM laM rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro//kye rgyal ba'i sras
293a6(mdo sde): 'di lta spyi dper ni nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin te/'bying ba ma yin/zhum pa ma yin/'phel
293a7(mdo sde): be ma yin/'gri ba ma yin/'byung ba ma yin/skye ba ma yin/rnam pa ma yin no//de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu 'jig
293b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kun 'dzin kyang de'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor ba'i sems skye ba gcig kyang mi mnga' ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spangs//
293b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i choso gnyis pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gom pa gcig gi spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
293b3(mdo sde): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu bya ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra'o//sangs rgyas d+d+hi ning brjod du med pa'i yong 'arjod du med pa'i rab tu phra
293b4(mdo sde): ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gom pas spyod do//du ma'i sems skye zhing 'jug pa de ltar gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam
293b5(mdo sde): pa'i bskal par gshegs te/'jig rten gyi khoms ma lus pa thams cad du sems bskyed pa bzhin du bskal par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams
293b6(mdo sde): cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gnas shing tshad med pa dang /khor yug chen po'i ri brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'gyur
293b7(mdo sde): pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa 'das shing ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'gag par 'gyur te/ji ltar be spu'i bu ga gcig
294a1(mdo sde): pa de ltar sku'i spu'i bu ga thams cad de sems can thams cad ji spyod pa ba spu'i bu gar gyur la/de ltar sems can thams cad lci bar gyur
294a2(mdo sde): la/sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo gcig gi rtse mos tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'dzin te/ji ltar sor mo gcig gi sa dang por
294a3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de ltar sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mos 'dzin kyang de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsnyel ba'ang mi mnga'/thugs la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/sdug
294a4(mdo sde): bsngal gyi reg pa tshor ro snyam pa'i sems phra rab gcig tsamo yang mi skye'o//de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams re rer gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /nam mkha'
294a5(mdo sde): la gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /rgya mo'i phyogs thams cad du gshogs shing 'jug pa dang /de ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad dang /
294a6(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar 'jug pa dang /sgo'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi khams thams cad du 'jug pa dang /skra rtse re ri'i mtha' tshad kyi grangs kyi nam mkha'i
294a7(mdo sde): khams ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gsol ba'i skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi nam mkha'i khams su 'jug pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam thog
294b1(mdo sde): du na pa nga du sa dang zlogasan skyems na sa /na du na nga/dung /
294b2(mdo sde): sa sa kya pa sa pa mas zin pa'i/ N+Di das sa rgyas r+b+he
294b3(mdo sde): sa drug dang meng pa zla la dang marnas pa'i glu da du ma m+b+ha naNA~M kA la spangs rgyas ya du
294b4(mdo sde): rje ra b+hU ba'i sa 'i ga n+de bu smras sa sa ning ng+ge du ma pa Sh+T+ri/ du m+bu pa'i rlub tu zla rje
294b5(mdo sde): sa kyi yan la ni /skye dang /sung 'dun /kyi bying sa ma khris pa thams ci rjes mas ldan hU~M khamam lag bar byed bye da/
294b6(mdo sde): slod du/ / dang de nga ngas sa me pa'i yang du byud pa'i rab cu zla 'i nyas pa'i 'di sa ma
294b7(mdo sde): ngas rgyas kyi dang brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa'i rab tu bre ze'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos sbyin pa'i rjes su rjod la
295a1(mdo sde): re ro la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa rnams kyi brjod pa
295a2(mdo sde): 'gro ste/ji ltar gang gis phyir chos ston pa de ltar chos thams cad ston te/de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i
295a3(mdo sde): rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams yongs
295a4(mdo sde): su zad nas/yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston te/gzhung 'dis 'jig rten
295a5(mdo sde): gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston la/gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam
295a6(mdo sde): pa'i bskal pa zad pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa zad cing 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de lta ma yin
295a7(mdo sde): te/chos thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'jug cing chos thams cad shes rab kyi ston te/brda sprod cing the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor
295b1(mdo sde): lo sor ba dang /cho sna thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /chags pa med pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /sems can mtha' yas
295b2(mdo sde): par tshim par byed pa'i 'dul ba'i rkyen gyi chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /
295b3(mdo sde): ye shes kyi nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad la ye shes kyi sgron ma chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor
295b4(mdo sde): byA dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rkyen gyis chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig gi sku'i byin gyis brlabs kyis
295b5(mdo sde): rjes kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin chen po'ang dpe thams cad kyis dper bya ba ma yin te/de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang //nam mkha'i khams
295b6(mdo sde): kyi mthar skra'i rtse mo'i mtha' nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhong brjod du med pa'i yung brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i
295b7(mdo sde): rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang /sems kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa dang /ji srid du mtha' ma'i bskal par
296a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sgra rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sU ri ro bA de skad de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun tu/
296a2(mdo sde): brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la/de snyed de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyings kyi yan lag dang /gsung dang /sku dang /gsung
296a3(mdo sde): 'jug ste/chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang /dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /sgra dang /gsung re res de snyed de
296a4(mdo sde): snyed kyi mdo sde rnams 'chad de/mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa'i
296a5(mdo sde): brjod pa 'gro ste/chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad
296a6(mdo sde): la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzer po'ang med/nyams pa'ang med/zad pa'adra med/dmas pa'ang med de/de ltar tha ma'i mthar
296a7(mdo sde): bskal pa'i bar du gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i rlobs kyi dpal la gnas
296b1(mdo sde): pa'i chos lnga pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u'i rgyun dang ldan zhing /rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung
296b2(mdo sde): du gshegs pa rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud sdig can gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa/mchog tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs
296b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs pa'i gzugs/mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul par byed do//byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos
296b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/'gro ba thams cad 'jom pas/'jig
296b5(mdo sde): rten thams cad 'jig pa'o//de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te/gzigs nas mi bsnyengs/bag mi tsha//
296b6(mdo sde): spu 'ga' yang mi g.yo//gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa'ang mi mnga'/sems phra mo'ang mI mnga' bar gnas te mi g.yo//mi skyod mi 'gyur
296b7(mdo sde): rnam par mi rtog/shin tu rab tu zhi/bsnyengs shing ba spu lang ba shin tu mi mnga'/'dong ba dang khong khro ba shin tu mi mnga'/sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po
297a1(mdo sde): chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong ba/dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas pa/brag mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po thugs
297a2(mdo sde): mi dngangs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang /bdud kyi sde mang po sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon
297a3(mdo sde): cing bzung nas zil gyis gnon/bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste/de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul gsum dang de bzhin gshegs
297a4(mdo sde): pas 'dul ba bstan te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
297a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyis khams
297a6(mdo sde): ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
297a7(mdo sde): sgra di ri la thogs pa med de/ri rab lhun po la mi thogs rin po che'i ri la ma yin/khor yug dang khor yug chen po la ma yin/lha'i gnas lam yin/
297b1(mdo sde): gnas la ma yin/gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin/dri za'i gnas la ma yin/lha ma yin gyi gnas la ma yin/nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin/mi 'am
297b2(mdo sde): ci'i gnas la ma yin/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas la lta zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro//gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na'ang mi chags
297b3(mdo sde): te/'jig rten srid pa'i khams thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa dri la de bzhin gi shegs pas brjod pa'i
297b4(mdo sde): sgras sgrib par 'gyur te/ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna bas rnam par rig ste/gang 'di rna bas rnam par rig cing rnam par rig pa'i tshig dang 'byed pa
297b5(mdo sde): nyams par mi 'gyur to/de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra/lham me/lhan ne/lhang nge'o//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
297b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs brjod du med pa'i yang
297b7(mdo sde): brjod du med pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pas chags pa med/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs
298a1(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan dang zhing rnyog pa med pa dang bdag gi med pa'i chos thams cad la gnas pa/nang dang phyi dang ldan pa ma yin/ma skyes pa
298a2(mdo sde): la brtsam pa thams cad rnam par phye ba/zhi ba/gnas med pa/rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa/ngo bo thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i 'du sheso la
298a3(mdo sde): gnas pa 'gag pa/rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/shin tu yongs su dag pa/rtsom pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i
298a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba/yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral zhing dag pa/chos kyi dbyings ston pa'i mthar song ba/chos kyi dbyings
298a5(mdo sde): kun tu mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba/'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang /tshad dang tshad med pa dang /'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas dang /mngon par
298a6(mdo sde): smra ba thams cad 'grogs pa dag gis lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i yul mi zad cing chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing 'jug pa
298a7(mdo sde): dang /stobs bcu'i rgyan dang chos thams cad rnam par dag pa/thabs mkhas pa la zhugs las chos sna tshogs dang /chos du ma dang /chos thams cad
298b1(mdo sde): dang /ston pa 'gal ba med pa/dus gsum du dbyer med pa/chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang /nom thams cadro dam/chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i da
298b2(mdo sde): gipha rol tu song ba/chos thams cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod kyi khyad par chos thams cad kyi tshul dran zhing kun nas gti mug pa zhing thams cad du 'gro
298b3(mdo sde): ba'i dbang dang /rgya mo'i phyogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo med bcu rdul yo ba la mi gnas pa/brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba/ye shes kyi lta ba chos ma lus
298b4(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa/zag pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag pa med pa/sems rnam par grol ba/shes rab rnam par grol ba/shin tu rnam par grol
298b5(mdo sde): bayang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa/rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa/dus gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa/sems
298b6(mdo sde): kyi skad cig ma la dus gsum gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad ma lus par rab tu shes pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi
298b7(mdo sde): dpal la gnas pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku dang lus gcig tu 'dus pa/sangs rgyas thams cad
299a1(mdo sde): kyi sgyu dang yul chad mod pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa/'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dzin dA'i sku/khams gsum gyis
299a2(mdo sde): mi gos pa'i sku/rkyen gyi sku rnam par rig cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la byin gyi brlabs kyi su'i tsho gas ston pa/mi bden mi brdzun zhing mnyam pa
299a3(mdo sde): nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku/'ong ba dang /'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi sku 'dus pa/'dus mo byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku/mtshan nyid gcig dang /mtshan
299a4(mdo sde): nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku/yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku/tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku/sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par sprul
299a5(mdo sde): pa'i sku/kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sku/sku thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/sku sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa/chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba/mtha' yas
299a6(mdo sde): par snang ba'i ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku/bya ba sna tshogs med pa/chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i sku/sems can gyi khams ma
299a7(mdo sde): lus pa thams cad la khyab par gsal ba'i sku 'dus pa mi g.yo mi sems pa'i sku rnam par dag pa/med pa dang mod pa ma yin pa dang /tshul dang tshul ma yin
299b1(mdo sde): pas phye ba'i sku/sems can thams cad kyi dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing 'dul ba'i sku/'gags pa dang /'grags pa ma yin pa 'dul ba la gzigs pa'i
299b2(mdo sde): yon tan dkon mchog thams cad byung ba bsgreng ba'i sku/chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang de bzhin nyid bsdus pa'i sku/rang bzhin gyis shin tu zhi ba dang //
299b3(mdo sde): bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha'i sku thogs pa med pa'i chos thams cad las skyes pa'i sku/thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/chos kyi dbyings dag pa/'jig rten thams cad
299b4(mdo sde): du rnam par bye ba'i sku/brtsam pa las mi ldog pa/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/kun 'brang ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste/
299b5(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus pa dgu pa'o//gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom
299b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang /mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chud pa de bzhin gshegs po thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/spyod
299b7(mdo sde): pa las mngon par byung ba/smon lam gyi khyad par dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
300a1(mdo sde): napa'i ye shes bya ba sna tshogs med de'i sangs nas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad lus byung ba/byang chub sems
300a2(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa byams cad kyi chog shes pa/smon lam chen po dang /spyod pa'i chung ba/spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dka' ngam
300a3(mdo sde): sbyin pa/spyod pa'i stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa rnams cad las byung zhing sprad pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ba
300a4(mdo sde): po spyad pa mau 'bri bar spyod pa/sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin tshad myed pa thams cad la gnas pa/spyod yul mtha' yas pa lam thams cad ston pa
300a5(mdo sde): lam ma yin pa'i yul dang lam thams cad la zhugs pa/ye shes mchog gi stobs kyi chog shes pa/'dzem pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo 'bebs pa/
300a6(mdo sde): dge ba 'dri ba dang /mi 'dri ba dang /btsun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye shes mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes shin tu yongs su dag pa lus dang /
300a7(mdo sde): dang /yid kyi spyod pa gsum yongs su dag pa/sangs rgyas kyi sgom rnyed pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
300b1(mdo sde): rigs dang /sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa/thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa tshad med par ston par gnas pa/rtsa ba med cing
300b2(mdo sde): mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ye shes 'jog rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba/'gro ba ma lus pa
300b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthong ba dang /phra ba ma lus pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i ye shes/dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul
300b4(mdo sde): dang phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa/'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam parla dag pa dang /'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang /ye shes dang /
300b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan zhing /phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku/grangs
300b6(mdo sde): la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi chos yi ge med par rab tu rtog pa/brjod du med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bye ba dang /yi ge thams cad brjod du med par shes
300b7(mdo sde): par byed/ye shes kyi dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim pa/sems skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis
301a1(mdo sde): ts+tshaH/nas rnams cad khong du chud pa'i mi skyes de ltar 'os pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /ngo sbyar sgyu mchod so nas gtong bar rab tu
301a2(mdo sde): yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa/'jig rten gyi yul khams mA lus pa thams cad dang /'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad
301a3(mdo sde): dang /sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /dus gsum gyi sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la chags pa med pa'i
301a4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa ma lu sngo pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul la 'jug cing thams cad 'dul ba'i yul ma lus pa thams ca
301a5(mdo sde): kyi rjes su song ba/rnam par dag par sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi mtshams su thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing yul thams cad lngas mngon par sangs rgyas pa/sems
301a6(mdo sde): can gyi sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad rtogs pa/dus gsum gyis phye ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye shes kyi rjes su sangs
301a7(mdo sde): rgyas shing mtshams ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa/sems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas po dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mthar
301b1(mdo sde): med pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang /dus gsum thams cad du 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dang /sangs rgyas khyu mchog thams cad
301b2(mdo sde): du 'gro ba dang /khong du chud pa ma lus pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang /de dag ma lus pa thams cad las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnam par chud pa
301b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi gtong ba/sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs te/de na sangs rgyas
301b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mtha' dang dpung med par gnas pa/sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi sku mtha' dang dpung med par gnas pa/sems chags pa med par gnas pa
301b5(mdo sde): mtha' dang dpung med pa'i snying rje chen po sbyor ba la gnas pa/dus thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par gnas pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
301b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal dang /ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i chos bcu pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
301b7(mdo sde): rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bcu ste/sems can thams cad dang /'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung
302a1(mdo sde): ba'i nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad mi zin pa'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
302a2(mdo sde): rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshe ji tsam par dga' ldan na bzhugs shing tshe zad nas 'phro bar
302a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zla ba bcur bzhugs pa'i tshe ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'byung zhing
302a4(mdo sde): 'byung bar bzhed pa'i thugs kyis bzhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
302a5(mdo sde): cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig ma gcig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
302a6(mdo sde): kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas bzhugs shing /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sprul par ston pa
302a7(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing bzhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
302b1(mdo sde): 'das rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston te brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du sangs/
302b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mdzad pa la bzhugs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang //
302b3(mdo sde): sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das skad cig la sems can thams cad kyis dri ba dris pa rnams skad cig la brda sprod cing bzhugs te/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs
302b4(mdo sde): rgya/bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs
302b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can ngan par 'gro ba'i sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu de dag myur du
302b6(mdo sde): zlog pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par lhag par 'gro ba dang /sangs
302b7(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
303a1(mdo sde): sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du mtho ris su skyo ba rnam par dag pa so sor thob par mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
303a2(mdo sde): sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du nem nur dang /yid gnyis 'joms par nye bar gshegs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu
303a3(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i sems can gzigs ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa'i phyir myur du gshegs shing sems rgya chen po la dad pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis 'dul
303a4(mdo sde): ba'i 'gro ba byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
303a5(mdo sde): ga sha' mar zhugs pa gzigs ma thag tu dmigs par lta ba dang /ge sha' mar 'jug pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems
303a6(mdo sde): can rnams gzigs ma thag tu myur du sems can rnams kyi dbang po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dag par mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan
303a7(mdo sde): 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsgribs pa thams cad zad par mdzad du gshegs pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
303b1(mdo sde): sems can gzigs ma bag tu myur du snang ba so sor rnyed cing zhum pa med de/mi 'jigs pa la spobs pa rtsom par mdzad pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs
303b2(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin du gzigs pa'i chos bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs
303b3(mdo sde): pa rnam par dag pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/
303b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan
303b5(mdo sde): 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
303b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsgribs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi tshangs par spyod pa dang /byang chub sems
303b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub po'i sgo'ang rjes su
304a1(mdo sde): dgongs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi lus tshad med mtha' yas pa'ang rjes su
304a2(mdo sde): dgongs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /rnam par sprul pa tshad med mtha' yas pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
304a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'di rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi stobs bcu dang ma 'jigs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa
304a4(mdo sde): rnams yin te/kyi rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs
304a5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu ste//b+ha n+ta ga zhen/'di lta ste/chos thams cad kyi dbying sa ma lus pa thams cad dang /dus gsum gyi sems can
304a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems sku chags dang sems gcig gi spyod pa dang /rnam par gal ba ldog pas mos gi sgyud cig ma la mkhyen pa dang /sa~M sa rgyun ma lus
304a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dus gsus kun gyi las rnams dang /sa dang ldan pa sna chags dang /rnam pa dang /rim pa dang /la sa
304b1(mdo sde): ci'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /sems can gyi ris sna tshogs dang /sems
304b2(mdo sde): can gyi ris gcig dang /sems can mu lus pa thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su bstan pa'i tshe
304b3(mdo sde): 'phrul dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /rgya mo'i phyogs kyi ris thams
304b4(mdo sde): cad dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis mtshan mar bzung ba dang /sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par
304b5(mdo sde): phye ba mkhyen pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /dad pa ji lta ba dang /'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin
304b6(mdo sde): du skad cig la tshad med pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /rnam par rig pa'i byin gyis brlabs mkhyen pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi
304b7(mdo sde): sems can pha rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad 'dzin pa med pas sangs rgyas nas
305a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'doms shing rjes su bstan pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ston par mkhyen pa
305a2(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro zhing sems kyi skad cig ma la de dang de dag tu 'gro ba'i nan ton
305a3(mdo sde): mkhyen pa dang /sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi phyogs thams cad la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
305a4(mdo sde): gtong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang /sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du
305a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku la lta ba dang /gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas pa ston pa mkhyen pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
305a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
305a7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs
305b1(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa
305b2(mdo sde): dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi
305b3(mdo sde): rim pa bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /dus gsum thams
305b4(mdo sde): cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dras chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med
305b5(mdo sde): bcu rdul yab thams cad kyi rgya mo thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rigs dang zhing thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing zhing mi zad pa'i mthar gyur par
305b6(mdo sde): gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig
305b7(mdo sde): la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig pa ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang lus
306a1(mdo sde): drang ngag dang /sems yongs su gsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing /sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas mdzod
306a2(mdo sde): du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang /chos thams cad kyi ngo
306a3(mdo sde): ba nyid la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dod chags dang bral po'i mthar gyur pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /'jig
306a4(mdo sde): rten thams cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi
306a5(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten las 'das pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la mtha' yas pa'i rkyen gyi rjes su song ba ste/sangs
306a6(mdo sde): rgyas la lta ba mi gcod cing sems can sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la lta bar mdzad pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
306a7(mdo sde): cad bsgrub pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing /skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rig nas/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mtha'
306b1(mdo sde): yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste/kye rgyal ba'i sgras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
306b2(mdo sde): rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o//kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste/bcu
306b3(mdo sde): gang zhe na/rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la badz+rod
306b4(mdo sde): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
306b5(mdo sde): sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa
306b6(mdo sde): rnam par thar pa dang /rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /
306b7(mdo sde): rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung zhing rje ba rnam par thar pa dang /rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs
307a1(mdo sde): pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /rab tu phra
307a2(mdo sde): ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par ni pa dang /rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig
307a3(mdo sde): la 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste//kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di sangs rgyas bcom

307a5(mdo sde): 'u nyi shu dag pa rdzogs so///rgya gagur skad du/Ar+ya ba kur byA kA raNAnA ma~M ma hA yAn sUhA//da skad du/'phags
307a6(mdo sde): kyis nga rgyun pa zhes bya ga pa rten po'i mang//sangs kyis dang lo//'dri
307a7(mdo sde): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chel mgon med kyis sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar/da gi
307b1(mdo sde): nyis brgya lnga bcu'o dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stod mang pos yongs su bskor zhing mdun
307b2(mdo sde): gyis bltas te chos ston to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' sprul pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la
307b3(mdo sde): sor brtag pa nyid kyis bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la zhe sa dang bcas pas
307b4(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dra sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi/gang gi tshe ngasu dra
307b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad mthong nas ut+pal lnga phul ba de'i 'og tu rjes bdag med pa nyid la mos par gyur cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir
307b6(mdo sde): ro//kun dga' bo de bas na khyod dge ba'i rtsa bas tshig shes pAr mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i
307b7(mdo sde): yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po ma skyes dgra zhes bya ba gzugs
308a1(mdo sde): bzang ba/mdzes pa/bltan sdug pa/kha dag bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/kun dga' ba rgyal po ma skyes dgra de la grung
308a2(mdo sde): khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/thams cad kyang bkra ba/bltan sdug po/skyed mos tshal phrin sum tshogs pa/rdzing bu phun sum tshogs pa/me tog phun
308a3(mdo sde): sum chags bya/'bras bu phun sum tshugs pa/bde bla ma leg pa/nyams dga' ba/'byor pa/d+h+yas pa/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba sha sta ga /
308a4(mdo sde): kun dga' bo ma skyes dgra de la rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod do/rgyal po ma skyes dgrod de na gnas so//de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mdun nA
308a5(mdo sde): 'don bram ze gling ldan zhes bya ba snying du sdug cing mthong na mi mthun pa med pa dang ldan pa zhig yod do//kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra rigs zo zhi'i ma
308a6(mdo sde): rnams cad smras nas byem ze gling ldan bgug ste/cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed byin te 'di skad ces kyang smras so//bram ze khyod rang gi yul du song ste/rgya
308a7(mdo sde): po'i pho brang byos la ming yang pad+ma cen du thogs shig/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po klong ldan gyi rang gi yul du rgyal po'i pho brang byos te/ming yang pad+ma can du
308b1(mdo sde): btags so//kun dga' ba de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na dzam+bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po gnyis rgyal skyid byed de/gcig ni ma skyes dgra bo//gcig shos ni gling ldan no//kun/
308b2(mdo sde): dka' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa khang bzang kyi yang thog na bde bar nyal zhing 'dug go/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad dga' ldan gyi
308b3(mdo sde): gnas nas shi 'phos nas glang po che'i phrug gu thal kar du bsgyur te/'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing me'i glo g.yas por zhugs par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe btsun mo
308b4(mdo sde): dam pa des rgyal po gling ldan la skabs 'dri smras so//kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis bram ze mtshan mkhan dang /ltas mkhan dang /mchod sbyin mkhan
308b5(mdo sde): rnams bsdus te rmi lam gyis skabs 'di bsnyad pa dang /bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/khyod
308b6(mdo sde): kye sras sems can rin po che zhig bltam par 'gyur ro//kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan rmi lam bstan pa 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te
308b7(mdo sde): rab tu dga' nas/dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/rgyal po gling ldan de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/'di lta ste/zas 'dod pa
309a1(mdo sde): rnams ldan das/snyom 'dod pa rnams lan skom/bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams lan zhon pa/spros dang /phreng brgya dang /drug pa dang /
309a2(mdo sde): gnas ma la rung ba kho na ma tho ba med pa dang /gang ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad byin no//kun dga' bo de nas zla ba bcu 'das pa dang /rgyal po gling ldan gyi zla
309a3(mdo sde): gzugs bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta na sdug pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig bcas te/bcas ma thag tu lus las 'di lta bu'i 'od
309a4(mdo sde): byung ste/'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin rang gi gnas nas mi
309a5(mdo sde): snang bar gyur nas gzhon nu gang ni ba der song ste phyin nas gzhon nu de la shis par brjod pa byas te/'di skad ces kyang smras so//'di btsas ma thag tu lus
309a6(mdo sde): las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming mAr me mdzad du btags/
309a7(mdo sde): so//de nas gzhon nu'i ming mar me mdzad mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur to//kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu
309b1(mdo sde): dga' nas/dga' bu dang yid bde ba skyes te/yang de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/'di lta ste/zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/rnam/
309b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/bzhon po 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/spos dang /phreng ba rgyu dang /byug pa dang /gnas mal rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /gang
309b3(mdo sde): ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad byin no//kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad bkug ste/cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed
309b4(mdo sde): byin te 'di skad ces kyang smras so//gzhon nu khyod song la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug cing rdzis shig/dga' bar gyis shig/dgra' mgur spyod cig/kun
309b5(mdo sde): dga' bo de nas re zhig na rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song na sa bzhon pa chen po la bzhon te/bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas
309b6(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag gcig gis bdag cag nyid rgas shing 'khogs pa dang /nad kyis btab pa dang /
309b7(mdo sde): shi ba'ang bstan te dge sbyong zhig kyang der 'ardeg pa dang /rgyal bu gzhon nu mer me mdzad kyis mthong nas kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so//kyai kha lo sgyur
310a1(mdo sde): ba rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba 'di dag ci yin/kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgas pa zhes bgyi ba dang /na ba zhes bgyi ba dang //
310a2(mdo sde): ba zhes bgyi ba lags te gzhon nu ji srid du chos nyid gdags pa mchis pa de srid du rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba'i chos rnams mchis te gzhon nu/gzhon nu
310a3(mdo sde): khyod dang ngo skol yang de lta bu legs te/'khor bA na gnas pa kho na lags so//gzhon nus smras pa/khya lo sgyur ba mgo bregs te ngur smrig gyon la zhi zhing
310a4(mdo sde): nyo bar zhi ba gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba 'di su zhig/kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/gzhon nu 'di ni dge slong ste/sdig pa thams cad spangs pa thar pa la
310a5(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba'i 'du shes skyes nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba lags so//gzhon nus smras pa/kha lo sgyur ba legs so legs so//
310a6(mdo sde): dge slong 'di'i lam 'di ni 'dod pa yin no//zhes nas phyir log ste khyim du song ngo //kun dga' bo de nas re zhig na rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad yang skyed mos tshal
310a7(mdo sde): gyi gnas su song ngo //de skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /de na sangs rgyas brgya stong mang pos bsten pa'i byang chub kyi snying po mthong ngo //kun dga' bo
310b1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad kyis byang chub kyi snying po de mthong nas skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs thams cad ha cang thag mi ring bar bor nas byang chub kyi snying po///
310b2(mdo sde): pab la dor song ste phyin nas/des byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba dang /lan gsum skor ba byas nas byang chub kyi snying po der skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go//byang chub
310b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' mar me mdzad 'dug mo thag tu de nas de'i tshe de nyid kyi mtshan mo'i skya reng dang po shor ba'i dus na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
310b4(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
310b5(mdo sde): ma thag tu de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/'od nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe
310b6(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar ma mdzad ga la ba der
310b7(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas sgra 'di skad ces kyang bsgrags so//kye ma'o//
311a1(mdo sde): na gshegs pa mar mo mdzad 'di 'jog rten du byung /'di ltar sa 'jog rten /khams thams 'do snang bas khyab par
311a2(mdo sde): mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzud lo lde bcu'i bar du byeng chub kyi snying po de ni bzhugs kyang tha sems can gcig tsam+bi yang blta ba
311a3(mdo sde): dang /phyag bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyal po gling ldan rgyu rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams bde ba
311a4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i phyir blta ba dang /phyag bye ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro'o//kun dge' bod nas de bzhin gshegs pa mer me mdzad
311a5(mdo sde): 'di snyam du dgongs te/rgyal po gling ljon gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams bde ba dang ldan pas ha cang bag med par gyur gyi/ngas de rnams cung
311a6(mdo sde): zhig yid byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis rdo
311a7(mdo sde): tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mengon par 'du mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po
311b1(mdo sde): gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyi nang du bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa skye bo dang mi mang pos gang la/mi de dag kyang lhag par mdzes
311b2(mdo sde): pa/lhag par blta na sdug pa/rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa drag cig mngon par sprul to//de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams bai DUr+ya
311b3(mdo sde): las byas pa'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis spa grong bar ni gyur na gang yang skyo bar ni ma gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
311b4(mdo sde): pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mAr me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams ha cang bgra med
311b5(mdo sde): pa dang ldan par gyur pa ngas yang cung zhig skyo ba bskyed par bya gor ma chag snyam mo//de nas de bzhin gshegasra pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
311b6(mdo sde): rgyas mar me mdzad kyis yang 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon por 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du
311b7(mdo sde): mdzad pas bai DUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po de la me chen po 'bar bar byin gyis brlabs so//byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu de la me 'bar bar gyur to//de nas
312a1(mdo sde): de'i tshe sems can de dag dang klong khyer chen po de yongs su zad cing mthar thug pa dang rtog par gyur nas sems can de dag kyang tshul mo yin pa ma
312a2(mdo sde): bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//kun dga' bo de nos rgyal po gleng ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyis bye DUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer zin pa
312a3(mdo sde): rguchud par mthong nas dang nges skrag par gyur cing skyo bar gyur nas spu zing zhes byed de/de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur to//gang gi phyir grong khyer de yongs su
312a4(mdo sde): zad cing mthar thug pa dang zhig par gyur pa la so na ring po me thogs par bdog cag kyang de lta bu'i mi rtag pa'i gnas skabs su 'gyuraro na su zhig bdag cag gi
312a5(mdo sde): skyabs su 'gyur snyam mo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/rgyal
312a6(mdo sde): gleng ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi 'di rnams yongs su smin pas ngas chos bstan pa kun shes par nus shing skal ba dang ldan pa dang mthu yid par
312a7(mdo sde): gyur te snyam mo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis mi de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis byang chub kyi snying
312b1(mdo sde): bo de nas bzhengs te/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang thabs cig tu rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang gul ba der gshegs so//kun dga'
312b2(mdo sde): bode bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad byon ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis chos bstan pa dang po'i tshe srog chags nyi khri rab tu phyung ste/
312b3(mdo sde): ded dag thams cad len pa med par zag po rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//chos bstan pa gnyis pa'i tshe srog chags sum khri rab tu phyung ste/de dag thams cad
312b4(mdo sde): kyang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//chos bstan pa gsum pa'i tshe srog chags bzhi khri rab tu phyung ste/de dag thams cad kyang chos
312b5(mdo sde): rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/chos bstun pa bzhi pa'i tshe srog tshugs lnga khri rab tu phyung ste/dri dag thams cad kyang len pa
312b6(mdo sde): med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dge
312b7(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun mang pos yongs su bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to//kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po gling ldan gyi bu zhig skyes
313a1(mdo sde): nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//zhes thos nas de la pho nya btang ste/'di ltar/
313a2(mdo sde): bdag kyang mchod par tshal ni bdag gi thang du gshegs par gsol zhes spring ngo //de nas pho nya des rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi
313a3(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba dang /rgyal po gling ldan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phrin de skad smras so//de nas rgyal po gling ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
313a4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mer me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig
313a5(mdo sde): tu 'dug nas skabs de gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod snying las chung ngur gyis la slar song zhig/nga ni rgyal
313a6(mdo sde): po'i pho brang pad+ma can du gshegs so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dge slong gi dge 'dun
313a7(mdo sde): dang /byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang //
313b1(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /rgyal po gling ldan yang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /rgyal po'i tshogs mang po dang /rgyal
313b2(mdo sde): po'i rnam par sprul po chen po dang /rgyal po'i bdog pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /rgyal po'i rnam par rtse ba chen po dang chus te yongs su bskor
313b3(mdo sde): cing mdun gyis bltas te thubs cig tu gshegs so//kun dga' bo de nas dri bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brad pad+ma can ga la ba der
313b4(mdo sde): gshegs so//de'i tshe na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bstan bcos dang /rig byed dang /
313b5(mdo sde): gsang sngags thams cad slob tu 'jug go/de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi nang na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya ba gzhon nu dar la bab pa/gzugs
313b6(mdo sde): bzang ba/mdzes pa/blta ni sdug pa/kha dog bzang po rgyas po mchog dang ldan pa/gsang sngags dang bstan bcos dang /cho ga shes pa ji snyed pa thams cad la mkhas
313b7(mdo sde): pa zhig yod do//kun dga' bo de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bas mkhan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so//kye mkhan po bdag
314a1(mdo sde): rgod dang / dang / sa dang /la por dang /rgyal po'i blo la khor nams su//mkhan pa smra smras pa/sgyum
314a2(mdo sde): smye'u bdag cag bram 'i rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/glang gis bstan bces dang /rig byed drung /gsung sngags thams cad longs pa des mkhan po la
314a3(mdo sde): bong lnga brgya dang rasti zung gcig dang /'khar ba dang /ril ba rnams sbyin dgos so//bram ze'i khye'u sbyin gyi sku skyes pa mkhan po bdag lnga pags pa dang /

314a5(mdo sde): khye'u sprin rim gyis ri'i rgyal po gangs las babs nas grong dang grong khyer dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du zhugs so//

314a7(mdo sde): mdzes pa/bldan sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de'i phyir nyi ba re re zhing bram ze bani khri la ben smyon par byed cing /dengs

315a3(mdo sde): 'dug gis stan 'di las longs shig/de nas bram ze dum bu byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze'i khye'u nga stan 'di las ma bslang zhig dang /khro bos

315a6(mdo sde): du skyes pa'i skyo ba thams cad du sbyin pa'i bar chod bya'o zhes dam btsas so//de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin seng ge'i khri de la 'dug go/de nas bram zes
315a7(mdo sde): gi bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/gser gyi 'khar ba dang ril pa dang ras zung cig dang /zong lnga brgya khyed nas bram
315b1(mdo sde): za' khye'u ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/bram ze'i khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu 'di dag long zhig/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis zong lnga

315b3(mdo sde): spre'u dang 'dra ste/rgod pa 'phyar ba dge ba'i bar chad byed pa yin la/khro bo ni dgon pa dang rab tu dben pa rnams na gnas pa 'di kho bo la mi dgos so//rigs kyi
315b4(mdo sde): bu bdag la snying brtse ba'i phyir long zhig/de ma blangs so de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin mchong sprin gyi gnas de nas song ste ri'i rgyal po gangs ga la ba de ra song ngo //
315b5(mdo sde): de nas bram ze sa gra bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan la smras pa/bu mo khyod khyim thabs kyi phyir ci'i phyir mi 'gro/des de'i tshig mnyan te mnyan nas ri'i rgyal
315b6(mdo sde): po gang sde ga la ba der logs su 'phags so//de'i tshe nr-i gnas gtsang mo'i ros kyi lha'i bu zhig gis r-i'i rgyal po gangs su 'gro ba'i lam mi snang bar byas nas
315b7(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can du gang nas 'gro ba'i lam bstan cing /gang du bram ze'i khye'u sprin dri 'debs pa der bu mo bzang len ldan yang dgongs 'debs so//de
316a1(mdo sde): nas bram ze'i khye'u des rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can dar gyi lnga ldi bres pa/mo tog bkram pa/bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod da dA ra ba mthong nas des
316a2(mdo sde): dris pa/grong khyer chen po 'di ci'i rgyus mngon par brgyan par gyur de nas rgyal po'i pho brang pad+ma can gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u
