371a5(mdo sde): des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med//byams dang thugs rdza phun sum tshogs//de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do//gang gis bla med 'khor lo yi//chos kyi 'khor lo rab
371a6(mdo sde): skor zhing //zhing rnams bye ba rnams rig la//bdag med rab tu bstan mdzad cing //gang gis sangs rgyas zhing stong dang //brgya dang khrag khrig snyed rnams dang //ljags
371a7(mdo sde): kyis rab tu khyab mdzad pa//de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do//zhing rnams bye ba stong phrag ni//gang+gA'i bye ma sred dag tu//dbyangs kyis spro bar mdzad pas na//

372a1(mdo sde): na ni//bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang //gang phyir sangs rgyas de don brjod//de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do//de nas bu mo zla mchog dga' zhing mgu
372a2(mdo sde): lnga yi rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas yongs su sgom par gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
372a3(mdo sde): phyir tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/gang gi yon tan de 'dra ba'i//rdzogs sangs de ltar rnga thog gam//chos 'di thos na mkhas pa ni//su zhig skad 'ga'ang khyim la dgal
372a4(mdo sde): rdo srid bde gshegs ma mthong bar//bdag ni rmugs dang gnyid spong zhing //zas dang snyom yang mi 'tshal la//bstan la'ang mchis par mi bgyid do//bdag gis

372a6(mdo sde): 'gyur lags grang //bskal pa stong phrag bya bar 'jog rten na//skyes bu mchog rnams mthong ba shin tu dkon//dgra bcom de'i mtshan dang thos bdag gi ni//rnyed pa
372a7(mdo sde): legs brnyed bdag gis rgyal ba blta//sprul pa de yis de la di skad smras//sems can mchog de tshal chen nang na bzhugs//de yi dge 'dun stong phrag brgyad po dag
372b1(mdo sde): dnga' bo sdig med mi gtsang spangs pa yin//de dag re re'ang lag pa sa gcig gis//bskal pa mang por stong gsum zhing 'dag cing //ting 'dzin mngon shes spobs pa rab
372b2(mdo sde): thob la//thos pa mi 'khrug rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin//de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis//bye ba dpag med zhing du skad 'gas 'dong //dong nas sangs rgyas bye snyed mngon
372b3(mdo sde): mchod cing //brtan rnams phyir yang skad 'gas ldog par byed//bdog tu 'du shes sangs rgyas 'du shes med//spobs pa sna tshogs kun gyis ma gos shing //sems
372b4(mdo sde): can tshogs chen rnams kyi don yang byed//dgra thul de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //de bzhin dge slong dge 'dun lta 'dod cing //thub dbang drung nas chos mchog

372b6(mdo sde): bzhin du khang bzang gi steng de nas babs nas rang gi pha ma ga la ba deng song ste phyin pa dang /rang gi pha ma la tshigs su bcud de smras pa/yab gzigs dran bu'i sug
372b7(mdo sde): pa lag pa na//pad+ma gsor gdong mdzes pa yid du mchi//skyes bu dam pa'i sgo la gzigs shig yum//mthong na su zhig de la skyabs mi mche//rang gi gnas kun
373a1(mdo sde): gser mdog 'dra ba yi//'od kyis gsal ba bdug gis mthong lags yum//skad cig la yang du mar ldog 'gyur bas//sku tshe'i tshad ni gzung bar
373a2(mdo sde): rngo mi thog/de slad rgyal po'i spyan sngar tshal chen du//rgyal ba gr-i ta ma gzigs su ga/shugs so yum//me tog rnams dang spos mchog bsnyems nas su//de bzhin
373a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa la ni mchod pa bgyi//zla ba mchog gi pha dang ma dag gis//yid du 'ong ba'i tshig thos legs so zhes//gos rnams dang ni bdug spos spos ngag dang //me tog

373a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems kun nas dkris par gyur/kha cig ni lha 'dod par gyur/kha cig ni rtog pa skyes par gyur nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i

373b1(mdo sde): brtsegs pa dang /khang bzang gi stong dag tu dong ste 'khod par gyur to//de nas bu mo zla mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du pha ma dang
373b2(mdo sde): 'khor mang po rnams lhan cig tu me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byugs pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
373b3(mdo sde): dang /ba dan dag thogs te sil snyan dang /pheg rdob pa sna tshogs byed pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te rang gi gnas nas byung ngo //de nas srog chags 'bum
373b4(mdo sde): phrag du ma dag gis de grong bar gyi dbus su byung ba/mthong ba dang /bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o snyam du sems shing rab tu rgyug go/de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi grong

373b6(mdo sde): rmurnyog pa de dag mthong nas/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du bar snang gi nam mkha' la shing tA la'i srid tsam du mngon par
373b7(mdo sde): 'phags te 'dug par gyur to//'dug nas kyang skye bo phal po de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/bzod ldan bdag mdzes pa yi lus 'di ni//chags pa'i sems
374a1(mdo sde): las byung ba ma yin te//kha dog gser mdog me lce 'bar ba 'dra//shin tu yid 'ong kho mo'i lus 'di ltos//gang dag yul rnams la ni brkam med na//
374a2(mdo sde): me mdag 'bos 'dra rab 'bar 'dod spong zhing //dbang po drug rnams sdom pas bsdams pa dang //gang dag tshangs spyod rnams spyod dag pa dang //gang dag gzhan gyi bud
374a3(mdo sde): med rnams mthong na//mi srid snyam du 'du shes skyed byed na//de dag mdzes shing shin tu blta sdug la//rtag tu mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur//gang gis sa 'di kun tu

374a6(mdo sde): chad khyod cag kho mo'i phar gyur la/kho mo'ang khyed kyi pha dang phu nu dang //sring mo 'am phar yang yang dang yang gyur pas//su zhig ma la 'dod chags sems skyed byed//

375b1(mdo sde): ched 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /khro ba dang /thab pa dang /'chab pa dang /gnod sems dang /rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyang sems

375b6(mdo sde): de'i rkang pa bzhag pa dang bteg pa thams cad du sa chen po rab tu g.yos pa dang /yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong tham pa'ang bu mo zla
375b7(mdo sde): mchog song ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to//daM nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos bgos
376a1(mdo sde): te lhung bzed thogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por zhugs pa dang /nyan thos chen po de dag gis bu mo zla mchog skye
376a2(mdo sde): bo phal po ches yongs su bskor cing rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces
376a3(mdo sde): smras so//tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pa bu mo zla mchog 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro na/bdag gis 'di ci bzod pa thob pa zhig gam/'on te ma yin
376a4(mdo sde): zhes shes par byas/dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs su dri bar bya 'am/zhes nas/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong de dag dang lhan cig tu bu mo zla mchog
376a5(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo khyod gar 'gro bu mas smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du bu mo khyod gar
376a6(mdo sde): 'gro zhes gsung ba ni gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchis lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo kho bo ni yangs pa can du 'jug la khyod
376a7(mdo sde): ni yangs pa can nas 'byung na/'o na khyod 'di skad du gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lags so zhes zer ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur/bu mos smras
376b1(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod zhabs gang nas 'dog cing gang du 'jog par mdzad lags/shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo kha bo ni rkang pa nam mkha' las 'dog cing nam mkha'o//

376b3(mdo sde): la ni tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mchis pas/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du bdag gis 'di skad ces khyod gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lags so zhes smras
376b4(mdo sde): so//shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo kho bo ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba lags pas bdag kyang
376b5(mdo sde): der mchi ba lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo gal te chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin na/'o na khyod ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan
376b6(mdo sde): las 'das par mi 'gro/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing yongs su mya ngan las
376b7(mdo sde): 'das par mchi ba la ni skye ba dang 'jig pa'ang ma mchis la/yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ma gtogs par yang gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
377a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so//de ci'i slad du nan/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mchog nyid yongs su m+b+ha n+d+ha las 'das pa lags
377a2(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o//dri skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'od skad ces smras so//bu mo 'on ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pu la yang dag
377a3(mdo sde): par zhugs pa yin nam/'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/'on te theg pa chen po la yang drug par zhugs pa yin/bu mos smras
377a4(mdo sde): pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du khyod theg pa gang la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes gsungs pa ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i skad du de khyod nyid la zhus
377a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab du gsol/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rtogs pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang
377a6(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/rlung snangs rgyas N+DI theg pa yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags
377a7(mdo sde): shA rangadwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu ma de ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa 'am/smras pa 'ga' yang med la ba dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/gci
377b1(mdo sde): byung sa 'on/da pa nyid kyad ma yin pa'i gyur ro//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA rang ti'i bu de'i skang du rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /smras pa
377b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos thams cad dang /tha dad du dbyer ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas par 'gyur ba 'am/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pa'i chos de
377b3(mdo sde): dmigs su ma mchis lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa ni dri mtshar na gzhan yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bskyen
377b4(mdo sde): bkur byas bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin
377b5(mdo sde): nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa la'o//shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings kyang ji snyed cig yin/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa
377b6(mdo sde): radwa ti'i bu ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa ji snyed pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu ma ma rig pa dang srid po'i sred pa'ang ji snyed cig yin/bu mos smras pa/ba tsun
377b7(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu ma sems can gyi khams kyang ji snyed cig yin/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA
378a1(mdo sde): /tI'i bu 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sang sa rgyus/bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ji snyed pa'o//shU radwa tI'i bus smras pa/bum/
378a2(mdo sde): khyod kyis ci zhig lan btab pa yin/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyid kyi lan bdag gis bti ba lags
378a3(mdo sde): so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo kho bos ci zhig yongs su dris/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yi ge gang dag yongs su dris pa de dag nyid nges par
378a4(mdo sde): bstan lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/gdags su med pa yin las de dag ni nges par bstan par mi nus
378a5(mdo sde): so//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la'ang
378a6(mdo sde): gang gis yongs su dris pa dang /gang gis lan btab po de gnyis ga'ang dmigs su ma mchis lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo 'di ltar khyod ni
378a7(mdo sde): bzod pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa dag yod pa/kho na yin pas khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon por
378b1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ces bgyi ba de'ang spros pa lags so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
378b2(mdo sde): ro/zhes bgyi ba de'ang spros pa lags so//nye ba zhes bgyi ba 'am ring ba zhes bgyi ba de'ang spros pa lags so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu grang 'di skad ces khyod ni ring po
378b3(mdo sde): mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bla na med pa yang dag
378b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba ma mchis pa/'gog pa ma mchis pa/chad pa ma mchis pa/rtag pa ma mchis pa/don gcig pa ma lags pa/don tha dad pa ma
378b5(mdo sde): legs pa/'ong ba ma mchis pa/'gro ba ma mchis bya//brjod du ma mchis pa/'byung ba ma mchis pa/rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas de la ni gang mngon
378b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis lcags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/byang chub
378b7(mdo sde): ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis dang bral pa lags pa'i slad du'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo khyod de
379a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig/kho bo cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dong ngo //de nas gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla
379a2(mdo sde): mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa na nyan 'tshal ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus
379a3(mdo sde): smras pa/bu mo 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa su dge la chos ston par mdzad/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag nyan par bgyid kyang dga' bar mi
379a4(mdo sde): bgyid/mngon par dga' ba mi bgyid pa rnams la'o//shA ri'i bus smras pa/bu mo sems can mang po dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
379a5(mdo sde): 'dong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dag la chos ston pa mi mdzad dam/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing
379a6(mdo sde): chos la ngar 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/bdag cag la chos ston par mdzad pa'o//'di ni chos te
379a7(mdo sde): bstan par bgyi ba'o snyam du sems lags kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/chos sam/bstan pa zhes bgyi bar sems
379b1(mdo sde): pa ma mchis lags so//de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta bu'i spobs
379b2(mdo sde): pa dang ldan par bu mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na der ni chos bstan pa chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur bas bdag cag zin bcad de phyir lag na ni 'o bu
379b3(mdo sde): cag la legs kyis/bdag cag chos mnyan pa de lta bu las phyi rol tu gyur na ni ma yin no//de nas nyan thos chen po de dag gi phyir phyogs te de nyid nas phyir log par gyur
379b4(mdo sde): to//de nas bu mo zla mchog tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas gA la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zas
379b5(mdo sde): phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dang /
379b6(mdo sde): phyi ma dang /nA bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//mngon par rab tu gtor to//skye bo phal po che
379b7(mdo sde): dag gis kyang ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang /bdug spos dang /spos dang /me tog phreng dang /byug pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/gtor mthan
380a1(mdo sde): tu de nas de'i maung la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugasau rgyur dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhig tu gyur to/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thud kyi
380a2(mdo sde): steng na 'dug par gyur to//de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs/'di nas shi
380a3(mdo sde): 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs/gang bdag gi sreg pa g.yas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs
380a4(mdo sde): pa 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir byon la/'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/bu mo 'di ni sprul pa ste sprul pa la ni
380a5(mdo sde): 'chi 'pho'ang med la skye ba'ang med do//bu mos smras pa/'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad la gang 'chi'i 'pho ba 'am
380a6(mdo sde): skye ba de ma mthong legs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so//bu mo bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub
380a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyi lus sgyur bar mi byed/bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid
380b1(mdo sde): mtshan nyid lags pas stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so//bu/
380b2(mdo sde): mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dris gzigs pa ltar bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
380b3(mdo sde): pa mthong lags so//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa rtsegs kyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyi chos kyis gtam la spobs par gyis shig bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu chos kyi
380b4(mdo sde): dbyings la ni brjod par bgyi ba dang rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la/chos kyi dbyings ni yi ger 'grang ba'ang ma lags so//byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa
380b5(mdo sde): med pas smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos ji lta bu thos/bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu de'i slad du steng du gzigs shig dang /
380b6(mdo sde): bar snang ci 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de 'dra la/de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar chos bstan pa nyid kyang de 'dra/nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/rigs kyi bu
380b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lags so//byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag
381a1(mdo sde): la ji ltar sbyin pa byin zhing ji ltar yongs su bsngos/bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dpor bgyin de bzhin gshogs pa'i sprul pa
381a2(mdo sde): zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na de la rgyu ba ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags smras pa/bu mo sprul pa
381a3(mdo sde): la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang 'byung ba med do//bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu bdag gis kyang sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dag la de ltar sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su
381a4(mdo sde): bsngos pa lags so//byang chub sems dpa' thogs med sems kyis smras pa/bu mo khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab par byed/bu mos smras
381a5(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ji lta bu kho na bzhin du'o//smras pa/bu mo sems can de dag kyang ji lta bu yin/smras pa/rigs kyi bu 'das pa'ang ma lags//
381a6(mdo sde): ma'ongs pa'ang ma lags/dra ltar byung ba'ang ma lags la/sems de'ang 'das pa'ang ma lags/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma lags da ltar byung ba'ang ma lags pas
381a7(mdo sde): byams pa bsgom pa de ni 'di 'dra'o zhes gdags par rngo mi thog lags so//byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/bu mo khyod kyis
381b1(mdo sde): chos kyi mig thob pa mang /bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang ma thob lags na chos kyi mig lha thob pa ga la 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
381b2(mdo sde): brtan pas smras pa/bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/bu mos smras pa/rigs kyi bu yun ji srid
381b3(mdo sde): cig nas smig rgyu chu la yang dag par zhugs pa'i yun dri srid nas bdag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bu mo zla

381b5(mdo sde): gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa so so skye bo'i sa las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid kyis lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang/
381b6(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu so 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu dag dang lhan cig yang dag par
381b7(mdo sde): smra'ang 'jigs par mi bgyid/dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lags so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad
382a1(mdo sde): ces smras so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyin zhugs ni ji tsam du chung yang sreg pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas ji tsam du nye bar lon pa rnyed/
382a2(mdo sde): pa de tsam du sreg par bgyid lags so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pas tha dad
382a3(mdo sde): kyi dbye ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas de dag thams cad bdag dang gzhan dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lpags so//shA ra dwa ti'i
382a4(mdo sde): bus smras pa/bu mo byang chub thob nas khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar 'gyur/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/
382a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sems can dman pa la mos pa/shes rab chung ba/gzhan gyi don la mi lta ba/nyan
382a6(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag go ming yang grag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu 'gyur lags so//shA ra dwa tI'i bus smras pa/bu mo gang khyod 'di skad ces

382b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/dper bgyi na ba lang gi rjes kyi chab gang lags pa dang /rgya mtsho chen po'i che ba gang lags pa de
382b2(mdo sde): ngag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/'on kyang ba lang gi rjes la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi go skabs ma mchis lags so//

382b7(mdo sde): la ni phyogs bcu'i khongs su chud pa la ni nam mkha'i khams lhor grong dang /grong khyer dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu mi gnas shing kun tu mi gnas
383a1(mdo sde): la ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag kyang ma mchis rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma mchis lags so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa

383a3(mdo sde): rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ltar sems can tshad med pa grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi
383a4(mdo sde): thog lags so//shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo sangs rgyas rnams dang /nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig pa ma yin nam/bu mos smras pa/btsun

383a6(mdo sde): ti'i bus smras pa/bu mo ci'i phyir/bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la yongs su zhus/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan
383a7(mdo sde): gdab tu gsol/gang gi tshe btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe dzI ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar
383b1(mdo sde): mnyam par kun tu gnas par gyur lags sam/jig shing ljon pa dang ri thams cad kyi khyod logs su mngon par phyogs te btud mngon par btud/mngon par rab tu
383b2(mdo sde): btud lags sam/ji gA ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur lags sam/dzi ga sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur lags sam/dzI ga sbyong //
383b3(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa la thug pa yan chad dang /steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag 'od zer gyi kha dog
383b4(mdo sde): lta bus snang bas gyur lags som/ji ga lha thams cad kyis phyag bgyis lags sam/ji ga bdud kyis sa dang nam mkha' dpag tshad sum cu tshun chad dpung gis khyab
383b5(mdo sde): par bgyis te mchis par gyur lags sam/ji ga sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol lags sam/ji ga khyod byang chub pa dang dus
383b6(mdo sde): gcig kho nar bdud thams cad nges par bcom lags sam/shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/kho mo khyod kyis kho mo la ji skad smras pa de dag las de'i rgyu gcig tsam yang ma
383b7(mdo sde): byung lags so//bu mos smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi snying po dam pa la gnas pa la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang /gzhan yang dpag tu ma mchis pa//
384a1(mdo sde): dag byung bar gyur pas na btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol po dang /nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni de
384a2(mdo sde): lags so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla mtshig la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/bu mo legs so legs so//bu mo khyod de skad ston pa ni yang khyod
384a3(mdo sde): legs so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de pad+ma'i
384a4(mdo sde): gdan de las mngon par 'phags te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku lte ba'i khung du zhugs so//de nas de'i mad
384a5(mdo sde): la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing /bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/sdong bu rnams
384a6(mdo sde): ni gser/'dab ma rnams ni dngul/snying po rnams ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa dag byung bar gyur to//pad+ma de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
384a7(mdo sde): sku mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa pad+ma la bzhugs pa dag kun tu snang bar gyur cing /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
384b1(mdo sde): mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu gshegs te sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na chos ston par kun tu snang zhing /'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos ston pa de
384b2(mdo sde): dag kyang 'dir kun tu grag go/de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas dga' zhing mgu li yi rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /yid bde ba
384b3(mdo sde): skyes nas des lag pa g.yas pa na thogs par gyur pa'i pad+ma grang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de me tog gi khang pa
384b4(mdo sde): brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa/cha mnyam pa/shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig tu gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi snying gi nam mkha' la
384b5(mdo sde): 'dug par gyur to//khang pa brtsegs pa der yang khri gdan rkang pa rin po ches spras pa/lha'i ras bcos bu 'bum phrag du ma bting ba zhig byung bar gyur to//khri gdan de la
384b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhig bzhugs par yang kun tu snang ngo //des pad+ma de 'phangs nas
384b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa de la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la
385a1(mdo sde): ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig byung bar
385a2(mdo sde): gyur pa dang /des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'adra bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis
385a3(mdo sde): pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang 'brel pa'i sems can rnams
385a4(mdo sde): la 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma gsum pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /des de 'dra bcom
385a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa zhig tu gyur ba dang /tshig
385a6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dris rtog pa dang /rnam par rtog pa dang /yongs su rtog pa dang /'dod chags dang /zhe sdang
385a7(mdo sde): dang /gti mug spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /des
385b1(mdo sde): dri'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lcogs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma dro'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /
385b2(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs
385b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan/
385b4(mdo sde): 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgrib pa lnga dang /
385b5(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spangs pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma drug pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /nges
385b6(mdo sde): de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa drug pa zhig tu gyur pa dang tshig/
385b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skye mched drug la rten pa'i sems can rnams la skye mched drug yongs su 'tshal tI bregyi ba'i
386a1(mdo sde): slad du chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang //des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga
386a2(mdo sde): la ba de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /tshig 'di skad ces
386a3(mdo sde): kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdu ni dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun
386a4(mdo sde): yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /des de'ang bcom
386a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i ljang pa brtags pa brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /
386a6(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad ces kyang gastsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsu ba 'dis log pa nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log pa nyid brgyad nges par
386a7(mdo sde): spangs pa'i slad du tshos ston par gyuR+Sha cig/yeng sangasu rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag por pad+ma dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /des de'ang bcom ldan 'das gla la ba
386b1(mdo sde): de logs su 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brnogs pa dgu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//
386b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyi/dngos po dgu la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spang ba'i
386b3(mdo sde): slad du chos ston par gyur cig/yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bcu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /des de'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
386b4(mdo sde): 'phangs so//'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /tshig 'di skad
386b5(mdo sde): ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan//
386b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/de nas pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gong nas go du brtsegs pa'i 'phang gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyis thar thug par gyur to//de'itshe
386b7(mdo sde): nas bla ba'i lha yan chad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul nas lha bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par
387a1(mdo sde): gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/gang gi tshe 'dzum pa
387a2(mdo sde): mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kha dag 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar
387a3(mdo sde): po dang /dkar po dang /rnod ka dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/de dag gi sra 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab
387a4(mdo sde): bar byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas phyir log ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
387a5(mdo sde): gtsug tu nub bo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha sna la btsugs te/bcom
387a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa/mkhyen
387a7(mdo sde): ba kun la mngon sum spyan mnga' zhing //chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam par rgal//'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam mthu mnga' ba//rgyal dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu
387b1(mdo sde): mdzad//khyod kyis mtha' yas dus na sbyin pa byin//khyod khrims rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra//khyod kyi bzod pa'ang mi g.yo lhun po bzhin//drang srong chen po ci slad 'dzum pa
387b2(mdo sde): mdzad//bsam gtan brnyes shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa//gnod bral na dang rga las rnam par grol//rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo//thub chen ci slad 'dzum pa
387b3(mdo sde): rab tu mdzad//bya se la gnas shing thugs rjer gnas pa po//thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la gnas//'dod chags la sogs 'jigs pas la rab tu ni//thub dbang ci smad 'dzum par rab tu mdzad khyod
387b4(mdo sde): spu gcig nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas khams rnams su//nyi zla myur du mog mog rab mdzad de//gzi brjid zil gyis gnon cing mig kyang
387b5(mdo sde): stsol//'gro ba'i mgon cig khyod gsung rnam phyur dag/sbyin cing yid 'ong yan lag drug cu ldan//gang dag mnyan pa de dag mi ngoms shing //nyon mongs thams cad ma
387b6(mdo sde): lus zhi bar byed//phyogs bcu mtha' yas sems can gang mchis pa'i//sems kyi spyod pa du ma gang lags pa//de mkhyen de dag som nyi gcod pa po//rab 'byung ci srang
387b7(mdo sde): 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad//deng su'i sems ni byang chub slad du nges//su zhig sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs//khyab bdag gang gi yid bsams rab tu grub//thub
388a1(mdo sde): dbang ci skad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad//gang gis de rang badrud bzhi pa ma cos shing //nyon mongs bdud dang 'argya ba dag bdud chen dang //gang gis phung po lta bu
388a2(mdo sde): mya ba'i bdud//pham par bgyis sam 'i skad khyod 'dzum mdzad//su ni ga nga don chen langs 'gyur zhing //su zhig ches mo legs 'i byid me'i seng gi/ rengs kyi ts+tshin
388a3(mdo sde): phyogs rnams mchi//thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad//kun mkhyen mi dag thams cad rab srung ba//sems can kun la mtshungs par byams pa'o//ga
388a4(mdo sde): nA dang log pa rnams spangs pa//dang srong chen po ci da 'dzum pa mdzad//de ming su zhen yangs pa chen ba zag/deng su'i sems kyi smon pa lags 'grub cing //da
388a5(mdo sde): suM skabs bcu rnams deng ldan par 'gyur//ngagra bral gyi srid 'jum pa rab tu mdzad//mkha' la gnas pardzu bye ba dang //gnod sbyin mkha' lding k+ta n+d+har bcan
388a6(mdo sde): /sa la nas myur skyes pa bred med mas//ngana'i zhing na me dbang po sgrub sa//rdzogs pa'i byang chub se ma so pa'i meng pon//de ma chis 'tshal sa bu dag
388a7(mdo sde): phyogs bcu dag nas lhags nas dgra tshul ba//yangs dag zugs menga' 'dzum don pa shid rdugs 'o//de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis cha dang ldan pa kun dga' ba le byi/
388b1(mdo sde): gas su brgyad bka' stsal pa/gang gi rgyal ba'i tsho 'phrul mchog mthong nas//byang chub phyir ni tshon sems bskyed cing //nga yi mdun na thal sbyar dang 'dug ga
388b2(mdo sde): dun gyi bu mo mthong ngam kun dga' gro/'dis ni sngon gyi srid par rtag tu yang //rgyal gyi su mo brgya legs par mchud byas shing //ji ltar bdag ni byang chub mchog
388b3(mdo sde): /rgyal ba drug kun la mngon sumathus//nam yang lan 'gyu' ngan 'gror ma song shing //'di ni rtag tum+b+ha mi'i 'jig rten gyis//nam yang byang chub sems
388b4(mdo sde): cing //bgyi dus byas kya rgyun kyi bas d+ha//rgyal ba 'di blangs nas bya mthong nas ni//khang pa' stod nas mdzes pa'i lus mtshangs s+ho//rgyu chen phams
388b5(mdo sde): da srings de mchod nas//de nas rjes mthun pa ring pa thob par gyur//sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces mtshan gsol pa//de yin bzang dam pa thugs phul bas//
388b6(mdo sde): spyir de'i lus mdog gser 'brel//mdzes shing dag la zla ba 'dra ba yin//rgyun pa gser thub ces bya gang smin pa//de la bdug pa sngos mchog phul bas na//
388b7(mdo sde): 'di 'i khe deng spu lung nas//ut+pa la tsan+dan dri dang rab tu 'byung //gtsug tor zhes byi rlung gnyis na tshig de lo//'dis ni mtshan bdun nges par brtags gyur pa'o/
389a1(mdo sde): 'di yi mig mdog mthon mthing la//'gro ba rtog par byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur//tshe rabs lnga brgya dag tu 'dod spangs shing //tshangs spyod rnam par spyod//
389a2(mdo sde): pa dag byas nas//de phyir chags pas gdungs pas de mthong na//de tshe 'dod chags can dge chags bral 'gyur//sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dir 'phos te//'do/
389a3(mdo sde): li tsa bi khyim ni yangs par skyes//skye ba kun tu tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing //tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis smra ba'i bya ba shes//pha ma yongs su smin par bya ba dang //de
389a4(mdo sde): bzhin sems can gzhan don byed 'dod cing //la la byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed phyir//de phyir yangs pa'i khyim 'dir rab tu skyes//bud med skyes pa nye du
389a5(mdo sde): mdza' bshes dang //gzhon nu gzhon nu ma dgra gdul bya'i phyir//de dag stong phrag drug cu 'di yis ni//sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la yongs smin byas//'di/
389a6(mdo sde): ni ring po mi thogs bud med kyi//lus bsgyur nga'i bstan la rab 'byung zhing //tshangs spyod dam pa rgya chen thob byas nas//shi 'phos lha yi 'jig rten 'gro bar
389a7(mdo sde): 'gyur//lha gnas de nas shi 'phos phyir yang ni//dus mtha'i tshe ni chos 'di srung 'gyur zhing //'dir yang skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni//'di nas phyir yang
389b1(mdo sde): dga' ldan 'gro bar 'gyur//gang tshom pham dgra las rgyal ba po//dung gi sras su gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe//de ni bzo dAn sgra rtsal bya ba kun//shes shing mdzes lnga yon tan
389b2(mdo sde): kun ldan 'gyur//srog chagasna brgya phrag dums mdun bdar cing //zla ba gsum du tshu lnga 'i mchod byas nas//do ni srog chags drug steng sum brgya dang //lhan cig
389b3(mdo sde): gyis gnas nas 'byung 'gyur zhing //rgyal ba mi pha mo bzhugs dang 'das pa yi//chos kyi tshul yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur//de 'dra'i dpa' bo de nas shi phos nas//
389b4(mdo sde): bde ba can gyis 'jig rten khams su 'gro/blo ldan des ni 'od dpag med pa dang //gzhan yang phyogs bcu mtha' yas bzhugs pa yi//sangs rgyas bye mang gang+gA klung grin//
389b5(mdo sde): bye snyed mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur//ting 'dzin mngon shes brtson 'grus stobs thob cing //bskal pa bzang la gang dag phyis 'byung ba'o//rang 'byung 'jig
389b6(mdo sde): rten rnams la phan brtson na//'jig rten mgon de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed//bye mang bskal pa de dag mchod byas te//sems can bye mang yongs su smin byas shing /
389b7(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cun//rgyal ba zla ba mchog ces bya bar 'gyur//zla mchog rkang gnyis gtso bo mdzod spu nas//'od zer gser mdog shin tu yid 'ongag
390a1(mdo sde): /ldang ba sgyur pa da// /sa kun tugasas ra b+hUm+b+ha/ ra don / sa
390a2(mdo sde): me dang nor bu'i 'od rnams ni//snang bar mi 'gyur rgyu skar tshogs min zhing //nyin dang mtshan yang bgrang du yod ma yin//de tshe rang sangs rgyas dag yod min zhing
390a3(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams med mu stegs can tshogs med//mnyam med de yi dge 'dun rnam dag cing //bud med rnam par spang ba nyid du 'gyur//mi rnams thams cad gser
390a4(mdo sde): gyi mdog 'dra zhing //bsod nams brgya yi mtshan can blta na sdug/mngal na mi gnas 'dod pa mi bsten cing //pad+ma'i nang nas brdzus te skye zhing 'byung //rgyal sras
390a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi tshogs 'byung gang yin pa//de ni bgrang bas rtogs par mi nus shing //thams cad mngon shes thob pa de la spyod dang //mi skye bzod cing mnyam med chags
390a6(mdo sde): pa med//de na bdud med dmigs can yod min zhing //bslab pa 'dral med phyogs 'dzin yod ma yin//'jig rten khams de dag cing dga' ldan gyi//tsA bar spyod
390a7(mdo sde): pa'i rnam pa 'dra bar 'gyur//gser dngul mu tig dam pa'i dri mchog gis//spras shing gtsang la dri med yangs pa yin//rgyal ba de yi sku tshe lo grangs ni//snying
390b1(mdo sde): drag bye ba bdun cu gsum du 'gyur//ston pa de ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas//de tshe dam chos bskal pa gcig gnas shing //bzhugs bzhin mya ngan las 'das na'ang
390b2(mdo sde): 'di ni//dam chos mdzod la nyams par 'gyur ba med/gal te rgyal ba dang ni zhing de yi//phun sum tshogs pa bskal par brjod byas kyang //rgya mtsho dag las chu thigs
390b3(mdo sde): gcig bzhin du//dpe yang brjod par 'gyur ba ma yin no//de nas bu mo zla mchog gis bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar bdag nyid mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas
390b4(mdo sde): dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so//mngon par 'phags ma thag tu bu mo de bud med kyi lus sgyur
390b5(mdo sde): cing skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur pa dang /'jig rten du sa chen po'ang rab tu g.yos par gyur/me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bab/lha dang mi'i sil
390b6(mdo sde): snyan 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sgra 'khrol bar gyur to//'jig rten kun tu snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis par snang de//
390b7(mdo sde): nyid la 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod po/ri rab g.yo zhing nam mkha' sar ltung ba//lha gnas skad cig tsam la
391a1(mdo sde): 'jig 'gyur zhing //rgya mtsho mi g.yo dgung na lhung yang gda'//de bzhin gshegs pa sho ba'i chog m-i gsung //phyogs bcu'i sems can+ta mAs
391a2(mdo sde): rnams gcig 'gyur zhing //zhugs ni tshab gyur chub ni zhugs gyur gda'//mnyam med thub dbang yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas//'gro la phan bzhed log pa'i tshir
391a3(mdo sde): mi gsung //bar snang dog sa kun tu 'dzin gyur zhing //yungs 'bru'i nang ngu zhing brgyu chud 'gyur la//gser mo zhags pas bzung la rngo thog gda'//rgyal ba los
391a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshig ni gsung mo 'gyur//de 'drar yang dag de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i//rgyal ba des bdag byang chub nges bstan cing //gang phyir ngogs kun tu rab g.yos pas
391a5(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur gor ma bkum//sangs rgyas theg mchog bdag lung bstan pas na//rab 'byung gis ni ji skad gsungs de dang //sngan chad bskal
391a6(mdo sde): brgyar bdag gis gang btsal ba//de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor lo bskor//lha mi lha min gnod sbyin dge slong dang //dge bsnyen rnams dang byang chub
391a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' dag/thams cad mnyam med mthu stobs ldan pa yi//bde gshegs 'gyur gyis som nyi ma byed cig/chos 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste//rgyal
391b1(mdo sde): rnanas mangs rgyu da //bdag 'dag sa nga du 'ga' yang byed//sems nan rdzog ma gung da spyod pa ga ts+tsha//shAd+hA na tud rdzu
391b2(mdo sde): ni//rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo nyid med pas//bdag sngon bud med rang bzhin gyur pa gung //doni dngas med gsog sbyor ya ma ban//phyi ma'i dngos de'ang sbyor shing ma
391b3(mdo sde): dngos med mi g.yo gsog dang yam par//rtog dang rnas par rtog pa bral sgyur cing //rtag 'gyur de yang mthu' la bya rjes bzhin//gang zhig ma nyam bya
391b4(mdo sde): /rdzum da/'byung nga du tu garnam pa dang //spyo gsumatshan du'i 'jig rten khams su ni//chos kyi 'khyer 'dam pa slar 'arjod pa//dus ni ston pa
391b5(mdo sde): sos bskyed la//de bzhin gshegs par ba tshang bkyis dang //des ni myu d+ma na tan 'byung ba'i gnas//skyon pa rgyal pa'i sdug sad las rtogs 'gyur/
391b6(mdo sde): hrIrgyal bag na sung sbyin ma par na/rgyam po sa margyagag nal lo//dag sud ba 'das pa hU~M sa dpe//thub pa sa kyi
391b7(mdo sde): dbang phyug bstod//bde ba'i 'byung gnas pa di kun rab stsal ba//de bzhin gshegs pa 'dud kyi tshor ma dkrugs//badz+rang+ge 'as rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag
392a1(mdo sde): rang 'byung dbang ldan sred bral bstod par bgyi//bdag gis phyogs bcu bltas na de dag tu//sdig med sangs rgyas brgya phrag bas mA yas mthong //
392a2(mdo sde): shAkya seng ge ji lta de lta bur//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung ston//rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig/de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis
392a3(mdo sde): gcig/sems can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges pas//gang la bzod 'di mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis tshigs
392a4(mdo sde): su bcad pa de dag smras nas bar snang de las babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugs so//des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum
392a5(mdo sde): phrag mang po dag kyang snang bar gyur to//sangs rgyasra bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//des sangs
392a6(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri dag mngon sum du mthong zhing bdag nyid lung bstan pa'ang thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
392a7(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar
392b1(mdo sde): gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khye'u de'i phyir pha ma ngag gnang bar byed du chug cig/de nas khye'u pha ma dag gis cho 'phrul chen po de mthong zhing de mngon sum du
392b2(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'ang thes nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das badrag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'byung bar gnang lags so//bdag cag gis kyang chos de dag
392b3(mdo sde): slad kyis thob par bgyi lags so zhes gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu phyung ngo //de nas khye'u de rab tu byung ba dang /srog chags khris kyang bla nA med pa
392b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bdun chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma
392b5(mdo sde): drang bral ba rnam par dag go/dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i dge slong ma
392b6(mdo sde): nyis brgya dang srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//bcom ldan 'ad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub
392b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' zla mchog dang /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
393a1(mdo sde): sgra dang /sa dang /lham yin dang /hU~M ba brnyas pa'i 'dog rten mo rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/
393a2(mdo sde): rgyas pa na rnaMm chog yang bstan pa zhes na pa'i mad rdzonas / ni skye ba badzin mi tu dang/
393a3(mdo sde): kyi la nu na shes sa la/ga ba du/ hrI thAka pa rnam pa d+d+ha ts+tshaH/ dadu/gas pa
393a4(mdo sde): ma snang bstan pa zhes bya ste ga chen pa'i ngo //srungs rgyas dang bye sa ng+ge ba'i sa phyog 'am ma//'di da bdag gis zas pa ngas gcin //
393a5(mdo sde): sa ldan 'das rgyal bag byung na b+ha rlung nga la na 'dun 'du na padang /rnas pa dang / ma dang la la migs byu
393a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i sems dang ldan po na mang po dung byabs sa kyi nas so/ kyi rjes gos dang sham thabs gson
393a7(mdo sde): lhung bzed bsnams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che 'byings pa dang thibs sbyin tu rgyam ba'i khob kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs
393b1(mdo sde): smra ga nam ldan 'das rnal bal shA zla na du ra canas ma dadang na rgyun rgyal bu gzugs sun dun po zu gal 'ad du ga ga
393b2(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs cheni snying pa'i btsun mo pade ldan mogs bya bakhang ba dang /mchog gi slong na 'dug pas bcos ldan 'das thag rang phyinas gshegs pa
393b3(mdo sde): nas kyang sems dag bar gyur /khang pab gi sbyir nos thabs nas/bcam ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byams pa'i
393b4(mdo sde): / rin cheb bti //de nas banam ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dbyams pa gdun pa shams dasu zhugasas//donas
393b5(mdo sde): tsun mo ban ldan sa mas ldan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i skabs la mgru pas phyag 'a
393b6(mdo sde): chom mnani pa'i phyir zhes dang bcas/gus dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo 'ar
393b7(mdo sde): rnanum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la gzigs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir ma byin bzhin du rgyal ba'i btsun mo 'di ldan ma la bka' stsal bya
394a1(mdo sde): ldan ma gang lus la thogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta bu shin tu lhum me lhan no lha der 'dug pa'i shing de'i ming ci zhes bya/dro skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
394a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/gang gi 'bras bu khyod thogs pa//shring de'i ming ni ci yin zhes//dpa' bo chen po
394a3(mdo sde): mkhyen bzhin du//gang zag mchog gis smras pa ni//bdag gis sngon ni gang bskyed pa//bsod nams las byung shing zhes bgyi//'dren pa bdag gis myang ba yi//'bras
394a4(mdo sde): bu de dag de yi lags//ljon shing bshad pa de nyid kyang //sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams la yod//sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob 'dod rnams//byang chub phyir ni de la
394a5(mdo sde): gnas//sbyin dang tshul khrims chab stsal bas//ljon shing de ni rnam par bsrung //de ni rnam par 'khrud pa na//'bras bu bzang po rnams kyang 'byung //bzod pa dang ni
394a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus mthus//mun shing bdag gis legs par bsrungs//de ni rnam par 'khrud pa na//'bras bu dri med 'byung bar 'gyur//shing 'di bltan mdzes pa ste//
394a7(mdo sde): bsam gtan shes rab me tog rgyas//'dren pa bdag gis de dag gi/'bras bu rnams ni myong ba lags//ji ltar ri la rten pa yi//shing rnams yal ga lo ma dag/
394b1(mdo sde): chu nga grub par rgya cho ga/'phel bar gyur te bskyod mi nus//de bzhin ljon shing che bzang 'di//sangs rgyas chos nyid 'tshal bas na//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//
394b2(mdo sde): sngon ni legs par bsrungs pa lags//'dron pa bson nams ljon shing 'di'i//'bras bu gzhan yang mchis lags te//bdag gis nyams su myong ba 'di//de yi mi
394b3(mdo sde): tog tsam du bas//de yi 'bras bu byang chub mchog/sangs rgyas byang chub bla med lags//de ni bdag gis thob par 'gyur//smad pa bud med nyid spangs nas//skyes par
394b4(mdo sde): bdag nyid 'gyur ba lags//sems can kun gyi dam pa mchog/chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin//thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs//sdug bsngal kun gyi
394b5(mdo sde): nyen po yi//sems can rnams ni bdag gis dgrol//'jig rten kun la snying rtse ba'i/skyabs su bdag ni 'gyur ba lags//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bajim ldan
394b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la bka' stsal pa/bde ldan ma gang khyod skye bo mong po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang //
394b7(mdo sde): skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi don dang /lha rnams dang /mi rnams la phan pa dang /bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa legaso so legs so//de skad ces bka' sprul pa dang /bcom
395a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum du/
395a2(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis dang /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs
395a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /btang snyoms chen po 'di rnams ci las grub lags/de bzhin du gzhan yang
395a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /gzhal du ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams ci
395a5(mdo sde): las grub lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas ye
395a6(mdo sde): shes 'dod pas na//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//ngas kyang 'di ltar ljon pa'i shing //sngon ni legs pa kho nar bskyed//sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang //
395a7(mdo sde): de bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsags//yun ring dus nas ting 'dzin dang //shes rab nges par bsten pa yin//sems can rnams la mi mnyam sems//
395b1(mdo sde): ngas ni bsgoms par mi dran to//rtag tu sems ni mnyam gyur pas//sangs rgyas nyid ni nges brnyed so//nga yi sems ni mnyam pa yi//rtag tu sdug dang mi sdug dang //mdza'
395b2(mdo sde): dang mi mdza' snyoms pas na//bsod nams shing ni rnam par bskyed//desnga na ljon shing chen po 'di//yon tan mang por gyur pa yin//'khor los sgyur nyid ngas thob ste//
395b3(mdo sde): brgya byin nyid kyang byas pa yin//rnam mang dbang phyug chen po dang //tshangs pa nyid kyang de las thob//bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos//chos nyid dag kyang ngas rtogs so//
395b4(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams thos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rab tu gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de rjes su yi
395b5(mdo sde): rangs nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ji ltar mi mchog dam pa po//yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas//sngon ni spyod pa shin tu bslabs//de ltar
395b6(mdo sde): bdag kyang rjes su slob//yon tan mthar phyin khyod kyi ni//yon tan rnams ltar bdag slob ste//srid par sdug bsngal spangs nas ni//bdog kyang 'di 'drar 'gyur bar bgyi///
395b7(mdo sde): tshe rabs gzhan ni ma lus par//bdag gis sbyin pa gang stsal pa//mnyam ming ye shes mthong slad du//de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo//srid pa 'di 'am gzhan dag
396a1(mdo sde): tu//bdag gis tshul khrims gang bsrungs pa//sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob slad du//de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo//bzod dang brtson 'grus ting
396a2(mdo sde): 'dzin dang //shes rab dge ba gang bsten pa//sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyi phyir//de dag thams cad bdag gis bsngo//lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis//las dge ba
396a3(mdo sde): gang bdag gis bsags//sangs rgyas ye shes yon tan phyir//byang chub tu ni bdag gis bsngo//bud med lus 'di spangs nas ni//skyes pa mchog tu badrag gyur cig/
396a4(mdo sde): de ltar skyes pa'i lus thob nas//dam pa'i mchog tu bdag gyur cig/de ltar gyur nas bde gshegs kyi//'khor lo bla med bskor bar bgyi//'khor ba'i btson rAr
396a5(mdo sde): bcings pa li//sems can bye ba dgrol bar bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin
396a6(mdo sde): te/tshig 'di smras pa legs pa yin//sems ni rab tu sdom pa legs//khyod kyis bdud ni legs par mnan//rdzogs sangs rgyas su khyod 'gyur ro//de nas rgyal
396a7(mdo sde): po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba dang /dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das dang /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bza' ba
396b1(mdo sde): dang bca' ba mang pos tshim par byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsang sngor ni gyur phyag ni bcabs nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bdo ldan ma la chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang
396b2(mdo sde): dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas lung bstan te/bde ldan ma khyod ma 'ongs pa'i
396b3(mdo sde): dus bskal pa du ma zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan
396b4(mdo sde): rin chen dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mchog tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba'i sdug bsngal mod pa
396b5(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba yid dang 'thad pa mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas yin te/khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro//chos kyi rnam
396b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di bshad pa na dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /lha
396b7(mdo sde): dang mi'i skye dgu rnams kyis ni chos kyi snang ba thob par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dang /'khor de dag
397a1(mdo sde): dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas 'jig rten po rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs po la mngon pa bstod na
397a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya shrI ya ma hA de bi byA kA ra Na/
397a3(mdo sde): bod skad du/'phags pa lho ma chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos
397a4(mdo sde): pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mang po 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
397a5(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
397a6(mdo sde): sel ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /byang chub sems dpa'
397a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig pa thams cad
397b1(mdo sde): stsol ba dang /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams//
397b2(mdo sde): rje mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang 'jig rten gsum 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu
397b3(mdo sde): stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /de dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i
397b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
397b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsalo te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das
397b6(mdo sde): kyi thad du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/lan gsum bskor po byas nas bde btsun na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
397b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag thams cad la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing de bzhin
398a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa bye ba snyed kyis yongs su bskor te/brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pas lha mo tshan/
398a2(mdo sde): mo dpal lnga gzigs nas/tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bkra' stsal /
398a3(mdo sde): spyan rus gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'am/blon po 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen namo/dge bsnyen ma 'am/bram ze 'am/rdul rigs
398a4(mdo sde): rje'u rigs sam/dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'chang na/rgyal rigs kyi rgyal
398a5(mdo sde): po de'i yul dang /sems can de dag gis 'jigs pa dang /yams kyi nad dang /gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rkun dang /g.yon can dang /mi
398a6(mdo sde): dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/nor dang /'bru dang /mdzod dang /dang ba thams cad rnam par 'phral bar 'gyur ro//rgyal
398a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol
398b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan ldangs rgyag 'di logs pa bka' snyam pa/lags kyi lugs so// ma tshan mod pa sa kyi meng rnams 'dzin pa dang /zas nas sa su lan pa ga
398b2(mdo sde): lags pa de dag gi yon tan dang phan yon ni de dag tu 'gyur lags so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
398b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen ma dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
398b4(mdo sde): lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klu gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ston byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig
398b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/de bzhin gau shegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyis rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi ri bi mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal
398b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de dang de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge bo'i rtsa ba bskyed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
398b7(mdo sde): 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang /'grub par byed pa dang /rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin to//de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal
399a1(mdo sde): gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang /sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang /nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang /lus thams cad dri ma med par byed//
399a2(mdo sde): pa dang /nor dang 'bru rnams 'dra zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang /dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri ba dang /lha ma yin dang /
399a3(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dul zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang /sems kyi nang dang /gnod pa dang /'thab pa dang /'khrug pa
399a4(mdo sde): dang /'byed pa dang /rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par byed pa'o//'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dang la sdug pa la
399a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin
399a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gda'i mu stegs kyi sku thams cad kyi bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa tsan+dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal
399a7(mdo sde): la phyag 'tshab lo//de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i
399b1(mdo sde): na shegs pa gshegs pa ma bu'i rdul tshugs sa gag med pa
400a1(mdo sde): dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la
400a2(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma'i 'od bzang dpal
400a3(mdo sde): lo phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin
400a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin
400a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
400a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od phro'i ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin
400a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa smon la mtshan po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa
400b1(mdo sde): dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa
400b2(mdo sde): nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa
400b3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcad par bya'o bklag par bya'o//de ltar byas
400b4(mdo sde): na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de la bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro//lha mo chen mo dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung
400b5(mdo sde): bstan to//lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
400b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che lngas 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro//'jig rten
400b7(mdo sde): gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing
401a1(mdo sde): tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang /chos dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing
401a2(mdo sde): der byang chub sems dpa' gang drag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri
401a3(mdo sde): mA med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa brgyad bcu gnyis pa gang zhe na/'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams nyon
401a4(mdo sde): cig/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/
401a5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi ma/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams
401a6(mdo sde): cad kyi dpal/tshangs pa dang /khyab 'jug dang /dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi dpal/lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/gnas thams cad na yod pa'i
401a7(mdo sde): dpal/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/rig
401b1(mdo sde): phyogs spyan dang /lag na rdo rje dang rdo rje 'chang bu thams cad kyi dang lnga/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal/gza' brgyad dang /rgyu skar ny+tsi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dang
401b2(mdo sde): /oM nyi ma'i bya'o//ma ma mum/rig byed bzhi'i dpal/bkra shis ma/sems can rnams kyi ma/rgyal ma/rnam rgyal ma/grAng+ga mA/mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad
401b3(mdo sde): bkra shis ma/dri ma med pa/dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/rgyags pa med pa/zla ba'i dpal/nyi mi'i dpal zla thams cad kyi dpal
401b4(mdo sde): sang ge la zhon pa/pad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/pad+ma pad+ma la gnas pa/prad+d+ha 'dzin pa/pad+ma las byung ba pad+ma dang ldan pa/'od zer 'bar ba du mas 'khor pa
401b5(mdo sde): nor sbyin ma/dkar mo/dkar mo chen mo//lag dkar ma/bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa/bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad kyi lus can/shes nyin can gyi bu mo
401b6(mdo sde): lag pa 'bum dang ldan ma mig 'bum dang ldan ma/mgo 'bum dang ldan ma/nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i cod pan thogs pa/gzugs bzang ba
401b7(mdo sde): gzugs sna tshogs cacen/rab grags me/shin tu grags ma/zhi ba ma/sbyin ma/sgra gtsang ma/zla ba ltar mdzes mo/nyi ma ltar mdzes ma/dge ma/dge byed ma/sems
402a1(mdo sde): can thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/'phags ma/me tog la gnas ma/me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ri bo'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad
402a2(mdo sde): kyi dpal/rba klung dang /mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/chu thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i dpal/mu stegs thams cad du mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/sman dang /rtsi tog dang //
402a3(mdo sde): shing dang /nor dang /'bru thams cad kyi dpal/gser sbyin ma/zas dang gos sbyin ma/'od gsal ma/snang po ma/lus gtsang ma/de bzhin gshegs
402a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyi dbang sbyar ma/lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpalo/gshin rje dang /chu lha dang /ku be ra dang /brgya byin la sogs pa'i
402a5(mdo sde): dpal sbyin pa ma/longs spyod ma/gzi brjid ldan ma/phun sum tshogs ma/'byor pa ma/rnam par skye ba mtho ba/chos kyi dpal/khyab 'jug la brten pa/ku mu
402a6(mdo sde): da la go nas ma/bzod ldan ma/mthu rtsal gyi gnas/dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa bsod
402a7(mdo sde): nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/sa thams cad dang /rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/'byung po thams cad
402b1(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /grul bum dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/lha'i gnas dang lha thams cad kyi dpal
402b2(mdo sde): bzlas brjod dang /bzlas brjod du bya ba dang /sbyin sreg dang /sbyin bsreg tu bya ba dang /bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/'od la dga' ba/skal ba dang ldan par
402b3(mdo sde): 'dod pa/drang srong thams cad dag phyir byed pa'i dngol/bud med kyi gnas thams cad kyi gtso mo dang /dpal gyi mchog mi 'am ci mo thams cad dang lha ma yin mi thams
402b4(mdo sde): cad kyi dpal gyi mchog/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug pa/yid du 'ong ba/sim par byed pa/ku be ra'i snying du sdug pa/chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/oM sdug
402b5(mdo sde): bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shig/sgrol cig thar bar mdzod cig/bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hA/
402b6(mdo sde): gaM ge sar+b+ba tir+d+ha mu khi swA hA/oM sar+b+ba bit+ti swAhA/sarba mi ga la d+hA rA NI swAhA/tsa turbid+ya sarba nak+ShA tra gra h+Na ga Na ga Na a d+hi muN+ye swA hA/brah+mA ya~M swA hA/biSh+Nu be swA hA/ruM drA yA
402b7(mdo sde): swAhA/biShA mu khA ya swA hA/oM kli ni kli na~M sarba kar+yas d+ha na d+ha ni si ni/a ba ha de bi shrI/bi sr-i baNA ya swA hA/su ban+d+ha dA na d+hA n+ye A kaiR+Sha n+yai skr-i hA/sarba puMr+Na a koD+D+h+ya
403a1(mdo sde): swAhA/shrI de ba tA A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/sarba pA pa nA sha n+yo swAhA/sarba a kA lA mr-i t+yu prA tA ma n+yo swA hA/sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Sho ka ta ye swAh+ma/sarba dwe
403a2(mdo sde): ba tA mu kha shrI ye swA hUM/a yurba la bar+N+Na kai ra ye swA hA/sarba bi tri maM ga laM haMsta ye swA hA/sid+d+ha pa hi ne ye swA hA/pad+ma sa rU d+hA ye swA hA/sarba kra t+ya ka kha rdi bi na shan+yai
403a3(mdo sde): swAhA//'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang la lde lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/sdig pa thams cad 'joms
403a4(mdo sde): par byed pa/bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/bak+Sha mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/dpal dang /bde ba dang /skal ba bzang po thams cad
403a5(mdo sde): sdud par byed pa/'di dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang /klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/sangs
403a6(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo dpal la'ang tsan+dan gyi bdug pa phulo te/bklags na des dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing
403a7(mdo sde): bde ba dang /yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te/lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sbed pa byed par 'gyur la de'i don thams cad kyang /
403b1(mdo sde): 'grub par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis do ga kyis bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /lha mtshan rma//
403b2(mdo sde): dpal de dang /'khor de dag thams cad dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas
403b3(mdo sde): mngon par bstod do//'phags pa lha mo tshan mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya dza ya ma tI nA ma mahA
403b4(mdo sde): yAn sU hA/bod skad du/'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
403b5(mdo sde): phyug 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rtul byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dege
403b6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems pa dUb d+ha mang po drug dang bubs cig tu bzhugs s+ho//de nas hrIm ldan 'das kyis byung chub sems dpa'
403b7(mdo sde): ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/rgyal ba'i bla gros rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod zer bya'o//
404a1(mdo sde): 'dod pas thos pa la brtson par bya'o//mtha ris 'dod pas tshul khrims bsrungs par bya'o//longs spyod 'dud pas gtong ba sngol bar bya'o//gzugs/
404a2(mdo sde): bzang ba 'dod pas bzod pa bsgom par bya'o//spobs pa 'dod pas bla ma la gus par bya'o//gzungs 'dod pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par bya'o//ye shes 'di dang
404a3(mdo sde): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par bya'o//thar pa 'dod pas sdig pa thams cad srung bar bya'o//sems can thams cad bde bor bya bar 'ad pos byang chub tu sem
404a4(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o//skad snyan pa 'dod pas bden par smra bar bya'o//yon tan 'dod pas rab tu dben pa la dga' bar bya'o//chos 'dod pas dge ba'i be shes gnyen
404a5(mdo sde): la bsnyen par bya'o//zhi gnas 'dod pas 'du 'dzi med pa mang du bya'o//lhag mthong 'dod pas chos stong par so sor brtag pa mang du bya'o//tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
404a6(mdo sde): 'dod pas byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o//lha dang mi'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pas dge bcu'i las kyi
404a7(mdo sde): lam yang dog par blangs te gnas par bya'o//yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'dod pas stong pa'i chos la mngon par dga' bar bya'o//yon tan thams cad thob par
404b1(mdo sde): par 'dod pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i blo gro
404b2(mdo sde): dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
404b3(mdo sde): bstod do//'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo glos zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya a ba lo ka na ni nA ma
404b4(mdo sde): hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
404b5(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems
404b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' spel pa/blo gros rnam
404b7(mdo sde): par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang /bzod pa yongs su dag
405a1(mdo sde): pa dang /phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshogs pa yongs su dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de
405a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go//blo gros rnams par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu dag go//blo gros rnams par dag pa dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang /
405a3(mdo sde): btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dgra lA dang /rnam par grol
405a4(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su
405a5(mdo sde): dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shem+ba yongs
405a6(mdo sde): su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang /phreng ba dang /
405a7(mdo sde): spos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rol mo'i sgra dang /byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs
405b1(mdo sde): bar mi nus te/de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i mthar
405b2(mdo sde): yang zad par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
405b3(mdo sde): pa la yon phul ba'ang tshad med do//mtha' yas so//bsam gyis mi khyab bo//mtshungs pa med do//dpag tu med do//grangs med do//dpag gis mi lang ngo //brjod du
405b4(mdo sde): med do//blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /ri mor byed
405b5(mdo sde): pa dang /mchod pa dang /brjod pa dang /phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya mtha' ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ring bsrel yungs
405b6(mdo sde): 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang /ri mor byed pa dang /mchod pa dang /brjed pa dang /yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste byang chub tu gzhol
405b7(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang /phyag byed pa dang /bsti stang byed pa dang /bla mar byed pa dang //ri mor byed pa dang /mchod pa dang /brjod pa dang /gsol ba
406a1(mdo sde): dang /sngags pa dang /skor ba byed pa des phan yon lnga yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rtogs pa
406a2(mdo sde): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthing bar 'gyur ba dang /mthong nas
406a3(mdo sde): kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i
406a4(mdo sde): bstan pa 'dzin pa dang /de'ang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sgrub pa dang /bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /myur du sangs
406a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur te/chos bzhi po de dag go//blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi
406a6(mdo sde): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi brdzi bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/rigs mtho zhing rigs che ba dang /btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la
406a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang /phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis
406b1(mdo sde): sa padun rgyun/ sa rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dang 'tshas can pa de dag dang /na nu bdud dam du rnam sa ba gyung /
406b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi ma de'i rnatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//srog chags kun la phyin du ra/ chu tun snyoms bstod dus//'jig rten mgon gyi dzod
406b3(mdo sde): u TIgan ba byed pa ni// rabs dag rnams cad du//byang chub skyed pa smod pa //dun dang ldan da mas ldan//bso nams nA~M 'jigs
406b4(mdo sde): da rten bskor po byas na ni//charabs danan thams pa d+hi//lho da T+wa da gnang sbyin dang //sman pa ni mas kyis mchod par 'gyur//dus ni gang dag basbyin pa
406b5(mdo sde): mi na pa de dag slong //ngas rgyas 'byung ba 'jig ga/sa par byed 'dri ma pam//bdag ldan gcugs ni ldan sum rdzogs/da
406b6(mdo sde): ldan pa dang/bu dang sa sbyin pa 'gyur// D+yan dI mI //na b+h+ya 'gyur na na
407a1(mdo sde): mkhas par 'gyur//tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pA dang //phyug po rnams su skyo bar 'gyur//dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur//gtong ba btang na
407a2(mdo sde): ser sna med//dzam+bu'i gling na gang yang rung //khyad par can gyi rigs mdzes pa//der ni brtan pa de skye ste//dma' bdag ni rnam par spangs//mchod rten bskor ba
407a3(mdo sde): byas nA ni//skye ba thams cad kun tu yang //dbang cher grags pa'i khyim bdag dang //dpal drung gzi brjod ldan par 'gyur//bram ze sA la che 'dra dang //tshul khrims
407a4(mdo sde): ldan zhing mang thos dang //rgyal rigs sbal che 'dra dang //phyug cing nor tshur ldan par 'gyur//ris bskor rgya mtsho tshun chad kyi//sa kun la ni gang smon pa//gling bzhi
407a5(mdo sde): dag gi dbang phyug bla//rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur//'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che//rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur//rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas la/
407a6(mdo sde): yang dang yang du bsti sta dbyed//'di nas shi 'phros mtho ris su//song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dang //lhun po'i zom gyi dbang phyug go/lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'gyur//
407a7(mdo sde): dbang shin tu'i bril dang //de bzhin du ni dgra' ldan da// bang shin tu 'phrul dag //dbang smrar 'arjesas pa med par 'gyur//mchod rten paskur
407b1(mdo sde): nan//de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du//tshangs pa'i dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing //lha rnams bye bas mchod par 'gyur//'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la//mi grang skor ba
