440a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo lce bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos par dkas/khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung
440a6(mdo sde): smyig/yI gar bris shig/tshangs shig/lhogs shig/kun rgyub par gyis shig/rgyu drung ldan pa kun dge'as gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag
440a7(mdo sde): gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags ni/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs rlung ci le /'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/thecom ldan 'dres
440b1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya bar gzung zhig/byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang gzung
440b2(mdo sde): zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /dge slong
440b3(mdo sde): de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi
440b4(mdo sde): rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///
440b5(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya me tre ya pra s+thA na nA ma ma hA yA nA sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/sangs
440b6(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
440b7(mdo sde): tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dog
441a1(mdo sde): 'dun chen po thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa yin zhing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang phyir
441a2(mdo sde): mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/byang chub sems dpa'
441a3(mdo sde): spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par brtse ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /byang chub sems dpa' mthu
441a4(mdo sde): chen thob dang /byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/
441a5(mdo sde): 'khod do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams paspyan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
441a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das go la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal te zhus nas zhu ba
441a7(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
441b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus nas/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do//
441b2(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpral gauzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so//byams pa 'di ltar byas pa dang /zhus nas zhu ba
441b3(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed//
441b4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched yongs su
441b5(mdo sde): shes par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed//
441b6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed na/de ltar na zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par
441b7(mdo sde): mdzad de//gal te khyod 'du byed rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/gal te khyod bden
442a1(mdo sde): pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/lAm dang lamra bsgom par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/gal te khyod 'bras bu thob par bya ba
442a2(mdo sde): dang /mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/gal te khyod mi gnas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed dam/yi ge rnams mi brjod par zhu
442a3(mdo sde): bar mi byed na/de lta na zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byams pa ji tsam du sgra
442a4(mdo sde): 'dogs pa de tsam du chags pa yod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos bstan pa ni chags pa med pa'i phyir ro//de nas tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i bus
442a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal sgro btags pa sgro btags pa zhes bya ba/'jam dpal ji tsam gyis na sgro btags par
442a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis
442a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa yin/smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam po yin/ji lta ba bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin//
442b1(mdo sde): chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/mI skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin//
442b2(mdo sde): ma skyes mo byung ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag 'di ltar chos
442b3(mdo sde): thams cang mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam par brtags nas med bzhin du sgro 'dogs pas sgro 'dogs par byed de/'di ni srungs rgyas so//'dri ni chos so//'di ni dge
442b4(mdo sde): 'dun no//'dri ni bdag go/'di ni sems can no//'di ni gong zag go/'di ni shed las skyes pa'o//'di ni shed bu'o//'di ni byed pa po'o//'di ni tshur
442b5(mdo sde): bya ba'o//'di ni chad pa'o//'di ni rtag pa'o//'dri ni so so'i skye bo'o//'di ni nyan thos so//'dri ni rang sangs rgyas so//'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o//'di
442b6(mdo sde): ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o//'di ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//'di ni zag pa drang bcas pa'o//'dri ni zag pa med pa'o//'di ni 'dus byas so//'di ni 'dus ma
442b7(mdo sde): byas so//'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o//'di ni rnam par byang ba'o//'di ni dge ba'o//'di ni mi dge ba'o//'di ni 'jig rten po'o//'di ni 'jig rten las
443a1(mdo sde): 'dus pa'o//'dre ni 'khor ba'o//'di ni mya ngan lus 'das pa'o//'di ni dngos po'o//'di ni dngos po ma yin pa'o//'di ni yod pa'o//'di na
443a2(mdo sde): med pa'o//'di ni thob pa'o//'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o//'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'o//'di ni lam mo//'di ni lam gyi 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba 'di ni sgo
443a3(mdo sde): btags pa zhes bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mnyam pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med cing grang dag 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa
443a4(mdo sde): nyid du sgro 'dogs pa yin te/mi mnyam par sgro 'drogs pa ni me yin la/gang dgra mthong ba med par mnyam pa nyid mthong ba dri dag ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin//
443a5(mdo sde): sgro 'dogs pa la spyod pa ni mi mnyam par mthong ba yin zhing /gang dag mnyam pa nyid la sgro mi 'dogs pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba yin la/sgro 'dogs pa
443a6(mdo sde): le spyod pa ni mnyam po nyid mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/
443a7(mdo sde): dge slong de dag 'dul ba la dbang mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
443b1(mdo sde): byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so//'jam dpal kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed do///
443b2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed pa nas kho bo ni mi gnas
443b3(mdo sde): pa'i bcu du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed do//'jam dpal kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ci nas de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ltar zhu bar byed do//'jam
443b4(mdo sde): dpal kho bo ni gang dag de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /gang dag chos thams cad dben pa nyid kyi phyir chos ci'ang mi dmigs pa dang /gang dag chos kyi
443b5(mdo sde): dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams kyis mi gos pa dang /gang dag 'khor ba mi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba las
443b6(mdo sde): 'da' bar mi byed pa dang /gang dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa nyid dang /gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa/thob par mi byed pa de dag gi
443b7(mdo sde): phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed do//'jam dpal kho bo ni ci nas yi ge rnams kyang mi brjod tshig gi lom la'ang mi dpyod la/shes rab kyis kyang bye brag phyed
444a1(mdo sde): /pad+ma gyu ba dang /shes pa'ang gang yang mengal/'di ni rnam par grol ba'ang ga yang med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed do//
444a2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/yi ge stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /thams cad skye ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro//de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' grang dag 'dus par gyur pa de dag
444a3(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de kho na ltar ldem po ngag snrel zhir 'dug pa'i tshig 'di dag kyang ston la brjod/
444a4(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyang chos nyid dang mthun par sbyor ba la sen zab mo'i shes rab dang ldan no snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
444a5(mdo sde): chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de tsam du zab mo'i bzod pa la nges
444a6(mdo sde): shring shes rab dang /spobs pa ston pa la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshare lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yun ji
444a7(mdo sde): srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
444b1(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/de ltar bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
444b2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis gnas de dag kyang thos la/'jug pa de'adra thos nas slar zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson par
444b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ljags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
444b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
444b5(mdo sde): pho byams pas ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la bya ba byas so//dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do//zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan no//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
444b6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po byams pa yang dag par zhugs te/bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong lon nas de'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
444b7(mdo sde): bskyed do//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
445a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glang gi thad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
445a2(mdo sde): pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan ci lags pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
445a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyis legs par bka' stsal du gsol/dri skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la
445a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal
445a5(mdo sde): lo zhes gsol nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba dang /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang //
445a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rnam par brtse bsngon byung ba 'dus pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang tshes grangs med pa/
445a7(mdo sde): yun ring shing tshad med/bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med pa'i snga rol de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
445b1(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha la sgyur ba blan med pa/lha dang ma rnams kyi sbyin pa/sangs rgyus/
445b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gser bzang 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od kyi spu'i khung bai re re nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
445b3(mdo sde): 'bum phrag mang po byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag kyang gser gyi 'od ltar bzang la 'od zer re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
445b4(mdo sde): re re 'od kyis snang bar byed do//'od zer re res kyang pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag gis shar phyogs 'gengs par byed do//lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs drang /
445b5(mdo sde): byang phyogs dang /phyogs mtshams dang /steng dang /'og kyang de dang 'dra'o//phyogs rI rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa re res sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye bo khrag khrig
445b6(mdo sde): 'bumo phrag du ma 'gengs par mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re res kyang sems can phye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma sangs rgyas dang /chos rnams lnga 'dul
445b7(mdo sde): bar mdzad de/phyir mi ldog pa la 'god do//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i gser
446a1(mdo sde): gyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyi ming med do//rgyu skar dang /gza' dang //
446a2(mdo sde): skar ma dang /me'i 'od kyi myiming yang mi grag go//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse
446a3(mdo sde): bas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji ltar gdugs mtshan rnam par bzhag par 'gyur lpags/de skad
446a4(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin
446a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri nas gzhi chen po de rin po che sna bdun lngas grub pa yin te/
446a6(mdo sde): lag mthil lhur mnyam par gyur lnga rin po che sna bdun gyi sa gzhi chen po de las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam la mdzes shing blta n+da sngags
446a7(mdo sde): pa dang /dri zhim po'i ngad ldang la yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'phags te/pad+ma re re las dri bsung gi ngad lding ba'i dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'arjeg
446b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams khyab ste/sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dgra par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges so//pad+ma de dag kyang snga dro'o//
446b2(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe ni de tog rgyas la/phye ma rnyed kyi dus kyi tshe ni rnyis par 'gyur te/des na sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/phyi ma red kyi dus la ba'i bro snyam mo//rigs
446b3(mdo sde): kyi bu de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan rnam
446b4(mdo sde): par bzhag par mngon pa yod do//rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing dri na mi khom pa brgyad ni tha na ming tsam yang med do//sdug bsngal ba'i ming tsam dang /nyan thos dang rang
446b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyang ming tsam yang med do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa'i chos dang bral ba/dri nga ba med pa 'ba' zhig gis yongs su
446b6(mdo sde): grang bar gyur to//'dus pa re re la byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de/de'i mjug tu bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu
446b7(mdo sde): med grangs med par 'dus par gyur to//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'ang chos gzhan mi ston te/
447a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'bra' zhig ston par mdzad do//byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor
447a2(mdo sde): lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog pa
447a3(mdo sde): drang /chos grang yang yang dag pa'i mtha' las phyir mi ldog pa dang /'drod chags 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /zhe sdang zhe sdang gi ngo bo
447a4(mdo sde): nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /gti mug gti mug gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /gzugs gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /tshor ba dang //
447a5(mdo sde): 'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes pa rnam pa do shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /mig mig gri ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog
447a6(mdo sde): pa dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid yid kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med la/dngos
447a7(mdo sde): med pa gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang phyir mi ldog pa/gang du'ang mi 'jug pa'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
447b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i srungs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i ste snod phyir myi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
447b2(mdo sde): yang dag par stan to//de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal po cho sa dang ldan pa gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser mdog can bya ba zhig byung ngo //rigs kyi bu
447b3(mdo sde): rgyal po gser mdog des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub sems dpa'i dge
447b4(mdo sde): 'dun chen po dang bcas pa lnga lo bye ba phag brgyad cu rtswa bzhi'i bAr du mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/bla mar byas/ri mor byas/mchod
447b5(mdo sde): pA byas so//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pas kyang rgyal po gser mdog
447b6(mdo sde): gi bsam pa rig nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de la bsnyen bkur bya bar spro bar gyur to//rigs kyi bu rgyal po gser mdog des
447b7(mdo sde): 'khor gyi khyams dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa zhig byas te/'khor gyi khyams der rdar gyi lnga ldi ni bris/me tog gis ni pus mo nub pa tsam du khyab par byas/steng
448a1(mdo sde): gi bar snang la ni mu tig dmar po'i dra ba bres/snying po'i spos kyi mchog gis ni bdugs te/'khor gyi khyams der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan
448a2(mdo sde): bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ra ba'i ras bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bting ba khri'i rkang pa rin po che du mas spras pa zhig bshams so//byang chub
448a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' re re'i stan yang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba dag bshams so//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de dpag tshad nyisu skyong ni bzhugs te/rigs kyi bu 'di
448a4(mdo sde): lhur rgyal po gla ser mdog gis gshegs shul dpag tshad nyis stong legs par brgyan nas/'di lta ste/lam de'i ngos g.yas gla yon du stegs bu ran+da po
448a5(mdo sde): chetshe sna tshogs kyis spras pa dag byas so//lAm de'adra pus mo nub pa tsam du me tog gis khebs par byas so//steng gi bar snang la nI rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra
448a6(mdo sde): ba'i b+ha bre bres so//stegs bu de dag la'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'phyang du mda' rgyang gang tsam yod pa dag btsugs so//rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig nas
448a7(mdo sde): rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig tu rin po che'i tha gu bres so//rin po che'i shing ljon pa gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba gser gyi bya/
448b1(mdo sde): ma brdal ba/bai DUr+ya'i them skas kyi rI pra pA dang bcas pa/me tog ut+pa la drang /pad+ma dang ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar pos gang ba/ngur pa skud 'byin pa dang ldan pa
448b2(mdo sde): dag byis so//de bzhin du rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i bar thams cad dunyung rdzing dag byas te bkod pa de kho na drang 'dra bar bkod do//rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams
448b3(mdo sde): cad kyi drung du me tog sil ma thogs pa'i me lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//rin po che'i spos kyi snod thogs pa'i me lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//rnga bo che dang /rdza rnga dang /
448b4(mdo sde): 'khar rnga dang /kim pa la dang /pi wAng dang /khar dkrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa'i mi lde brgya lnga brgya bkod do//gdugs dang /
448b5(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//de ltar rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drung thams cad du mi brgya phrag de snyed de snyed bkod nas/
448b6(mdo sde): gang gri tshe bcom ldan 'dras de bzhin gshegs pa gle ser bzang 'od phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis me tog sril ma 'di dag gis gtor cig/tsan+dan gyi phye
448b7(mdo sde): ma 'di dag gis gtor cig/pog phor 'di dag gis bdugs par gyis shig/sil snyan 'di dag kyang dkrol cig/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bo
449a1(mdo sde): ngan 'di dag kyang sbrengs shig ces bsgo'o//rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du rin po che'i me tog gi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya'ang
449a2(mdo sde): bkod do//lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/gleng gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de lAm 'di nas phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis rin po che mi
449a3(mdo sde): tog 'di dag gis gtor cig ces bsgo'o//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de gtsug lag khang de nas byung ma thag
449a4(mdo sde): tu 'khor gyi khyams su gshegs te de'i bar du gtsug lag khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba byung ngo //rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lam dpag tshad nyis
449a5(mdo sde): stong po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re phan tshun du 'drim rI re tsam na 'greng ngo //
449a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de phan tshun du gshegs pa na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' re re'i mgo bo'i drang thad
449a7(mdo sde): kyi steng na dngul gyi gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can/mu tig dmar po'i dra bas g.yogs pa gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bskor ba/ma bzung
449b1(mdo sde): bar nam mkha' la phan tshun du 'gro'o//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o//rin po che'i gdugs de dag la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba btags pa gang
449b2(mdo sde): yin pa de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/rin po che'i gdugs de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra ji lta bu 'byung ba de 'dra ba ni sil
449b3(mdo sde): snyan yan lag 'bum dang ldan pa las kyang mi 'byung ngo //rin po che'i gdugs dang dril bu g.yer ka de dag dang /rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i lo ma de dge dang /
449b4(mdo sde): rin po che'i thag gu de dag dang /rin po che'i stegs bu de dag dang /sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra
449b5(mdo sde): 'byung ste/de na sems can gang dag sbyin pa la mos pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i sgra thos so//gang dag tshul khrims la mos pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi sgra thos so//
449b6(mdo sde): de bzhin du gang drug bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan la mos pa dang /gang dag shes rab la mos pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi sgra thos so//de
449b7(mdo sde): bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang /de bzhin du dbang po dang /stobs dang //
450a1(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam gyi sgra dang /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang /stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par
450a2(mdo sde): rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ste/sems can rnams ji lta bur mos pa de lta bu'i sgra 'byung zhing thos so//chos kyi sgra de thos
450a3(mdo sde): nas kyang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
450a4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de lam de nas phan tshun du gshegs pa na/dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che 'bum phrag du
450a5(mdo sde): mas spras pa'i lha'i rin po che'i gdugs ma bzung bar 'phags te phan tshun du 'gro'o//rin po che'i gdugs de dang /dril bu g.ye ri ka de dag rlung gis bskyod pa
450a6(mdo sde): las kyang sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa byung ngo //de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom
450a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang
450b1(mdo sde): 'od de'i rin po che'i gdugs de las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa de/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
450b2(mdo sde): pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la 'di skad
450b3(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i brtsams pa tsam ngas bshad par
450b4(mdo sde): bya'o//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang /smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa
450b5(mdo sde): med pa dang /gnas pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /dngos po med pa'i phyag rgya dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang /de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'i
450b6(mdo sde): phyag rgya dang /ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang /'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang /dben pa'i phyag rgya dang /rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya dang /mtshan nyid med
450b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyag rgya dang /byed pa med pa dang 'gro ba med pa'i phyag rgya dang /gzung du med pa dang gnas med pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o//rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni nam
451a1(mdo sde): mkha'i phyag rgyas btub pa'o//rigs kyi bu dper nA nam mkha' la ni phyag rgya brko bar sla ba'ang ma yin la phyag rgyar yang 'dug pa dang /phyag rgya'o//
451a2(mdo sde): 'brur yang gdab tu med do/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gnas kyang med/rkyen kyang med/rgyu 'ong mod/bskyed pa'ang med/rten yang med pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu de//
451a3(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang /nam mkha'i rnam pa can dang /namo mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang //
451a4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i ston par yang dag par shes pa dang /nam mkha' la ni chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad do//ji ltar nam mkha'
451a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang gdags su med par gnas te/gdags pa tsam du zad
451a6(mdo sde): par yang dag par shes pa dang /glang chos rnams gdags pa tsam du shes pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'o//gang de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar
451a7(mdo sde): mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste/des na de bzhin nyid la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro//bstanapa
451b1(mdo sde): 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
451b2(mdo sde): po rnam par brtse ba la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub
451b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par 'khor gyi khyams der gshegs te der byon pa ni lha 'bum dag mchod pa'i las bya ba la spro bar gyur to//me tog ut+pa la dang /
451b4(mdo sde): pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do//lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba'i char yang 'bebs so//saul snyan bye ba phrag 'bum dag kyang dkrol bar
451b5(mdo sde): byed do//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de 'khor gyi khyams der bzhugs pa na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi
451b6(mdo sde): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mchod pa'i las bya ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par gyur to//mchod pa ji lta bu dag gi phyir spro bar
451b7(mdo sde): gyur ce na/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa la/byang chub sems dpa' re re'i rgyab ni glang po che
452a1(mdo sde): dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar gnas la/glang po che'i rgyal po de'i sku la'ang 'di lta ste/rlung dang nyi ma bskyab pa'i phyir rin po che'i
452a2(mdo sde): gdugs gsal zhing blta na sdug pa thogs pa dang /glang po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sno la'ang mu tIgi sngon po gsal ba'i mu tog gi do shalo 'phyang ba dang /mu tig
452a3(mdo sde): gi do shal dri las kyang chub si li zhing bai DUr+ya sngon po 'dra la yan lagro brgyad dang ldan pa 'bib ste/chu des chu'i bya ba byed pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' dag 'khod
452a4(mdo sde): ma thag tu 'di lta ste/lha'i mthus lag po g.yas pa le rin po che'i lhung bzed byung bar gyur to//lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lhung bzed 'dzin
452a5(mdo sde): par byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de la ni tshangs pa nyid rin po che'i gdugs thogs te snam logs na 'dug go/rin po che'i gdugs de las
452a6(mdo sde): kyang mu tig gi do shal dgra 'phyang ngo //mu tig gi do shal de dag lus kyang chu bsil zhing bai DUr+ya sngon po 'dri la yan lagra brgyad dang ldan pa 'bab ste/chu des de
452a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de chu'i bya ba mdzad do//lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni bcom ldan 'das de'i lhung bzed 'dzin to//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de
452b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas par bzhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag la lha mo re re mdun na 'dug ste/lha'i spos dri zhim po sna du ma mchis la 'thag
452b2(mdo sde): por byed do//spos de 'thag pa na'ang rje phyogs dang rdzi phyogs mo yin par ser bu ldang ste/ser bu des byang chub sems dpa' de drag gi lus la spos kyis phog par byed do//
452b3(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa de drag ni dri dra ba med pa ste/de dag ni lha mo'i 'du shes kyang 'jug par mi byed la de dag ni spos kyi mtshan ma'ang mi skyed na chags par lta ga la 'gyur te de ni
452b4(mdo sde): gnas med do//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od bzhugs par rig nas bu stong dang /bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong
452b5(mdo sde): dang /rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /blon po brgyad khri bzhi steng dang /bu mo brgyad khri
452b6(mdo sde): bzhi stong dang /gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag dang lhan cig tu rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa mang po mchog tu gtsang bas tshim par byas te ci
452b7(mdo sde): bzhed pa bstabs so//tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs te bshos gsol nas gtsang sder gyur te phyag bcabs par rig nas/de bzhin gshegs pa la
453a1(mdo sde): bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu phrugs gcig phul lo//byang chub sems dpa' re re la'ang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba'i ras
453a2(mdo sde): bcos bu phrugasu re re phul lo//phul nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang /yul mi glatso bo rnams dang lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar nus 'di lta ste/chos mnyan
453a3(mdo sde): pa la gus pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khod do//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des skye bo'i tshogs chen po gus par
453a4(mdo sde): 'khod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod par thugs su chud nas sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan te//de skad ces bka' stsal pa
453a5(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
453a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de glang lags/bcom ldan 'das
453a7(mdo sde): kyis chos kyi rnam grangs de legs par bka' stsal du gsol/de ltar bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams
453b1(mdo sde): kyang sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de la slob par 'gyur lags so//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par brtso
453b2(mdo sde): ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang /sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de las brtsams pa
453b3(mdo sde): tsam zhig bshad par byed do//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so bA ni gzhan ma yin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho nar zad de/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i
453b4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol
453b5(mdo sde): tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba ni de yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de nyid la sngon gyi de bzhin
453b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor/sems
453b7(mdo sde): can rnams kyang yongs su smin par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das la/ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sgo so so ba 'di nyid la bslabs
454a1(mdo sde): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs
454a2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dgra 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu medo grangs med pa dgra na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa'i de
454a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa de dag kyang sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
454a4(mdo sde): rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi bu gleng byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
454a5(mdo sde): 'di dag nyid yang dag par smra bas smra'o//de lo sgo so so ba de'i bye brag ni gang yin/nyes pa ni gang yin/rnam par gnon pa ni gang yin/nges par 'byung ba ni/
454a6(mdo sde): gang yin zhe na/ser sna'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//yongs su 'dzin
454a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//nor kun tu bsrung la bgo bsha' mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'
454b1(mdo sde): gang ser sna'i sems rnam par gnon cing bcom nas sbyin pa yid la byed pa bskyed pa de ni de'i rnam par gnon pa yin no//de longs spyod ji ltar chung yang rung /longs
454b2(mdo sde): spyod rgya chen po drag yod kyang rung ste/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /slong po rnams la bgo bsha' byed la de dga' ba'i sems dang /kun tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sems
454b3(mdo sde): dang /mgu ba'i sems dang /rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sems can thams cad la snying rje bas phan pa'i dngos po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pas lag brkyang
454b4(mdo sde): ste/sbyin pa byin par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sgo so so ba'i slob pa yin te/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges par 'byung ba'o//rigs kyi bu 'chal pa'i
454b5(mdo sde): tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang /'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang /zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang /ral pa'i tshul khrims
454b6(mdo sde): dang /nag nog gi tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//byang chub sems dpa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang /'dres
454b7(mdo sde): pa'i tshul khrims dang /zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang /ral pa'i tshul khrims dang /nag nog gi tshul khrims gang zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi
455a1(mdo sde): sems sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi thugs
455a2(mdo sde): pa'am/dmigs pa'i lta ba 'dod pa dang /nyan thos kyi gtam mam/rang sangs rgyas kyi gta mo mam/dmigs pa can gyi gtam la dga' bar 'dzin pa 'di ni
455a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /tshul khrims nyams pa dang /tshul khrims 'dres pa dang /tshul khrims zhig pa dang /tshul khrims ngal ba
455a4(mdo sde): dang /tshul khrims nag nog cen zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la mi skyod pa dang /mi slob pa ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rab yin no//de skad
455a5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i
455a6(mdo sde): slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal ba bgyi na ni tshul khrims 'chal par mi 'gyur la//gang
455a7(mdo sde): gi tshe nyan thos kyi sems sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rab tu 'gyur lags//
455b1(mdo sde): de skad ces gsol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub
455b2(mdo sde): sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsgrub pa gzhan las 'gal bar byas sam/ngas ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi gang dag gsungs pa de dag gi nyes pa byos sam//
455b3(mdo sde): mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug gam/mtsham mi med pa lnga byas su zin kyang /byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi sems kyang ma btang ma
455b4(mdo sde): spangs te/byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral la/dmigs pa can gyi sems dang /mngon par zhen pa'i sems kyang mi bskyed na byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshul khrims
455b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa kho na yin pa dang /tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang /tshul khrims ma zhig pa dang /tshul khrims ma ral ba dang /tshul khrims
455b6(mdo sde): nag ni gcan ma yin par gzung bar bya ste/byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa'ang yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
455b7(mdo sde): byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa mi yin pa'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i las byas pas srid par 'gro ba bskyed du zin kyang 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa'
456a1(mdo sde): ni ji tsam du srid par 'gro ba bskyed pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
456a2(mdo sde): bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs su zin kyang de nyan thos kyi sems sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/dmigs par lta ba dang lhan cig bsten par byed na
456a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems ma
456a4(mdo sde): gtong la/dmigs par lta ba'i sems kyang mi bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so bo la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no//rigs kyi bu
456a5(mdo sde): gzhan yang gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//sems can rnams la mi snyoms pa'i yid la byed pa ni byang chub sems
456a6(mdo sde): dpa'i nyes pa'o//sems can rnams dang chos rnams la tha dad par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//sems can la dmigs pa la brten pa'i
456a7(mdo sde): byams pa phyogs gcig pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//stong pa nyid la mi bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//'di la ni sbyin no//'di la ni/
456b1(mdo sde): mi sbyin no snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//'di la nI yon dbul lo//'dri la ni mi dbul lo snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//'di la ni chos
456b2(mdo sde): bshod par bya'o//'di la ni chos bshad par mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//'di la ni bsnyen bkur bya'o//'di la ni bsnyen bkur mi bya'o/
456b3(mdo sde): snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du so sor 'gyed par byed de/'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o//'di ni tshul khrims
456b4(mdo sde): 'chal pa'o snyam du so sor phye nas tshul khrims 'tshal pa la brnyas par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpas ni sems
456b5(mdo sde): can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /chos thams cad la sems mnyam par bya dgos shing nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang /sa dang chu dang me dang /rlung dang /
456b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' lta bur snyoms pa'i sems dang /stong pa nyid la bzod pa dang ldan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro//byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can gang yang yongs su mi
456b7(mdo sde): gtong la/mi gnas pa'i sems dang /tshad nges par mi byed pas sems can thams cad kyi phyir snying rje bskyod cing byams pas mos par byas te/khyad par byas nas
457a1(mdo sde): bsgrubs te gnas la/chos rnams la'ang stong ngo snyam du bzod pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no//gzhan yang byang/
457a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang 'khor ba la tshad nges par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ste/bskal pa 'di tsam gyi bar du ni bdag 'khor bar bya'o//bskal pa 'di
457a3(mdo sde): tsam gyi bar du ni 'khor bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//sems can 'di snyed cig ni bdag gis dgrol bar bya'o//sems can 'di nyid cig ni badrag
457a4(mdo sde): gis dgrol bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//'di ni brtson 'grus so//bdag ni brtson 'grus can no//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
457a5(mdo sde): byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gang zhe na/rigs kyi/
457a6(mdo sde): bro 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no zhes ji skad du 'byung ba de srid du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor 'khor to//
457a7(mdo sde): gal te bdag sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa de kho na snyed du 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya dgos par gyur na yang bdag gis spro bar bya'o//rnam grangs 'di bzhin du
457b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur zug pa skyid pa de snyed du 'khor ba na 'khor dgos na'ang bdag spro ste/de'ang brtson 'grus dang /nga rgyal dang /byang chub/
457b2(mdo sde): la mngon par zhen pa spangs la mAM dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go chas spro bar bya'o snyam ste/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha bgos pa de na byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la
457b3(mdo sde): spyod pa dang slob pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'ogang glong dang /grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song na
457b4(mdo sde): sems cani rnams kyid na nus shing lcogs la/blos yin bzhin du de dgan pa'i phyogs dben pa zhig tu 'dug nas dben pa na spyod cing bas me gtan gyi de'i dga' ba deng /
457b5(mdo sde): ba la brten cing gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa'ang byin par byed la skyo ba'ong med/sems kyi dmigs pa la'ang mi glen
457b6(mdo sde): nang du yang ngag 'dzag kyang 'phrul bar byed/bsam gtan gyi ro myong ba'ang med mi gnas pa'i bosam gtan pa'ang yin ni byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo
457b7(mdo sde): sa pa la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa
458a1(mdo sde): shes nas 'di la bdag gam/sems can nam/sgrog gam/gang zag gang+gA yang myed du snyam du de ltar shes nas bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang /
458a2(mdo sde): gnas la rnal 'byor du btsun par gnas la/sems can gzhan phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i 'dzin 'khris zin pa de la stong pa nyid bdug med pa'i tshul de mi brjod mi
458a3(mdo sde): na/brda sprod par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i thabyas lnga mi mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/nyes par byed pa'ang ma yin no//byang chub sems dpa'
458a4(mdo sde): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par shes shing chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam/
458a5(mdo sde): sems can nam/srog gamau/gang zag gang yang med do snyam ste/de ltar ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 'di dag lus kyis mngon sum du byas te/thams cad la
458a6(mdo sde): mi dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan la/sems can phyin ci log tu sems shing dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag kyang phyin ci log gis zin tsong dmigs pa'i sems
458a7(mdo sde): su gyur pa de las rab tu grol bar byas nas/de dgo la'ang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med do zhes ston cing de dag kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes byab
458b1(mdo sde): la 'dzud par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa'ang yin no//rigs kyi
458b2(mdo sde): bu de ster na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od bshos gsol nas/'khor gyi khyams der 'kho
458b3(mdo sde): de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bshad do//bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can
458b4(mdo sde): tshad med pa dgra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to//rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am/bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i sgo
458b5(mdo sde): so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te/chos blostan du zin kyang spobs pa'am/chos kyi sgo rnams zad par mi 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang de'i brtsams pa tsam bstan pa yin
458b6(mdo sde): no//rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa zin
458b7(mdo sde): zam par bkod pa de lta bu dang /bsnyen bkur dang /phu dung du bya ba de lta bus bkur sti byas/bla mar byas/rim gro byas mchod pa byas so//de nas bcom ldan 'das/
459a1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gser mdog des de
459a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gtsug lag khang ma bgyis lags sam/de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag
459a3(mdo sde): gang na bzhugs bzhugs lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la 'di skad
459a4(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rang rang gi sprul pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na gnas gnas
459a5(mdo sde): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de ltar lo bye ba phrag brgyang cu rtsa
459a6(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag 'das pa'i tha ma'i nyin por rgyal po gser mdog gris de bzhin gshegs pa de la bshos gsol yon phul te/slar gshegaso par reg nas bsam
459a7(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu zhig bsams te/ci bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am/'on te tshangs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya
459b1(mdo sde): 'am/'on te 'khor los byung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya snyam mo//de nas de'i sems bskyod pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des
459b2(mdo sde): thugs su chud do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas rgyal po dang /skye bo'i tshigs mang po de dag gi mdun du steng
459b3(mdo sde): ge bar snang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de kho na bzhin du rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus shig sprul te/de steng gi bar snang de la 'dug nas rgyal po gser
459b4(mdo sde): mdog li tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so//dper na mi ni shes rab 'tshal//byis pa'i rang bzhin gyur pa zhig/rgyal po bsnyen bkur byas nas ni//bya dga'
459b5(mdo sde): chung ngu gsol bar byed//de bzhin la la sangs rgyas la//bsam gyis mi khyab mchod byas nas//tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal po'i srid//dma' ba'i gnas la 'dod par
459b6(mdo sde): byed//rgyal por gyur dang brgya byin dang //de bzhin tshungs par 'gyur ba rnams//'di dag mi rtag brtan ma yin//brnyan ma yin te 'jig tshul can//srog chags
459b7(mdo sde): kun la phan pa'i phyir//byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis//de 'dra'i sems ni bsngags pa yin//rgyal po khyod ni yul
460a1(mdo sde): 'khor brnyas//mchod pa rgya chen byas zin gyis//byang chub sems ni tha na med//rgya chen sems ni khyod kyis bskyed//dma' ba'i sman lam ma/
460a2(mdo sde): 'debs shig/den byis pa'i spyod yul yin//shes rab bzang po mkhas par gyis//byang chub mchog la 'jug par gyis//mya ngan 'das pa 'dod pa'i phyir/
460a3(mdo sde): snangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rnams la//gang gis stong gsum thams cad kyang //don chen bkang ste phul babs//gang gis thal mo sbyar byas nas//ma
460a4(mdo sde): kyis byang chub ba sgo byas la//tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang //de ni de bas shin tu che//gang gis sems can thams cad la//bskul pa bye ba bad med du//sems
460a5(mdo sde): can kun la bsnyeni byas kyang //de yi ban+de ga tshar mi byed//gang zhig du mA n+mA byung rgyub sems bskyed dang //phyogs bcu dag ni mchog na mdin mdzad pa/rnam
460a6(mdo sde): 'dren sad sa rgyas gling dag bzhugs rnams la//bskyod nams 'dad pa'i mi gas sngon chad ci//'khor ba bskal pa bye bar mchod pabs//me gang mkhas shing
460a7(mdo sde): mdzangs pa lding bzhin can//bde bar gshegs pa'i basbyi la yid ches shing //byeng chub sems ni brtan por bskyed nas kyang //bde gshegs margyad rten pa ni/
460b1(mdo sde): u/'din sa da nas da pa da//na sa sa //nga nams ma na snro/ sa
460b2(mdo sde): shA byung 'a g+hu maud//de dag byung chub sems nas sbyin na//bzhil pa ma sa ra sh+led na rlung //sang sa 'a ngasas
460b3(mdo sde): mug dun lhus dul ngas pa / la bskye na nga sabyung //byang chub snyams ci ni yan 'di sa na//rlung byas du
460b4(mdo sde): myu b+h+r-i rten sems rnye // nA~M dun sdigs sa mad/d+mo/ m-i mr-i Sh+ThA hrI na nA pa/ sa
460b5(mdo sde): sa na na 'di mas sbyinam sbyin rdzun pa'i//ba na ma la la ga sa /
460b6(mdo sde): dri dag ma di meng// na pa 'di na //ma pa'i gyi mam dan su ts+tsha//su ma rgyams thal sa ni/
461a1(mdo sde): rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes ni tshigs su smras//byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sems bskyed do//bdag ni chos rje sangs rgyas grub par shog/byang chub
461a2(mdo sde): rdul bral 'dus ma byas rtogs na//sems can gang+gA'i byi snyed dgrol bar bgyi//sangs rgyas su des tshogs bcad 'di brjod nas//de tshe rgyal po'i gtso bo dgo' gyur pa/
461a3(mdo sde): shes nas stong gsum thams cad rab g.yos te//ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du mkha' las song //rgyal po gser mdog sems ni dad gyur nas//bu dang bu mo de bzhin
461a4(mdo sde): chung ma dang //rgyal po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag rnams//sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal 'dong zhes bos//bye ba brgya phrag drug cus yongs bskor zhing //me tog
461a5(mdo sde): rnams dang phreng dang bdug pa thogs//sangs rgyas ga la bar ni gnyi rgyud song //zhabs la phyag btsal nas ni phyogs gcig 'dug/de bzhin bu dang bu mo chung ma
461a6(mdo sde): dang //blon po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag dang //rgyal po gzhan dang de bzhin 'khor gyi rnams//de dag kyang ni phyag btsal gus par 'khod//lha rnams kyis kyang
461a7(mdo sde): de bzhin bar snang thams cad khyab//sil snyan dkrol zhing me tog char pa phab//gser gyi mdog de yul gyi mis bskor nas//thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas zhu bar
461b1(mdo sde): byed//stobs bcu ldan pa dpag med lha yi lha//mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba khyod la zhu//gang gis byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed//de yi bsod nams ji tsam skyed
461b2(mdo sde): 'gyur lags//bcom ldan ji ltar spyod pa spyad bgyis na//bskal paM mang por sdug bsngal mi mthong bar//nges par bde dang bde blag tshims gyur pas//byang chub bdung
461b3(mdo sde): rtsi mya ngan med pa rtogs//bdag gzhor rkang lag btang yang mi 'tshal zhing //mgo dang rang sha stsa la yang mi 'tshal bar//bdag ni nges par bder gnas spyod pa yi//
461b4(mdo sde): thabs 'dir thub pas bdag la bstan du gsol//rtag tu bde dang bde blag ldan par shog/nams kyang bdag lus sdug bsngal ma gyur cig/byams dang bzod dang dul
461b5(mdo sde): dang sdom pa la//gnas nas bdag gis byang chub mchog reg shog/le lo ma mchis rtag tu bslab la slob//bdag gis bslab pa nams kyang gzhig mi bgyi//'den pa
461b6(mdo sde): bdag ni dam bcas brtan par bgyi//nam yang tshig tsam lhur len yong mi bgyid//rang byung bsod nams 'bras bu bdag la gsungs//de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa
461b7(mdo sde): bde ba gsungs//ji ltar spyad pa'i bslab pa bka' stsal gsol//thos nas ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par bgyi//gser 'od gser bkod 'od bzang des gsungs pa//
462a1(mdo sde): kye kye sa yi bdag po mnyan par gyis//bde ba'i rgyu yi bsod nams khyod la bshad//bslab pa'ang bshad kyis de phyir nga las nyon//gang gis stong
462a2(mdo sde): gsum rin chen gang byas la//stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la 'bul byed pa//de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa//bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur//
462a3(mdo sde): gang gris zhing rnams gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//rin chen gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin//de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa//bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur//
462a4(mdo sde): gang gis bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig tu//sems can thams cad la ni mchod pa byed//de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa//bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar
462a5(mdo sde): 'gyur//gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur//ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la//bsod namos 'dod pa'i gang zag la la zhig/bskal pa khrag
462a6(mdo sde): khrog bar du mchod pa byed//gang gis snying rje bskyed nus byang chub tu//rgya chen sems ni skyed par byed gyur te//sems can la la gang gis byang chub tu//sems kyi
462a7(mdo sde): gtso bo bskyed pa byas nos kyang //gom pa bdun ni bor ba'i bsod nams 'di//de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin//gal te sems can mtha' dag sangs
462b1(mdo sde): rgyas te//spobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid gyur pa//ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor ba'i bskal pa'i b.rarla//sems can gcig pus mchod pa byas pa dang //mkhas pa'i mi ni gang
462b2(mdo sde): yang rung ba yis//byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed nas kyang //me tog gcig pu phul ba'i bsod nams 'di//de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin//bskal
462b3(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni//bsod nams de yi bshad pa brtsam byas kyang //bsod nams 'bras bu de yi bshad pa ni//nam yang zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no//
462b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des rgyal po gser mdog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rgyal po chen po chos gcig
462b5(mdo sde): dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du theg pa bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
462b6(mdo sde): la/sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde bar yang mi 'gyur ro//chos gcig po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bge yod pa ste/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' bgo
462b7(mdo sde): yod pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bslab pa yongs su
463a1(mdo sde): mi gtong ba dang /dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa dang /sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi
463a2(mdo sde): gtong ba dang /byang chub la 'dun pa brtun pa dang /brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /chos la
463a3(mdo sde): gus pa dang /thos pa mang bros chog mi shes pa dang /gzhan dag la chos kyi bgo bsha' byed pa dang /zang zing med par chos ston pa dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan
463a4(mdo sde): dang yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams mi gtong ba dang /'dod pa nyung ba drang /chog shes pa dang /nga rgyal bcom pa dang /cho sra mnyan pa la rnab blags te nyan pa dang /bla ma
463a5(mdo sde): la gus pa dang /bzod pa la gnas pa dang /gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs pa dang /zab mo stong pa nyid kyi chos la mos pa dang /dmigs par lta ba
463a6(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par spangs pa dang /nang du yang dag 'jog la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi g.yel ba dang /'du shes
463a7(mdo sde): zlog pa dang /bre mo gtam rnam par spong ba dang /lus dang sems dben par gnas pa dang /dgon par gnas pa dang /sems mnyen pa dang /tshul khrims
463b1(mdo sde): mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang /bdag la mi bstod pa dang /gzhan la mi smod pa dang /'gyod pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byed pa dang /mngon par 'byung ba dang //
463b2(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi tshul la rgyun du dga' ba dang /gsong por smra ba dang /bzhin khro gnyer med pa dang /chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa la 'dzud pa dang /
463b3(mdo sde): chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rtogs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brag yod pa zhes bya'o//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa
463b4(mdo sde): ni 'di lta ste/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /dmigs par lta ba'i sems tha na rmi lam du'ang yid la mi byed pa ste/rgyal po chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i
463b5(mdo sde): bag yod pa'o//rgyal po chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
463b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/mgo bo dang /rkang lag dang /mig drang /yan lag dang /sha dang /khrag dang /rus pa dang /rkang dang /tshil dang /mdog dang /pags pa dang /lus
463b7(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su gtong ba'ang yongs su btang mi dgos par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar yang 'gyur la/theg pa bde bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
464a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos
464a2(mdo sde): yongs su btsal ba la yi dam brtan pa yin te/de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci bskyed kyang rung ste/de la brtan por gnas shing zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan la theg
464a3(mdo sde): pa chen po la shin tu brtan no//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu yongs su dag pa/'phags pa dang mkhris pas
464a4(mdo sde): bsngags pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis yongs su zin pa dang ldan pa yin te/des ni bdag nyid tshul khrims la gnas par rig nas chos
464a5(mdo sde): kyi draga' ba nyams su myong ngo //rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pas gnas pa dang /bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa dang /mi gnas
464a6(mdo sde): pa'i bsam gtan po yin te/rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing mi gnas pa yid la byed pa dang /sems can thams cad la snyoms
464a7(mdo sde): pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i bde bar gnas pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bde ba'i rnam pa gzhan med do//rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ba bzhin du
464b1(mdo sde): chos la rtog pa yin te/de ni 'di ltar ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rtog ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa 'dri dag thams cad ni stong pa ste/'di ltar bdag dam/sems can nam/
464b2(mdo sde): srog gam/gang zag gam/yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa 'am/yongs su btang ba gang yin pa'am/len pa gang yin pa'am/bzod par byed pa gang yin pa'am/
464b3(mdo sde): gang la bzod par bya ba'am/bzod par bya ba gang yin pa'am/rtsom pa gang yin pa'am/gang gi phyir rtsom pa'am/bsam gtan byed pa gang yin pa'am/bsam gtan
464b4(mdo sde): du bya ba gang yin pa'am/sgom par byed pa grang yin pa'am/bsgom par bya ba gang yin pa gang yang med do snyam mo//de de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa na 'dus byas kyi chos
464b5(mdo sde): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas dmigs par lta ba gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med la bde bar yang gnas te/rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i
464b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bde ba thams cad dang ldan par myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
464b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gser mdog des bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i gos kyi sbyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa de la phul nas bcom ldan 'das de
465a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sems can
465a2(mdo sde): thams cad la glo brje ba'i slad du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes gsol nas/de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
465a3(mdo sde): gsol to//bdag ni zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su//mi mchog spyan sngar tshig ni gsol bar bgyi//sems can kun la snying rje bskyed nas kyang //'dren pa
465a4(mdo sde): sems ni byang chub gzhol bar bgyi//bdag la nams kyang g.yo rgyu ma mchis te//stobs bcu ldan pas bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen//yon tan mnga' ba grags
465a5(mdo sde): chen 'dra ba ni//lha mi gzhan la bdag gis dpang ma mchis//bdag ni sdug rnams skyabs dang skyob pa dang //dpung gnyen gyur te sdug bsngal chos rnams dgrol//khyu//
465a6(mdo sde): mchogra bdag nyid bde lnga gnas nas kyang //srog chags rnams ni bdag gis de la dag//'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos gang dag/de la bdag ni
465a7(mdo sde): spyad phyir gnas par bgyi//'dren pa ji ltar khyod ni lha mis mchod//de ltar bdag kyang mi rnams mchod rten shog/byang chub thams cad mchog ni tshol bgyid cing /
465b1(mdo sde): bskalnga pa mang por sbyin pa byin par bgyi//zas skom gos dang shing rta bzhon pa dang //glaser dngul rin chen du mA'i sbyin pa bgyi//'dren pa bdag ni bslab la gus par bgyid
465b2(mdo sde): de ni ji bzhin yongs su bsrung bar bgyi//nyams par mi bgyid gang la'ang gnas mi bgyid//'dren pa bdag ni tshul khrims dag par bgyid//sems can kun la snyoms
465b3(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa yis//srog chags rnams la byams pa'i sems su bgyi//bkur sti bgyis dang bkur sti ma bgyis lnga//mtho bar 'gyur dang dra ma' bar 'gyur ma mchis//
465b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba mang po bsam yas par//bdag ni ji srid sngan chad 'khor bar gyur//mi dpa' khyod la brten nas de srid du//sems can gcig gi phyir yang spro bar bgyi//
465b5(mdo sde): lha mi'i 'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa yi//bsam gtan bde ba de la gnas par bgyi//'dren pa bsam gtan bde la reg gnas shing //rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas su
465b6(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi//bdagra ni stong pa nyid la nges par bgyi//lta ba la ni brten par yong mi bgyid//dma' ba'i spyod pa rtag tu rnam par spang //mchog gi spyod pa dri med
465b7(mdo sde): spyad par bgyi//rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gser mdog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag pa de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen
466a1(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so//rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
466a2(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed do//khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /bu drang bu mo dang /chung ma de dag dang /gzhan
466a3(mdo sde): skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang /lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams rgyal po gser mdog de'i rjes su slob cing thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
466a4(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog des bu thu bo rgyal por bcug go/bcug nas kyang bu rnams dang /bu mo rnams dang /chung
466a5(mdo sde): ma rnams dang /tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag dang /blon po dang /rgyal phran rnams dang lhan cig tu srog chags bye bas bskor te dad pas khyim nas khyim med par
466a6(mdo sde): rab tu byung ngo //de dag de ltar rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yongs su drug pa yongs su byung ba spyad do//rgyal po gser mdog gis kyang mngon
466a7(mdo sde): par shes pa bsgrubs nas mang du thos pa'i mthar phyin par gyur to//byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs so//de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa la
466b1(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas nyi khri mnyes par byas te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la'ang na bza' dang
466b2(mdo sde): zhal zas dang /gzims cha dang /gdon dang /spun gyi gsos sman dang /yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/bla mar byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams
466b3(mdo sde): cad kyi thad du dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gser mdog tu gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nye'am/
466b4(mdo sde): yid gnyis sam/the tshom za na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na
466b5(mdo sde): rgyal po gser mdog tu gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na tshangs par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin go shegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag byar rdzogs pa'i spangs
466b6(mdo sde): rgya gser bzang 'od de la mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/yid gnyis sam/the tshom ze na rigs kyi bu
466b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam par brtse ba khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na tshangs par gyur to//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin
467a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gser bzung 'od la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed par spro bar gyur pra gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/yid
467a2(mdo sde): gnyis sam/the tshom za ni rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin du gyur te/byang chub tu sems
467a3(mdo sde): ma bskyed par mi gnas pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsnyen bkur byas so//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na sems cani ji snyed kyis rgyal po gser mdog
467a4(mdo sde): dang lhon cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi nang nas tha na sems can gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
467a5(mdo sde): chub las phyir ldog pa ngas ma mthong ste/de dag thams cad ni shes rab tsho ba dang /brtson 'grus che ba sha stag ste/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par/
467a6(mdo sde): bsgrubs shing /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad po dag tu mtshan tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur te 'jig rten du
467a7(mdo sde): byung nas thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
467b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang nga dang //khyod dang /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /'khor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
467b2(mdo sde): po 'dus pa gang yin pa 'di dag gis kyang mthong ngo //mchod pa byas so//bsnyen bkur byas so//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang bzung ngo //de nas
467b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di ska/de ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
467b4(mdo sde): byang chub de tsam du yun ring du thogs pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'ang de tsam du dka' ba ni ngo mtshar lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe
467b5(mdo sde): na/des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'ang
467b6(mdo sde): de'i gsung rab la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ma bskyed pa'i slad du'o//de skad ces gsol nas/bcom
467b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin te/khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin
468a1(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di ni yun ring du thogs so//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'ang
468a2(mdo sde): dka'o//rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sngon
468a3(mdo sde): rol dang de'i 'og tu'ang sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la ngas ri mo byas/mchod pa byas/bkur sti byas/bla mar byas mod kyi/de srid du ngas bla
468a4(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed de gzhan du na nga 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag de tsam du mdzes shing de tsam du
468a5(mdo sde): blta na sdug la/de tsam du snying du sdug pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam skye//de dag la nga'i sdug pa'i sems dang /dga' ba dang /gus pa bskyed par zad de/des bla na med pa yang
468a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni sems ma bskyed do//rigs kyi bu de bas ni rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
468a7(mdo sde): phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang /rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag
468b1(mdo sde): drabrag tu med grangs med pa drug la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mchod pa byas su zin kyang de srid du'ang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa rma/
468b2(mdo sde): mi bskyed de/gzhan du na phyis gung gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dus par gyur pa de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par zad do//de
468b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag paka'i sprul to//dang po dag ni don dam gzigs pa dang //grags pa chen po shes rab pha rol son/
468b4(mdo sde): mchog sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang //bas ma las rnams la gus pas mchod pa byed//dang por yon tan 'byung gnas rnams mchod kyang //bdag ni mkhas pa chos
468b5(mdo sde): kun shes pa'i mchog/'jig rten mchod rten sangs rgyas gyur cig ces//de srid du yang sems ni skyed mi byed//de dag rang rgyal bye ba snyed la yang //gus pa bskyed nas
468b6(mdo sde): mchod pa byed myod kyi//mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba rdzogs sangs rgyas//gyur ces sems ni de skyid skyed mo byed//gus pa rgya chen yang dag bskyed nas kyang //dbang du gyur pa
468b7(mdo sde): bye snyed mtshong mod kyi//ye shes rgya mtsho mi mchog 'dra bar ni//de srid du yang sems ni skyed mo byed//don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas//dga' ba'i
469a1(mdo sde): shugs ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab//mkhas pa mi 'dul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su//gyur ces sems ni de srid skyed mi byed//gung che de dang bsod
469a2(mdo sde): nams rgya chen bsags//lus dang yid kyis bden pa bsgoms pa na//'dren pa mi rnams mchog tu gyur cig ces//byang chub don du sems ni skyed par byed//de
469a3(mdo sde): dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba snyed//bsnyen bkur byas pas bsod nams tshogs bsags nas//snrums dge ba dang 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis//de tshe byang chub tu yang
469a4(mdo sde): sems bskyed de//bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa//des ni bdag kyang thams cad gzigs gyur cig/nams kyang bdag gi smon lam nyams ma gyur//
469a5(mdo sde): de dag de skad smon lam 'jug par 'gyur//bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa//des ni srog chags thams cad brgal gyur cig/mi dge'i las ni bdag
469a6(mdo sde): gis gang byas pa//de yi 'bras bu mi zad bdag gis spangs//mthu dang brtson 'grus brtan po bskyed nas ni//phyi nas byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed//sems
469a7(mdo sde): ni nams kyang zhum par ma gyur cig/dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas thob gyur cig/mkhas pa sems la dmigs par mi byed de//byang chub mi dmigaso bdag nyid
469b1(mdo sde): kun mi dmigs//chos 'di mtha' dag stong par shes na ni//des na byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das
469b2(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ci'i skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
469b3(mdo sde): po byams pa la/byams pa zhes bgyi/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'dis ming 'drig las rnyed legs/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
469b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brje ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa
469b5(mdo sde): grangs med pa bas kyang chos grangs med pa yun ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig/
469b6(mdo sde): pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom
469b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byu ste/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de bcis ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor ba ni gnas
470a1(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bzung ngo //rin po che'i gdugs des kyang stong gsum gyi stong
470a2(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so//der lha rnams kyis kye me 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rIn+da chen gdugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra
470a3(mdo sde): bsgrags te/dus ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan rin tshun gdugs rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar gyur to//de'i tshe dro'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
470a4(mdo sde): pra yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs de'i gsung rab la dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya ba tshong dpon gyi rigs las rab tu byung ba zhig yod de//
470a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po de bsod snyoms par gyur to//de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs po rin chen gdugs de'i bstan pa la byib pa na dza m+bu'i gling de na
470a6(mdo sde): grong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do//grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do//grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do//yul 'khor brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do//tshong
470a7(mdo sde): 'dus brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do//dge slong blo gros brtan pa de'ang grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /tshong ngus de dag thams cad du/
470b1(mdo sde): bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar gyur la/de 'di snyam du sems te/nam sreg chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar du bdag gis zan mi bza'o snyam mo//rigs/
470b2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des de lta bu'i yi dam de bcas nas grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/yul 'khor ram/tshong dus gang dang glang du bsong
470b3(mdo sde): snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba de dang der nas srog chags brgya cheng bar bslab pa'i gzhi ldi la ma bkod kyi bar zan mi za'o//rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po dris glang gi tshe nyi ma gcig/
470b4(mdo sde): gis srog tshogs brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do//gang gi tshe nyi ma gnyis kyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa
470b5(mdo sde): de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod de/des zan bcad nas nyi ma gsum pa'i tshe zan za'o//gang gi tshe nyo ma gsum gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i
470b6(mdo sde): dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do//nyi ma bzhis srog chags brgya chung bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do//rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe nyi ma lnga
470b7(mdo sde): dang /drug dang /bdun gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang /de'i skabs kyang yod de/de zhag bdun gyi bar du zan chad kyang sems can
471a1(mdo sde): rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir sems yongs su mi skyo ste zhag brgyad pa'i tshe zan za'o//rigs kyi bu rnam grangs de lta bus dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo
471a2(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems kyis grong khyer chen po de dag tu spong zhing grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdul dang /yul 'khor dang /tshong
471a3(mdo sde): 'dus de dag tu song nas sems can de dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do//rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brten po des lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'das nas
471a4(mdo sde): srog chags skyes pa dang r+m+ma bud med dang /khye'u dang bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtswa drug bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge
471a5(mdo sde): slong blo gros brtan po de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis sems can mang po 'di drug bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bgrod zin gyis/bdag gis 'di dag bla na med pa
471a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzung gor ma chag go snyam ste/de de dag gi tha~Md du song nas lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod
471a7(mdo sde): do//chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do//dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do//theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa brjod do//sems can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod
471b1(mdo sde): pipo glang yin pa'i sems can de dag gi nang nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong pa gzhan 'das nas srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu tshang ba gang dag sngon gyi srungs rgyas rnams la dge
471b2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rgya chen po la mos pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud do//lhag myi dmyan pa la mos pa rkyen gyi mthu dong ldan pa de dag ni
471b3(mdo sde): rlung sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems bskyed de bcug go/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'dri snyam du sems te/bdag
471b4(mdo sde): gis sems can 'di drag theg po gsum po la mos par byas zin gyis/bdagra gris sems can 'di dag bag yod par gnas par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin la gzungs
471b5(mdo sde): bstan to snyam mo//rigs kyi bu de ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des yang lo nyi khri chig stong gi bar du srog chags bya ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la
471b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i lung phrog go/rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtswa drug po'i sems can de dag
471b7(mdo sde): thams cad ci nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur gdams ngag bsten cing /de lta de lta bur rjes su ston te//rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong bla
472a1(mdo sde): gros brtan po de gang gi tshe grong du 'gro ba de'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'gro'o//de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
472a2(mdo sde): zhugs nas grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam/yul 'khor ram/tshong 'dus su bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ste/de 'gro ba na sems cani byams pa la
472a3(mdo sde): gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i rkang pa sgo'i thim pa la bzhag pa'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to//
472a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba la yid ches pa dang /stong pa nyid la mos pa'i khyad par la ltos/de'i phyir dge slong blo gros brtan po'i rkang pa sgo'i
472a5(mdo sde): them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ji ltar btsud pa bzhin du byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//de
472a6(mdo sde): nas de'i tshe dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu mthong nas sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyis a la la byang chub sems dpa'
472a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/'di ltar 'di grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /tshong 'dus su 'gro ba na sems can
472b1(mdo sde): rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra sgrogs shing skad 'byin par byed do//sa bla ba'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sgra
472b2(mdo sde): bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo //de dag gis sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /
472b3(mdo sde): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi bar du gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos nas a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
472b4(mdo sde): chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/'di ltar 'di grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /tshong 'dus su song ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge
